xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,bemi bomzantsi afrika, sinovuyo ukunazisa ukuba ekupheleni kweyomnga, besesidale amathuba emisebenzi yoluntu engaphezulu kwama-480 000, into ethetha ukuthi ngama-97% yenani ebesijolise kulo.
zul: lawa mathuba emisebenzi akhelwe ukunikeza abantu abangasebenzi amasentshana, isipiliyoni somsebenzi kanye namathuba okuqeqeshwa.

xho: le yimisebenzi efana neyokwakha, unakekelo lwezempilo lwasekhaya nolwasekuhlaleni, neeprojekti zokusingqongileyo.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile, bantu baseningizimu afrika,sinenjabulo yokubika ukuthi ekupheleni kukazibandlela, bese sakhe amathuba emisebenzi yomphakathi angaphezu kwe-480 000, nokungamaphesenti angama-97 omkhawulo esasizibekele wona.

xho: sityumbe imimandla ethile efuna ukuphuculwa, esiza kuyisebenzisa ukuya phambili, kuquka nokuqinisekisa ngeeprojekti ezijolise kakhulu ekusekweni kwemisebenzi.
zul: imisebenzi yakhiwe ezindaweni ezifana nezokwakha, onompilo bomphakathi kanye nabasemakhaya, kanye nasezinhlelweni zezemvelo.

xho: siyayazi ukuba oku namanye amanyathelo akusoze kuyinciphise ngokupheleleyo impembelelo yokudodobala koqoqosho.
zul: sihlonze ezinye izindawo ezidinga ukwenziwa ngcono ezizoba nomthelela kwinqubekela phambili, okubandakanya ezinye izinhlelo ezisebenzisa abasebenzi abaningi.

xho: siyawubulela umoya weentsapho, wobuhlali nomsebenzi wamavolontiya ovuselela abantu abaninizi ukuba bancede abo bachatshazelwe kakhulu yile ntlekele, ngala maxesha obunzima.
zul: siyabonga ngomoya womndeni, womphakathi kanye nomsebenzi wobuvolontiya ogqugquzele abantu abaningi ukusiza labo abakhahlanyezwe yile nkinga, kulezi zikhathi ezinzima.

xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,iimpawu zoqoqosho zibonisa ukuba ngoku sesidlulile kwelona xesha linzima.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,izinkomba zomnotho zikhombisa ukuthi sesiyaphuma manje kule nkinga.

xho: uqoqosho luyakhula emzantsi afrika, kwaye silindele ukukhula koqoqosho okuya phambili.
zul: imisebenzi yezomnotho iyakhula eningizimu afrika futhi silindele ukukhula ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.

xho: iinkcukacha-manani zezemisebenzi ezikhutshwe ngolwesibini, zibonakalisa ukuba uqoqosho ludala amathuba emisebenzi kunokuba luyivale.
zul: izibalo zabasebenzi ezikhishwe ngolwesibili, zikhombisa ukuthi manje umnotho wakha imisebenzi kunokuyiqeda.

xho: kodwa ke, kuse kutsha noko, ukuba singaqiniseka ngezinga lokuphucuka.
zul: kusesekuseni kodwa ukuba nesiqiniseko ngesivinini sokusimama kwawo.

xho: ngoko ke, urhulumente akakazukuyirhoxisa inkxaso yakhe.
zul: ngakho-ke uhulumeni ngeke azihoxise izinyathelo zakhe zokweseka.

xho: ngoku lixesha lokuba sakhe isiseko sokukhula koqoqosho olomeleleyo ukuya phambili, nokukhula okuvelisa amathuba emisebenzi eyongezelelweyo.
zul: manje sekuyisikhathi sokwakha umsebenzi oyisisekelo sokukhula ngokuqina njengoba siphikelele phambili, kanye nomnotho okhulisa amathuba emisebenzi.

xho: inkqubo yethu yeziseko zoncedo yexesha elide iza kusinceda sikhule ngoku khawuleza.
zul: uhlelo lwethu lwesikhathi eside lwengqalasizinda luzosisiza ukuthi sikhule ngesivinini.

xho: iinkqubo zethu zezemfundo nezakhono ziza kwandisa ukuvelisa kwethu nokukhuphisana.
zul: izinhlelo zethu zezemfundo kanye namakhono zizokhulisa ukukhiqiza kwethu kanye nokuncintisana.

xho: isicwangciso sokusebenza komgaqo-nkqubo wezoshishino wethu nengqwalasela yethu entsha kwimisebenzi efanelekileyo ngokusingqongileyo, siyakwakha ushishino olomelele ngokuthe chatha noluqesha abantu abaninzi.
zul: uhlelo lwethu lokusebenza lwenqubomgomo yezimboni kanye nokugxila kwethu emisebenzini yemvelo luzokwakha izimboni eziqinile futhi eziqasha abasebenzi abaningi.

xho: inkqubo yethu yophuhliso lwamaphandle iya kuphucula imveliso yasemaphandleni, kwakunye nobomi babantu abahlala emaphandleni.
zul: uhlelo lwethu lokuthuthukisa izindawo zasemakhaya luzokwenza ngcono ukukhiqiza ezindaweni zasemakhaya, kanye nezimpilo zabantu abahlala ezindaweni zasemakhaya.

xho: isiseko sesicwangciso-qhinga sethu sokubuyisela uqoqosho nokukhula, inkqubo yethu yotyalo-mali lwemali eyinkunzi.
zul: isisekelo seqhinga lethu lokusimama kanye nokukhula komnotho, wuhlelo lwethu lokutshala izimali.

xho: kule minyaka mithathu izayo, urhulumente uza kuchitha ama-r846 eebhiliyoni kwiziseko zoncedo zoluntu.
zul: eminyakeni emithathu ezayo, uhulumeni uzochitha izigidigidi ezingama-846 zamarandi kwizingqalasizinda zomphakathi.

xho: kwezothutho, siza kulolonga sandise uthungelwano lwethu leendlela.
zul: kwezokuthutha, sizokhanda futhi sisabalalise ubuxhakaxhaka bemigwaqo yethu.

xho: siza kuqinisekisa ukuba uthungelwano lwethu lomzila kaloliwe luthembakele, luyakhuphisana kwaye ludityaniswe ngendlela engcono namazibuko wethu.
zul: sizokwenza isiqiniseko ukuthi ubuxhakaxhaka bemizila yethu ehamba izitimela ithembekile, iyancintisana futhi ididiyelwe kahle nezikhumulo zethu zemikhumbi.

xho: ukuqinisekisa unikezelo mbane oluthembakeleyo, siye saseka ikomiti yabaphathiswa kwezamandla, ukuze baphuhlise isicwangciso semithombo esidibeneyo seminyaka engama-20.
zul: ukuqinisekisa ukuphakelwa kukagesi okuthembekile, sakhe ikomidi likagesi elakhiwe ngongqongqoshe, ukuthuthukisa uhlelo oludidiyelwe lwemithombo lweminyaka engama-20.

xho: phakathi kwezinye izinto, oku kuya kujonga ekuthatheni inxaxheba kwabavelisi bombane abazimeleyo, nokukhusela abantu abahluphekileyo kumaxabiso ombane onyukayo.
zul: phakathi kwezinye izinto, lokhu kuzobheka ekubambeni iqhaza kwabakhiqizi bakagesi abazimele, kanye nokuvikela abadla imbuya ngothi kumanani kagesi akhuphukayo.

xho: siza kuseka ulawulo lwenkqubo ezimeleyo, eyahlukileyo ku-eskom holdings.
zul: sizosungula umlawuli wohlelo oluzimele, olungahlangene nenkampani yakwa-eskom.

xho: u-eskom uza kuqhubekeka ukwakha amandla okuvelisa aze aphucule indlela yokulolonga izikhululo zakhe.
zul: u-eskom uzoqhubeka nokwakha ezinye iziphehlo zokukhiqiza ugesi kanye nokwenza ngcono ukukhandwa kweziteshi zokuphehlwa kukagesi.

xho: ukuqinisekisa ukukhuthaza uqoqosho oluquka wonke umntu, ukuncedisa nokuphuhlisa, siye saseka ibhunga lokucebisa lokuxhotyiswa kwabamnyama ngokubanzi kwezoqoqosho, usihlalo walo ngumongameli.
zul: ukuqinisekisa ukukhuthazwa komnotho ofaka wonke umuntu, ukusiza ukukhula kanye nokuthuthuka, sibuye sakha umkhandlu wokwelulela ohlelweni olunabile lokuthuthukiswa kwabamnyama kwezomnotho, kanti usihlalo wawongumongameli.

xho: eyona ngqwalasela intsha ingxamisekileyo lutshintsho lomgaqo-nkqubo ekufuneka ibe ngamangenelelo okudala amathuba emisebenzi yabantu abatsha.
zul: lapho esizogxila khona ezinguqukweni zenqubomgomo kufanele kube wukungenelela ekwakheni imisebenzi yentsha.

xho: izinga lokungaphangeli kwabantu abatsha lingaphezu kokuqonda.
zul: amazinga entsha entula imisebenzi makhulu kakhulu kunokujwayelekile.

xho: kuza kwenziwa iziphakamiso zokuncedisa kwiindleko zokuqeshwa kwabasebenzi abasebatsha, ukukhuthaza iifemu ukuba ziqeshe abasebenzi abangenamava.
zul: iziphakamiso zizondlalwa ukuxhasa ezindlekweni zokuqasha abasebenzi abancane, ukukhuthaza amafemu ukuthi aqashe abasebenzi abangenaso isipiliyoni.

xho: okunye ukwandiswa kwenkqubo yemisebenzi yoluntu nako kusendleleni.
zul: okunye ukusatshalaliswa kwezinhlelo zokuqashwa komphakathi seziqalile.

xho: oku kuquka iziseko zoncedo zasekhaya neeprojekti zamaziko emfundo ephakamileyo neeprojekti zezakhono zokufunda nokubhala, unakekelo lwezempilo lasekhaya, ukunakekelwa kwezikolo namaphulo okuphuhliswa kwabantwana abasakhulayo.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ingqalasizinda yendawo kanye nezinhlelo zemfundo ephakeme kanye nezokufunda, ukunakekelwa emakhaya, ukulungiswa kwezikole kanye nezinhlelo zokuthuthukiswa kwezingane zisencane.

xho: kulo nyaka uphelileyo siseke i-arhente yophuhliso lolutsha yesizwe.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, sathula inhlangano kazwelonke yokuthuthukiswa kwentsha.

xho: siyalele ukuba le arhente mayisebenze ngokukhawuleza ukuseka iziseko zayo, elizweni jikelele, ukuze ibe nokuncedisa ukufaka iinkqubo zophuhliso lolutsha eburhulumenteni.
zul: sijube inhlangano ukuthi isebenze ngokushesha ukwakha izinhlaka zayo, ezweni lonke, ukuze sikwazi ukufaka izinhlelo zokuthuthukiswa kwentsha kuhulumeni.

xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,ekungeneni kolu lawulo kulo nyaka uphelileyo, saqalisa ukusebenza ngamandla ukwakha isizwe esiphuhlayo.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,ngesikhathi lo hulumeni uthatha izintambo ngonyaka ofile, sazinikela ekusebenzeni ngokuzikhandla ukwakha umbuso othuthukayo oqinile.

xho: sathi iya kuba sisizwe esihoyana neemfuno neminqweno yabantu, esisebenza ngcono nangokukhawuleza.
zul: sathi kuyoba umbuso ophendula kwizidingo kanye nezifiso zabantu, futhi osebenza kangcono futhi ngokushesha.

xho: lo nyaka, wama-2010, uza kuba ngunyaka wokuba kusetyenzwe.
zul: lo nyaka we-2010 kufanele kube ngunyaka wokusebenza.

xho: olona phawu lubalulekileyo kolu lawulo iza kuba kukuba luyabazi abantu ukuba bahlala phi na, luyaziqonda iimfuno zabo kwaye lusabela ngokukhawuleza.
zul: into eyenza lohulumeni uhluke ukuthi uyazi ukuthi abantu bahlala kuphi, uyaziqonda izindingo zabo, futhi uphendula ngokushesha.

xho: urhulumente kufuneka asebenze ngokukhawuleza, ngamandla nangcono.
zul: uhulumeni kufanele asebenze ngokushesha, ngokuzikhandla futhi ngobuchule.

xho: siza kulindela ukuba iinkonzo zesigqeba nezoluntu ukuba ziwuthobele lo mbono.
zul: sizolindela isigungu esiphezulu kanye nabasebenzi bakahulumeni ukuthi bathobele lo mbono.

xho: sakha isizwe esisekelezelwe ekwenziweni komsebenzi, ngokuphucula ucwangciso kwakunye nohlolo novavanyo lomsebenzi.
zul: sakha umbuso ogxile ekusebenzeni, ngokwenza ngcono ukuhlela kanye nokuqapha nokuhlola indlela okusetshenzwa ngayo.

xho: sikwafuna ukuquka amanyathelo okulingana ngokwesini kwinkqubo yomsebenzi karhulumente.
zul: sidinga futhi ududidiyela izinyathelo zokulingana ngokobulili ohlelweni lokusebenza lukahulumeni.

xho: la manyathelo ayakuqinisekisa ukuba abantu ababhinqileyo, abantwana nabantu abakhubazekileyo bayakwazi ukufikelela kumathuba ophuhliso.
zul: lesi sinyathelo sizoqinisekisa ukuthi abesimame, izingane kanye nabantu abakhubazekile bayakwazi ukuthola amathuba entuthuko.

xho: sinovuyo ukwazisa ngendlela entsha yokusebenza kurhulumente.
zul: siyajabula ukwethula indlela entsha yokwenza izinto kuhulumeni.

xho: imisebenzi yamasebe iya kulinganiswa ngemiphumela, ephuhliswe ngenkqubo yethu yohlolo novavanyo lomsebenzi.
zul: imisebenzi yeminyango izokalwa ngemiphumela ethuthukiswe ngokusebenzisa uhlelo lokuqapha nokuhlola indlela okusetshenzwa ngayo.

xho: abaphathiswa abajongene nemiphumela ethile, baya kutyikitya isivumelwano sokwenziwa komsebenzi esicwangcisiweyo kumongameli.
zul: ongqongqoshe abanomsebenzi womphumela othile bazosayina isivumelwano esibanzi nomongameli.

xho: siza kucacisa ukuba yintoni ekufanele yenziwe, njani, ngubani, phakathi kwexesha elingakanani na kwaye kusetyenziswa wuphi umlinganiselo nayiphi imithombo.
zul: sizobalula ukuthi yini okufanele yenziwe, kanjani, ngubani, esikhathini esingakanani futhi kusetshenziswa kuphi ukukala kanye nezinsiza.

xho: njengoko nisazi, sizibophelele kwiindawo zantlanu eziphambili emakuqalwe ngazo: ezemfundo, ezempilo, uphuhliso lwamaphandle novuselelo lomhlaba, ukudala umsebenzi ofanelekileyo, nokulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho.
zul: njengoba nazi, sizibophezele emisebenzini emihlanu eseqhulwini: ezemfundo, ezempilo, ukuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya kanye nokuhlelwa kabusha komhlaba, ukwakha imisebenzi ehloniphekile kanye nokulwa nobugebengu.

xho: ukongeza, siza kusebenzela ukuphucula ukusebenza koorhulumente basekhaya, uphuhliso lweziseko zoncedo neendawo zokuhlala koluntu.
zul: phezu kwalokhu, sizosebenzela ukwenza ngcono indlela asebenza ngayo uhulumeni wasekhaya, ukuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda kanye nokuhlaliswa kwabantu.

xho: siza kwenza imisebenzi emininzi engundoqo ukujolisa ekuphumezeni le miphumela.
zul: sizoqala imisebenzi eminingana ekubhekeni ukufeza le miphumela.

xho: ingqwalasela yethu enkulu siyibeke kwezemfundo nasekuphuhlisweni kwezakhono kwimigaqo-nkqubo yalo rhulumente.
zul: kuhlelo lwethu lonyaka we-2010 sifuna ukwenza ngcono ikhono lezingane zethu lokufunda, ukubhala, ukubala eminyakeni yemfundo eyisisekelo.

xho: asisokuze siwuphucule umgangatho wemfundo, ngaphandle kokuba senze oku.
zul: ngaphandle uma senza lokhu, ngeke sikwazi ukwenza ngcono izinga lemfundo.

xho: iinjongo zethu eziphambili kwezemfundo zilula kodwa zibalulekile.
zul: imikhawulo yemfundo esizibekele yona ilula kodwa ibalulekile.

xho: sifuna ukuba abafundi kunye nootitshala babe sesikolweni, emagumbini okufundela, ngexesha, bafunde kwaye bafundise iiyure ezisixhenxe ngosuku.
zul: sifuna othisha nabafundi babe sesikoleni, emagunjini okufundela, ngesikhathi, befunda futhi befundisa amahora ayisikhombisa ngosuku.

xho: siza kuncedisa ootitshala ngokubabonelela ngezicwangciso zemihla ngemihla zezifundo ezineenkcukacha.
zul: sizosiza othisha ngokubanikeza izinhlelo zesifundo sosuku ezinqala.

xho: abafundi, siyakuba bonelela ngeencwadi zokusebenzela ekulula ukuzisebenzisa ezifumaneka ngeelwimi ezili-11.
zul: kubafundi, sizobanikeza izincwadi okulula ukuzisebenzisa ngezilimi eziyi 11. kusukela kulo nyaka kuya phambili, bonke abafundi bebanga lesithathu, lesithupha kanye nelesishiyagalolunye bazobhala ukuhlolwa kwelitheresi kanye nezibalo okuhlelwe ngokuzimela.

xho: sizimisele ukwandisa izinga lempumelelo kolu vavanyo lisuke kwizinga lomlinganiso ophakathi wangoku ophakathi kwama-35 nama-40% ukuya kuma-60% ngowama-2014 ubuncinane.
zul: sihlose ukukhuphula izinga lokuphasa kulokhu kuhlolwa elisuka phakathi kwamaphesenti angama-35 kuya kwangama-40 eya okungenani kumaphesenti angama-60 ngonyaka we-2014.

xho: iziphumo ziya kuthunyelwa kubazali ukuze bakwazi ukubona inkqubela.
zul: imiphumela iyothunyelelwa abazali ukubheka inqubekela phambili.

xho: ukongeza apho, isikolo ngasinye kwizikolo zethu ezingama-27 000 ziya kuhlolwa ngamagosa esebe lemfundo esisiseko.
zul: phezu kwalokhu, isikole ngasinye ezikoleni eziyi-2700 sizohlolwa ngumhloli ophuma emnyangweni wemfundo eyisisekelo.

xho: oku kuya kushicelelwa kwingxelo ebhaliweyo ezakuphicothwa.
zul: lokhu kuyoqoshwa kumbiko obhaliwe olungisekayo.

xho: sizimisele ukulandisa inani labafundi bematriki abalungele ukungena eyunivesithi liyokuma kwi-175 000 ngonyaka ngowama-2014.
zul: sihlose ukukhulisa isibalo sabafundi bebanga leshumi abamukelekayo emanyuvesi nge-175 000 ngonyaka we-2014.

xho: sicela abazali ukuba basebenzisane kunye nathi ekwenzeni oku kube yimpumelelo.
zul: sinxusa abazali ukuthi babambisane nathi ukwenza lokhu impumelelo.

xho: siyayamkela intetho eyenziwe yimibutho yootitshala, i-naptosa, sadtu ne-saou, xa bengqina ukuzibophelela kwabo kwiphulo lokufunda nokufundisa okusemgangathweni ukususela ekuqaleni kowama-2010.
zul: siyasamukela isitatimende esithulwe yizinyunyana ezintathu zothisha, i-naptosa, sadtu kanye ne-saou, begcizelela ukuzinikela kwabo emkhankasweni wokufundisa nokufunda okuqotho ekuqaleni konyaka we-2010.

xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,kufanele sidale ihlumelo kulutsha lwethu ukuqinisekisa abasebenzi abanezakhono nabakwaziyo ukusebenza ukuxhasa ukukhula nokudalwa kwamathuba emisebenzi.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,sidinga ukutshala entsheni yethu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi bangabasebenzi abanamakhono futhi abakwaziyo ukusebenza ukusekela ukukhula kanye nokwakhiwa kwemisebenzi.

xho: ngako oko siceba ukwandisa uqeqesho lwababudala buphakathi kwe-16 ?
zul: ngakho-ke sihlela ukuqeqesha intsha eneminyaka eyi-16 kuya kwengama-25 ezikhungweni zokuqeqeshwa kanye nokuqhutshezwa kwemfundo.

xho: oku kuza kusivumela ukuba sinike abo bangakulungelanga ukungena eyunivesiti ngokwemfundo, ithuba lesibini kwimfundo.
zul: lokhu kuzosenza sikwazi ukunikeza ithuba lesibili lemfundo kulabo, abangenayo imiphumela efanele yokubangenisa enyuvesi.

xho: sisebenzisana namaziko emfundo ephakamileyo ukuqinisekisa ukuba abafundi abafanelekileyo bafumana uncedo lwemali, ngesikimu soncedo lwezezimali lwabafundi sesizwe.
zul: sisebenza nezikhungo zemfundo ephakeme ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abafundi abafanele bathola usizo lwezezimali, ngokusebenzisa isikhwama sikazwelonke sokusiza abafundi ngezimali.

xho: kwakhona sizibekele ngebhongo iinjongo eziphambili zophuhliso lwezakhono, ukuvelisa iinjineli namagcisa ongezelelweyo, nokwandisa inani lootitshala abalungele ukufundisa izibalo nenzululwazi.
zul: siphinde sazibekela imikhawulo ethile yokuthuthukiswa kwamakhono, ukukhiqiza abanye onjiniyela kanye nochwepheshe, kanye nokukhulisa isibalo sothisha abaneziqu zezibalo kanye nesayensi.

xho: kufuneka sandise inani lolutsha olungenela uqeqesho emisebenzini kumacandelo abucala nawakarhulumente.
zul: kufanele siphinde sikhulise isibalo sentsha eqeqeshelwa imisebenzi emikhakheni ezimele kanye nekahulumeni.

xho: omnye umphumela ongundoqo kukuqinisekisa ubomi obude nobusempilweni kubo bonke abemi bomzantsi afrika.
zul: omunye umphumela obalulekile ukuqinisekisa impilo ende futhi enhle kuzo zonke izakhamizi zaseningizimu afrika.

xho: siza kuqhubekeka ukuphucula inkqubo yethu yonakekelo lwezempilo.
zul: sizoqhubeka nokwenza ngcono uhlelo lwethu lokunakekelwa ngezempilo.

xho: oku kuquka ukwakhiwa nokuphuculwa kwezibhedlele neekliniki, nokuqhubekeka ukuphucula iimeko abasebenza phantsi kwazo abasebenzi bonakekelo lwezempilo.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ukwakha kanye nokulungisa izibhedlela kanye nemitholampilo, kanye nokwenza ngcono izimo zokusebenza kubasebenzi bezempilo.

xho: sizidibanise nebhanki yophuhliso yasemazantsi e-afrika ukuphucula iindlela ezisebenza ngayo izibhedlele zikarhulumente kunye nee-ofisi zazo zesithili.
zul: sibambisane nebhange lentuthuko laseningizimu ne-afrika ukwenza ngcono ukusebenza kwezibhedlela zomphakathi kanye namahhovisi ezifunda.

xho: kwakhona sikwasebenzisana nebhanki yophuhliso yasemazantsi e-afrika kunye nequmrhu lophuhliso lwamashishini, kwinkqubo yobehlulelani bukarhulumente nabezoshishino labucala ukuphucula izibhedlele nokubonelela iiprojekthi ngemali.
zul: sisebenza ngokubambisana futhi nebhange lentuthuko laseningizimu ne-afrika kanye nenhlangano yokuthuthukiswa kwezimboni, kuhlelo lukahulumeni ebambisene nezimboni ezizimele ukwenza ngcono izibhedlela kanye nokusiza ngezezimali ezinhlelweni.

xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,kufuneka sihoyane nento yokuba ukuba ubomi obuphilwayo ukusukela ekuzalweni komntu, kwehlile ukusuka kwiminyaka engama-60 ngowe-1994 kwayo kutsho njengaphantsi kwama-50 eminyaka namhlanje.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,kufanele sibhekane neqiniso lokuthi iminyaka yokuphila kusuka uzalwa yehlile isuka kwengama-60 kuya ngaphansi kwengama-50 namhlanje.

xho: ngoko ke senza amangenelela okunciphisa izinga lokubhubha kwabantwana abazalwayo, ukunciphisa usuleleko olutsha lwentsholongwane kagawulayo kwakunye nokunyanga ngokuvakalayo intsholongwane kagawulayo nesifo sephepha.
zul: ngakho-ke, siyangenelela ukwehlisa izinga lokushona kwabantwana bezalwa, ukunciphisa ukusuleleka ngesandulela ngculaza kanye nokwelapha isandulela ngculaza kanye nesifo sofuba.

xho: kwakhona siza kunciphisa ukubhubha kweentsana ngenkqubo yokugonya ngokobuninzi.
zul: sizophinda sehlise ukushona kwabantwana ngokusebenzisa uhlelo lokugoma.

xho: siza kubuyisela iinkqubo zezempilo ezikolweni.
zul: sizobuyisela izinhlelo zezempilo ezikoleni.

xho: siza kuphumeza zonke izivumelwano ezenziwa ngomhla kagawulayo wehlabathi ngokumalunga nothintelo olutsha lwentsholongwane kagawulayo namanyathelo onyango.
zul: sizoqalisa ukusebenzisa konke ukungenelela okwenziwa ngosuku lomhlaba lwengculaza oluphathelene nezinyathelo ezintsha zokuvimbela nokwelapha isandulela ngculaza.

xho: umsebenzi omkhulu uyenziwa ukuqinisekisa ukuba lo msebenzi ugqitywa ngexesha elifanelekileyo.
zul: umsebenzi omkhulu uyaqhubeka ukwenza isiqinisekiso ukuthi lo msebenzi uhamba ngokohlelo.

xho: kwakhona siza kuqhubekeka ngamalungiselelo okusekwa kwenkqubo ye-inshorensi yesizwe yezempilo.
zul: sizoqhubeka namalungiselelo okwakha uhlelo lomshuwalense kazwelonke wezempilo.

xho: bemi bomzantsi afrika,senza konke okusemandleni wethu ukuqinisekisa ukuba wonke ubani emzantsi afrika uziva ekhuselekile kwaye ukhuselekile.
zul: zakhamizi zaseningizimu afrika,sisebenza kanzima ukuqinisekisa ukuthi wonke umuntu eningizimu afrika uzizwa ephephile futhi kuphephile.

xho: siza kuwuqhubela phambili umsebenzi wethu ukuciphisa ulwaphulo-mthetho olumasikizi nolunobundlongondlongo, nokuqinisekisa ukuba inkqubo yezobulungisa isebenza ngokuvakalayo.
zul: sizoqhubezela phambili umsebenzi wethu wokunciphisa amacala abucayi kanye nanesihluku futhi siqinisekise ukuthi uhlelo lwezobulungiswa lusebenza ngendlela efanele.

xho: siphumeza izicwangciso zokwandisa inani lamapolisa namapolisakazi nge-10% kule minyaka mithathu ilandelayo.
zul: siqalisa ukusebenza kwezinhlelo zokukhuphula isibalo samaphoyisa ngamaphesenti ayi-10 eminyakeni emithathu ezayo.

xho: sityumbe ukulwana nokuqweqwediswa, ukukhuthuza kwasekhaya nokwamashishini, kwakunye nolwaphulo-mthetho oluphakathi komntu nomtu olufana nobugebenga, ukudlwengula nokuhlasela, njengeendawo eziphambili ekufanele kuqalwe ngazo.
zul: sihlonze ukulwa nokuduna izimoto, ukuphangwa kwamabhizinisi kanye nezindlu, kanye nobugebengu obuhlanganisa abantu njengokubulala, ukudlwengula kanye nokushaya njengamacala aseqhulwini.

xho: sonke sinendima ekufanele siyidlalile.
zul: sonke sinendima okufanele siyidlale.

xho: masithathe inxaxheba kumaqonga okhuseleko nabahlali.
zul: asibambe iqhaza kuzinhlaka zokuphepha komphakathi.

xho: masiyeke ukuthenga izinto ezibiweyo.
zul: asiyeke ukuthenga izimpahla ezebiwe.

xho: masisoloko sikulungele ukunika amapolisa ulwazi malunga nezenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho.
zul: asihlale sikulungele ukunikeza amaphoyisa ulwazi mayelana nemisebenzi yobugebengu.

xho: xa sisebenzisana siya kuloyisa ulwaphulo-mthetho.
zul: ngokusebenzisana sizobunqoba ubugebengu.

xho: bantu bakuthi neendwendwe ezibalulekileyo,oorhulumente basekhaya kufuneka basebenze.
zul: bakwethu kanye nezimenywa ezihloniphekile,uhulumeni wasekhaya kufanele asebenze.

xho: oomaspala kufuneka baphucule ubonelelo ngezindlu, amanzi, ugutyulo, umbane, ulawulo lwenkunkuma neendlela.
zul: omasipala kufanele benze ngcono ukunikezelwa kwezindlu, amanzi, izindlu zangasese, ugesi, ukuphathwa kwemfucuza kanye nemigwaqo.

xho: kulo nyaka uphelileyo besinentlanganiso noosodolophu nabaphathi boomaspala.
zul: sibambe umhlangano nosodolobha kanye nezimenenja zomasipala ngonyaka odlule.

xho: oku kusinike umfanekiso wemiceli mingeni oorhulumente basekhaya abajongene nayo.
zul: lokhu kusivule amehlo mayelana nezinselelo ezikhona kuhulumeni wasekhaya.

xho: kwakhona sikwatyelele neendawo abantu abahlala kuzo, kuquka nebalfour empumalanga nethembisa egauteng.
zul: siphinde savakashela imiphakathi kanye nomasipala abaningana, kubandakanya ibalfour empumalanga kanye nethembisa egauteng.

xho: emva kotyelelo lwasebalfour, sithumele iqela lomphathiswa elimalungu alithoba ukuba lityelele lommandla ukuze lisombulule le miba ibiphakanyiswe ngabahlali.
zul: emva kokuvakashela ebalfour, sathumela ithimba elalakhiwe ngongqongqoshe abayisishiyagalolunye ukuthi bavakashele le ndawo ukuxazulula izinkinga ezaziphakanyiswe ngumphakathi.

xho: iliqela imiba esele ihoyiwe.
zul: izinkinga eziningana sezixazululiwe.

xho: ndiyalele ukuba abaphathiswa mabahoyane nemiba esaseleyo.
zul: ngijube ongqongqoshe ukuthi babhekane nezindaba ezingakaxazululwa.

xho: siya phinda sithi akukho nasiphi na isikhalazo esifunisa ubundlongondlongo nokutshatyalaliswa kwempahla.
zul: siyaphinda siyasho, azikho izikhalo ezingaba yizizathu ezinqala zodlame kanye nokulinyazwa kwempahla.

xho: siyalele i-arhente zabezomthetho ukuba zithabathe amanyathelo aqatha kuwo nawuphi na umbodamo osebalfour nakwezinye iindawo.
zul: siyalele izinhlaka eziphathelene nokuqiniswa komthetho ukuthi zithathe izinyathelo ezinqala mayelana nokungahlonishwa komthetho ebalfour kanye nakwezinye izindawo.

xho: kweyomga yama-2009, ikhabhinethi iphumeze isicwangciso-qhinga sokudala inguqu koorhulumente basekhaya.
zul: ngozibandlela wonyaka we-2009, ikhabhinethi yamukela iqhinga lokushintsha ukusebenza kukahulumeni wasekhaya.

xho: oku kuya kuqinisekisa ukuba oorhulumente basekhaya banolawulo olufanelekileyo, izakhono zezolawulo nezobugcisa ezifanelekileyo.
zul: lokhu kuzoqinisekisa ukuthi uhulumeni wasekhaya unamakhono afanele ezokuphatha, ukulawula kanye nawezobuncweti.

xho: kuwo lo nyaka wokuba kusetyenzwe, masisebenzisane ukwenza oorhulumente basekhaya babe ngumsebenzi wonmtu wonke.
zul: kulo nyaka wokusebenza, asisebenze ngokubambisana ukwenza umsebenzi kahulumeni wasekhaya ube wawo wonke umuntu.

xho: sijonge ekuphuculeni iindawo zokuhlala zasematyotyombeni ezimi kwindawo entle size sinikezele ngeenkonzo ezifanelekileyo nelungelo lokuhlala isigxina kwimizi engama-500 000 ubuncinane ngowama-2014.
zul: sisebenzela ukuthuthukisa izakhiwo ezingahlelekile ezisendaweni enhle kanye nokuhanjiswa kwezidingo ezifanele kubandakanya umhlaba kubantu okungenani abayi-500 000 ngonyaka we-2014.

xho: siceba ukubekela bucala ngaphezulu kweehektare ezingama-6 000 omhlaba karhulumente osendaweni entle ukwenzela ukwakha izindlu zabo bamivuzo iphantsi nezifikelelekayo.
zul: sihlela ukubeka eceleni amahektha ayi-6 000 omhlaba osendaweni ekahle ukwakha izindlu zabantu abahola kancane futhi ezingambi eqolo.

xho: iphulo elitsha elingundoqo liya kuba kukulungiselela abo bamivuzo iphezulu ukuba bangafumana inkxaso-mali karhulumente, kodwa besamkela kancinci kakhulu ukuba bangafumana imali-mboleko yebhanki eqhelekileyo yokuthenga indlu.
zul: uhlelo olusha olubalulekile ukuhlalisa abantu abahola kakhulu ukuthi bengathola uxhaso lukahulumeni kodwa abahola kancane ukuthi bengatshelekwa amabhange imali.

xho: siza kuseka ingxowa-mali yesiqinisekiso se-r1 sebhiliyoni ukukhuthaza iibhanki zabucala necandelo lezezindlu, ukuba ziphuhlise imveliso entsha ukukhawulelana noku kufuneka kwezindlu.
zul: sizovula isikhwama esinegaranti yesigidigidi esisodwa ukugqugquzela amabhange kanye nomkhakha wezezindlu ukuthi uthuthukise imikhiqizo emisha ukuhlangabezana nalesi sidingo sezindlu.

xho: bantu bakuthi,kunyaka ophelileyo sathi, abantu basemaphandleni nabo banelungelo lokuba nombane, amanzi, izindlu zangasese ezigungxulwayo neendlela.
zul: bakwethu,ngonyaka odlule sathi, abantu basemakhaya nabo banelungelo lokuba nogesi, amanzi, izindlu zangasese ezigijima amanzi nemigwaqo.

xho: sathi kufanele babe neendawo zezemidlalo kunye neendawo zokuthenga ezinkulu neziphucukileyo njengezasezidolophini.
zul: sathi kufanele babe nezindawo zezemidlalo kanye nezindawo zokuthenga ezinkulukazi eziphucuzekile njengezasemadolobheni.

xho: kule meko, sisungule isiza selinge lokuqala lenkqubo yophuhliso olubanzi lwasemaphandleni egiyani, elimpopo, kweyethupha kulo nyaka uphelileyo.
zul: mayelana nalokhu, sethule uhlelo lokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya oluqukethe konke endaweni yokuhlola egiyani elimpopo ngoncwaba kofile.

xho: ukususela ngelo xesha, ngama-231 ezindlu ezakhiweyo.
zul: kusukela kwaqalwa, sekwakhiwe izindlu ezingama-231.

xho: inkqubela phambili yokubonelela ngeziseko zoncedo ukuxhasa uphuhliso lwezolimo, noqeqesho lwabahlali seyenziwe nayo.
zul: inqubekela phambili yenziwe futhi ekwakheni ingqalasizinda ukusekela ukuthuthukiswa kwezolimo kanye nokuqeqeshwa kwamalungu omphakathi.

xho: ufikelelo kumaziko ezempilo nawezemfundo sele luphuculiwe.
zul: ukufinyelela ezikhungweni zezempilo kanye nezemfundo kwenziwe ngcono.

xho: siphumeza iinkqubo ezifanayo kwiziza ezisixhenxe elizweni jikelele, oku kuza kuxhamlisa iwodi ezingama-21.
zul: siqalisa ukusebenzisa izinhlelo ezifanayo ezindaweni eziyisikhombisa ezweni lonke, noluhlomulisa izigceme ezingama-21.

xho: ngowama-2014, sizimisele ukuba neziza kwiiwodi ezili-16.
zul: ngonyaka we-2014 sihlela ukuba nezindawo ezigcemeni eziyi-160.

xho: sifuna imizi engama-60% kwezi ziza ukuba iphumeze iimfuno zayo zokutya ngemveliso yazo ngowama-2014.
zul: sifuna amaphesenti angama-60 abantu kulezi zindawo bahlangabezane nezidingo zabo zokudla ngokuzikhiqizela bona ngonyaka we-2014.

xho: kancinci kancinci kuza kude kulunge, bantu bakuthi, kuthiwa nenkqayi iqala ngentlontlo.
zul: kancane kancane kuze kulunge, phela bakwethu, kuthiwa nempandla iqala ngenhlonhlo.

xho: sikwafuna ukudibanisa ngcono iinkqubo zobuyiselo mhlaba nenkxaso yezolimo.
zul: futhi sidinga ukudidiyela ukuhlelwa kabusha komhlaba kanye nezinhlelo zokusekela ezolimo.

xho: impumelelo yethu kule ndawo iya kubonakala ngokwanda kwenani lamafama ezinga elincinci athi akhule aphuhle kwezoqoqosho.
zul: impumelelo yethu kulezi zindawo iyokalwa ngukukhula kwesibalo sabalimi abancane ababamba iqhaza emnothweni ngendlela ebonakalayo.

xho: somlomo ohloniphekileyo nosihlalo webhunga lesizwe lamaphondo,asisilo lizwe lityebileyo kwicala lokuba namanzi.
zul: somlomo ohloniphekile kanye nosihlalo womkhandlu kazwelonke wezifundazwe,asilona izwe elicebile ngamanzi.

xho: noxa kunjalo, sisalahlekelwa ngamanzi amaninzi ngenxa yemibhobho evuzayo nokungoneli kweziseko zoncedo.
zul: kodwa, sisalahlekelwa ngamanzi amaningi ngenxa yamapayipi avuzayo kanye nengqalasizinda enganele.

xho: siza kuba namanyathelo esiwabekayo ukunciphisa ukulahlekelwa kwethu ngamanzi kangangesiqingatha ngowama-2014.
zul: sizothatha izinyathelo zokunciphisa ukulahlekelwa kwethu ngamanzi ngengxenye ngonyaka we-2014.

xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,njengenxalenye yethu yokukhuthaza ukukhula koqoqosho, sisazama indlela yokunciphisa iindleko zoqhagamshelwano.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,njengengxenye yemizamo yethu yokukhuthaza ukukhula komnotho okukhulu, sisebenzela ukunciphisa izindleko zokuxhumana.

xho: uluntu lwasemzantsi afrika lungalindela okunye ukuthotywa kwamaxabiso othungelwano-maza, umnxeba weselula, umnxeba wocingo kunye namaxabiso eminxeba kawonkewonke.
zul: umphakathi waseningizimu afrika ungalindela ngabomvu okunye ukuncishiswa kwemali yamagagasi obuhlakahlaka bokuxhumana ngomoya, omakhalekhukhwini, izingcingo zasendlini kanye nezingcingo zezigxobo.

xho: siza kusebenzela ukwandisa isantya sothungelwano-maza nokuqinisekisa izinga eliphezulu lenkonzo ye-intaneti, ngokuhambelana nemigangatho yezizwe ngezizwe.
zul: sizosebenzela ukukhuphula isivinini samagagasi obuhlakahlaka bokuxhumana ngomoya kanye nokuqinisekisa izinga eliphezulu lokutholakala kwe-inthanethi, ngokuhambisana namazinga omhlaba.

xho: bemi bomzantsi afrika,lo rhulumente uza kuqinisekisa ukuba indalo yethu nemithombo yethu yendalo ikhuseleke kakuhle, kwaye ixhotyiswa rhoqo.
zul: zakhamizi zaseningizimu afrika,lo hulumeni uzoqinisekisa ukuthi izimpahla zethu zemvelo kanye nemithombo yemvelo ivikeleke kahle futhi ithuthukiswa ngokuqhubekayo.

xho: sikunye nebrazil, i-india nechina, kwangenelela ne-united states, emele ihlabathi eliphuhlileyo, senze igalelo elincomekayo kwisivumelwano esamkelwa kwindibano engokuguquguquka kwemozulu ebisecopenhagen kweyomnga kulo nyaka uphelileyo.
zul: ngokubambisana nezwe lasebrazil, elasendiya nelasechina sijoyinwa yizwe lasemelika, nebelimele amazwe omhlaba athuthukile, saba neqhaza elikhulu esivumelwaneni esamukelwa enqunqutheleni yokushintsha kwesimo sezulu ebisecopenhagen ngozibandlela kofile.

xho: nangona singahambi ngangokuba kulindelekile nje, linyathelo elibalulekileyo ukubheka phambili kuba sibophelela onke amazwe ukuba kubekho into ayenzayo ngokuguquguquka kwemozulu.
zul: yize singakafiki lapho okudingeka sifike khona, kuyisinyathelo esibalulekile esiya phambili njengoba sibophezela amazwe ukuthi abhekane nokushintsha kwesimo sezulu.

xho: siza kusebenza ngokuthe chatha kunye noogxa bethu bezizwe ngezizwe sisebenzela isivumelwano esibophelela ngokusemthethweni.
zul: sizosebenza ngokuzikhandla kanye nozakwethu bomhlaba ukwenza isivumelwano esisemthwethweni esibophezelayo.

xho: njengomzantsi afrika, sizibophelele ngokuzithandela kwiinjongo eziphambili ezibaluliweyo zokunciphisa ungcoliseko, kwaye siza kuqhubekeka ukusebenzisa isicwangciso-qhinga sethu sokunciphisa ukuguquguquka kwemozulu sexesha elide.
zul: njengeningizimu afrika, sizinikele ngokuzithandela kwethu ukuzibekela umkhawulo othile wokunciphisa intuthu engcolisayo, futhi sizoqhubeka ukusebenza ngeqhinga lethu lesikhathi eside ukwehlisa ukushintsha kwesimo sezulu.

xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,siza kuqinisa amalinge wethu okuphakamisa iimfuno zomzantsi afrika kwihlabathi jikelele.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,sizoqinisa imizamo yethu yokwazisa ngezintshisekelo zezwe laseningizimu afrika umhlaba wonke.

xho: siza kuwaxhasa amalinge okukhawulezisa indibaniselwano yepolitiki neyoqoqosho yommandla wenkqubo yokuphuhliswa kwamazwe e-afrika esemazantsi (i-sadc), nokukhuthaza urhwebo notyalo-mali phakathi kulo mmandla.
zul: sizosekela imizamo yokusheshisa ukuhlanganisa ezomnotho kanye nezepolitiki esifundeni senhlanganisela yamazwe aseningizimu ne-afrika kanye nokugqugquzela ukuhwebelana kanye nokutshalwa kwezimali phakathi kwesifunda.

xho: umzantsi afrika usaqhubekeka ukudlala indima ephambili kumalinge elizwekazi ukomeleza imanyano yamazwe ase-afrika kunye neziseko zayo, nokusebenzela umanyano.
zul: iningizimu afrika iyaqhubeka ukudlala indima yokuhola emizameni yezwekazi yokuqinisa inhlangano yamazwe ase-afrika kanye nezikhungo zayo, kanye nokusebenzela ubunye.

xho: siza kunikezela amandla ekuvuseleleni ubudlelwane obutsha bophuhliso lwe-afrika, njengesicwangciso-qhinga sophuhliso loqoqosho kwilizwekazi.
zul: sizogxilisa amandla ethu ekuvuseleleni ukubambisana okusha kokuthuthukiswa kwe-afrika, ngenjeqhinga lokuthuthukisa umnotho ezwenikazi lase-afrika.

xho: bemi bomzantsi afrika,inkonzo karhulumente isabele kubizo lokwenza eli ixesha lokuqala lokusebenza msinyane nokuphuculwa komsebenzi karhulumente.
zul: zakhamizi zaseningizimu afrika,abasebenzi bakahulumeni balinanele ikhwelo lokwenza lesi sikhathi sikahulumeni kube ngesokusebenza ngokushesha kanye nendlela yokusebenza kombuso eyenziwe ngcono.

xho: siza kulindela ukusebenza okugqwesileyo nokusebenza ngamandla.
zul: sidinga ubuqotho nokusebenza ngokuzikhandla.

xho: sifuna abasebenzi bakarhulumente abakhutheleyo, abakwaziyo ukusebenza nabazikhathaleleyo iimfuno zoluntu.
zul: sidinga abasebenzi bakahulumeni abazinikele, abakwaziyo ukusebenza futhi abazikhathalele izidingo zezakhamizi.

xho: urhulumente sele esebenzela uphuhliso nokuphunyezwa kwenkqubo yophuhliso lwenkonzo karhulumente, oluya kucacisa indlela nomgangatho wokuziphatha kwabasebenzi bakarhulumente kuwo onke amazinga.
zul: uhulumeni useqalile vele ukusebenza ekuthuthukisweni kanye nasekuqalisweni kokusebenza kohlelo lwentuthuko yabasebenzi bakahulumeni, oluzobeka indlela yokusebenza kanye namazinga ezisebenzi zikahulumeni kuzo zonke izinhlaka zikahulumeni.

xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,siyaqhubekeka ngamalinge wethu okuncothula urhwaphilizo nenkohliso ekunikezelweni kwemisebenzi neenkqubo zeziniki maxabiso, nakwizicelo zeempepha mvume zokuqhuba, inkxaso-mali karhulumente yezentlalo namaxwebhu ezazisi, phakathi kwezinye.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,sizoqhubeka nemizamo yethu yokuqeda inkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa phakathi kwezinye izinto ezinhlelweni zokuthenga kanye nezamathenda, ezicelweni zezincwadi zokushayela, izibonelelo zikahulumeni kanye nomazisi.

xho: sixolile yinkqubela urhulumente ayenzayo kwezinye iindawo.
zul: siyajabula ngenqubekela phambili eyenziwa nguhulumeni kwezinye izindawo.

xho: kule veki, sirhoxise iintlawulo zenkxaso-mali karhulumente yezentlalo zenkohliso ezingama-32 687, ezixabisa i-r180 lezigidi.
zul: kuleli sonto, siqede ukukhokhwa kwezibonelelo zikahulumeni ezikhwatshanisiwe ezingama-32 689, nezibiza isamba samarandi ayizigidi eziyi-180.

xho: ikomiti yethu yabaphathiswa ejongene norhwaphilizo isakhangela iindlela zokuloyisa luphele nya urhwaphilizo.
zul: ikomidi lenkohlakalo elakhiwe ngongqongqoshe libheka izindlela zokuqeda nya inkohlakalo.

xho: xa sisebenzisana singenza ngcono.
zul: ngokusebenzisana singenza okuningi.

xho: bantu bakuthi,njengoko nisazi, savelisa umnxeba kamongameli ongavalwayo ukwenza ufikelelo kurhulumente nakumongameli lube lula ngakumbi kuluntu, nokunceda ukususa imiqobo ekunikezelo nkonzo.
zul: bakwethu,njengoba nazi, sathula inombolo kamongameli ukwenzela umphakathi ufinyelele kalula kuhulumeni kanye nasemnyangweni kamongameli kanye nokusiza ukuqeda ukubambezeleka kokuhanjiswa kwezidingo emphakathini.

xho: lo mnxeba ungavalwayo ubonakalisa ukuzimisela kwethu ekwenzeni izinto ngendlela eyahlukileyo eburhulumenteni.
zul: le nombolo imele ukuzimisela kwethu ukwenza izinto ngenye indlela kuhulumeni.

xho: lo mnxeba wenze umahluko kubomi babemi bomzantsi afrika abaninzi.
zul: yenze umehluko ezimpilweni zezakhamizi eziningi zaseningizimu afrika.

xho: singakhankanya unkosk.
zul: singabalula unkk.

xho: buziwe ngaleka wasemount frere, omnxeba wakhe umalunga nemali yomhlalaphantsi yomyeni wakhe ongasekhoyo waba ngowokuqala esawufumanayo ngosuku lokuqala lale nkonzo.
zul: buziwe ngaleka wasemount frere, ucingo lwakhe mayelana nempesheni yomyeni wakhe kwaba ngolokuqala ukwamukelwa osukwini lokuqala lokusebenza.

xho: ukunye nathi apha ngokuhlwa nje.
zul: unathi la namhlanje ebusuku.

xho: kwakhona phakathi kwethu sinomnu nkululeko cele, owancedakala ngokuthi afumane ixwebhu lakhe lesazisi, elathi lamenza ukuba akwazi ukubhalisa kwi-yunivesiti yezobugcisa yasethswane.
zul: nkululeko cele, owasizwa ukuthola umazisi owamsiza ukuthi abhalise enyuvesi yezobuchwepheshe yasetshwane.

xho: la ngamabini nje kumabali amaninzi empumelelo.
zul: lezi ezinye zezindaba eziyimpumelelo.

xho: kule neminye imizekelo, siqaphele ubuthakathaka ekufanele bulungiswe ngamazinga awohluka hlukeneyo aseburhulumenteni.
zul: kulezi zibonelo kanye nakwezinye, sihlonza ubuthaka obufanele bulungiswe ezinhlakeni ezahlukene kuhulumeni.

xho: ngegunya likasomlomo, siye samema igqiza lamaqela ngamaqela asepalamente ukuba atyelele eli ziko lomnxeba, ukuze amalungu epalamente azibonele ngokwawo umsebenzi owenziwayo.
zul: ngosomlomo wephalamende, simeme ithimba elakhiwe ngamaqembu ahlukahlukene asuka ephalamende ukuthi livakashele isikhungo sethu sokwamukela izingcingo, ukuze amalunga ephalamende azitholele wona ngokwawo mayelana nomsebenzi owenziwayo.

xho: bantu bakuthi nabahlobo,ndizicacisile iimpawu zezicwangciso zethu zowama-2010, isibophelelo sethu esihlangeneyo njengorhulumente kubantu basemzantsi afrika.
zul: bakwethu kanye nabangani,ngindlalile amaphuzu abalulekile ezinhlelo zethu zonyaka we-2010, ukuzinikela kwethu sonke njengohulumeni kubantu baseningizimu afrika.

xho: intetho kamongameli engobume besizwe inika umfanekiso ophangaleleyo wesicwangciso sethu somsebenzi.
zul: inkulumo echaza isimo sezwe inikeza isithombe esibanzi mayelana nohlelo lwethu lokusebenza.

xho: abaphathiswa baza kunikezela ngeenkcukacha kwiintetho zabo zohlahlo lwabiwo-mali lwabo olwahluka hlukeneyo.
zul: ongqongqoshe ngamunye bazonikeza ulwazi oluthe xaxa uma sebethula izinkulumo zabo zesabelomali.

xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo, bemi bomzantsi afrika,kweyenkanga kulo nyaka, siya kuphawula isikhumbuzo seminyaka eli-150 yokufika kwamandiya emzantsi afrika.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile, zakhamizi zaseningizimu afrika,ngolwezi kophezulu, sizobe sigubha ukuphela kweminyaka eyi-150 selokhu kwaqala ukufika kwabomdabu basendiya eningizimu afrika.

xho: oku kunikeza ithuba lokuba sikwazi ukubaluleka kwegalelo elenziwe ngamandiya kumacandelo ezemisebenzi, ezoshishino, ezenzululwazi, ezemidlalo, ezenkolo, ezobugcisa, ezenkcubeko nempumelelo nokomeleza intando yethu yesininzi.
zul: lokhu kusinikeza ithuba lokubonga umthelela obalulekile owenziwe umphakathi wasendiya emkhakheni wezabasebenzi, amabhizinisi, isayensi, ezemidlalo, ezenkolo, ezobuciko, ezamasiko kanye nasekutholeni nasekuqiniseni intando yeningi.

xho: bantu bakuthi nabahlobo,mandithathe eli thuba lokuba ndivakalise kwakhona uvelwano lwethu olunzulu kurhulumente nabantu basehaiti ngesihelegu sentlekele ethe yabehlela.
zul: bakwethu kanye nabangani,angiphinde ngithathe leli thuba ukuthumela umyalezo wokuzwelana nohulumeni kanye nabantu basehaiti mayelana nefu elimnyama elibagubuzele.

xho: sinovuyo lokuba amaqela wethu ezohlangulo akwazile ukuya kunceda.
zul: sinenjabulo ukuthi amaqembu ethu ezokutakula akwazile ukuya khona eyosiza.

xho: ndingathanda ukuqaphela ngokukodwa omnye ummi womzantsi afrika osoloko ephumelela ukuya kunceda ngamaxesha entlekele, nosincedayo ukukhuthaza umoya wesizwe esikhathalayo.
zul: ngithanda kakhulukazi ukubonga isakhamuzi esisodwa saseningizimu afrika esingahluleki nhlobo ukusiza ngezikhathi zezinhlekelele , kanye nokusiza ukukhuthaza umbono womphakathi onakekelayo.

xho: siyamamkela kule ndlu namhlanje ugqr imtiaz sooliman wegift of the givers.
zul: imtiaz sooliman kulendlu namuhla, wenhlangano i-gift of the givers.

xho: bemi bomzantsi afrika,ukusingatha umnyhadala wendebe yehlabathi yefifa yenza owama-2010 ngokwenene ube ngunyaka wokuba kusetyenzwe.
zul: zakhamizi zaseningizimu afrika,ukusingatha indebe yomhlaba yefifa kwenza unyaka we-2010 kube ngunyaka wokusebenza.

xho: sichithe iminyaka emininzi silungiselela lendebe yehlabathi.
zul: sichithe iminyaka eminingi sihlelela indebe yomhlaba.

xho: sishiyekelwe nje ziinyanga ezintathu.
zul: sisalelwe izinyanga ezintathu kuphela.

xho: kwaye sizimisele ukuyenza ibe yimpumelelo.
zul: futhi sizimisele ukuthi siyenze ibe yimpumelelo.

xho: iziseko zoncedo, ukhuselo namalungiselelo ezinto eziyimfuneko sele enziwe ukuqinisekisa umnyhadala oyimpumelelo.
zul: amalungiselelo enqgalasizinda, ezokuvikela, kanye namalungiselelo okuhamba asenziwe ukuqinisekisa umqhudelwano oyimpumelelo.

xho: njengesizwe, kufanele ukuba siyibulele ikomiti yasekhaya eququzelelelayo yowama-2010 ngomsebenzi wayo omhle.
zul: njengesizwe sidinga ukubonga ekomidini lakuleli elihlela imidlalo yonyaka we-2010 ngomsebenzi walo oncomekayo.

xho: sinqwenela usihlalo wayo, u-irvin khoza, igosa eliyintloko yesigqeba solawulo udanny jordaan kunye nomqeqeshi webafana bafana, ucarlos alberto parreira, amathamsanqa odwa kwezi nyanga zizayo.
zul: sifisela usihlalo wekomidi lakuleli elihlela imidlalo u-irvin khoza kanye nomphathi omkhulu udanny jordaan kanye nomqeqeshi webafana bafana ucarlos alberto parreira impumelelo kulezi zinyanga ezizayo.

xho: umongameli mandela ube negalelo ekuncedeni ilizwe lethu ukuba linikwe amalungelo okusingatha lo mnyhadala mkhulu kangaka.
zul: umongameli umandela waba ngumongo ekusizeni izwe lethu ukunqoba amalungelo okusingatha lo mcimbi oyindumezulu.

xho: ngoko ke kufanele ukuba lendebe yehlabathi siyenze impumelelo enkulu njengentlonipho yokumbulela.
zul: ngakho-ke njengendlela yokumbonga kufanele senze indebe yomhlaba ibe yimpumelelo.

xho: bantu bakuthi, nathi masilixhase iqela lethu lesizwe ibafana bafana.
zul: bakwethu, asiphinde siseke iqembu likazwelonke ibafana bafana.

xho: ndingomnye wabo bakholelwa ukuba ibafana bafana iza kwenza imimangaliso.
zul: ngingomunye walabo abakholwa wukuthi ibafana bafana izogila izimanga.

xho: okona kubaluleke kakhulu, itikiti esandlelni bantu bakuthi!
zul: okubaluleke kakhulu, ithikithi esandleni bakwethu!

xho: sonke masithenge amatikiti kuselithuba ukuze sikwazi ukuya emidlalweni.
zul: sonke asithenge amathikithi kusenesikhathi ukuze sikwazi ukuthamela imidlalo.

xho: bemi bomzantsi afrika,njengoko sibhiyozela ukukhululwa kukamadiba namhlanje, sizibophelela ngokutsha kuxolelwano, umanyano lwesizwe, ukungabi nabuhlanga nokwakha ikamva elingcono njengabemi bomzantsi afrika, abamnyama nabamhlophe.
zul: zakhamizi zaseningizimu afrika,njengoba sigubha ukukhululwa kukamadiba namhlanje, siyaphinda siyazibophezela ekubuyisaneni, kubumbano lukazwelonke, ukungacwasi kanye nokwakha ingomuso elingcono sonke njengezakhamizi zaseningizimu afrika, abamnyama nabamhlophe.

xho: sikhokelwa koko kwathethwa ngumadiba esemkhumbini, ndiya caphula:?
zul: siholwa yilokho okwashiwo ngumadiba ngesikhathi esebhokisini labasolwa, ngiyamcaphuna:"empilweni yami yonke ngizinikele kulo mzabalazo wabantu base-afrika.

xho: ngexesha lokuphila kwam ndinikela ubomi bam kumzabalazo wabantu abamnyama.
zul: ngilwisene nokuthi abamhlophe babe ngaphezu kwabanye abantu, futhi ngilwisene nokuthi abamnyama babe ngaphezu kwabanye abantu.

xho: ndilwile nokuthi abamhlophe babe ngentla kwezinye iintlanga, ndaza ndalwa nokuthi abamnyama babe ngentla kwezinye iintlanga."
zul: ngivikele futhi nganakekela umcabango womphakathi okhululekile futhi wentando yeningi, lapho bonke abantu bephila ndawonye ngokuthula, futhi benamathuba alinganayo.

xho: ndiyixabisile iminqweno yentando yesininzi nesizwe esikhululekileyo, apho bonke abantu bahlalisana ngokuvana, kwaye bafumane amathuba alinganayo.
zul: kungumcabango engithemba ukuwuphilela, futhi ngiwufeze.

xho: ngumnqweno endithemba ukuba ndiyakuwuphilela, kwaye ndiwuphumeze."
zul: kodwa uma kunesidingo, kungumcabango engizimisele ukuwufela.

xho: 13 feb 2014somlomo ohloniphekileyo wendlu yowiso-mthetho yesizwe,sihlalo webhunga lesizwe lamaphondo (i-ncop).
zul: 13 feb 2014somlomo ohloniphekile wesigungu sikazwelonke.

xho: sekela somlomo wendlu yowiso-mthetho yesizwe nosekela sihlalo we-ncop.
zul: sihlalo womkhandlu kazwelonke wezifundazwe (i-ncop).

xho: sekela mongameli werhiphabliki, ohloniphekileyo ukgalema montlanthe.
zul: iphini likasomlomo wesigungu sikazwelonke kanye nephini likasihlalo we-ncop.

xho: owayesakuba ngusekela mongameli ubaleka mbethe,ehloniphekileyo ijaji eyintloko, nawo onke amalungu ahloniphekileyo ecandeloleenkundla.
zul: iphini likamongameli weriphabhulikhi, umhlonishwa kgalema motlanthe.

xho: kubaphathiswa abahloniphekileyo nakoosekela baphathiswa,kwiinkulumbuso ezihloniphekileyo noosomlomo bamaphondo.
zul: iphini likamongameli laphambilini, ubaleka mbethe.

xho: kusihlalo webhunga loomasipala basemzantsi afrika (i-salga), kunye nazo zonke iinkokheli zoorhulumente basekhaya.
zul: umhlonishwa ijaji eliyinhloko leriphabhulikhi kanye nawo wonke amalungu ahloniphekile ophiko lwezobulungiswa.

xho: kwintloko zamaziko karhulumente axhasa intando yesininzi.
zul: ongqongqoshe abahloniphekile kanye namaphini abo.

xho: kwirhuluneli yebhanki enguvimba,kwiinkokheli zezoshishino, zezemidlalo, zezemveli, zezenkolo nezawo onke amacandelo,kumalungu wezozakuzo, kwiindwendwe ezikhethekileyo nezibalulekileyo,kumalungu ahloniphekileyo,bemi zomzantsi afrikagood evening, sanibonani, molweni, dumelang, riperile, ndimadekwana, goeienaand.
zul: ondunankulu abahloniphekile kanye nosomlomo bezifundazwe zethu.

xho: ndinqwenela ukubulela amagosa awongameleyo ngeli thuba lokuthetha nabantu basemzantsi afrika, kulo msitho wentetho kamongameli engobume besizwe (i-sona), yokugqibela kolu lawulo lwesine lwentando yesininzi.
zul: usihlalo we-salga, kanye nabo bonke abaholi bohulumeni basekhaya.

xho: sidlulisa uvelwano lwethu olunzulu kusapho lwakhe, nakwinkokheli ye-inkatha freedom party (i-ifp) ushenge, kunye nawo onke amalungu we-ifp.
zul: abaholi bezamabhizinisi, ezemidlalo, ezendabuko, ezenkolo kanye nabo bonke abaholi beminye imikhakha.

xho: sidlulisa ukukhala kwethu emndenini wakhe, nakumholi we ifp ushenge, kanye namalunga onke e-ifp.
zul: amalungu ezindlu zamanxusa, izivakashi ezikhethekile neziqavile.

xho: somlomo ohloniphekileyo,sihlalo ohloniphekileyo we-ncop,le yi-sona yokuqala eqhubeka engasekho umongameli owayengumseki wentando yesininzi yethu, ohloniphekileyo unelson rolihlahla mandela.
zul: good evening, sanibonani, molweni, dumelang, riperile, ndimadekwana, goeie naand.

xho: ukusishiya kwakhe, kanye xa sisecicini lokufika konyaka wama-20 wenkululeko yethu nolawulo lwentando yesininzi, kubangele intlungu enkulu kubantu bakuthi nangaphaya kwemida yethu.
zul: ngithanda ukubonga izikhulu ezengamele izindlu zephalamende ngokunginika leli thuba lokuba ngikhulume nabantu baseningizimu afrika, kulo mcimbi wokwethulwa kwenkulumo echaza isimo sezwe (i-sona) yokugcina kahulumeni wentando yeningi labantu wehlandla lesine.

xho: sifumana ukuthuthuzeleka ezingqondweni kuba umadiba uzakuhlala ehleli ezintliziyweni zethu, kwaye sinoxanduva lokuba siqhubekeke ngomsebenzi wakhe.
zul: ngithanda ukudlulisa amazwi enduduzo ngokudlula emhlabeni komhlonishwa umnu ben skhosana, ongomunye wamalungu asebe yingxenye yale ndlu ehloniphekile isikhathi eside futhi ubengelinye lamalungu asezikhundleni eziphezulu, futhi phambilini wayengungqongqoshe wezokuhlunyeleliswa kwezimilo.

xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,ilizwe lethu livelise amadoda namakhosikazi agqamileyo, athe abonakalise ubunkokheli ngamaxesha anzima.
zul: sidabuka kakhulu ngokudlula kwakhe emhlabeni ngokuzuma.

xho: omnye wezo nkokheli yayingumnu moses kotane, owayesakuba ngunondyebo jikelele we-anc esakuba kwanguye nonobhala jikelele wombutho wamakomanisi womzantsi afrika (i-sacp).
zul: sidlulisa ukukhala kwethu emndenini wakhe, nakumholi we-ifp ushenge, kanye namalungu onke e-ifp.

xho: siwongekile kukuba nenkosikazi yakhe ethandekayo phakathi kwethu, umama urebecca kotane, njengendwendwe lethu elikhethekileyo ngobu busuku.
zul: somlomo ohloniphekile,sihlalo we-ncop ohloniphekile,lena yinkulumo echaza isimo sezwe yokuqala eyenzeka engasekho emhlabeni umongameli wethu wokuqala, umhlonishwa nelson rolihlahla mandela.

xho: umama ukotane ugqibe iminyaka eli-102 ubudala izolo, kwaye simnqwenelela okuhle kodwa.
zul: ukudlula kwakhe emhlabeni, kungasensuku zatshwala kufike umgubho weminyaka engama-20 yenkululeko nentando yeningi yethu, kubazwise obukhulu ubuhlungu abantu bethu kanye nabakwamanye amazwe.

xho: sikwakhumbula ngokunika imbeko owayesakuba ngumongameli we-anc umnu oliver tambo, owagcina isibane senkululeko siphila (ithemba lenkululeko liphila) apha ekhaya nakumazwe angaphesheya ngawona maxesha ayengawona anzima omzabalazo.
zul: sithola induduzo ngokwazi ukuthi umadiba uyohlala ngaso sonke isikhathi esezinhliziyweni zethu, futhi sinesibopho sokuqhubekisela phambili ukhondolo lwakhe.

xho: unyana wakhe udali nenkosikazi yakhe urachel bayinxalenye yethu kulo msitho wangokuhlwa nje.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,izwe lethu likhiqize abesilisa nabesifazane abanohlonze, abahlinzeke ngobuholi ngezikhathi ezinzima.

xho: sikhahlela usolomon mahlangu, iqhaji lomfana elaya ngokudela ekuxhonyweni ngowe-1979 apho wathi wabulawa ngokwesigwebo eminyaka ingama-23 ubudala.
zul: omunye walabo baholi ngumnu moses kotane, umgcinimafa waphambilini we-anc futhi owayengunobhala jikelele we-sacp.

xho: baze baqhubekeke ngokuzabalaza.”siwongekile kukusindleka umama wakhe, umama umartha mahlangu kunye nomzukulwana wakhe ubathabile.
zul: kuyintokozo enkulu ukuthi unkosikazi wakhe, umama rebecca kotane, unathi lapha kusihlwa njengesivakashi sethu esikhethekile.

xho: unyaka wama-2014 ukwaphawula isikhumbuzo sonyaka wama-40 wokugetyengwa ngobugwala ngesiqhushumbisi esiyipasile, kwenkokheli yabafundi, u-abram onkgopotse tiro ngowe-1974 ebotswana.
zul: izolo umama ukotane ubegubha iminyaka yobudala eyi-102, futhi simfisela okuhle kodwa.

xho: siyamamkela umntakwabo, umogomotsi tiro kulo msitho.
zul: sithanda futhi nokuhlonipha umongameli we-anc waphambilini u-oliver tambo, owagcina isibani senkululeko sivutha, lapha ngaphakathi ezweni lethu kanye nakwamanye amazwe, ngezikhathi ezinzima kakhulu zomzabalazo wethu.

xho: sivakalisa umbulelo wabantu bakuthi, ngokuzenza idini komntakwabo engakhathalelanga siqu sakhe kuphela.
zul: sithanda ukuthulela u-solomon mahlangu isigqoko, ibhungu elabe linesibindi esikhulu, okungadikizanga nqulu kulona ngenkathi lilengiswa ngowe-1979 lineminyaka yobudala engama-23.

xho: siyabakhumbula abo bathi basweleka kubundlobongela obabufumana inkxaso yorhulumente weminyaka yama-1980 nama-1990 kwiilokishi zethu nasezilalini.
zul: wathi: “igazi lami lizonisela futhi likhulise isihlahla esizothela izithelo zenkululeko.

xho: unks jabu ndlovu, owayesakuba ngummeli wabasebenzi wombutho wabasebenzi besinyithi wasemzantsi afrika (i-numsa), wadutyulwa wasweleka ngowe-1988 emgungundlovu kunye nomyeni ujabulani nonyana wakhe.
zul: kuyintokozo enkulu ukuthi lapha sivakashelwe ngumama wakhe, umartha mahlangu kanye nomzukulu wakhe ubathabile.

xho: siyayamkela intombi yakhe uluhle nonyana wayo, usanele, kwaye sidlulisela uvelwano lwethu olunzulu kuzo zonke iintsapho ezathe zaphulukana nabo bezibathanda, kuyo yonke imibutho yopolitiko.
zul: futhi unyaka wama-2014 uqopha iminyaka engama-40 kwenzeka isenzo sobugwala obukhulu sokubulawa komholi wabafundi, u-abram onkgopotse tiro ngebhomu elalifakwe ephaseleni, ngowe-1974, ebotswana.

xho: somlomo ohloniphekileyo,sihlalo ohloniphekileyo we-ncop,sikwazile ukoyisa intlungu yangaphambili sakhe uluntu olutsha.
zul: sithanda ukwamukela umfowabo, umogomotsi tiro onathi lapha kulo mcimbi.

xho: sakhe amaziko awomeleleyo wentando yesininzi.
zul: sidlulisa ukubonga kwabantu, ngokuzinikela nokuzidela komfowabo.

xho: siwungcwabile umbuso ongenalawulo lwentando yesininzi, ongamelanga luntu, wengcinezelo nogcwele lurhwaphilizo owawusebenzela iimfuno zegcuntswana kuphela.
zul: siyabakhumbula labo abashona ngenxa yodlame olwabe luxhaswe ngumbuso ngeminyaka yama-1980s kanye nama-1990s emalokishini ethu kanye nasezindaweni zasemakhaya.

xho: siqulunqe urhulumente obumbeneyo wamaqela ngamaqela, ongenacalucalulo ngokobuhlanga, nangokwesini wolawulo lwentando yesininzi, obizwa asabele nomele bonke abemi bomzantsi afrika.
zul: unkk jabu ndlovu, phambilini owayeyisikhulu esimele abasebenzi senyunyana yabasebenzi bensimbi baseningizimu afrika (i-numsa), wadutshulwa washona ngowe-1988 emgungundlovu kanye nomyeni wakhe nendodana yabo.

xho: sidale ulawulo lwentando yesininzi olusekelezelwe kumgaqo-siseko, olunemilenze esebenza ngokubonakalayo yombuso – izindlu zowiso-mithetho, ikhabhinethi neejaji zeenkundla.
zul: sithanda ukwamukela indodakazi yakhe uluhle kanye nendodana yakhe, usanele, futhi sithanda nokuhlonipha yonke imindeni eyalahlekelwa yizithandwa zayo, emaqenjini wonke.

xho: sinamaziko abizwa ngokuba ngamaziko esahluko se-9 axhasa ulawulo lwentando yesininzi aze akhusele amalungelo wabemi.
zul: somlomo ohloniphekile,sihlalo we-ncop ohloniphekile,saphumelela ukubudlulisa bonke lobo buhlungu besikhathi esedlule kanye nokwakha umphakathi omusha.

xho: ukumelwa kwabantu basetyhini kumaziko karhulumente kwande ngokuncomekayo ukususela oko kwafika inkululeko, kwaye ukunatyiswa kweenkonzo ezingundoqo kukwaxhamlisa abantu basetyhini.
zul: sawungcwaba umbuso wengcindezelo, owawukhohlakele, owawungenayo intando yeningi, owawungamele bonke abantu, futhi owawubhelekela izimfuno zabayingcosana kuphela.

xho: zonke ezi mpawu zenze umzantsi afrika ube lelona lizwe lingcono onokuhlala kulo kunokuba kwakunjalo.
zul: sasungula umbuso wentando yeningi owodwa onezinhlaka eziningi ngaphansi kwawo, ongacwasi ngokobuhlanga nangokokubulili, ophendula kubo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika futhi obamele bonke.

xho: nangona kunjalo, ilizwe lethu lisajongene nomngeni ontlandlo-ntathu wendlala, ukungalingani nentswela-ngqesho, esisaqhubekayo ukusokola ngazo.
zul: sakha umbuso wentando yeningi ophumelelayo osekelwe phezu komthethosisekelo, onezinhlaka ezisebenza kahle – isishayamthetho, isigungu seziphathimandla zikahulumeni kanye nophiko lwezobulungiswa.

xho: ukuqubisana nale mingeni kube yeyona nto bonke oorhulumente bentando yesininzi bagxile kuyo.
zul: sinezikhungo zesahluko sesi-9 ezeseka intando yeningi futhi ezivikela amalungelo ezakhamuzi.­futhi inkululeko kanye nentando yeningi seyivule nesikhala sokuthi kube nomphakathi wezinhlaka ezahlukene okhuthele, kanye nomkhakha wabezindaba okhululekile.

xho: sikhethe ukugxila kwimiba ephambili emihlanu, ezemfundo, ezempilo, ukulwa nolwaphulo-mthetho norhwaphilizo, uphuhliso lwamaphandle nokuhlengahlengiswa komhlaba kwakunye nokudala amathuba emisebenzi endilisekileyo.
zul: ukumelwa kwabesifazane kwizikhungo zomphakathi sekukhule kakhulu kusukela ngenkathi kufika inkululeko, futhi ukuthunyelwa kwezidingongqangi kuyabahlomulisa nabesifazane.

xho: sikwahlengahlengise nombuso ukuba ukuphucula indlela osebenza ngayo.
zul: konke lokhu sekwenze iningizimu afrika yaba yizwe elingcono kakhulu kunakuqala umuntu angaphila kulona.

xho: sidale imisebenzi emibini engundoqo, isicwangciso sexesha elide kwakunye nohlolo novavanyo.
zul: kepha-ke, leli lizwe lisabhekene nezinselelo ezintathu, ububha, ukungalingani kanye nokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi, okuyizinselelo esiqhubekayo nokulwisana nazo.

xho: saseka ikhomishoni yocwangciso yesizwe nethe yavelisa isicwangciso sophuhliso sesizwe esibe sisiganeko esibalulekileyo, isicwangciso sezentlalo noqoqosho kweli lizwe nesikwayenye yeempumelelo ezingundoqo zolawulo lorhulumente wesine.
zul: thina siqoke ukugxila ezintweni ezinhlanu esizibeke eqhulwini, ezemfundo, ezempilo, ukulwisana nobugebengu nenkohlakalo, ukuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya nezinguquko kwezomhlaba kanye nokuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi osesimweni esigculisayo.

xho: uhlolo novavanyo lwethu lusibonisa ukuba iinkonzo ezininzi ziyaqhubekeka ukuphucuka.
zul: sisungule imikhakha emibili ebalulekile, umkhakha wokuhlelela isikhathi eside kanye nowokuqapha nokuhlola ukusebenza kukahulumeni.

xho: umzekelo, izibonelelo zenkxaso yezentlalo namaxwebhu ezazisi ngoku athatha ixesha elifutshane ukwenziwa.
zul: sisungule ikhomishana kazwelonke yokuhlela, ekhiqize uhlelo lokuthuthukiswa kwezwe oluyingqophamlando, oluwumhlahlandlela waleli lizwe wezenhlalo nezomnotho futhi lokhu ngenye yenzinto ezinkulu ezifezekiswe yilo hulumeni wehlandla lesine.

xho: ngentsebenziswano phakathi kukarhulumente, abezoshishino, imibutho yezabasebenzi nemibutho emele uluntu, siluthantamisile uqoqosho ukuba lubuyele esiqhelweni.
zul: uhlelo lwethu lokuqapha nokuhlola ukusebenza kukahulumeni luyabonisa ukuthi ukuhlinzekwa kwezidingongqangi eziningi kuyaqhubeka nokuba ngcono.

xho: ubutyebi besizwe jikelele, xa bulinganiswa ngokwemveliso yangaphakathi epheleleyo, bukhule bade bedlula kwi-3,5 seetriliyoni zeerandi.
zul: isibonelo, izicelo zezibonelelo zomphakathi kanye nezomazisi sezithatha isikhathi esifushane kunakuqala.

xho: amathuba emisebenzi ayadalwa kwakhona.
zul: kodwa-ke miningi eminye imikhakha esadinga ukuthi kuqiniswe isandla.

xho: bali-15 lezigidi abantu abaphangelayo apha kweli lizwe, elona nani liphezulu kwimbali yethu, kwaye kudalwe amathuba emisebenzi engaphezulu kwama-650 000 kulo nyaka uphelileyo, ngokutsho kweziko leenkcukhacha-manani lasemzantsi afrika.
zul: ngizokwethula umbiko wendlela okusetshenzwe ngayo ezintweni ezinhlanu ezibekwe eqhulwini futhi ngizoqala ngomnothongokwesilinganiso esimaphakathi, umnotho ukhule ngamaphesenti angu-3,2ngonyaka, kusukela ngowe-1994 kuya kowezi-2012, nakuba kubekhona ukufadalalakomnotho okuholele ekutheni kulahleke amathuba omsebenzi ayisigidi.

xho: izinga lentswela-ngqesho lisephezulu.
zul: aseqalile futhi ukuvuleka amathuba omsebenzi.

xho: intswela-ngqesho kulutsha emzantsi afrika isaxhalabisa nangoku, njengoko kunjalo nasehlabathini jikelele.
zul: njengamanje sekunabantu abasebenzayo abayizigidi eziyi-15 kuleli lizwe, okuyinani eliphezulu kunawo onke emlandweni wethu, futhi ngokusho kwezezibalo eningizimu afrika, ngonyaka odlule kuvulwe amathuba omsebenzi ayizinkulungwane ezingama-650.

xho: kuza kuphunyezwa imithetho ukuqinisekisa ukuba oku akubachaphazeli kakubi abasebenzi abangafumani nkxaso yamali okanye abadala.
zul: kunezinyathelo eziningana esizithathayo, kubandakanya nomthetho wesaphulelo sentela sokuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi, okhuthaza abaqashi ukuthi baqashe intsha.

xho: amanye amanyathelo aqulathwe kwisivumelwano solutsha sesizwe esatyikitywa esoweto kwekatshazimpunzi yonyaka odlulileyo.
zul: kunezimiso eziphathelene nalo mthetho ezizophasiswa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi lokhu akubi nomthelela omubi kubasebenzi abangaxhasiwe noma abasebenzi abadala.

xho: inkqubo yemisebenzi yoluntu enatysiweyo kunye nenkqubo yemisebenzi yoluntu isaqhubekeka ukuyinciphisa ngokuvakalayo intswela-ngqesho kwabahluphekileyo nolutsha.
zul: ezinye izinyathelo ziqukethwe kwisivumelwano sikazwelonke sentsha esasayindwa esoweto ngenyanga kambasa ngonyaka odlule.

xho: abantu bethu bafumana ingeniso nezakhono kwinkqubo yemisebenzi yoluntu, abathi bazisebenzise ekufuneni imisebenzi esesikweni.
zul: uhlelo olunwetshiwe lwemisebenzi yomphakathi kanye nohlelo lwamathuba etoho omphakathi ziyaqhubeka nokuba yizinhlelo ezisebenza kahle ezivikela abantu abahlwempu nentsha ukuze bangakhahlamezeki kakhulu.

xho: ikhabhinethi izimisele umlinganiselo wokudala amathuba emisebenzi ezizigidi ezisithandathu ukususela kulo nyaka ukuya kowama-2019, apho kuza kugxilwa kulutsha.
zul: kule minyaka emihlanu edlule sivule amathuba etoho angaphezu kwezigidi ezingu-3,7.

xho: inkqubo yesibonelelo sethu sezentlalo esifikelela kubantu abamalunga nezigidi ezili-16, inika ukhuselo kwizigidi, ingakumbi abantwana abasemngciphekweni.
zul: abantu bethu bazitholela imadlana kanye namakhono ohlelweni lwemisebenzi yomphakathi, abawasebenzisela ukufuna umsebenzi ohlelekile.

xho: imizi emininzi iyancedakala ngenxa yezibonelelo zikarhulumente, inkxaso-mali yabantwana, indodla yabadala neyabakhubazekileyo.
zul: ikhabhinethi izibekele umkhawulo wamathuba etoho ayizigidi eziyisithupha kusukela ngalo nyaka kuya kowezi-2019, futhi ngalokhu kuhloswe ikakhulu ukuqasha intsha.

xho: ezi zibonelelo zizokuhlala ziqhubekeka kuba ziluncedo kwimizi emininzi kuba amathuba emisebenzi avela kancinci kweli xesha lokudodobala koqoqosho.
zul: uhlelo lwethu lwezibonelelo zomphakathi manje selufinyelela kubantu abayizigidi eziyi-16, ikhakhulu izingane ezintulayo.

xho: iimeko zoqoqosho lwasemelika zikhokelele ekuhleni ngamandla kwemali yorwebo lwamazwe asakhulayo, kuquka nerandi.
zul: imizi eminingi ithola ukusizakala ngenxa yezibonelelo zikahulumeni, imali yezingane, impesheni yabadala neyabakhubazekile.

xho: noxa kunjalo, iinkampani ezithumela imveliso yazo kumazwe angaphesheya, ingakumbi kwicandelo lokuvelisa, kufanele zibusebenzisele ukuzinceda ubuthathaka berandi nokuphucuka koqoqosho ngamandla ehlabathini jikelele.
zul: lezi zibonelelo zizoqhubeka njalo ngoba imizi eminingi ithola ukusizakala ngoba amathuba emisebenzi ayivelakancane ngalesi sikhathi somnotho ontengantengayo.

xho: ngeli xesha sinezinzima, siyayiqonda into yokuba singamelana nalo eli xesha lokungazinzi.
zul: la mathuba atholakala kuhulumeni, enza sisho ngeqholo ukuthi iningizimu afrika esiphila kuyo namhlanje ingcono kakhulu kunaleyo esasiphila kuyo ngaphambi kowe-1994.

xho: kufanele sisebenzisane njengorhulumente, abezoshishino nemibutho yabasebenzi ukukhulisa uqoqosho lwethu ngezinga elingaphezulu kweepesenti ezihlanu sikwazi ukudala amathuba emisebenzi esiyidingayo.
zul: ukwehla kwamandla emali kungenzeka kuholele ekutheni akhuphuke kakhulu amanani entengo yezimpahla futhi lokho kuzokwenza ukuthi uhlelo lwethu lokwakhiwa kwengqalasizinda lumbe eqolo.

xho: oko kwenzeka kwibhunga lesizwe lokuphuhlisa uqoqosho nezabasebenzi (i-nedlac) elingamanye wamaziko entsebenziswano kulawulo lwethu lwentando yesininzi, phakathi kukarhulumente, abezoshishino, imibutho emele abasebenzi nabameli babahlali.
zul: kodwa-ke, izinkampani ezithumela izimpahla kwamanye amazwe, ikakhulu emkhakheni wezokukhiqizwa kwempahla, kumele zilisebenzise leli thuba elihlinzekwa yirandi elibuthakathaka kanye nokusimama komnotho womhlaba emva kokufadalala kwawo esikhathini esedlule.

xho: iqhubekekile kwakunye nakuthethathethwano ebesinalo nabezoshishino.
zul: nakuba sibhekene nalobu bunzima, siyazi ukuthi sizokwazi ukumelana nalesi sikhathi senxushunxushu ebangelwa ukwehla kwamandla emali.

xho: usekela mongameli werhiphabliki usaqhubekeka ukuququzelela iingxoxo phakathi kukarhulumente, iinkampani zemigodi nemibutho emele abasebenzi.
zul: ukubambisana kwenzeka kwi-nedlac okungesinye sezikhungo ezibalulekile zokubambisana zentando yeningi yethu, phakathi kukahulumeni, abamabhizinisi, abasebenzi kanye nomkhakha wezinhlaka zomphakathi.

xho: iinjongo zezokuzinzisa ubudlelwane kweli candelo libaluleke kangaka loqoqosho lwethu.
zul: lokhu kwenzekile futhi nasekubonisaneni esibe nakho nomphakathi wosomabhizinisi.

xho: singenelele kwezemigodi kuba ingamanye amacandelo wethu angundoqo ekudaleni amathuba emisebenzi.
zul: ngenxa yalolu hlelo lokubonisana nabamabhizinisi, manje sesikwenze lula ukulawulwa kanye nokunikezwa kwezimvume zokuhlolwa komthelela wokukhahlamezeka kwemvelo, nezimvume zamanzi kanye nezezimayini.

xho: sidinga icandelo lezemigodi elisebenzayo.
zul: iphalamende liphothula izichibiyelo zomthetho ukuze kuqaliswe ukusebenza kwale nqubo ezoba nomthelela omuhle kakhulu, ezonciphisa ubude besikhathi sokusungula izimayini behle bufinyelele esikhathini esiyizinsuku ezingaphansi kwama-300, kusukela ekufakweni kwesicelo kuya ekwamukelweni kwaso.

xho: lilelona lizuza ingeniso enkulu kunaniselwano namazwe angaphandle kwilizwe lethu.
zul: injongo yalokhu ukuletha uzinzo kubudlelwano phakathi kwabaqashi nabasebenzi kulo mkhakha obaluleke kakhulu emnothweni wethu.

xho: sisaqwalasela ubudlelwane bokuhlangabezana nomba wezindlu kwidolophu ezikufutshane nemigodi nabadlala indima ebalulekileyo.
zul: futhi into ebaluleke kakhulu ukuthi izinqubo zokubonisana phakathi kwabaqashi nabasebenzi zenzeka ngendlela ehambisana nokuthotshelwa komthetho.

xho: mandikhumbuze iinkampani zemigodi ukuba unyaka wama-2014 ngowokugqibela wokuba mabaphucule izindlu neemeko abasebenzi-mgodini abaphila phansi kwazo nokuphumeza inani lwezinto ekufanele ziphunyeziwe.
zul: sibone kufanele singenelele kwezezimayini ngoba lo mkhakha ngomunye wemikhakha yethu ebalulekile evula amathuba omsebenzi amaningi.

xho: ishishini lezokhenketho likhule ngokuncomekayo.
zul: lona ngumkhakha ongenisa imali evela kwamanye amazwe enkulu kunayo yonke eminye imikhakha ezweni lethu.

xho: ngowe-1993, umzantsi afrika ufumene nje izigidi ezintathu zeendwendwe ezisuka kumazwe angaphesheya.
zul: futhi lo mkhakha ufaka imali eyizigidigidi zamarandi ezibalelwa kuma-20 engena ngqo esikhwameni sentela saleli lizwe.

xho: ngowama-2012 sityhile isicwangciso seziseko ezingundoqo sesizwe, ngokukhokelwa ngumongameli ngekhomishini kamongameli yokulungelelanisa iziseko ezingundoqo.
zul: bantu baseningizimu afrika,malungu ahloniphekile,ngaphandle komkhakha wezezimayini, ngonyaka wezi-2009 sahlonza eminye imikhakha emihlanu ezovula amathuba omsebenzi amaningi.

xho: sifakele uluhlu lwemibhobho yezibaso engama-700 eekhilomitha ukusuka ethekwini ukuya egauteng yokuthutha iibhiliyoni ezine zeekyubhik-litha zepetula, idizili kunye nezibaso zejeti ngonyaka.
zul: kule minyaka emihlanu edlule sitshale inkulungwane yezigidigidi zamarandi ohlelweni lokwakhiwa kwengqalasizinda yomphakathi.

xho: sekwakhiwe iindlela ezintsha okanye imizila ephantse yafika kwi-1500 leekhilomitha.
zul: eminingi kule miklamo seyiphothuliwe noma sekusele kancane ukuthi iphothulwe.

xho: le nkqubela ngokumalunga neendlela isikhumbuzo ngabo babesebenza kulo rhulumente ngaphambi kwethu ababefuna ukuba eli lizwe lifumane okungcono kodwa, abafana nowayesakuba ngumphathiswa wezothutho umnu dullar omar.
zul: egoli, uhlelo lwamabhasi asheshayo olubizwa nge-rea vaya manje selusetshenziswa ngabahlali basegauteng abangaphezu kwezi-100 000. kunezinhlelo ezifana nalolu ezakhiwayo ekapa, tshwane, nelson mandela bay, buffalo city, ethekwini kanye nase-rustenburg.

xho: ukwakhiwa komzila woololiwe empumalanga sekuqalile, ngeenjongo zokunciphisa uxinizelelo ezindleleni.
zul: asenziwe ngcono amachweba akuleli lizwe kanye nezikhumulo zemikhumbi.

xho: iprojekthi yegautrain isebenza ngokupheleleyo ngoku kwaye ithwala abakhweli abangaphezulu kwe-1,2 sezigidi ngenyanga.
zul: sesakhe iphayiphi elithwala uphethiloli elingamakhilomitha angama-700 ubude elisuka ethekwini liye egauteng elithutha izigidigidi ezine ngonyaka zamakhubhikhi-litha kaphethiloli wezimoto, udizili kanye nophethiloli wamabhanoyi.

xho: i-arhente yabakhweli bakaloliwe yasemzantsi afrika (i-prasa) iza kuchitha ngaphezulu kwe-r120 leebhiliyoni kule minyaka ilishumi izayo ukuthenga oololiwe abatsha.
zul: sekwakhiwe imigwaqo nemizila emisha ecishe ibe ngamakhilomitha ayi-1 500. le nqubekelaphambili eseyenziwe ekwakhiweni kwemigwaqo isikhumbuza abantu ababeyingxenye yalo hulumeni esikhathini esedlule ababenesifiso sokubona leli lizwe linengqalasizinda kanokusho, abanjengongqongqoshe wezokuthutha waphambilini umnu dullar omar.

xho: ngokuqonda amandla wezoqoqosho wentshona koloni nonxweme lwasentshona, simisele ummandla wophuhliso lwamashishini i-saldanha saze savula nemizi-mveliso emibini emitsha e-atlantis.
zul: sekuqaliwe ukwakhiwa kojantshi besitimela abasha empumalanga, ukuze kuncishiswe ingcindezi emgwaqweni.

xho: ukuphucula ubonelelo lwamanzi, sele egqityiwe ukwakhiwa amadama amabini amatsha, i-de hoop elimpopo ne-spring grove kwazulu-natal, ngeli xesha isigaba sesibini seprojekthi ilesotho highlands water iza kumiselwa kungekudala.
zul: umklamo we-gautrain manje ususebenza ngokuphelele futhi uthwala abagibeli abangu-1,2 wezigidi ngenyanga.

xho: ulwakhiwo lwezikhululo zombane ezitsha ezibini lusaqhubekeka, imedupi elimpopo, ikusile empumalanga ne-ingula kufutshane nomnambithi, kwaqeshwa abasebenzi abangaphezulu kwama-30 000. sisaqhubekeka ukuphonononga eminye imithombo yezamandla, ngokuhambelana nesicwangciso semithombo edibeneyo yezamandla.
zul: uphiko lwezokuthuthwa kwabantu ngezitimela lwaseningizimu afrika luzosebenzisa imali engaphezu kwezigidigidi eziyi-r120 ukuthenga izitimela ezintsha kule minyaka eyishumi ezayo.

xho: ukuphuhliswa kwepetroliyam, ingakumbi igesi ephuma kuqhushumbo olwenzeka phantsi komhlaba kungaguqula izinto kummandla wekaroo noqoqosho lwasemzantsi afrika.
zul: abakwa-transnet sebeluqalisile uhlelo lwabo olukhulukazi lokubhekana nesidingo esikhuphukayo sokuhlinzeka amakhasimende abo ngalo lonke usizo aludingayo, oluzodla izigidigidi ezingama-r300, futhi lokhu kuzoholela ekwakhiweni kwengqalasizinda yezokuthutha edingeka kakhulu.

xho: siyihlolile imingcipheko namathuba, imithetho yokugqibela iza kuqukunjelwa kungekudala ize ilandelwe ngokwenziwa nokukhutshwa kweempepha-mvume.
zul: ngenhloso yokusimamisa umnotho wasentshonalanga kapa nowendawo esogwini olusentshonalanga, sesethule isifunda sokuthuthukiswa kwezimboni sase-saldanha futhi savula namafemu amabili e-atlantis.

xho: silindele ukuqukumbela ukufumaneka kwama-9 600 ee-megawatts zamandla enyukliya.
zul: uyaqhubeka umsebenzi wokwakhiwa kweziteshi ezintsha zamandla kagesi, imedupi elimpopo, ikusile empumalanga kanye ne-ingula bude buduze nasemnambithi, futhi kule miklamo kuqashwe abasebenzi abangaphezu kwezi-30 000. siyaqhubeka nemizamo yokuthola eminye imithombo kagesi, ngokohlelo oludidiyela imithombo ehlukahlukene yokuphehla ugesi.

xho: abavelisi bezibaso ezivela kwizityalo sele bekhethiwe kwaye sele beqalisile ukusebenza.
zul: ukuthuthukiswa kwephethroliyamu, ikakhulu igesi etholakala ngaphansi komhlaba, kuzoletha izinguquko ezinkulukazi esifundeni sase-karoo kanye nasemnothweni waseningizimu afrika.

xho: malungu ahloniphekileyoeneneni elethu lilizwe elisebenzayo kwaye yindawo ekungconwanana ukuhlala kuyo.
zul: njengoba sebuhlaziyiwe ubungozi kanye namathuba azovuleka, khona maduze nje kuzokhishwa izimiso zokugcina futhi lokhu kuzolandelwa wuhlelo lokucutshungulwa kwezicelo nokunikezwa kwezimvume.

xho: kufuneka silugcine olo yondelelwano lwamandla.
zul: sibheke ukuthi siphothule ukuthengwa kwamamegawathi kagesi wenonzi ayizi-9 600. sebeqokiwe abakhiqizi beziphehlamandla zezitshalo futhi sebeqalile ukusebenza.

xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,uninzi lobutyebi bethu budalwa ngokusebenzisa i-intanethi okanye unxibelelwano lomnxeba.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,ngempela singasho kugcwale umlomo ukuthi izwe lethu liyizwe elimatasatasa, elisebenzayo futhi elingcono kakhulu kunakuqala umuntu angaphila kulona.

xho: kule minyaka mihlanu idlulileyo kufakelwe iintambo zombane ezinezigqubuthelo zeplastiki ezingama-37 000 eekhilomitha.
zul: kule minyaka emihlanu edlule, umkhakha ozimele kanye nokahulumeni sewakhe futhi waxhuma amakhebuli efayibha athutha idatha nolwazi alinganiselwa kumakhilomitha ayizi-37 000 ubude.

xho: siyazingca ngempumelelo yethu kwezenzululwazi nobuchwephetshe.
zul: siyaziqhenya ngempumelelo yethu emkhakheni wezesayensi nobuchwepheshe.

xho: ukwakhiwa kwesibonakude sokuqala sama-64 eedish ephambili ye-square kilometre array, i-meerkat, kuza kugqitywa kwikota yokuqala yowama-2014.
zul: uzophothulwa ngekota yokuqala yowezi-2014 umsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwesibonakude sokuqala esinezindishi ezingama-64, esandulela ukwakhiwa kwesibonakude esikhulukazi esibizwa nge-square kilometre array, i-meerkat.

xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,inkuthazo yethu yokukhulisa imveliso seyineziqhamo ezibonakalayo.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,izibonelelo zethu zokukhuthaza umkhakha wezokukhiqizwa kwempahla sezikhombise izithelo ezinhle.

xho: iskimu senkuthazo kwezeemoto nesamiselwa ngowama-2009 sesiphumeze inkuthazo efikelela kwi-r3,8 yeebhiliyoni ukwenzela iiprojekthi zotyalo-mali ezili-160.
zul: uhlelo lokutshalwa kwezimali emkhakheni wokwakhiwa kwezimoto olwethulwa ngowezi-2009 selwamukele ukukhishwa kwezibonelelo ezilinganiselwa kwizigidigidi ezingu-r3.8 zokukhuthaza imiklamo yokutshalwa kwezimali ecishe ibe yi-160.

xho: oku kuzinzise malunga namathuba emisebenzi engama-50 wamawaka.
zul: lokhu kuqinisekisa ukuba khona kwamathuba omsebenzi angaphezu kwezi-50 000. lezi zinkampani zizokwakha izimoto, amakhumbi kanye namabhasi.

xho: silizinzisile icandelo lezeempahla, impahla elukiweyo, ufele nelezihlangu, apho abantu babekade bephelelwa yimisebenzi.
zul: sesilethe uzinzo emkhakheni wezingubo, indwangu, isikhumba kanye nezicathulo, okuyimikhakha obekudilizwa kuyona abasebenzi kakhulu.

xho: amashishini athile amiselwe ukuba ajongane nemveliso yalapha ekhaya.
zul: kunezimboni eziningana ezisungulelwe ukwakha imikhiqizo ngaphakathi kuleli lizwe futhi ezosetshenziswa kuleli lizwe.

xho: oku kuquka iibhasi, iimfuno enkonkxiweyo, impahla, impahla elukiweyo, ufele nezihlangu nezinye iimveliso.
zul: lezi zibandakanya izimboni zamabhasi, imifino esemathinini, izingubo, indwangu, isikhumba, izicathulo kanye nezinye izimpahla.

xho: sinemizekelo ebonakalayo yokuphumelela kwenkqubo yokuqaqambisa imveliso yasekhaya.
zul: sinezibonelo eziphathekayo zempumelelo yohlelo yokukhiqizwa kwempahla ngaphakathi kuleli lizwe lethu.

xho: kule minyaka mibini idlulileyo, kudityaniswe iiteksi zeminibhasi ezingama-20 000 neebhasi ezingama-330 apha ekhaya, oku kutsalela utyalo-mali nophuhliso kwizixeko zethu.
zul: kule minyaka emibili nje kuphela edlule, kuleli lizwe kwakhiwe amakhumbi angaphezu kwezi-20 000 kanye namabhasi angama-330, lokhu sekuhehe ukutshalwa kwezimali futhi kwathuthukisa namadolobha ethu.

xho: kule minyaka mihlanu izayo, urhulumente uza kuthenga malunga nama-75% eemveliso neenkonzo kubavelisi balapha emzantsi afrika.
zul: kule minyaka emihlanu ezayo, umbuso uzothenga okungenani ama-75% ezimpahla zawo nemisebenzi kubakhiqizi baseningizimu afrika.

xho: bemi bomzantsi afrika,kufanele sisebenze ngaphezulu kokuba sisenza ukuphuhlisa imizi-mveliso esakhulayo okanye abanini mizi-mveliso abantsundu.
zul: bantu baseningizimu afrika,kumele sisebenze ngokuzikhandla okukhulu kunakuqala ukuthuthukisa osozimboni abasafufusa noma osozimboni abamnyama.

xho: uninzi lwabanini mizi-mveliso abamnyama abasakhulayo bakhalazela ubunzima abahlangana nabo ekufumaneni inkxaso yezezimali zoshishini lwemizi-mveliso, urhwebo lwababoneleli nabathengisa ngemiyinge emincinci, nenkxaso yobuchwephetshe bokuvelisa.
zul: abantu abaningi abamnyama abanesifiso sokuba ngosozimboni bakhononda ngobunzima abahlangabezana nabo ukuthola ukuxhaswa ngezimali zokusungula izimboni, nezimakethe zokuhlinzeka nokuthengisa ngempahla yabo, kanye nokuthola ulwazi olufanelekile lomsebenzi wezokukhiqizwa kwempahla.

xho: ingxowa-mali yokuxhobisa yesizwe, nequmrhu lophuhliso lwamashishini kunye ne-arhente yenkxaso-mali yamashishini amancinane ziza kuqhubekeka ukubonelela ngemali yenkxaso kumashishini wemizi-mveliso aphilayo wabanini abantsundu ukukhuthaza ukwanda kwamashishini emizi-mveliso.
zul: isikhwama sikazwelonke sokufukulwa kwabamnyama kwezomnotho, inhlangano yokuthuthukiswa kwezimboni kanye nophiko lokuxhaswa ngezimali kwamabhizinisi asafufusa zizoqhubeka nokuxhasa ngezimali amabhizinisi abantu abamnyama athembisayo, ukuze kugqugquzelwe ukusungulwa kwezimboni.

xho: ukongeza apho, sikhuthaza amashishini azinzileyo ukuba axhase uphuhliso lwamashishini emizi-mveliso yabantsundu.
zul: ngaphezu kwalokho, sikhuthaza amabhizinisi asethuthukile ukuthi asekele ukuthuthukiswa kwezimboni zabamnyama.

xho: ezolimo ngumdali wamathuba emisebenzi ongundoqo nomboneleli wamathuba ezoshishino.
zul: umkhakha wezolimo ngumkhakha obalulekile ovula amathuba omsebenzi amaningi futhi ohlinzeka ngamathuba okusungula amabhizinisi.

xho: inkqubo yethu yenkxaso yezolimo, i-fetsa tlala, ivelisa abathumeli-mveliso kumazwe angaphesheya abatsha.
zul: uhlelo lwethu lokuxhasa ezolimo olubizwa nge-fetsa tlala, lukhiqiza osomabhizinisi abasha abathumela imikhiqizo yabo emazweni angaphandle.

xho: awokuqala amafama angama-88 wemihlatyana emincinci kule nkqubo abonelele inkqubo yokutya yehlabathi yezizwe ezimanyeneyo ngeetoni ezingama-268 zombona neembotyi zokuthumela elesotho kule nyanga iphelileyo.
zul: ngenyanga edlule, abalimi abasafufusa bokuqala abangama-88 abayingxenye yalolu hlelo bahlinzeke uhlelo lwenhlangano yezizwe lokuhlinzeka ngokudla emhlabeni ngamathani angama-268 ombila nobhontshisi azothunyelwa kwelaselesotho.

xho: silindele ukuba eli nani lande.
zul: silindele ukuthi sikhuphuke lesi sibalo.

xho: siza kuqhubekeka ukulikhulisa nalo icandelo lethu lezokuloba, nelithi libe negalelo elithelekelelwa kwiibhiliyoni ezisithandathu zeerandi kuqoqosho nelibonelela ngamathuba emisebenzi engama-27 000. malungu ahloniphekileyo,senze inkqubela entle kwinkqubo yokuhlengahlengiswa komhlaba.
zul: futhi sizoqhubeka nokugqugquzela umkhakha wethu wezokudoba, okuwumkhakha ofaka imali elinganiselwa kwizigidigidi eziyisithupha zamarandi emnothweni wethu futhi ohlinzeka ngamathuba omsebenzi ayizi-27 000. malungu ahloniphekile,sesenze inqubekelaphambili encomekayo ohlelweni lokulethwa kwezinguquko kwezomhlaba.

xho: ukususela ngowe-1994, phantse ziifama ezingama-5 000, ezenziwa ziihektare, ezidluliselwe kubantu abantsundu, ezixhamlise iintsapho ezingaphezulu kwama-200 000. phantse ibe ngamabango omhlaba angama-80 000, afikelela kwi-3,4 sezigidi zeehektare, asele egqityiwe kwaye kuxhamle i-1,8 sezigidi zabantu.
zul: kusukela ngowe-1994, acishe afinyelele kwizi-5 000 amapulazi, alinganiselwa kumahekthare omhlaba ayizigidi ezingu-4,2, asedluliselwe ezandleni zabantu abamnyama, futhi lokhu kuhlomulise imindeni engaphezu kwezi-200 000. cishe ziyizi-80 000 izicelo eseziphothuliwe zokubuyiselwa umhlaba olinganiselwa kumahekthare ayizigidi ezingu-3,4 futhi lokhu kuhlomulise abantu abayizigidi ezingu-1,8.

xho: urhulumente olandelayo kuza kufuneka ukuba uqhubele phambili ngenani elivisayo lemigaqo-nkqubo, ungenelelo lwezomthetho nolubonakalayo, ukuqhubela phambili ukulungisa ukuhluthwa komhlaba kubantu bethu.
zul: uhulumeni ozothatha izintambo kuzodingeka ukuthi aqhubekisele phambili izinhlelo eziningana zokungenelela, ngokusebenzisa inqubomgomo, umthetho kanye nezinyathelo eziphathekayo, ukuze kuqhutshekwe nokulungisa inkinga yokuphucwa kwabantu bethu umhlaba wabo.

xho: oku kuquka imiba enxulumene nokusekwa kwe-ofisi yomhlengahlengisi jikelele ngalo ndlela kuvulwe inyoba yokufakwa kwamabango.
zul: lezi zinhlelo zibandakanya nezindaba eziphathelene nokusungulwa kwehhovisi lesikhulu esiyinhloko sokubekwa kwezilinganiso zamanani entengo yomhlaba futhi emva kwalokho kuzobe sekuvulwa kabusha ithuba lokufakwa kwezicelo zokubuyiselwa umhlaba.

xho: malungu ahloniphekileyoeneneni umzantsi afrika lilizwe elithe chatha ngobungcono ukuhlala kulo.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,ngempela iningizimu afrika isiyizwe elingcono kakhulu umuntu angaphila kulona.

xho: ke ngoku makhe ndifake ingxelo ngenkqubo yenguqu kwezentlalo.
zul: manje ngizobika ngohlelo lwethu lokuletha uguquko kwinhlalo yomphakathi.

xho: imfundo yindlela yokuphuma endlaleni kwizigidi ngezigidi zabantu.
