zul: siyawancoma lawa makhomishana ngomsebenzi awenzayo, futhi esikhathini esiningi awenza ngaphansi kobunzima obukhulu, ukuze kuvundululwe iqiniso.

xho: ezi khomishini kufuneka zenze umsebenzi wazo ngaphandle kokuphazanyiswa, futhi sihlaba ikhwelo kuyo wonke umntu onento ayaziyo nengaluncedo ukuba eze ngaphambili.
zul: lawa makhomishana kumele enze umsebenzi wawo ngaphandle kokuphazanyiswa nokuvinjelwa, futhi siyabanxusa bonke labo bantu abasesimweni sokufaka isandlaukuthi basondele bawalekelele amakhomishana ophenyweni alwenzayo.

xho: nangona ezi khomishini ziza kuthatha ixesha phambi kokuba ziqukumbele zinike iziphumo neziphakamiso ngokomsebenzi eziwugunyazisiweyo, ubungqina obukhomba izenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho obuvelayo kufuneka buthunyelwe kwiinkundla nee-arhente zogcino-mthetho.
zul: nakuba kusazothatha isikhathi ukuthi lawa makhomishana akhiphe imiphumela yalokho akutholile ophenyweni lwawo futhi enze nezincomo ngokuhambisana namagunya awo, ubufakazi bezenzo zobugebengu obuvelayo kumele bufakelwe izibuko wuhlelo lobulungiswa nokulwisana nobugebengu.

xho: apho kukho ubungqina obunyanzelisa ukuba abantu batshutshiswe, kufuneka batshutshiswe ngokukhawuleza ize imali karhulumente ebithotywe nemilenze ibuyiswe ngokukhawuleza.
zul: lapho kunobufakazi obuphathekayo obuvumela ukuba kuqaliswe inqubo yokushushisa, kumele ilandele ngokushesha futhi kubuyiswe ngokushesha imali kahulumeni entshontshiwe.

xho: malunga nalo mba, siye savumelana ne-ndpp entsha, ukuba kufuneka kuvulwe icandelo lophando kwi-ofisi ye-ndpp eliza kugxininisa kumatyala amabi orhwaphilizo namanye afana nawo, njengoko lisitsho icandelo 7 lomthetho we-npa.
zul: ngenxa yalokho-ke, sivumelene no-ndpp omusha ukuthi kukhona isidingo esisheshayo sokusungula, ehhovisi lika-ndpp, uphiko lokuphenya oluzobhekana ngqo namacala amabi obugebengu kanye namanye ahlobene nawo, ngokuhambisana nesigaba 7 somthetho we-npa.

xho: kungekudala ndiza kwenza isibhengezo esisesikweni esiza kucacisa imigaqo eza kulandelwa yokumisela eli candelo.
zul: khona maduze nje ngizokhipha isisaziso esisemthethweni esizobeka ngokucacile imigomo yokusebenza yalolu phiko.

xho: ngokufutshane, eli candelo liza kugxininisa kubugqina obuvela kwikhomishini kazondo yophando ngokubanjwa kobhongwane kombuso, nakwezinye iikhomishini kunye neziphumo zophando ngemiba yezoluleko.
zul: ngokubanzi, lolu phiko, luzogxila ebufakazini osebuvelile kwikhomishana yophenyo kazondo ephenya isihlava sokubhozonyelwa kombuso, nakwamanye amakhomishana kanye nasophenyweni lwezigcawu zokuqondisa izigwegwe.

xho: liza kujonga amatyala eliza kuwaphanda liwase ezinkundleni zotshutshiso lize libuyise nemali ekukho ubungqina bokuba ifunyenwe ngondlela mnyama norhwaphilizo.
zul: luzohlonza amacala aseqhulwini okumele aphenywe futhi ashushiswe, futhi luzodla nempahla ehlonzwe njengempahla ethengwe ngemali etholakale ezenzweni zobugebengu.

xho: eli candelo liza kuba neengcali kwezophando nakwezotshutshiso eziphuma kurhulumente nakwicandelo labucala futhi liza kuba phantsi komlawuli yena oza kubaphantsi kwe-ndpp.
zul: lolu phiko luzohlanganisa ndawonye abaphenyi kanye nabashushisi abaningi futhi abahlukahlukene, abavela ngaphakathi emkhakheni kahulumeni kanye nalabo abavela emkhakheni ozimele abazoholwa ngumqondisi wezokuphenya osebenza ngaphansi kuka-ndpp.

xho: ekuhambeni kwexesha, siza kusebenzisana ne-npa kunye nezinye ii-arhente zogcino-mthetho sizame isisombululo esiza kusisebenzisa ixesha elide esiza kongeza inani labantu abaqeshwe ezinkundleni nakwii-arhente zogcino-mthetho ukuze kuliwe urhwaphilizo.
zul: ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, sizosebenzisana ne-npa kanye nezinye izimpiko zokuphoqelela ukuthotshelwa komthetho ukuthuthukisa isixazululo sesikhathi eside esizoqinisa amandla okuqhuba umsebenzi ngempumelelo ohlelweni lobulungiswa nokulwisana nobugebengu ukuze lukwazi ukubhekana ngqo nenkohlakalo.

xho: bantu bakuthi,njengoko sisajamelene nemingeni yangaphambili, nanjengoko siqhubeleka nokuqinisa amalinge ethu okulwa inkohlakalo embi yeenkulungwane zeminyaka, kubalulekile ukuba sihlale sithe qwa sazi apho sisingise khona.
zul: bantu baseningizimu afrika,njengoba sisazama ukuxazulula izinselele ezibangelwe yizinto ezenzeke kuleli esikhathini esifushane esedlule, futhi njengoba siqinisa imizamo yethu yokunqoba ububi bokungahanjiswa kwezinto ngobulungiswa, okwaqhubeka amakhulukhulu eminyaka, kusemqoka ukuthi ngenkathi sikwenza lokho amehlo ethu ahlale ethe njo esikhathini esizayo.

xho: isantya ezitshintsha ngaso izinto kule mihla siphezulu ngendlela engazange yabonwa ezimbalini.
zul: umhlaba esiphila kuwona njengamanje uguquka ngesivinini esikhulu futhi ngendlela engakaze ibonwe emlandweni.

xho: ubuxhaka-xhaka bobuchwephesha obukwizinga eliphezulu kakhulu buyazitshintsha iindlela abantu abasebenza nabaphila ngazo.
zul: intuthuko enkulukazi eyenzekayo kwezobuchwepheshe iguqula indlela abasebenza ngayo abantu futhi lokhu kushintsha nendlela abaphila ngayo.

xho: ziyatshintsha iindlela esisebenzisana nesibabona ngayo abanye abantu, neendlela uluntu ngobubanzi olusebenza noluzenza ngayo izinto kunye nendlela abantu nezizwe ezilawulwa ngayo.
zul: le ntuthuko enkulukazi iguqula indlela abaxhumana ngayo abantu, indlela esebenza ngayo imiphakathi kanye nendlela ephathwa ngayo.

xho: umonakalo ongathethekiyo owenziwa kukunyuka kwamaqondo obushushu kwihlabathi kwimo zezulu uyavakala, iimeko zezulu ezimbi ziyabaphehluzelisa abantu, izizwe kunye namazwe.
zul: imiphumela emibi kakhulu yesivuvu sokushisa komhlaba, esiguqula isimo sezulu sethu esijwayelekile, isiyazwela impela njengoba izimo zezulu ezixakile zicekela phansi izindlela abaziphilisa ngazo abantu, futhi zicekela phansi imiphakathi kanye namazwe.

xho: njengesizwe esifumene inkululeko izolo, sineminyaka nje engama-25 silawulwa ngokwentando yesininzi, sixakene nengxubakaxaka yokukhetha phakathi kokusonga izandla okanye ukubhinqa omfutshane siphathe khona.
zul: njengesizwe esisha, okuyiminyaka engama-25 nje kuphela izwe libuswa ngentando yeningi labantu, sibhekene nezimo ezinzima futhi ezingagwemeki okumele sikhethe kuzona.

xho: ukukhetha phakathi kokunyevulela ubuxhaka-xhaka bale nokubamkela ngezandla zozibini ukuze sibusebenzisele ukufezekisa amaphupha ethu okuphuhlisa eli lizwe.
zul: kumele sikhethe phakathi kokushiywa ngemuva wuguquko olwenzekayo kwezobuchwepheshe noma silubambe ngazo zombili, silusebenzisele ukufezekisa izifiso nezinjongo zethu zentuthuko.

xho: ukukhetha phakathi kokuyibetha ngoyaba intlungu yokungalingani okanye ukusebenzisana sidale ilizwe lobusi nobisi kuye wonke ngokusebenzisa ubuchule bokuyila.
zul: kumele sikhethe phakathi kokuqinisa nokugxilisa ukungaiingani kanye nokwakha isimo esizophumelelisa umuntu wonke ngokusebenzisa intuthuko yokuqanjwa nokusungulwa kwezinto zesimanjemanje.

xho: ngaphandle kokuba siyazihlanganisela sizilungiselele, ngaphandle kokuba siyawazi owona mongo ungundoqo wolu tshintsho lwenza ezibukwayo kwihlabathi liphela, ngaphandle kokuba sithi unotshe nathi siza kuwaxhaphaza siwasebenzise la mathuba eza nolu tshintsho, izithembiso esazenzayo ngethuba eli lizwe lifumana inkululeko ziya kuhlala zinjalo, zizizithembiso ezingazalisekwanga.
zul: ngaphandle kokuthi nathi siguquke nalolu guquko olwenzekayo, ngaphandle kokuthi nathi siluqonde kahle uhlobo loguquko olunohlonze olushintsha isimo somhlaba wethu, nangaphandle kokuthi nathi siwabambe ngazo zombili amathuba ahlinzekwa yilolu guquko, izithembiso esazenza ngenkathi izwe lethu lithola inkululeko ziyohlala zinjalo, ziyithembiso ezingafezekisiwe.

xho: namhlanje, sikhetha ukuba sisizwe sale mihla esikhasela phambili.
zul: namuhla, sikhetha ukuba yisizwe esihlabela phambili, esiphokophele esikhathini esizayo.

xho: ngokwenza oku, sakhela kwimisebenzi yezobunzululwazi ekwizinga lehlabathi.
zul: ngokwenza njalo, sakhela phezu kwesisekelo sempumelelo emangalisayo ezuziwe kwezesayensi.

xho: ukwakhiwa ngempumelelo kwesibonakude (itheleskophu) i-meerkat emntla koloni, isibonakude esiseona sikhulu nesinobuxhakaxhaka bokuva amaza obubukhali kunawo onke kwihlabathi jikelele, nokwakhiwa kwesiza esiyikhilomitha ubude nobubanzi (i-ska) kwenze umzantsi afrika waqesha iingcali kwinzululwazi yokujonga emajukujukwini, kweyobunjineli bezinga eliphezulu nobekhompyutha ezinobuxhaka-xhaka obukwelona qondo lokugqibela ngokwesantya nesakhono.
zul: ukwakhiwa ngempumelelo kwesibonakude i-meerkat enyakatho kapa, okuyisibonakude esikhulukazi emhlabeni futhi esisebenza ngamagagasi omoya esinamandla amakhulukazi okubona izinto ezikude emajukujukwini omkhathi, kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwe-square kilometre array (i-ska) sekwenze ukuthi iningizimu afrika ikwazi ukuqeqesha ongoti bemikhakha enjengokubukelwa komkhathi, ubunjiniyela obuseqophelweni eliphakeme kanye nabomkhakha wokusetshenziswa kwamakhompyutha asesingeni eliphakeme kakhulu, obizwa nge-supercomputing.

xho: ezi ngcungela zinezi zakhono ziyasetyenziswa ekwakheni i-hera, isibonakude samaza esenzelwe ukuva, okokuqala ezimbalini, amaza afana wodwa avela kwiinkwenkwezi nee-galaxy zokuqala (iingqumba zeenkwenkwezi ezingaphaya kwamajukujuku) ezazalwa ngethuba indalo yonke iseneminyakana nje embalwa ikho.
zul: labo ngoti bayasetshenziswa njengamanje ukwakha i-hera, isibonakude esisebenza ngemagagasi omoya esakhelwe ukuhlonza, okokuqala ngqa, isiginali yamagagasi omoya eyingqayizivele evela ezinkanyezini kanye nemithala (ama-galaxy) yasemandulo okungeyokuqala ngqa eyakheka ngenkathi kudaleka imvelo yonke.

xho: oku akukho malunga nje nokutyebisa ulwazi lwabantu ngemvelaphi yendalo - kumalunga nokusabela kule mingeni abemi bomzantsi afrika bajamelene nayo namhlanje, nabasezakujamelana nayo ngomso.
zul: lokho akuphathelene nje kuphela nokuqhubekisela phambili ukuqonda kwabantu ngokudaleka kwemvelo yonke – kepha kuphathelene nokubhekana nezinselele ezibhekene nabantu baseningizimu afrika esikhathini samanje kanye nalezo abazobhekana nazo esikhathini esizayo.

xho: injongo yoku kukubhala ubuchwepheshe kunye nezakhono eziza kwakha uqoqosho lwale mihla nolukwaziyo ukumelana nokhuphiswano eliza kudala imisebenzi esisigxina.
zul: lokhu kuphathelene nokuthuthukisa ubuchwepheshe kanye namandla namakhono okusebenza azokwakha umnotho okhulayo, oguquka nezikhathi nokwaziyo ukuncintisana neminye, futhi ovula amathuba omsebenzi asezingeni elamukelekile futhi asimeme.

xho: intsusa yoku kukuqinisekisa ukuba kukho ukutya okwaneleyo, sinamacebo nobuxhaka-xhaka bokulwa izifo kunye namandla afikelelekayo, angenabungozi kokusingqongileyo nasebenza ngobunono.
zul: lokhu kuphathelene nokuqinisekisa ukuthi kunokudla okwanele kuleli, ukulawulwa kwezifo kangcono, kanye namandla kagesi angambi eqolo, ahlanzekile futhi asebenza kahle.

xho: lo msebenzi ulungiselelwe iindawo ezihlala abantu ezilungiselwe iimeko zale mihla kunye nezisombululo kwiingxaki zophuhliso loluntu ezisekelwe kwizidingo nezinto ezithandwa ngabantu.
zul: lokhu kuphathelene nezindawo zokuhlalisa abantu zesimanjemanje kanye nezinsizakalo zokuthuthukiswa komphakathi ezakhelwe phezu kwezidingo zabantu kanye nezinto ezithandwa yibona.

xho: oku kumalunga nolawulo oluhlakaniphileyo, olusabela ngokukhawuleza kunye nolusebenzayo.
zul: lokhu kuphathelene nokuphatha okunobuhlakani, okusabelayo futhi okusebenza kahle.

xho: ukuze siqinisekise ukuba siyawasebenzisa futhi siwaxhamla onke amathuba eza notshintsho kwezobuchwepheshe kuba sifuna ukufikelela kuhlumo loqoqosho oluza kuxhanyulwa ngumntu wonke kunye nophuhliso loluntu, ndonyule ikomishini kamongameli yeziseko zokuchwepheshe bale mihla.
zul: ukuqinisekisa ukuthi silusebenzisa kahle futhi ngokuphuthuma okukhulu uguquko lwezobuchwepheshe ekuphishekeleni ukukhula komnotho okubandakanyayo kanye nokuthuthukiswa komphakathi, sengiqoke ikhomishana kamongameli eqondene noguquko lwezimboni lwesine olugxile ekusetshenzisweni kobuxhakaxhaka nobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje.

xho: le komishini yenziwe ngabantu abazingcali ezaziwayo eziphuma kumacandelo ahlukeneyo kweli lizwe iza kusebenza njengequmrhu lesizwe labacebisi elilelona liphezulu lemiba engenguqu kwezobuchwepheshe.
zul: le khomishana, ezobandakanya abantu abavelele futhi abahlonishwayo abavela emikhakheni ehlukahlukene yomphakathi, izosebenza njengethimba elimkhakha-mningi likazwelonke lokweluleka maqondana noguquko lokusetshenziswa kobuxhakaxhaka besimanjemanje obusebenzisa izinhlelo-kusebenza zekhompyutha.

xho: liza kuqulunqa lize linike neengcebiso ngemigaqo-nkqubo, amacebo kunye nezicwangciso eziza kwenza umzantsi afrika ube lelinye lamazwe ahamba phambili kubuchwepheshe bale mihla.
zul: lokhu kuzohlonza futhi kwenze izincomo mayelana nezinqubomgomo, amaqhingasu kanye nezinhlelo ezizobeka iningizimu afrika esimweni sokuba yizwe elikwaziyo ukuncintisana namanye amazwe emhlabeni jikelele emkhakheni wezoguquko lokusetshenziswa kobuxhakaxhaka besimanjemanje obusebenzisa izinhlelo-kusebenza zekhompyutha.

xho: sisebenzisa lo msebenzi sele siwenzile kulo nyaka uphelileyo, siza kuphucula izakhono zombuso.
zul: ngokwakhela phezu komsebenzi esiwenze ngonyaka odlule, sizogxila ekuqiniseni kakhudlwana amandla nekhono lokusebenza lombuso.

xho: inkulu indima esele siyihambile malunga nokuphonononga inani labasebenzi kunye neendlela ezihlelwe ngayo izikhundla zombuso, siza kuwugqiba lo msebenzi xa lo rhulumente wathatha intambo zolawulo ngowe-2014 uphelelwe lixesha lawo lolawulo.
zul: ikhona inqubekela phambili esesiyenzile ekucubunguleni ubukhulu kanye nohlaka lwezikhundla zombuso, futhi lo msebenzi sizowuphothula ngaphambi kokuphela kwehlandla lokuphatha likahulumeni ophethe njengamanje owavotelwa ngowezi-2014.

xho: sihlaba ikhwelo kubo bonke abemi bomzantsi afrika ukuba bathumele izimvo kunye neengcebiso zabo ngendlela abafuna atshintshwe indlela urhulumente ahlelwe ngawo ukuze akwazi ukuba luncedo ngamandla ebantwini.
zul: siyabanxusa bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika ukuthi benze iziphakamiso futhi bathumele imibono yabo mayelana nokuthi iyiphi indlela engcono yokwakha nokuhlanganisa uhlaka lwezikhundla zikahulumeni ukuze ukwazi ukusebenzela ukufezekisa izidingo nezimfuno zabantu.

xho: njengelinge lokuphucula izakhono zabasebenzi bakarhulumente, isikolo sesizwe sikarhulumente (i-nsg) siza kuqalisa izifundo ezisisinyanzelo eziza kuba kwicandelo lemigaqo yokuziphatha nokulwa urhwaphilizo, izakhono zokuphatha kumanqanaba aphezulu kunye nezokulawula iinkqubo zokuthenga kweenkonzo neempahla, ukuthunyelwa kwabaphathi kumaziko apho baza kunxibelelana ngqo nabahlali ngolo hlobo kuphuculwe iinkqubo zokuhanjiswa kweenkonzo.
zul: ngenhloso yokwenza ngcono amakhono kanye namandla okusebenza ezisebenzi zikahulumeni, isikole sikazwelonke sikahulumeni (i-nsg) sethule iqoqwana lezifundo eziphoqelekile, emikhakheni enjengomkhakha wenkambiso yokuziphatha elungileyo nokulwisana nenkohlakalo, umkhakha wabaphathi abakhulu kanye nokuphathwa kwenqubo yokuthengwa kwempahla nezinsizakalo, kanye nokutshalwa kwabaphathi ezigabeni lapho bezozibambela bona mathupha futhi balekelele emsebenzini wokuhlinzeka umphakathi ngezinsizakalo ukuze kuqiniswe ukuhlinzekwa kwezinsizakalo emphakathini.

xho: siza kuqalisa ukusebenzisa icandelo 8 lomthetho wolawulo nokuphathwa kukarhulumente, elenza ngqingqwa imithetho elwa okanye eyenza kungabikho mthethweni ukuba abasebenzi bakarhulumente baqhube ushishino nombuso lize lincede urhulumente akwazi ukulusiphula neengcambu urhwaphilizo.
zul: sizokwenza yonke imidanti nemicikilisho edingekayo maqondana nokusetshenziswa kwesigaba 8 somthetho wokuphathwa nokulawulwa komkhakha wezisebenzi zikahulumeni, esiqinisa ukunqatshelwa kwezisebenzi zikahulumeni ngokusemthethweni ukwenza ibhizinisi nombuso futhi ukuze uhulumeni ukwazi ukubhekana kangcono nezenzo zenkohlakalo.

xho: lo mthetho uza kubangela ukuba amagosa aphula umthetho afumane izohlwayo eziqatha, eziquka umdliwo oyintlawulo okanye nokuthunyelwa ejele.
zul: lesi simiselo somthetho sizoholela ekutheni kukhishwe izigwebo eziqinile, kubandakanya izinhlawulo noma nezigwebo zokugqunywa ejele kulezo zisebenzi zikahulumeni eziphula umthetho.

xho: icandelo loncedo lobuchule ngemigaqo yokuziphatha, imfezeko noluleko liza kusekwa ukuze kuphuculwe indlela elawulwa ngayo imigaqo yokuziphatha nokuqinisekisa ukuba kukho iziphumo xa ubani ethe wenza into enxamnye nemigaqo karhulumente.
zul: kuzosungulwa uphiko lwezenkambiso yokuziphatha elungileyo, ubuqotho kanye nokuhlinzeka ngosizo lokuphathwa nokuqhutshwa kwenqubo yokuqondiswa kwezigwegwe ukuze kuqiniswe ukuphathwa nokulawula kwenkambiso yokuziphatha elungileyo nokulwisana nenkohlakalo futhi kuqinisekise ukuthi bayaphendula ngezenzo zabo futhi bathathelwa izinyathelo zokuqondiswa kwezigwegwe labo abaphule izinqubo-kusebenza ezibekiwe zikahulumeni.

xho: bantu bomzantsi afrika,umzantsi afrika kulo nyaka uza kuthatha indawo yawo njengelingu elingesosigxina sebhunga lezokhuseleko lezizwe ezimanyeneyo (i-unsc).
zul: bantu baseningizimu afrika,kulo nyaka iningizimu afrika seyithathe isikhundla sobulungu besikhashana emkhandlwini wezokuvikela wenhlangano yezizwe (i-unsc).

xho: siza kusebenzisa esi sikhundla silwelwe uxolo kweli lizwekazi nakwihlabathi liphela, ngolo hlobo siqhubele phambili umbono kanelson mandela wehlabathi elinoxolo, elizinzileyo nelisekelwe kubulungisa.
zul: lesi sikhundla sizosisebenzisela ukukhuthaza nokugqugquzela ukuthula kuleli zwekazi kanye nasemhlabeni wonke jikelele, ngalokho siqhubekisele phambili ihloso-mbono ka-nelson mandela yomhlaba onokuthula, uzinzo, ongachemile futhi onobulungiswa.

xho: bantu bakuthi,kwiinyangana nje ezimbalwa, abemi bomzantsi afrika baza kuya kuvota isihlandlo sesithandathu ukusukela oko eli lizwe lafumana inkululeko, apho baza kuya kuvotela urhulumente kazwelonke nowamaphondo.
zul: bantu baseningizimu afrika,ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezizayo, abantu baseningizimu afrika bazovakashela ezikhungweni zokuvota beyovota, okuzobe kungokwesithupha ngaphansi kombuso wethu wentando yeningi labantu bevotela uhulumeni kazwelonke kanye nohulumeni bezifundazwe.

xho: eli iza kuba lithuba lokuba abantu bakuthi basebenzisa ilungelo labo abalilwela nzima lokuthatha inxaxheba xa kuthathwa isigqibo ngendlela eli lizwe ekufuneka lilawulwe ngayo.
zul: leli yithuba lokuthi abantu bakuleli basebenzise ilungelo labo abalithola kanzima lokuthatha isinqumo mayelana nokuthi leli lizwe kumele lithathe indlela ebheke ngakuluphi uhlangothi.

xho: bendibambe indibano nekomishini yonyulo ezimeleyo (i-iec) kunye neenkulumbuso zamaphondo, yaye ndineenjongo zokubhengeza umhla wesi-8 kucanzibe 2019 njengomhla wolonyulo.
zul: sengixoxisene nekhomishana yokhetho ezimele kanye nondunankulu bazo zonke izifundazwe, futhi ngihlose ukumemezela ngokusemthethweni usuku lomhla ziyisi-8 kunhlaba 2019 njengosuku lokhetho.

xho: sifuna ukukhumbuza bonke abemi bomzantsi afrika abafanelekileyo abangekabhaliseli ukuvota ukuba basenalo ixesha ude umhla wolonyulo ubhengezwe ngokusesikweni.
zul: sithanda ukubakhumbuza bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika abafanelekile ukuvota abangakabhalisi njengabavoti ukuthi basenalo ithuba lokubhalisa kuze kufike usuku lokumenyenzelwa ngokusemthethweni kosuku lokhetho.

xho: bantu bomzantsi afrika,singabantu abakwaziyo ukunyamezela, abangaxhomi izandla idabi lizaqhuba nabakwaziyo ukubambelelela ethembeni.
zul: bantu baseningizimu afrika,thina singabantu abakwaziyo ukumelana nezimo ezinzima futhi emva kwalokho bavuke bazithathe, abaphikelelayo futhi abahlalela ethembeni lokuthi konke kuzolunga.

xho: nangona umbuso wocalucalulo wawusekelwe kwinzondo nenkohlakalo, zange siphele sisisizwe esilugcwabevu nesigcwele ingcwangu yempindezelo ngethuba sifumana inkululeko yethu.
zul: nakuba sabhekana nobubi obesabekayo bobandlululo, asizange sibe nomoya wokuziphindisela emva kokuthola inkululeko yethu.

xho: isizwe sethu esilawulwa ngentando yesininzi asiqhathuli nje kuphela koko siyagqabadula futhi siqhakazile, ngokufukanyelwa bubushushu bobubele bamadoda oqobo, oomama namaqobokazana eli lizwe lookhokho bethu, abazazi kakuhle izinto ezancanywa ngamagorha namagorhakazi eli ukuze sibe silapha namhlanje.
zul: umbuso wethu wentando yeningi labantu usukhululile futhi waqhakaza, ukhuliswa ngumusa nezenzo ezinhle zamadoda nabesifazane baleli lizwe elihle kangaka, abakuqonda kahle kamhlophe ukuthi intando yeningi labantu yatholakala emva komzukuzuku nokulahlekelwa okungakanani.

xho: kodwa indlela eya enkululekweni egqibeleleyo inde, inameva, kwaye sesiqalile ukuzibona iintanda ezikhulayo phakathi kwabantu bakuthi.
zul: umgwaqo obheke enkululekweni yoqobo usemude impela, futhi sikubonile ukukhula koqhekeko ezweni lethu.

xho: kukho umsantsa phakathi kwabantsundu nabamhlophe, kwezinhanha namahlwempu, kwabasemaphandleni nabasezidolopheni, kwabasebuhlanti nabasegoqweni, phakathi kwabantu abathetha iilwimi ezahlukeneyo kunye naphakathi kwabo baneentlobo ezahlukeneyo zenkcubeko.
zul: phakathi kwabamnyama nabamhlophe, abacebile nabampofu, abahlala emadolobheni nabahlala ezindaweni zasemakhaya, phakathi kwabesilisa nabesifazane futhi phakathi kwabantu abakhuluma izilimi ezahlukene, abalandela amasiko ahlukene.

xho: ngamanye amaxesha kubonakala ngokungathi ububele obushushu babantu beli bokuxolelana ngowe-1994 baphephetheka nemimoya.
zul: kwezinye izikhathi bekubonakala sengathi waphephethwa ngumoya umusa owasenza sibuyisane ngowe-1994.

xho: kodwa angekhe sivumele ofunzeweni namagwala ibe ngabo abeza nodumo.
zul: kodwa-ke ngeke neze siyekelele konke ngenxa yokuphelelwa yithemba nokwamukela ukuthi sesihlulekile.

xho: ingcambu zesi sizwe zimile phezu konyamezelwano nokuhlalisana ngoxolo, kwaye simi, asigungqi futhi simanyene kwidabi lokulwa yonke into ezama ukusahlula okanye itshabalalise lo msebenzi weza ngegazi neenyembezi zabantwana beli.
zul: isizwe sethu sisekelwe yizimpande zokubekezelelana nokuphilisana ngokuthula futhi asijiki neze, asihlehli neze, futhi sibumbene ekubhekaneni ngqo nakho konke okuzama ukusihlukanisa phakathi, noma okuhlose ukucekela phansi izinzuzo nempumelelo esayithola kanzima.

xho: amatshijolo athi sibhibhidla nje amazinyo xa sithi sifuna ukwakha umzantsi afrika ongacaluli ngobuhlanga, futhi baxoka besithi asisoze sixole xoliyane zizigxala zangaphambili.
zul: babesitshela ukuthi kuyinto engeke neze yenzeke ukwakha iningizimu afrika engenakho ukucwasana ngokobuhlanga, futhi ngeke neze sikwazi ukuwapholisa ngokweqiniso amanxeba esikhathi esedlule, okuyisikhathi esasinzima kakhulu kuleli.

xho: kodwa sakwazi ukudlula kwezo nzingo, kuba singaba siyaphila.
zul: kodwa nakuba kunjalo sakwazi ukuwela ngelibanzi, futhi siyanqoba.

xho: ngumoya wethemba osegazini labantu beli owasenza sadlula kula ntsunguzi.
zul: ngezikhathi ezinzima kakhulu kuleli, ngumoya ongapheliyo ongaphakathi kithina njengabantu owasikhuthaza ukuthi singapheli amandla futhi sihlalele ethembeni ngoba izinto zizolunga.

xho: ngulo moya wethemba oza kuba likhubalo lethu xa siqhathula sisingise phambili.
zul: yilo moya wokuba nethemba ozosithwala usise phambili lapho siyobhekana khona ngqo futhi ngesibindi nengomuso elisha.

xho: ngumzantsi afrika apho oomama, ootata nabantwana benikwa amathuba nezixhobo zokuba bazisebenzele benze ubomi babo ngcono.
zul: leyo iningizimu afrika lapho yonke indoda, wonke umuntu wesifazane kanye nezingane behlinzekwa ngethuba kanye nezinsiza nezindlela zokuzenzela ingomuso elingcono.

xho: ngumzantsi afrika oza kuwasebenzisa kangangoko amaqithi-qithi namathuba eza nobuchwepheshe bale mihla obudumbise iintloko abantu kulo lonke eli limiweyo ukuze sikhulise uqoqosho lweli lizwe sidale nemisebenzi.
zul: leyo iningizimu afrika esikulungele ukuwabamba ngazo zombili futhi iwasebenzise amathuba ahlinzekwa wuguquko lwezobuchwepheshe oluvunguza emhlabeni wonke jikelele, ukuze sikhulise umnotho wezwe futhi sivule amathuba omsebenzi azohlomulisa abantu bakuleli.

xho: ngumzantsi afrika onabantu abangqondo zihleliyo, abanamaphupha neminqweno.
zul: leyo iningizimu afrika enabantu abanombono, ugqozi nenkuthalo kanye nokulangazelela ukufezekisa amaphupho nezifiso zabo.

xho: into eyenza eli lizwe libe ngumakhonya kubuchule bezokuyila, kwezoshishino nokuba nesibindi sokwenza imizamo.
zul: okwenza leli lizwe libe yisizinda sokuqanjwa nokusungulwa kwezinhlelo nemikhiqizo yesimanjemanje, ukusungulwa kwamabhizinisi kanye nokusetshenziswa kwenzindlela ezintsha.

xho: ngumzantsi afrika oziqondayo iingxaki zangaphambili kodwa okhetha ukujonga phambili.
zul: leyo iningizimu afrika ezivumayo futhi ezamukelayo izinkinga zesikhathi esedlule, kodwa ephokophele phambili ngokuzimisela okukhulu.

xho: ngumzantsi afrika oneenkokeli ezinesibindi nobugorha, iinkokeli ezizinekeleyo ekusebenzeleni abantu - ezaziyo ukuba ukubalasela nokugqwesa emsebenzini wakho liwonga elingaphezulu kwawo onke.
zul: leyo iningizimu afrika enabaholi abanesibindi, abaholi abalokhu beyizinceku ezisebenzela abantu – futhi kubona ukwenza nokufeza umsebenzi wabo kungumvuzo omkhulu kunayo yonke, futhi okunguwona kuphela abawufunayo.

xho: ngaphezu kwako konke, ngumzantsi afrika esizingcayo ngako konke esele sikwenzile nangale ndlela siyihambayo.
zul: ngaphezu kwakho konke, leyo iningizimu afrika esiziqhenyayo thina sonke ngalokho esekuzuzile kanye nalapho esiphokophele khona.

xho: mninzi lo msebenzi uphambi kwethu.
zul: umsebenzi ophambi kwethu usemkhulu impela.

xho: kwinto yonke, kufuneka sivuselele uqoqosho lweli lizwe luphinde luvuke kwakhona.
zul: ngaphezu kwakho konke, kumele sizabalaze futhi senze konke okusemandleni ethu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umnotho wethu uyakhula futhi.

xho: ndihlaba ikhwelo kubo bonke abemi bomzantsi afrika ukuba bawufunqule bawuthathele kubo lo msebenzi.
zul: ngiyabanxusa bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika ukuthi lo mzabalazo bawenze kube ngowabo.

xho: kuba xa sifumana uloyiso - enqinisekileyo ngalo - impumelelo yalo igcotyelwa ngumntu wonke kweli.
zul: ngoba uma sesiphumelela – futhi nginesiqiniseko sokuthi lokho kuzokwenzeka noma kanjani – kuzohlomula isizwe sonkana.

xho: njengorhulumente, amashishini, abasebenzi kunye nabemi beli masivule iintliziyo zethu samkele amathuba eza nengomso.
zul: njengohulumeni, amabhizinisi, abasebenzi futhi njengezakhamuzi, masibumbane ukuze silibambe ngazo zombili ingomuso.

xho: masilamkele ngezandla ezishushu ikamva lethu, silandela amazwi awuhlala emi ngonaphakade omqulu wenkululeko athi: sibambene njengenyanda, sityhale ngawo onke amandla esinawo.
zul: masilibambe ngezandla zombili ingomuso lethu sonke, futhi uma ngicaphuna amagama ayohlala naphakade omqulu wenkululeko, sikwenze lokho: ‘sisebenza ndawonye ngokubambisana, futhi ngamandla ethu onke nesibindi’.

xho: uxanduva lokwakha umzantsi afrika ongcono ngumsebenzi wethu sonke sisisizwe, singabantu bomzantsi afrika.
zul: lo msebenzi – wokwakha iningizimu afrika engcono – ngumsebenzi wethu sonke okumele siwenze ngokubambisana njengesizwe, njengabantu baseningizimu afrika.

xho: xa sijijisana nalo msebenzi kunye nale mingeni sijamelene nayo kufuneka siqamele ngamazwi katheodore roosevelt, owakhe ngenye imini wathi:"ayingomgxeki ekufuneka athathelwe ingqalelo.
zul: njengoba sifinyeza imikhono sisondela kule misebenzi kanye nezinselele, kumele silalele amagama ashiwo ngu-theodore roosevelt, owathi:“umgxeki akuyena neze obalulekile.

xho: ayinguye lowo uhlelele uchuku lokuchonga iimpazamo, okanye oziqhathayo athi ukuba ibindim ngekungenje.
zul: futhi akuyona neze leyo ndoda ekhombisayo ukuthi isikhondlakhondla siwe kanjani, noma ekhombisayo ukuthi bekumele enzeni umenzi wezenzo.“empeleni umuntu okumele anconywe yindoda esenkundleni, ubuso bayo obugcwele uthuli kanye nomjuluko kanye negazi.

xho: iwonga liya kuloo madoda axhimfana neengxaki ezingxamele ukuwagxagxisa, abila esoma encame yonke into, abhinq'omfutshane athi unotshe.
zul: ezabalaza ngobuqhawe.

xho: awe evuka elinga imizamo, ayaziyo intsingiselo yelabadala elithi 'umzingisi akanashwa', aziyo ukuba isandla esingcolayo sesibenzayo.
zul: eyenza amaphutha, ihluleke ngokuphindaphindiwe, ngoba phela awukho umzamo ongenalo iphutha nokuhluleka.

xho: aziyo ukuba ukusonga izandla akuzange kwazisela mntu sonka.
zul: kodwa engumuntu ozamayo impela ukwenza lokho okumele akwenze.

xho: somlomo wendlu yowiso-mthetho yesizwe (i-na), nksz thandi modisesihlalo webhunga lesizwe lamaphondo (i-ncop), mnu amos masondosekela-mongameli david mabuzajaji eyintloko mogoeng mogoeng nawo onke amalungu ahloniphekileyo ecandelo leenkundla,owayesakuba ngumongameli, ukgalema motlanteowayesakuba ngumongameli, uthabo mbekiowasakuba ngusomlomo we-na, ugq frene ginwala,owasakuba ngusomlomo we-na, umnu max sisuluumongameli wepalamente yamazwe ase-afrika, umnu roger nkodo dang,magqala omzabalazo wenkululeko,gq dennis goldberg,gq andrew mlangeni,advocate priscilla jana,nksz joyce dipale,nksz lillian keagile,nksz smally maqungo,baphathiswa noosekela-baphathiswa,zinkulumbuso noosomlomo bezindlu zowiso-mthetho zamaphondo,sihlalo wombutho woomasipala basemzantsi afrika (i-salga) nabo bonke oosodolophu abahloniphekileyo abakhoyoirhuluneli yebhanki enguvimba yomzantsi afrika, umnu lesetja kganyagointloko zamaziko karhulumente axhasa ulawulo lwentando yesininzi,iinkokeli zemibutho yeemvaba ngeemvaba,iinkokeli zamaziko emfundo ephakamileyo nawezophando,iindwendwe ezimenyiweyo,malungu abekekileyo e-namalungu abekekileyo e-ncop,bantu bomzantsi afrika,sidibene apha namhlanje xa le palamente yesithandathu ilawulwa ngokwentando yesininzi iqala ukuhlala, kanye ngomhla okwamiselwa ngawo umthetho womhlaba wabantu abantsundu kwiminyaka eli-106 eyadlulayo, umthetho lowo ungomnye wesenzo esisesona sibuhlungu sokuhluthwa, intlungu nokuhlazwa owakhe waphunyezwa.
zul: somlomo wesigungu sikazwelonke, unkz thandi modise,sihlalo womkhandlu kazwelonke wezifundazwe, umnu amos masondo,iphini likamongameli, u-david mabuza,ijaji eliyinhloko, u-mogoeng mogoeng, kanye nawo wonke amalungu ahloniphekile ophiko lwezobulungiswa,umongameli waphambilini, umnu kgalema motlanthe,umongameli waphambilini, umnu thabo mbeki,usomlomo waphambilini wesigungu sikazwelonke, udkt frene ginwala,usomlomo waphambilini wesigungu sikazwelonke, umnu max sisulu,usomlomo waphambilini wesigungu sikazwelonke, unkz baleka mbete,umongameli wephalamende lamazwe ase-afrika, umnu roger nkodo dang,omakadebebona bomzabalazo wenkululeko,udkt dennis goldberg,udkt andrew mlangeni,u-advocate priscilla jana,unkz joyce dipale,unkz lillian keagile,unkz smally maqungo,ongqongqoshe kanye namaphini abo,ondunankulu kanye nosomlomo bezishayamthetho zezifundazwe,usihlalo wenhlangano yohulumeni basekhaya yaseningizimu afrika kanye nezimeya zemikhandludolobha,umphathi webhange lombuso laseningizimu afrika, umnu lesetja kganyago,izinhloko zezikhungo zikahulumeni ezeseka ukubusa ngentando yeningi labantu,abaholi bezinhlangano zezenkolo,abaholi bezikhungo zezemfundo nezocwaningo,amalungu ezindlu zamanxusa,izimenywa ezikhethekile,amalungu ahloniphekile esigungu sikazwelonke,amalungu ahloniphekile omkhandlu kazwelonke wezifundazwe,bantu baseningizimu afrika, njengoba sibuthene lapha, ekuqaleni kwephalamende lesithupha lentando yeningi yabantu, sibuthene ngosuku owaqala ngalo ukusebenza umthetho womhlaba wabomdabu, eminyakeni eyi-106 edlule – okungesinye sezigameko ezadala umonakalo omkhulu, sokuphucwa kwabantu umhlaba wabo, esashiya abantu behleli dengwane futhi esadala ukukhala nokugedla kwamazinyo, nosizi olwesabekayo.

xho: sikhumbula amazwi usol plaatjie awawathetha emva kokuwiswa kwalo mthetho wawusekelwe kwinkohlakalo, apho wathi: “uthe xa esula iintongo evuka ngentseni yangolwesihlanu, umhla wama-20 kweyesilimela 1913, umntu ontsundu womzantsi afrika wazibona, engelokhob nje kuphela koko eyintlekisa engudinga-sithebeni elizweni lakhe lokuzalwa.” abantu bakuthi bangcungcuthekiswa kakhulu kwaye banyamezela ubunzima obungaphaya ngenxa yokumiselwa nokuqaliswa ukusetyenziswa komthetho womhlaba wabantu abantsundu.
zul: siyawakhumbula amagama ashiwo ngu-sol plaatje, ephawula ngalesi sigameko esibuhlungu kangaka, uma ethi: “ngenkathi evuka ekuseni ngolwesihlanu, mhla zingama-20 kunhlaba ngowe-1913, umuntu omnyama wazithola, empeleni engesona isigqila, kepha eyisilahlwa, esingafuneki neze ezweni lakhe, azalelwa kulona, futhi lapho inkaba yakhe ikhona.” abantu bakithi bahlukumezeka kakhulu futhi bahlangabezana nobunzima obesabekayo ngenxa yokushaywa komthetho womhlaba wabomdabu.

xho: umonakalo owenziwa ngulo mthetho usabonakala nanamhlanje.
zul: kuze kube namuhla, sisahleli nemithelela kanye nemiphumela emibi yalowo mthetho.

xho: ngoku kwisithuba esingaphezulu kweminyaka elikhulu emva kokuphunyezwa kwalo mthetho wawungenabulungisa, kuhlatywa ikhwelo kuthi ukuba sakhe umzantsi afrika apho kungazikubakho mntu ulikhoboka okanye uyintlekisa, kubekho abantu abakhululekileyo nabalinganayo kunye nabahlonitshwayo kuphela.
zul: njengoba sekuphele iminyaka eyevile ekhulwini kwenzeka lesi sigameko esiphambene kakhulu nobulungiswa, kumele sisukume sakhe iningizimu afrika lapho engekho noyedwa umuntu ozoba yisigqila noma isilahlwa, kepha kube khona kuphela abantu abakhululekile, abalinganayo futhi abahlonishwayo.

xho: sidibene apha namhlanje ngexesha elinzima nelibi kakhulu kweli lizwe lethu litsha lilawulwa ngokwentando yesininzi.
zul: sibuthene lapha ngesikhathi esinzima kakhulu futhi esinezinselelo eziningi embusweni wethu wentando yeningi labantu osemusha.

xho: kodwa noko kunjalo, sikwixesha apho kwimbali yeli lizwe kugquba ithemba elithi nokuba kuyintoni na kuza kulunga.
zul: kepha-ke, nakuba kunjalo, sisesikhathini emlandweni wethu lapho kuvunguza khona umoya wethemba elikhulu, lokuthi konke sekuzolunga noma kanjani.

xho: kule minyaka ingama-25 sikhululekile mkhulu kakhulu umsebenzi esele siwenzile kumalinge okwakha isizwe esitsha apho bonke abemi bomzantsi afrika benamalungelo alinganayo kunye namathuba amaninzi.
zul: eminyakeni engama-25 izwe libuswa ngentando yeningi labantu, sesenze inqubekelaphambili enkulu impela ekwakheni isizwe esisha lapho bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika benamalungelo alinganayo kanye namathuba angudeda ngendlale.

xho: kwisithuba esingaphezulu kweminyaka engama-25, kukhulu kakhulu esikwenzileyo ukunceda abantu ngeenkonzo ezisisiseko, ukugxotha ikati eziko nokuzisa iinguqu kuqoqosho lweli olwalulungiselwe futhi lixhanyulwa ligcuntswana labantu beli.
zul: eminyakeni engama-25, kuningi esesikwenzile ukuhlangabezana nezidingo zabantu eziyisisekelo, ukunciphisa ububha kanye nokuvuselela kabusha umnotho owabe usufadalele, owabe wenzelwe ukubhekana nezidingo zabayingcosana kuphela.

xho: sisebenzisana sisonke, siwenzile amalungiselelo angqingqwa esiza kwakhela kuwo eli lizwe apho wonke umntu eza kuhlala eluxolweni, ngokonwaba nangokuxola.
zul: ngokusebenzisana kanye nokubambisana, sikwazile ukubeka isisekelo esiqinile esingakhela phezu kwaso izwe lapho bonke abantu bezohlala ngokuthula, banethezeke, futhi bathokoze.

xho: kodwa noko kunjalo sidibene namhlanje ngexesha apho eli lizwe lijamelene nemingeni emikhulu.
zul: kepha-ke nakuba kunjalo, sibuthene ngesikhathi lapho izwe lethu libhekene nezinselelo ezinkulu.

xho: uqoqosho lweli lizwe luyadodobala.
zul: umnotho wethu awukhuli.

xho: alidali misebenzi yaneleyo.
zul: futhi aligculisi neze izinga lokwakhiwa kwamathuba omsebenzi.

xho: le yingxaki engaphezulu kunazo zonke.
zul: lokhu kuyinto esikhathaza ngaphezu kwakho konke okunye.

xho: ibetha wonke umntu.
zul: kuyinto ethinta wonke umuntu.

xho: ibetha wena, tyendyana lasemzihlophe esoweto, elineminyaka emihlanu kungokunje lazigqibayo izifundo kodwa kodwa elingekawufumani umsebenzi.
zul: kuthinta wena, nsizwa yasemzimhlophe, esoweto, njengoba sekuphele iminyaka emihlanu uqedile esikoleni, kodwa namanje awukawutholi umsebenzi, usahleli ekhaya.

xho: nawe, mama wasedelft otsala wedwa ungenaqabane, imali yakha yenkam-nkam engondli nje wena kuphela koko nabazukulwana bakho abaxhomekeke kuyo.
zul: kunomthelela kuwena, mama wase-delft, ozikhulisela abantwana bakhe yedwana, njengoba ungagcini nje kuphela ngokuzondla wena ngesibonelelo-mali sakho osithola kuhulumeni kodwa kumele futhi wondle nabazukulu bakho imbala.

xho: ikwathwaxa nawe, msebenzi wasenelson mandela bay, othi nangona esamkela umvuzo kodwa ubopha amabande ucazulule loo malanyana unayo ukuze kulalwe kutyiwe.
zul: kubuhlungu futhi nakuwena, msebenzi wase-nelson mandela bay, ngoba phela nakuba ukhona umholo owutholayo, kunzima kakhulu ukwanelisa izidingo zakho zempilo.

xho: kanti nakuwe, mfundi oselula wedyunivesiti isol plaatjie emntla koloni, ekufuneka uxhomekeke kwimalanyana oyiphiwa ngabazali bakho ukuze ukwazi ukuzithengela into esiwa phantsi kwempumlo nobunye ubuvilikitshane.
zul: kunzima kuwena, mfundi wenyuvesi i-sol plaatje, enyakatho kapa, othembele kwimadlana encane yokuzondla nokuziphilisa oyiphiwa ngabazali bakho.

xho: iimeko abaphila phantsi kwazo abantu bakuthi zezi kanye ndizichaze apha ngasentla.
zul: konke lokhu engisanda kukusho kuyichaza njengoba injalo impilo ephilwa ngabantu bakithi.

xho: nina intlungu nentsokolo yabantu beli lizwe niyazi kanye.
zul: impilo yakho ifana ncamashi nobunzima bansukuzonke bokuphila kwabantu bakuleli.

xho: nina kunye nabanye abaninzi sinivile.
zul: sikuzwile, wena nabanye ebaningi.

xho: uninzi lwethu thina singabangabantu abanyuliweyo abamele abantu apha, sichithe ixesha elininzi kwezi nyanga zimbalwa zidlulileyo sityhutyha eli lizwe, simamela abantu bakuthi.
zul: iningi lethu njengabameleli abaqokwe ngabantu ukuthi sibe lapha, sichithe isikhathi esiningi impela kulezi zinyanga ezimbalwa ezedlule sehla senyuka emiphakathini ezweni lonkana, silalela izimvo zabantu kanye nezimfuno nezifiso zabo.

xho: sibavile abantu bakuthi, bethetha nathi, singena siphuma ezindllini zabo.
zul: sibezwile abantu bakithi bekhuluma nathi ngenkathi singena siphuma ezindlini zabo.

xho: ro vha pfa hoṱhe hoṱhe he ra tshimbila hone.
zul: ro vha pfa hoṱhe hoṱhe he ra tshimbila hone.

xho: ndi amba na he ha tshimbila vho maimane na vho julius malema.
zul: ndi amba na he ha tshimbila vho maimane na vho julius malema.

xho: lapho kuhambe khona ohloniphekileyo umnu buthelezi naye uzwile ukuthi abantu bathini.
zul: lapho kuhambe khona umhlonishwa ubuthelezi naye uzwile ukuthi abantu bathini.

xho: apho naye umnu groenewald ayileyo, njengoko besimbona etyhutyha eli lizwe, hey kan ook se da thy het die mense gehoor.
zul: lapho ehambe khona nomnu groenewald, njengoba simbonile ehla enyuka ezweni lonkana, naye angasho kugcwale umlomo ukuthi naye ubezwile abantu.

xho: hi swi twile.
zul: hi swi twile.

xho: ro ni pfa.
zul: ro ni pfa.

xho: re le utlwile.
zul: re le utlwile.

xho: ngokusebenzisa unyulo obelubanjwe ngocanzibe, nisinike umsebenzi ocacileleyo othi masikhokelisa phambili uhlumo nohlaziyo.
zul: okhethweni obelubanjwe ngonhlaba, nisihlinzeke ngegunya elicacile lokukhula nokuvuselela kabusha.

xho: sonke sinivile - mna uqobo ndinivile, ohloniphekile umnu maimane, ohloniphekileyo umnu malema, ohloniphekileyo umnu buthelezi, ohloniphekileyo umnu groenewald, ohloniphekileyo umnu meshoe, ohloniphekileyo umnu holomisa, ohloniphekileyo umnu zungula, ohloniphekileyo unksz de lille, ohloniphekileyo unkskz magwaza-msibi, ohloniphekileyo umnu galo, ohloniphekileyo umnu lekota, ohloniphekileyo umnu nyhontso nohloniphekileyo umnu hendricks.
zul: sonke sinizwile – mina ngokwami nginizwile, nomhlonishwa umaimane unizwile, kanjalo nomhlonishwa umalema, nomhlonishwa ubuthelezi, nomhlonishwa u-groenewald, nomhlonishwa umeshoe, nomhlonishwa uholomisa, nomhlonishwa uzungula, nomhlonishwa u-de lille, nomhlonishwa ukamagwaza-msibi, nomhlonishwa ugalo, nomhlonishwa ulekota, nomhlonishwa unyhontso kanye nomhlonishwa u-hendricks.

xho: umonakalo owashiywa ngumbuso wocalu-calulo kweli lizwe weengxaki ezinkulu zendlela izinto ezazihlelwe ngayo - indlela uqoqosho nentlalo eyayihlelwe ngayo.
zul: umonakalo ongapheli owashiywa ngumbuso wobandlululo, olokhu uqhubeke njalo.

xho: ngaxeshanye, kufuneka sijamelene nomngeni wobuchwepheshe obungxamileyo obuza neentlobo zemisebenzi emitsha, obutshintsha uqoqosho lwehlabathi kunye neendlela abantu abanxibelelana futhi basebenzisane ngazo.
zul: sewudale izinkinga ezikhahlameza izwe lethu lonkana – okuyizinkinga zomnotho ngokunjalo nezinkinga zenhlalo yomphakathi.

xho: thina sidibene namanye amazwe ehlabathi, sijamelene nomonakalo ombi kakhulu ezimbalini obangelwa kukutshintsha kwemo zezulu emhlabeni jikelele.
zul: futhi kusenjalo, kumele sibhekane noguquko lwezobuchwepheshe olwenzeka ngesivinini esikhulu, oluletha izindlela ezintsha zokwenza umsebenzi ezindaweni okusetshenzelwa kuzona, olubumba kabusha umnotho womhlaba futhi olushintsha indlela abantu abaxhumana ngayo, futhi basebenzisane ngayo.

xho: iimeko zezulu ezimbi kakhulu ezihambelana nokunyuka kwamaqondo obushushu zilubeka emngciphekweni uqoqosho lweli lizwe, zibubeka emngciphekweni ubomi nempilo yabantu bakuthi kwaye zingasibeka emngciphekweni wokutshabalala thina singabantu ukuba asithathi manyathelo ngokukhawuleza.
zul: thina kanye nawo wonke amanye amazwe omhlaba, sizithola sibhekene nezinguquko zesimo sezulu esezidale imbubhiso kanye nomonakalo omkhulukazi emlandweni.

xho: sizivile izikhalazo zabantu abatsha beli abathe babamba umngcelele oya kwizakhiwo zomdibaniso kule veki iphelileyo besicela ukuba sithathe amanyathelo ukusindisa umhlaba kule ntshabalalo.
zul: isimo sezulu esibi kakhulu esihlobene nesivuvu somkhathi sibeka umnotho wethu engcupheni, futhi siphinde sibeke engcupheni nezimpilo zabantu bakithi kanye nezindlela abaziphilisa ngazo, futhi uma singathathi izinyathelo njengamanje, kungenzeka sigcine sesishabalele sonke thina singabantu.

xho: isizathu esabangela ukuba samkele isicwangciso sophuhliso sesizwe (i-ndp) ngowama-2012 ukulwa le mingeni sasifuna ukuba sikhokele amalinge ethu sisizwe okulwa indlala, intswelo-misebenzi nokungalingani.
zul: sikuzwile lokho okushiwo ngabantu abasha abebeyingxenye yemashi eya e-union buildings ngeviki eledlule, besinxusa ukuthi sisukume sithathe izinyathelo zokuvikela umhlaba wethu.

xho: kodwa, xa sishiyekelwe yiminyaka eli-10 phambi kokuba sifike kunyaka wama-2030, asikenzi msebenzi waneleyo kumalinge ethu okuzalisekisa iinjongo nemibono ze-ndp.
zul: yisona-ke isidingo sokubhekana ngqo nalezi zinselelo ezisemqoka kakhulu esaholela ekutheni samukele uhlelo lokuthuthukiswa kwezwe (i-ndp) ngowezi-2012 ukuze luhole imizamo yethu ezweni lonkana yokunqoba ububha, ukuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi kanye nokungalingani.

xho: ngaphandle kokuba singenza imilingo, kona ngoku asikawuzalisekisa umbono wowama-2030.
zul: kodwa-ke, kuyacaca ukuthi njengoba sekusele iminyaka eyi-10 ngaphambi kokuthi sifike onyakeni wezi-2030, asikenzi inqubekelaphambili egculisayo ekuhlangabezaneni nemigomo okumele sifinyelele kuyona ebekwe yi-ndp.

xho: kufuneka sigxininise kwizinto eziza kwenza umahluko obonakalayo, amalinge aza kukhathula enze umqela, ngoku nakule minyaka ili-10 izayo.
zul: ngaphandle uma sithatha izinyathelo ezinqala futhi ezinohlonze, ngeke neze sikwazi ukufezekisa inhlosombono yowezi-2030.

xho: kubalulekile ukuba sikhumbule ukuba isicwangciso-sikhokelo esiqiqisisiweyo sesigaba esiphakathi (i-mtsf) sale minyaka mihlanu idlulileyo besinezalathisi ezingaphezulu kwe-1 100 eziza kusetyenziswa ukuhlola indlela esiqhuba ngayo kumalinge ethu okufezekisa nokuphumeza i-ndp.
zul: lokhu kusho ukuthi kumele sizibeke eqhulwini lezo zinto ezisemqoka kakhulu.

xho: ngoku kufuneka sigxininise ekuphumezeni.
zul: kumele sigxile kakhulu kulezo zinyathelo ezizoba nomthelela omkhulukazi, izinyathelo ezizokwenza ukuthi sikwazi ukuqhubekela phambili ngesivinini esikhulu, esikhathini samanje kanjalo nasesikhathini esiyiminyaka eyi-10 ezayo.

xho: ngoku kufuneka sithathe izigqibo ngezinto esifuna ukuzenza.
zul: manje sekuyisikhathi sokuthi sibhukule sigxile ekwenzeni lokho esithe sizokwenza.

xho: ezinye zezi zigqibo ziza kubanzima ezinye zona azizukuthandwa ngumntu wonke.
zul: ezinye zalelo zinqumo kungenzeka kube yizinqumo ezinzima impela futhi ezinye zazo kungenzeka zingehli kahle kwabanye abantu.

xho: kwilizwe elinoqoqosho olungakhuliyo, apho imali karhulumente iqingqekileyo, asizikukwazi ukwenza yonke into ngexesha elinye.
zul: esimweni lapho umnotho ungakhuli, futhi esikhathini lapho uhulumeni enemali eyingcosana emgodlagodleni wakhe wezimali, ngeke neze sikwazi ukwenza konke ngesikhathi esisodwa.

xho: njengoko lo mbuso wonyulwe kulo nyaka uthatha iintambo zolawulo, kufuneka sigxile kwezi zinto zisixhenxe kukhokeliswe zona.
zul: njengoba singena kuleli hlandla lokuphatha elisha, sizogxila ezintweni eziyisikhombisa eziseqhulwini: zonke izinhlelo nezinqubomgomo zethu, kuyo yonke iminyango nezimpiko zikahulumeni, zizoqondiswa ekufezeni le misebenzi ebanzi futhi ehlanganisa konke, esikholelwa ukuthi izokwazi ukuletha impilo engcono kubo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika.

xho: zonke iinkqubo nemigaqo-nkqubo yethu kuwo onke amasebe nee-arhente zikarhulumente ziza kugxininisa kwezi zinto zikhokeliswe phambili esikholelwa ukuba siza kukwazi ukulizalisekisa iphupha lobomi obungcono kubo bonke abemi bomzantsi afrika.
zul: futhi kusenjalo, kumele sibuyisele i-ndp endaweni yayo, lapho ingumgogodla wakho konke esikwenzayo ezweni, ukuze siqinisekise ukuthi iyasebenza, futhi siyenze ibe yingxenye yempilo yansukuzonke kanye nezimo abahlangabezana nazo abantu baseningizimu afrika.

xho: ngaxeshanye, kufuneka sibuyisele i-ndp endaweni yayo apho iyiyo eza kuba sisikhokelo sezinto zonke esizenzayo sisisizwe, siyivuselele, siyenze ukuba abantu bomzantsi afrika bangayisebenzisi nje kuphela koko bayiphile.
zul: enkulumweni engayethula emcimbini wokugcotshwa kwami njengomongameli, ngathi lesi yisikhathi esibaluleke kakhulu esizweni sethu esisesisha.

xho: isizwe esijongene nemingeni enzima.
zul: okuyisizwe esibhekene nezinselelo ezinkulu.

xho: isizwe esinabantu abazizigidi ezingama-57 abathatha izikrweqe balwa iminyaka emininzi futhi boyisa ucalu-calulo, oluleyona nkqubo yolawulo ikhohlakeleyo eyamiselwe ngabantu nabo abanegazi ezimbalini isizwe sabantu abanesibindi.
zul: isizwe esinabantu abayizigidi ezingama-57 abasukuma eminyakeni edlule banqoba enye yezinqubo-kuphatha ezimbi kunazo zonke ezisungulwe ngabantu, ubandlululo.

xho: isizwe sabantu abangakhomb'indlela baphinde bajike.
zul: isizwe sabantu abanesibindi.

xho: sasithe izinto esizenzayo namhlanje zizo eziza kusixelela apho siyakhona.
zul: ngasho futhi ukuthi izinyathelo esizozithatha njengamanje yizona ezizocaba indlela eya phambili kwingomuso laleli lizwe.

xho: njengoko umzantsi afrika ungena kweminye iminyaka engama-25 ulawulwa ngokwentando yesininzi, kwakunye nokuzama ukuzalisekisa iinjongo ze-ndp, masizibekele injongo eza kufuna isibindi nobugorha ukuze izalisekiswe, iinjongo thina sonke esiza kusingisa kuyo, iinjongo esiza kuncamela kuyo amandla ethu nako konke esinako.
zul: njengoba iningizimu afrika ingena eminyakeni elandelayo engama-25 ibuswa ngentando yeningi labantu, futhi ngenhloso yokufezekisa izinjongo ze-ndp, masizibekele injongo ebonisa isibindi neqholo, inhloso ezosibumbanisa sonke, esizozibophezela kuyona ngokuphelele futhi sifake kuyona wonke amandla nomfutho esinawo kanye nazo zonke izinsizaku-sebenza nezinsiza-sidingo zethu.

xho: njengoko singena kwiminyaka eli-10 yokugqibela yombono wowama-20130, kufuneka sibe nombono ocace gca ngowona mzantsi afrika sinephupha lawo size sivumelane ngamanye amanyathelo ekufuneka siwathathile ukuze sifikelele apho.
zul: njengoba singena kwiminyaka eyi-10 yokugcina yenhloso-mbono yowezi-2030, masikubeke kucace bha ukuthi ngenjani iningizimu afrika esiyifunayo futhi sivumelane ngezinyathelo eziphathekayo futhi ezinohlonze esizozithatha ukufinyelela kuleyo ningizimu afrika esiyifunayo.

xho: ukuze siqinisekise ukuba izinto esizenzayo zisebenzela ukufikelela apho ndicebisa ukuba, kwezinye zezinto ezibekwe phambili ngulo mbuso uthathe iintambo kulo nyaka, masivumelana ngeenjongo ezibalulekileyo ezintlanu esiza kugxila kuzo kule minyaka ili-10 izayo, ezo eziyinxalenye yezi zinto zisixhenxe zikhokeliswe phambili.
zul: ukuze siqinisekise ukuthi imizamo yethu iqondiswe ngqo kulokho esifuna ukukwenza, ngiphakamisa ukuthi, kulezi zinto ezibekwe eqhulwini yilo hulumeni ophetheyo njengamanje, sivumelane ngezinjongo eziyisisekelo ezinhlanu okumele sizifezekise kule minyaka eyi-10 ezayo, eziyingxenye yalezi zinto eziyisikhombisa ezibekwe eqhulwini.

xho: masivumelane ukuba, njengesizwe nanjengabantu abamaphupha manye, kule minyaka ili-10 izayo siza kube senze umsebenzi obonakalayo kumalinge okulwa indlela, ukungalingani nentswelo-ngqesho, apho:masizibophelele ngezi zithembiso ngoku - thina ezintliziyweni zethu nabanye abantu - sazi ukuba siza kugalela yonke into esinayo kumalinge okuzalisekisa esi sithembiso, kodwa sazi ukuba, ukuba sikwazile ukuzizalisekisa ezi njongo zintlanu, siyakube senze utshintsho olukhulu kwisizwe sethu.
zul: masivumelane, njengesizwe futhi njengabantu abanezinhloso ezifanayo, ukuthi ingakapheli le minyaka eyi-10 ezayo sizobe sesenze inqubekelaphambili ekuqedeni ububha, ukungalingani kanye nokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi, lapho: masizenze njengamanje lezi zibophezelo – sizibhekise kithina uqobo futhi sizibhekise nakomunye nomunye wethu – sibe sazi kahle kamhlophe ukuthi zizodinga izinsiza-sidingo kanye namandla ethu angeziwe, kodwa futhi ngokuqonda ukuthi uma siphumelela ukufezekisa lezi zinjongo, sizobe siphumelelile ukuletha uguquko olunohlonze ezweni lethu.

xho: asizibekeli ezi njongo zinzima ngenxa yokuba kukho imingeni emandla ngoku, koko ngenxa yokuba zona ziyimfuneko.
zul: izinjongo ezinohlonze esizibekele zona asizibekanga ngoba sifuna ukushaya indiva noma ukubukela phansi ubunzima esibhekene nabo esikhathini samanje, kodwa-ke yibona impela lobu bunzima obenze ukuthi sizibekele lezi zinjongo.

xho: sizibekela ezi njongo ukuze izigqibo esizithathayo ngoku zibonakalise isibindi kwaye sisebenze ngokukhawuleza.
zul: sizibekele lezi zinjongo ukuze siqinisekise ukuthi izinqumo esizithathayo njengamanje yizinqumo ezinohlonze, ezibonisa isibindi futhi ukuze sithathe izinyathelo eziphuthumayo.

xho: isigqibo esisithathileyo sokuba kule minyaka ili-10 akukho mntu kufuneka athwaxwe yindlala emzantsi afrika sibalulekile kumalinge ethu okulwa indlala nokuphungula ukungalingani.
zul: ukuzibophezela kwethu ekutheni kule minyaka eyi-10 ezayo asifuni ukubona noyedwa umuntu ebhuqabhuqwa yindlala eningizimu afrika, kuyisisekelo somzamo wethu wokuqeda ububha futhi sinciphise nokungalingani okukhona kuleli.

xho: ngaphandle kokuba kuza kudala imisebenzi kunye namanye amathuba ezoqoqosho, oku kuthetha ukuba kufuneka sizame ukuphucula izibonelelo zikarhulumente siphungule neendleko ezifunekayo zemihla ngemihla.
zul: ngaphezu kokudala amathuba omsebenzi kanye namanye amathuba ezomnotho, lokhu kusho ukuthi kumele siqinise uhlelo lwezibonelelo nemixhaso yomphakathi ehlinzekwa nguhulumeni futhi sinciphise nezindleko zokuphila.

xho: oku kuthetha ukuba kufuneka sizenze zifikeleleke, zikhuseleke futhi zisebenzisane izithuthi zabakhweli abaphuma kumakhaya amkela imivuzo ephantsi.
zul: lokhu kusho ukuthi kumele siqinisekise ukuthi lawo makhaya athola umholo ophansi noma ingeniso-mali ephansi ahlinzekwa ngezithuthi zomphakathi ezingambi eqolo, eziphephile futhi ezididiyelwe.

xho: nangona sele sakhe izindlu ezininzi, abemi bomzantsi afrika abaninzi basafuna umhlaba abazakwakha kuwo amakhaya abo baphile ubomi obundilisekileyo.
zul: nakuba senze inqubekelaphambili enkulu ekuhlinzekweni kwabantu ngezindlu, baningi abantu baseningizimu afrika abasadinga umhlaba abazozakhela kuwona amakhaya abo kanye nezindawo zokuqhuba ibhizinisi ukuze bakwazi ukuziphilisa.

xho: kule minyaka mihlanu izayo, siza kusinyusa isantya esakha ngazo izindlu nesinikezela ngaso umhlaba okwiindawo ezifanelekileyo kubemi bomzantsi afrika abangathathi ntweni.
zul: kule minyaka emihlanu ezayo, sizokusheshisa ukuhlinzekwa kwabantu baseningizimu afrika abahlwempu ngezindlu ezakhiwe ezindaweni ezifanelekile futhi ezikulungele ukuhlaliswa kwabantu futhi sibahlinzeke nangomhlaba.

xho: ukuze siphucule ubomi babemi bomzantsi afrika, ukuphungula iintlobo zonke zendlala kunye nokukhulisa uqoqosho lweli lizwe siza kugxila kwimiba enxulumene nempilo yabantu bakuthi.
zul: ukuze senze ngcono izinga lempilo ephilwa ngabantu baseningizimu afrika, siqede zonke izinhlobo zobubha futhi siqinise nomnotho wezwe, sizothatha izinyathelo zokubhekelela nokunakekela impilo yabantu bakithi ukuze bahlale bengumqemane.

xho: kufuneka siqwalasele ingxaki yokunqongophala koogqirha nabongikazi kwizibhedlele naseziklinikhi.
zul: kumele sithathe izinyathelo zokuqinisekisa ukuthi ezibhedlela kanye nasemitholampilo yethu zikhona zonke izinsiza-kusebenza kanye nezinsiza-sidingo ezidingekayo ukuze lezi zikhungo zikwazi ukusebenza kahle futhi ngobunyoninco.

xho: ingwevukazi eneminyaka engama-80 ayikwazi kwaye akufanelekanga ukuba ichithe imini yonke itshitshiliza ezitulweni ilinde amayeza ayo.
zul: kuyinto engalungile neze ukuthi ugogo oneminyaka yobudala engama-80 achithe usuku lonke emgqeni elinde imithi yakhe.

xho: umntu ogulayo akanakujikiswa ngenxa yokuba kunqongophele oogqirha nabongikazi.
zul: kuyinto engalungile neze ukuthi umuntu ogula kakhulu ajikiswe, kuthiwe makabuyele ekhaya, ngenxa nje yokuntuleka kodokotela nabahlengikazi.

xho: umama olunywanyo akanakubeka ubomi bomntwana wakhe ongekazalwa emgciphekweni ngenxa yokuba i-ambulensi ithatha ixesha ukufika kuye.
zul: kuyinto engalungile neze ukuthi impilo yengane engakazalwa, yowesifazane obelethayo, ibe sengcupheni ngenxa ye-ambulensi ethatha isikhathi eside ngaphambi kokuba ifike izomlanda.

xho: njengenxalenye yomsebenzi ekufuneka siwenze ngokukhawuleza ukuphucula umgangatho wenkqubo yezempilo, siqukumbela isivumelwano sengqungquthela yezempilo kamongameli, esiquka imibono nezimvo ezaziphakanyisiwe kwaye siza kusebenzisa iingcali ezivela kubo bonke abachaphazelekayo ukuze kulungiswe ezi ngxaki zambethe iiklinikhi nezibhedlela.
zul: njengengxenye yomsebenzi okumele siwenze ngokushesha ukuze senze ngcono izinga lohlelo lwezempilo, siphothula umsebenzi wokuhlanganiswa kwemininingwane yesivumelwano esingumphumela wengqungquthela kamongameli yezempilo, esakhelwe phezu kokuqonda okujulile kanye nemibono eyatholakala lapho, futhi okuyisivumelwano esizosebenzisa ongoti abavela kubo bonke ababambiqhaza abasemqoka ukuze kulungiswe izinkinga ezikhona emitholampilo yethu kanye nasezibhedlela.

xho: sele sihambe umgama omde ekuqwalaseleni kwakhona isicwangciso esineenkcukacha sokuphumeza i-inshorensi yezempilo yesizwe (i-nhi), kuquka nokuphucula umgangatho weenkonzo zoncedo kumaziko ezempilo karhulumente, ukuqeqeshwa kwabantu, ukumisela ingxowa-mali ye-nhi kunye nezinye iinkcukacha ezinxulumente neendleko kunye nolawulo lwengxowa-mali ye-nhi.
zul: mkhulu impela umsebenzi osuwenziwe ekubuyekezweni kohlelo oluqukethe imininingwane ebanzi lokuqaliswa komshwalense kazwelonke wezempilo (i-nhi), kubandakanya ukusheshiswa kwezinhlelo zokuqinisekisa ikhwalithi yosizo nokunakekelwa okutholakala ezikhungweni zikahulumeni, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi lezi zikhungo zinabasebenzi abanele, ukusungulwa kohlaka lwesikhwama se-nhi, kanye nokubala ukuthi kuzodinga imali engakanani ukuphathwa kwesikhwama se-nhi.

xho: iyasikhathaza into yokunyuka kwenani labantu abosulelwa yintsholongwane kagawulayo (i-hiv), ingakumbi amantombazana aselula, kunye nenani lamadoda azihlola i-hiv aze aqalise ukusebenzisa amachiza eliphantsi kakhulu, xa lithelekiswa neloomama.

zul: sizogxila emabhizinisini asafufusa emadolobheni ethu, emalokishini kanye nasezindaweni ezisemakhaya futhi sakhe nezindawo zemakethe yokuhweba lapho osomabhizinisi bezothengisa khona imikhiqizo yabo.

xho: siza kusizalisekisa isithembiso sethu sokulandisa ngokuphindwe kabini inani labakhenkethi bangaphandle abangena kweli libe zizigidi ezingama-21 ngowama-2030.
zul: sizoyifezekisa inhloso nesifiso sethu sokukhulisa ngokuphindwe kabili inani lezivakashi zakwamanye amazwe ezivakashela kuleli, liyifinyelele ezigidini ezingama-21 ngaphambi kowezi-2030.

xho: oku kuza kwenziwa ngokuthi livuselelwe igama leli lizwe, kusetyenziswa inkqubo yokufaka isicelo se-visa ekumgangatho wehlabathi kugxininiswe kakhulu kubakhenkethi abavela echina nase-india kunye nabo bafika ngeenqwelo-moya bephuma mbombo zone zeli lizwekazi.
zul: lokhu sizokwenza ngokuthi sivuselele isasasa lokuvakashela kuleli lizwe futhi senze leli lizwe libe yizwe elihehayo, sethule inqubo yokukhishwa kwezimvume zokungena nokuvakashela kuleli (ama-visa) ezisezingeni lomhlaba, futhi sigxile ikakhulukazi ekuheheni abavakashi abavela kwelase-china kanye nase-india, ngokunjalo nezivakashi ezifika kuleli ngendiza, ezivela emazweni aleli zwekazi lethu, i-afrika.

xho: sizimisele ukuqinisekisa ukuba abakhenkethi abatyelela kweli bakhuselekile.
zul: sizibophezele ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi izivakashi ezivakashela ezweni lethu ziphephile.

xho: siza kulikhulisa icandelo leli lizwe lobuchwepheshe obukwizinga eliphezulu ngokuqinisekisa ukuba imithetho esinayo ikhuthaza izakhono zokuqamba nokuyila, ukuphucula amaphulo ophuhliso lwezakhono kubuxhakaxhaka bobuchwepheshe kubantu abatsha, nokuphungula iindleko ze-data.
zul: sizoyikhulisa imboni yezobuchwepheshe nobuxhakaxhaka besimanjemanje ngokuthi siqinisekise ukuthi imithetho kanye nemithethonqubo elawulayo igqugquzela ukuqanjwa kwezinto ezintsha, sithuthukise amakhono abantu abasha kwezobuchwepheshe obusha, futhi sinciphise nezindleko ze-data.

xho: kuzo zonke iindawo esihamba kuzo, abantu abatsha bakhala ngamaxabiso e-data aphezulu ngokugqithisileyo emzantsi afrika.
zul: nomaphi lapho besihamba khona, abantu abasha bebelokhu bekhalaza ngenkinga yezindleko ze-data eziphakeme kakhulu eningizimu afrika.

xho: ukuze siqinisekise ukuba oku kuyenzeka ngenene, kule nyanga izayo, umphathiswa wezonxibelelwano uza kuphumeza umgaqo-nkqubo oza kuya kwiziko elizimeleyo lezonxibelelwano lomzantsi afrika (i-icasa) ukuba liqalise ngenkqubo yokukhupha iilayisenisi zamaza asasaza ngomoya.
zul: ukuze sifake umfutho kule nqubo, kule nyanga ezayo, ungqongqoshe wezokuxhumana uzokhipha umyalelo oqondiswe ophikweni oluzimele lwezokuxhumana lwaseningizimu afrika (i-icasa) ukuthi luqalise inqubo yokuhlinzekwa kwamalayisensi omthamo wamagagasi okusakaza nokuthunyelwa kolwazi ngomoya.

xho: le nkqubo iza kuquka amanyathelo aza kukhuthaza ukuba kubekho ukhuphiswano, iinguqu, uhlumo lweli candelo oluza kuxhanyulwa ngumntu wonke kunye nokuba wonke ubani axhamle kobu buxhakaxhaka.
zul: le nqubo izobandakanya izinyathelo zokukhuthaza ukuncintisana, uguquko, ukukhuliswa kwalo mkhakha ngendlela ebandakanya umuntu wonke kanye nokuqinisekisa ukufinyelela kwabantu bonke.

xho: oku kubaluleke kakhulu kumalinge okuphungula iindleko ze-data, into leyo ibalulekileyo kuphuhliso loqoqosho kunye nokuvulela amathuba amaninzi abantu abatsha.
zul: lokhu kuyingxenye esemqoka ekwehliseni izindleko ze-data, okuyinto ebaluleke kakhulu ekuthuthukisweni komnotho kanjalo nasekuvulweni kwamathuba aqondiswe entsheni.

xho: sihlaba ikhwelo kwicandelo leziseko zonxibelelwano ukuba liphinde lizithobe iindleko ze-data ukuze zifane nezamanye amazwe ehlabathi.
zul: siyayinxusa imboni yengqalasizinda yezokuxhumana ukuthi iphinde izehlise futhi izindleko ze-data ukuze inanintengo le-data lilingane nelamanye amazwe omhlaba.

xho: sinyusa iikawusi kwiphulo lethu lotyalo-mali.
zul: siyawuqinisa impela umkhankaso wethu wokuheha utshalomali.

xho: kutyalo-mali oluzibhiliyoni zeerandi ezingama-300 ebelibhengezwe kwinkomfa yotyalo-mali yokuqala kulo nyaka uphelileyo, iprojekthi ezixabisa imali engaphezulwana nje kwibhiliyoni zeerandi ezingama-250 sele ziqalisiwe.
zul: kutshalomali olungamabhiliyoni angama-300 amarandi olwamenyezelwa kwingqungquthela yotshalomali yokuqala ngqa eyabanjwa ngonyaka odlule, kunemiklamo esiqalisiwe yenani elingaphezulu nje kancane kwamabhiliyoni angama-250 amarandi.

xho: siyaqhubeka nokuqokelela amaphulo otyalo-mali, ekuza kunikwa iinkcukacha zawo kwinkomfa yotyalo-mali yomzantsi afrika yesibini eza kubanjwa ukususela ngomhla wesi-5 ukuye kowesi-7 kweyenkanga.
zul: siyaqhubeka nokwakha umgudu wotshalomali olungenayo kuleli, futhi lokhu kuzoboniswa kwingqungquthela yesibili yotshalomali yaseningizimu afrika ezobanjwa kusukela mhla ziyisi-5 kuze kube ngumhla ziyisi-7 kulwezi.

xho: kweli xesha libi kangaka, umsebenzi wabathunywa botyalo-mali wakhe ubuhlobo nentsebenziswano entle phakathi kukarhulumente namashishini.
zul: esikhathini lapho sibhekene nongabazane, umsebenzi wamanxusa otshalomali sewuvule amaxhama okuxhumana nokusebenzisana asemqoka kakhulu phakathi kukahulumeni namabhizinisi.

xho: ngokweengxelo esizifumana kwaba bathunywa, kucacile ukuba kusekuninzi ekufuneka kwenziwe ukulungiselela ukuba iimeko zifaneleke kanye kutyalo-mali.
zul: uma sibheka imbuyisambiko esiyithole kubona, kuyacaca ukuthi kusekuningi okusamele kwenziwe ngenhloso yokwenza ngcono isimo okusetshenzelwa ngaphansi kwaso esiphathelene nokutshalwa kwezimali.

xho: oku kuquka ukuqwalasela ngokutsha indlela urhulumente asebenza ngayo ukusombulula iingxaki abatyali-mali abajamelena nazo kunye nokutshintsha imigaqo-nkqubo neminye imigaqo yethu yokukhuthaza utyalo-mali.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ukubuyekezwa kwendlela olawula ngayo umsebenzi wokuxazulula izinselelo abahlangabezana nazo abatshalizimali kanye nokuphucula nokuhlela kabusha inqubomgomo yokukhuthaza utshalomali kanye nohlaka lwesakhiwo sayo.

xho: mhle umsebenzi osele wenziwe ngephulo lohlumo phakathi kukarhulumente necandelo labucala, umsebenzi lowo ukhokelwa ngumphathiswa unkosazana dlamini-zuma, umnu roelf meyer kunye nogq johan van zyl slabbert.
zul: mkhulu umsebenzi esesiwenzile ngaphansi kohlelo lokukhulisa umnotho ngobambiswano phakathi kukahulumeni nomkhakha ozimele oluholwa ngungqongqoshe unkosazana dlamini-zuma, umnu roelf meyer kanye nodkt johan van zyl slabbert.

xho: icandelo labucala lithembisile ukuba liza kutyala imali ezibhiliyoni zeerandi ezingama-840 kwiiprojekthi ezingama-43 kumacandelo ali-19 ngolo hlobo lidale imisebenzi engama-155 000 kule minyaka mihlanu izayo.
zul: umkhakha ozimele usuthembise ukutshala imali engamabhiliyoni angama-840 amarandi emiklamweni engama-43 ngaphansi kwemikhakha eyi-19, futhi lokho kuzodala amathuba omsebenzi ayizi-155 000 kule minyaka emihlanu ezayo.

xho: kwiingxoxo urhulumente ebezibambile nabezoshishino uye wathembisa ukuba uza kuyiguzula imigaqo-nkqubo eyimiqobo aze akhawulezise ukuphunyezwa kwezi projekthi.
zul: ezingxoxweni ebezibanjwe nabamabhizinisi, uhulumeni usezwakalise ukuzibophezela ekususeni izithiyo nemigoqo ephathelene nezinqubomgomo nemithetho eyinkimbinkimbi futhi asheshise ukuqaliswa kwale miklamo.

xho: sizama ukwenza utshintsho olungxamileyo ukuze senze kube lula ukuqala nokuqhuba ishishini ngokuthi siqinisekise ukuba imithetho iyahambelana futhi iyaqondana, izicelo zamaphepha-mvume nobunye ubucukubhede zenziwa ngekhompyutha nokuphungula iindleko zokuqinisekisa ukuba ubani unazo zonke izinto ezifunwayo.
zul: senza imizamo esheshayo yokuletha izinguquko ezisemqoka okuhloswe ngazo ukwenza kube lula ukwenza ibhizinisi kuleli, ngokuthi sihlanganise futhi sihlele kabusha imithethonqubo elawulayo, senze kube kula kakhulu ukuthola izimvume nokufaka izicelo ngobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje, futhi kuncishiswe nezindleko zokuthotshelwa kwenzinqubo ezibekiwe.

xho: iziseko ezingundoqo zibaluleke kakhulu kutyalo-mali oluxhasa indlela uqoqosho lweli olwakheke ngayo, uhlumo nokudala imisebenzi.
zul: ingqalasizinda ingumkhakha osemqoka kakhulu okumele kutshalwe kuwona izimali, osekela ukulethwa koguquko ezikhungweni, ukukhula komnotho kanye nokuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi.

xho: zibalulekile kumaphulo ethu okuvuselela uqoqosho, nokwenza ukuba umbono wexesha elitsha lotshintsho uyazalisekiswa ngenene.
zul: ingqalasiizinda ibaluleke kakhulu futhi ekuvuselelweni komnotho wezwe, kanye nokuletha nokuqalisa isikhathi esisha sokuvuselela nokuthuthukisa izwe lethu.

xho: indlela yethu entsha yokujongana nomba wophuhliso lweziseko ezingundoqo uxhomekeke kwintsebenziswano emandla phakathi kukarhulumente necandelo labucala kunye nabantu bakuthi.
zul: indlela entsha esizoyilandela ekuthuthukisweni kwengqalasizinda isekelwe phezu kobambiswano oluqinile phakathi kukahulumeni nomkhakha ozimele, kanye nemiphakathi yendawo.

xho: le ndlela iza kusetyenziswa iquka imali eza kubekelwa bucala kunye notshintsho oluza kwenziwa kumaqumrhu ukuze kuncediswa amaphulo okwakha kukhokeliswa phambili iziseko ezingundoqo zamanzi, iindlela kunye neendawo zokuhlala abantwana besikolo ngokuthi isetyenziswe ngobunono imali ebekelwe lo msebenzi.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya inhlanganisela ekhethekile yezinyathelo eziphathelene nezimali kanye nalezo eziphathelene nokuphatha nokulawula okuhloswe ngazo ukukhuthaza umsebenzi wokwakha kanye nokubeka eqhulwini ukwakhiwa kwengqalasizinda yamanzi, imigwaqo kanye nezindlu zokuhlalisa abafundi, ngokuthi kusetshenziswe ngobunyoninco leyo mali eyabelwe le miklamo.

xho: njengoko kwakubhengeziwe kwi-sona yangaphambili, urhulumente ubeke bucala imali ezibhiliyoni zeerandi ezili-100 ukuze ibe yimali yokuncedisa ingxowa-mali yeziseko ezingundoqo.
zul: njengoba kwamenyezelwa kwi-sona edlule, uhulumeni ubeke eceleni isamba esingamabhiliyoni ayi-100 amarandi ngenhloso yokuxhasa nokugqugquzela isikhwama sengqalasizinda.

xho: senza amalungiselo okuseka le ngxowa-mail itsho ibe liqumrhu eligcweleyo, eliza kuba phantsi kwebhanki yezophuhliso yamazantsi e-afrika (i-dbsa), apho isebe lemisebenzi yoluntu neziseko ezingundoqo elitsha liza kudlala indima yokuba liliso kwimisebenzi eyenziwa yile ngxowa-mali.
zul: senza imizamo yokuthi lesi sikhwama sibe yisikhungo, esizolawulwa yibhange lentuthuko laseningizimu afrika (i-dbsa), futhi umnyango wezemisebenzi yomphakathi kanye nengqalasizinda ohlelwe kabusha yiwona ozoqapha umsebenzi owenziwa yilesi sikhungo.

xho: oku sikwenze ngokufakana imilomo necandelo labucala, elifana namaqumrhu engxowa-mali zomhlala-phantsi, abonakalise umdla ngokuthi nawo adlale indima kule ngxowa-mali yeziseko ezingundoqo.
zul: lokhu sikwenza ngokubonisana kanye nokubambisana nabatshalizimali abazimele, abafana nezikhungo ezilawula izikhwama zempesheni, ezingabatshalizimali abanentshisekelo ekubambeni iqhaza esikhwameni sengqalasizinda.

xho: olu tshintsho luza kuqinisekisa ukuba luqhutywa ngcono ucwangciso lweprojekthi zokwakha iziseko ezingundoqo, ukwenza uphando olunzulu lokuhlola ukuba iiprojekthi ingenzeka ngempumelelo na kunye namalungiselo avuthiweyo phambi kokuqala umsebenzi, kuphuculwe indlela zokuphatha, kuqinisekiswe ukuba umsebenzi wenziwa ngendlela egqibeleleyo futhi kukho nolawulo olungcono.
zul: lezi zinguquko zizoqinisekisa ukuhlelwa kangcono kwemiklamo yengqalasizinda, umsebenzi onohlonze wokuhlola ukuthi ingqalasizinda izokwenzeka ngempumelelo yini nokwenza amalungiselelo afanelekile, ukuphucula ukuphatha okukhethekile, ukuqaliswa ngobunyoninco kwemisebenzi yengqalasizinda kanye nokuphatha okuhle.

xho: oku kuza kulinceda kakhulu icandelo lezokwakha esele linethuba litsala nzima.
zul: lokhu kuhlinzekwa ngokwesekwa okudingeka kakhulu emkhakheni wezokwakha osekuphele isikhathi eside impela ufadalele.

xho: siza kukhuthaza abathengi ukuba bathenge iimveliso zalapha ekhaya ngolo hlobo bakhulise icandelo lezemveliso lasemzantsi afrika ngokuqinisekisa ukuba iphulo elikhuthaza ukuthengwa kweemveliso zeli, i-buy local campain, likhoyo kuyo yonke indawo ngalo lonke ixesha.
zul: sizogqugquzela futhi sikhuthaze abantu ukuthi bathenge imikhiqizo nezimpahla ezikhiqizwe kuleli futhi sikhulise umkhakha wezokukhiqiza waseningizimu afrika ngokuthi siqinisekise ukuthi umkhankaso ‘wokuthengwa kwezimpahla ezikhiqizwe kuleli’ (i-‘buy local’) ungundabuzekwayo futhi ubonakala yonke indawo.

xho: sibongoza abemi bomzantsi afrika ukuba bathathe isigqibo sokuba bathenge gqolo iimveliso ezenziwe apha ekhaya.
zul: siyabanxusa bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika ukuthi, ngenhloso futhi ngokuqhubekayo, bathenge izimpahla ezakhiwe kuleli.

xho: le suti, hempe kunye neli qhina ndilinxibileyo namhlanje zenziwe apha ekhaya ngabasebenzi bamalaphu bomzantsi afrika e-house of monatic, apha esalt river ekapa.
zul: le sudu nehembe kanye nothayi engikugqokile namhlanje kwakhiwe ngabasebenzi bemboni yendwangu yaseningizimu afrika e-house of monatic, khona lapha e-salt river edolobheni lasekapa.

xho: ndiyacela ukuba sonke sithenge iimveliso ezenziwe apha ekhaya ukuze sandise inani labathengi ngolo hlobo sikhwezele uqoqosho lwelizwe.
zul: sonke masithenge izimpahla ezakhiwe kuleli ukuze sikhulise isibalo sabantu abathenga impahla ekhiqizwe kuleli.

xho: ungekapheli lo nyaka, sifuna ukutyikitya izivumelwano neevenkile ezinkulu zeli ukuba zithenge iimveliso zomzantsi afrika zize zenze kangangoko ukubabaza nokuthengisa iimveliso ezikudidi oluphezulu eziveliswe ngabasebenzi bomzantsi afrika.
zul: kulo nyaka esiwuphethe, sifuna ukwenza izivumelwano nezitolo ezithengisa impahla ukuthi ziqinisekise ukuthi zithenga izimpahla ezikhiqizwe eningizimu afrika futhi ziyikhangise ngenkuthalo imikhiqizo emihle kakhulu eyakhiwe ngabasebenzi baseningizimu afrika.

xho: ngaxeshanye, siza kuthengisa iimveliso zethu ngamandla kweli lizwekazi le-afrika nakwihlabathi liphela.
zul: futhi kusenjalo sizokhangisa ngomdlandla omkhulu imikhiqizo yethu ezwekazini lase-afrika kanye nasemhlabeni wonke jikelele.

xho: la manyathelo aza kuxhaswa yindlela engagungqiyo esiwuxhasa ngayo umgaqo-nkqubo woqoqosho olubanzi nowezimali zikarhulumente oza kuqhubeleka unika ithemba ukhuthaza notyalo-mali.
zul: lezi zinyathelo zisekelwe phezu kwesibophezelo sethu esiqinile kwinqubomgomo yomnotho-jikelele kanye neyezezimali ezoqhubeka nokukhuthaza ukwethenjwa kwaleli lizwe futhi kukhuthaze nokutshalwa kwezimali.

xho: sizimisele ukuboleka ngendlela enobulumko nokusebenzisa imali ngobunono ukuze siqinisekise ukuba kukho uzinzo kwizimali zikarhulumente futhi asingeni matyaleni makhulu.
zul: sizibophezele ekubolekeni izimali ngobuhlakani obukhulu ukuze singaboleki imali engaphezu kwamandla ethu okukhokha leyo mali esiyibolekile futhi sizibophezele ekusebenziseni imali ngokucophelela okukhulu ukuze siqinisekise uzinzo ezimalini zikahulumeni futhi sinciphise nesikweletu sezwe.

xho: ibhanki enguvimba yomzantsi afrika iliqumrhu elibaluleke kakhulu kweli lizwe lethu lilawulwa ngokwentando yesininzi, kwaye lihlonitshwa kakhulu kweli lizwe nakwihlabathi liphela.
zul: ibhange lombuso laseningizimu afrika lisiyikhungo esisemqoka kakhulu ezweni lethu elibuswa ngentando yeningi labantu, esithenjwayo futhi esihlonishwa kakhulu kuleli nasemhlabeni wonke jikelele.

xho: uzinzo kumaxabiso luyafuneka kodwa akunakusetyenziswa lona lodwa xa kufunwa ukukhulisa uqoqosho.
zul: uzinzo lwamananintengo luyadingeka impela, kepha-ke alwanele ekuqinisekiseni ukukhula komnotho.

xho: amaxabiso anyukayo eempahla neenkonzo abagqibela imali abemi bomzantsi afrika, ingakumbi abantu abangathathi ntweni.
zul: amananintengo ezimpahla nezinsizakalo adlondlobalayo anciphisa amandla okuthenga abo bonke abantu baseningzimu afrika, ikakhulukazi labo abadla imbuya ngothi.

xho: unyuko-maxabiso kwenza zingaqhubi kakuhle iimveliso zeli ezithunyelwa kumazwe angaphandle ngokunjalo neenkampani ezithenga iimveliso kumazwe angaphandle, ngolo hlobo imizi-mveliso namaphulo okudala imisebenzi ibe sengxakini.
zul: ukwehla kwamandla emali kunciphisa amandla okuncintisana ezimpahla zakuleli ezithunyelwa emazweni angaphandle kanye namafemu akuleli akhiqiza izimpahla ezincintisana nezimpahla ezingena kuleli ezakhiwe kwamanye amazwe, futhi lokhu kubeka engcupheni izimboni zakuleli kanye nemisebenzi.

xho: ngenxa yezi zizathu, umgaqo-siseko weli lizwe ugunyazisa ibhanki enguvimba yomzantsi afrika ukuba ikhusele ixabiso lemali yeli lizwe isenzela ukube kubekho uhlumo oluzingileyo nolungenandawo luhexa kuzo.
zul: ngenxa yalesi sizathu-ke, umthethosisekelo wethu ugunyaza ibhange lombuso laseningizimu afrika ukuthi livikele isilinganisontengo semali yakuleli ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukukhula komnotho okulingene futhi okusimeme.

xho: namhlanje, siyaphinda siyalibethelela eli gunya, ibhanki enguvimba ekufuneka ilisebenzise ngaphandle kokulukuhlwa, koloyiko, ngendlele eyenzelelelayo okanye edlela indlala.
zul: namuhla, sithanda ukuligcizelela leli gunya elihlinzekwe ngokomthethosisekelo, okumele lifezekiswe yibhange lombuso ngokuzimela, ngaphandle kokuchema noma ukucwasa.

xho: umgaqo-siseko weli lizwe ukwafuna ukuba kubekho iindibano zokubonisana rhoqo phakathi kwebhanki enguvimba nomphahtiswa wezimali ukuze kubekho ulawulo olungqingqwa loqoqosho olubanzi, konke oku bekwenzela ukuncedisa kumaphulo okudala imisebenzi nohlumo loqoqosho.
zul: umthethosisekelo wethu uyalela futhi ukuthi kube nokubonisana okuqhubekayo phakathi kwebhangengodla kanye nongqongqoshe wezezimali ukuze kugqugquzelwe ukusebenza ngendlela ehambelanayo emnothweni wezwe wonkana, ngenhloso yokuqinisekisa ukwakhiwa kwamathuba omsebenzi kanye nokukhulisa umnotho.

xho: ukuze sikwazi ukukhuphisana namazwe ehlabathi, ukuze sikwazi ukurhwebesha abatyali-zimali beze kweli, kufuneka silungise ingxaki yemali eninzi efunekayo xa ubani eqhuba ishishini emzantsi afrika, kunye nemithetho enobucukubhede obuninzi obutya ixesha.
zul: uma sifuna ukuncintisana ngempumelelo namazwe omhlaba, futhi uma sifuna ukuheha utshalomali, kumele sithathe izinyathelo zokunciphisa izindleko eziphakeme kakhulu zokwenza ibhizinisi eningizimu afrika, futhi sixegise imithethonqubo nemidanti eyinkimbinkimbi futhi ewundendende okumele ilandelwe.

zul: ngokuholwa yi-ndp, kungumthwalo nomsebenzi wethu ukuqinisekisa intuthuko ebandakanya umuntu wonke futhi esimeme, ezokwazi ukumelana nokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu.

xho: sisebenzisana necandelo labucala, abasebenzi kunye namazwe ehlabathi siza kuphucula amacebo ethu esiza kuwasebenzisa ukuze sikwazi ukumelana nezi meko zemozulu zitshintshayo namanye amacebo esinokuwasebenzisa ukuphungula umonakalo owenziwa lolu tshintsho kwimozulu.
zul: ngokubambisana nomkhakha ozimele, abasebenzi kanye namazwe omhlaba sizoqinisa futhi sikhuphule imizamo yethu yokumelana nokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu futhi sinciphise nomthelela omubi walokhu.

zul: sinethuba lokuqinisekisa ukuthi sihamba phambili emizamweni yokukhulisa umnotho ngendlela ebhekelela futhi inakekele imvelo, sibe nezimboni ezisebenzisa izindlela-kusebenza ezikhiqiza ikhabhoni encane kakhulu futhi ezingawuncolisi umkhathi nemvelo, sihambe phambili ekusetshenzisweni kobuchwepheshe obusha futhi sithathe amagxathu amakhulukazi aphokophele emnothweni wangomuso.

xho: kufuneka siwunyuse umthamo wamandla ahlaziyekayo nangenabungozi kokusingqongileyo kwiintlobo zamandla esinazo size siqwalasele nokuba uqoqosho oluxhomekeke kwihayodrojini lungadlala indima engakanani na.
