zul: ukukhula komnotho okusheshayo kudinga futhi ukuthi kusheshiswe izinguquko kwezomhlaba ezindaweni ezisemakhaya kanye nezosemadolobheni futhi kube khona inqubo-kusebenza ecacile ephathelene nokuphathwa kwamalungelo omhlaba.

xho: siyifumene ingxelo yeqela labacebisi likamongameli ebelichophele umba weenguqu kwezomhlaba nezolimo, ebelikhokelwa ngusekela-mongameli, ngoku eza kusiwa kwikhabhinethi ukuze yona iyiqwalaselisise.
zul: sesiwutholile umbiko wethimba elikhethekile lokweluleka umongameli mayelana nezinguquko kwezomhlaba nezolimo, elabe liholwa yiphini likamongameli, manje osuzokwethulwa phambi kwekhabhinethi ukuze ucutshungulwe.

xho: izindululo ezenziwe leli qela ziza kusetyenziswa xa kuqukunjelwa inkqubo ebanzi neenjongo zokwenza utshintsho kwezemihlaba.
zul: izincomo zaleli thimba elikhethekile yizona ezizosetshenziswa ukuhlanganisa nokuphothula uhlelo lwezinguquko kwezomhlaba olubanzi futhi oluzoletha uguquko olunohlonze.

xho: kungekudala, urhulumente uza kugxagxamisa akhangele aze akhulule umhlaba okulungeleyo ukuba kwakhiwe iindawo zokuhlala abantu ezidolophini nokulima okanye ukufuya.
zul: kulesi sikhashana esifushane esizayo, uhulumeni uzosheshisa imizamo yokuhlonza kanye nokwaba umhlaba kahulumeni okulungele ukuhlaliswa kwabantu ezindaweni ezisemadolobheni, onazo izinsiza nezidingongqangi zesimanjemanje, futhi uhulumeni uzokwaba nomhlaba ozosetshenziselwa ukulima.

xho: kwisicwangciso soncedo-mali esasibhengezwe kulo nyaka uphelileyo, saye sathembisa amafama asakhulayo ukuba aza kuba ngabanye babantu bokuqala abaza kuncedwa.
zul: kwiphakheji yokukhuthaza nokuvuselela umnotho eyamenyezelwa ngonyaka odlule, sathembisa ukuthi sizokubeka eqhulwini ukuxhaswa ngezimali kwabalimi abasafufusa.

xho: kuhlahlo lwabiwo-mali lwesigaba esiphakathi, kwaye kwabelwa ibhanki yezemihlaba imali ezibhiliyoni zeerandi eziyi-3.9 eza kuyisebenzisa ukuxhasa amafama amnyama arhwebayo.
zul: kulesi sikhathi sesabelo esimaphakathi, ibhange lomhlaba labelwe imali engamabhiliyoni ama-3.9 amarandi ngenhloso yokweseka nokuxhasa abalimi abamnyama abahwebayo.

xho: icandelo elikhulu lesicwangciso-qhinga sohlumo somzantsi afrika lithetha ngokudibanisa uqoqosho lweli lizwe nolwamazwe angabamelwane kunye nelizwekazi liphela.
zul: ingxenye esemqoka kakhulu yeqhingasu lokukhulisa umnotho leningizimu afrika wukudidiyelwa komnotho wakuleli neminotho yamazwe angomakhelwane kanye neminotho yamazwe aleli zwekazi lonkana.

xho: ummandla welizwekazi lase-afrika ongahlawulisani rhafu yorhwebelwano (i-afcfta) uza kwenza kube lula ukuhamba kweempahla neenkonzo, imali kunye nezixhobo zokuvelisa kulo lonke eli lizwekazi.
zul: isizinda sokuhwebelana mahhala kwamazwe ezwekazi lase-afrika, (i-afcfta), sizothuthukisa futhi senze ngcono ukuhamba nokuthunyelwa kwezimpahla kanye nezinsizakalo, ingqala-bhizinisi kanye nezinsiza-kusebenza zokukhiqiza impahla kwizwekazi lonkana.

xho: isicwangciso-qhinga sethu sezemizi-mveliso esihlaziyiweyo sigxininisa kumba wokongeza amazwe esinobudlelwano borhwebo notyalo-mali kummandla osemazantsi e-afrika nakwilizwekazi liphela.
zul: iqhingasu leningizimu afrika elivuseleliwe futhi lafakwa nomfutho ligxile ekukhuliseni ubudlelwano bokuhwebelana nokutshalwa kwezimali phakathi kwelizwe lethu nesifunda sonkana samazwe aseningizimu ye-afrika kanye nezwekazi lonkana.

xho: kumazwe ayinxalenye yombutho wophuhliso lwamazwe asemazantsi e-afrika (i-sadc) siza kukhokelisa phambili umba wokuqinisekisa ukuba amanqanaba abalulekileyo kwinkqubo yokuvelisa aqhutywa ngawo onke la mazwe ingakumbi kumacandelo afana nelezamandla, elezemigodi nokuxhamlisa ngezimbiwa, elezemveliso, eleziseko ezingundoqo kunye nelokuhlelwa nokucolwa kweemveliso zolimo.
zul: ngaphakathi kwenhlangano yokuthuthukiswa kwamazwe aseningizimu ye-afrika (i-sadc), sizobeka eqhulwini uchungechunge lokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo kanye nokuthunyelwa nokuhanjiswa kwayo phakathi kwamazwe angaphansi kwale nhlangano, okuyimikhiqizo yemikhakha enjengowezamandla, owezimayini nokuthuthukiswa kwekhwalithi yemikhiqizo yezimbiwa, owezokukhiqizwa kwempahla, owezengqalasizinda kanye nowokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo.

xho: bantu bakuthi, uhlumo loqoqosho lweli aluyikuba lulutho ngaphandle kokuba luza kukhatshwa kukudalwa kwemisebenzi emininzi.
zul: bantu bakithi, ukukhula komnotho wezwe ngeke neze kuwenze umehluko ophawulekayo uma kungalekeleli ekwakhiweni kwamathuba omsebenzi amaningi.

xho: into yokuba kube kanti izinga lentswelo-ngqesho kubantu abatsha abangabemi bomzantsi afrika lingaphezulu kwama-50% ithetha ukuba eli lizwe lisengxakini enkulu efuna kuthathwe amanyathelo akhawulezileyo, ahlakaniphileyo nangqongqo apho thina sonke siza kubona ukuba kunyanzelekile ukuba sisebenzisane.
zul: njengoba izinga lokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi entsheni lingaphezu kwama-50% kusho ukuthi izwe libhekene nengwadla enkulukazi edinga ukuthi kutholakale izixazululo eziphuthumayo, ezihambisana nokusetshenziswa kwamaqhingasu amasha futhi ezihambelanayo, lapho wonke umuntu kumele akubone njengento edingekayo futhi esemqoka kakhulu ukuthi kusetshenzwe ngokubambisana.

xho: nokuba abantu abaninzi abatsha bafikelela kwinqanaba lokufuna imisebenzi, eli lizwe kufuneka ludale imisebenzi yolutsha engaphezulu kwale liyidalayo.
zul: futhi njengoba abantu abasha bengena ngobuningi minyaka yonke esigabeni sabantu abathungatha amathuba omsebenzi, umnotho wezwe kumele wakhe amathuba omsebenzi aqondiswe entsheni angaphezulu kakhulu kwamathuba avulekayo njengamanje.

xho: ukuba nje likwazi ukugcina inani labantu abatsha abangasebenziyo lingenyuki.
zul: ngenhloso nje yokuqinisekisa ukuthi alidlondlobali ngokweqile izinga lokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi entsheni.

xho: inyani emsulwa yona yeyokuba xa kuthethwa ngengxaki yenani labantu abatsha abangasebenziyo kufuneka senze nje amacebo okubambisa nokuncamela ukuqinisekisa ukuba eli nani alandi.
zul: iqiniso elimsulwa wukuthi mayelana nenkinga yokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi entsheni, kumele senze imizamo enohlonze futhi ephuthumayo, ngenhloso nje yokunciphisa amanani aphakeme kakhulu esibhekene nawo njengamanje entsha ehleli emakhaya engasebenzi, singakayibali intsha esazophuma ezikhungweni zemfundo, nayo ifune umsebenzi.

xho: ke ngoko kunyanzelekile ukuba singaphozisi maseko siqalise ukusebenzisa esi sicwangciso sibanzi - esiza kulawulwa futhi siqhutywa yi-ofisi kamongameli - sokudala imisebenzi emitsha engekho ngaphantsi kwizigidi ezibini kule minyaka ilishumi izayo.
zul: ngakho-ke kusemqoka kakhulu ukuthi siluqalise ngokushesha okukhulu uhlelo olubanzi – oluqhutshwa futhi lulawulwe yihhovisi likamongameli – ukuze kwakhiwe amathuba amasha omsebenzi aqondiswe entsheni, angekho ngaphansi kwezigidi ezimbili kule minyaka eyi-10 ezayo.

xho: esi sicwangciso siza kusetyenziswa kuwo onke amasebe karhulumente nakuwo omathathu amaqoqo karhulumente, kusetyenziswano necandelo labucala.
zul: lolu hlelo luzosebenza kuyo yonke iminyango kahulumeni futhi lusebenze kuzona zontathu izigaba zikahulumeni, ngokubambisana nabomkhakha ozimele.

xho: sele sisebenzisana necandelo labucala ukuze sivulele amathuba abantu abatsha ukuba babambe izingxungxo eziza kubanika amava okusebenza ngokuthi kuphuculwe la mathuba akhoyo.
zul: sesiqalile kakade ukusebenzisana nabomkhakha ozimele ekwakheni imigudu yokufaka abantu abasha emsebenzini ngokuthi sikhulise futhi sithuthukise izinhlelo ezikhona njengamanje zokuphathwa kwemigudu yokufakwa kwentsha emsebenzini.

xho: la mathuba anceda abantu abatsha abawasebenzisayo ukuba babonakale, bafumane inkxaso bakwazi nokuzibonisa ukuba nabo bakhona kwaye bafuna ukuqeshwa nokuziqesha.
zul: lezi yizinhlelo ezivumela labo bantu abasha ababhalise ngaphansi kwazo ukuthi babonakale kalula, bathole ukwesekwa kanye namathuba azokwenza ukuthi bavele obala ukuze babonakale kalula ukuthi badinga amathuba omsebenzi noma amathuba okusungula amabhizinisi.

xho: aqinisekisa ukuba abantu abatsha abaphuma kumakhaya asokolayo - ingakumbi abantu abatsha ababhinqileyo - baxhotyiswa ngezakhono eziza kwenza ukuba kube lula ukuthatha amathuba amatsha avelayo.
zul: lezi zinhlelo ziyaqinisekisa ukuthi intsha evela emakhaya ahlwempu – futhi ikakhulukazi abesifazane abasebasha – iyahlonyiswa futhi icijwe ngendlela efanele ukuze ikwazi ukuwabamba ngazo zombili amathuba amasha avelayo.

xho: urhulumente uza kuqhubeleka ukudala imisebenzi esebenzisa inkqubo yemisebenzi yoluntu enatyisiweyo (i-epwp), ingakumbi imisebenzi efuna izandla namandla efana nokulungisa, ukucoca nokususa ukhula, ukutywina imibhobho yamanzi evuzayo nokwenza iindlela.
zul: uhulumeni uzoqhubeka nokuhlinzeka amathuba omsebenzi ngaphansi kohlelo olunwetshiwe lwemisebenzi yomphakathi (i-epwp), ikakhulukazi emikhakheni edinga abasebenzi abaningi njengomkhakha wokulungiswa kwengqalasizinda, ukuhlakulwa kokhula nokususwa kwezihlahla nezitshalo ezingadingekile, ukuvalwa kwamapayipi amanzi avuzayo kanye nokwakhiwa kwemigwaqo.

xho: siza kuqhubeleka ukuqulunqa iinkqubo eziza kuqinisekisa ukuba abantu abatsha abasokolayo bakulungele ukungena emisebenzini futhi bafumana imisebenzi kuloo macandelo anamathuba emisebenzi akhulayo.
zul: sizoqhubeka nokuthuthukisa izinhlelo zokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abasha abangasebenzi bakulungele ukusebenza futhi bayafakwa emsebenzini kuleyo mikhakha lapho kunamathuba omsebenzi akhulayo.

xho: la macandelo aquka icandelo lamaziko ehlabathi asebenza ngomnxeba ukunika uncedo nemibuzo, icandelo lamanqanaba ahlukeneyo okuhlela nokucola iimveliso zezolimo, ukusebenza ngobuxhakaxhaka bobuchwepheshe, ukulungisa nokukhanda kunye namanye amathuba amatsha eza nolu qoqosho luxhomekeke kubuchwepheshe kunye neli lixhomekeke kubuchwepheshe bale mihla.
zul: le mikhakha ibandakanya imikhakha enjengowezinsizakalo zamazwe ngamazwe zokuhlinzeka usizo ngocingo, uchungechunge lomsebenzi wokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo, ukuxhunywa kwemishini yezobuchwepheshe, ukulungiswa nokugcinwa kwemishini isesimweni sokusebenza esihle kanye namathuba amasha ahlinzekwa ngumnotho wezobuxhakaxhaka nobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje kanye noguquko lwezimboni lwesine olugxile ekusetshenzisweni kobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje.

xho: urhulumente uza kuqinisekisa ukuba abantu abatsha bayaqeshwa nayimibutho yoluntu kwimisebenzi efumaneka, umzekelo, kumaziko ophuhliso lwabantwana abaselula (i-ecd) kunye nawonakekelo lwezempilo.
zul: uhulumeni uzoqhubeka futhi nokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abasha bayaqashwa ezinhlanganweni nasezikhungweni zomphakathi ezinjengezikhungo zokuthuthukiswa kwezingane zisencane kanye nezinhlangano ezihlinzeka ngosizo lwezempilo nokunakekelwa.

xho: siza kuwunyusa umthamo othathwa yinkonzo yesizwe yolutsha itsho ithathe abantu abatsha abangama-50 000 ngonyaka.
zul: sizolukhulisa uhlelo lukazwelonke lokuvulwa kwemisebenzi eqondiswe entsheni ukuze luqashe abantu abasha abayizi-50 000 njalo ngonyaka.

xho: urhulumente uza kuxhasa iinkampani ezikwazi ukusebenza ngobuxhaka-xhaka be-intanethi zabantu abatsha abazisebenzelayo ezisemaphandleni nasezilokishini.
zul: uhulumeni uzosekela futhi axhase izinhlelo-kusebenza zobuchwepheshe eziqondiswe kubantu abasha abangosomabhizinisi ezindaweni zasemakhaya kanye nasemalokishini.

xho: siza kuzangeza iinkqubo zethu ukuze sincede abantu abatsha bafumane izingxungxo eziza kubanceda bafumane amava ngokusebenzisa amaphulo afana nenkonzo yokuqeshwa kolutsha (i-yes), kunye nokuququzelela amaphulo okufundiswa umsebenzi beqeqeshelwa emsebenzini.
zul: sizozikhulisa izinhlelo zethu ukuze silekelele abantu abasha bakwazi ukuthola ulwazi nesipiliyoni somsebenzi lapho bezokwenza umsebenzi abazowuholela, ngaphansi kwezinhlelo ezinjengohlelo lophiko lokuqashwa kwentsha (i-yes), futhi silekelele intsha ekutholeni amathuba okuqeqeshelwa emsebenzini.

xho: siza kuvula amaziko okufukamela nokutatamisa amashishini asakhasayo ukuze sibonelele amashishini asakhasayo aqalwe lulutsha ngoncedo lwezimali nobunye ubuchule njengoko bengena kwicandelo lokuziqhubela awabo amashishini.
zul: sizohlinzeka ngezizinda zokulekelela nokuhlinzeka ngosizo emabhizinisini amancane ngenhloso yokunikeza abantu abasha izeluleko eziphathelene nezimali kanye nokuqhutshwa kwebhizinisi ngenkathi besungula amabhizinisi abo.

xho: izolo, ndibe nenyhweba yokudibana ndize ndincokole nabantu abatsha bomzantsi afrika abenza imisebenzi emihle ukwakha eli lizwe lethu baze baphuhlise nabantu bakuthi.
zul: izolo, kube yintokozo enkulu kimina ukuhlangana nokuxoxisana neqenjana labantu abasha baseningizimu afrika abenza umsebenzi omuhle kakhulu ekwakheni izwe lethu kanye nokuthuthukisa abantu bakithi.

xho: bangoosomashishini, abaphuhlisi boluntu, amatshantliziyo kunye namagcisa.
zul: bangosomabhizinisi, abathuthukisi bomphakathi, izishoshovu kanye namaciko.

xho: eyona nto siyifundileyo kwincoko ebesinazo nabantu abatsha beli lizwe kukuba ayibobulumko ukuba sibakakaze: yonke into esiyenzayo kufuneka ikhokelwe ngabantu abatsha ngokwabo.
zul: enye yezinto ezisemqoka esizifundile kulezi zingxoxo ebesizibambe nentsha yaleli lizwe wukuthi akumele siqhamuke nezixazululo ezicatshangwa yithina bese sithi mabazisebenzise: konke esikwenzayo kumele kuholwe ngabantu abasha ngokwabo.

xho: basixelele izinto abazifunayo nabazidingayo.
zul: basitshelile ukuthi yini abayifunayo, futhi yini abayidingayo.

xho: ewe bona bafuna imisebenzi, kodwa bayafuna nokuzisebenzela baqeshe abantu.
zul: yebo, bayakufuna impela ukuqashwa, kepha-ke futhi bafuna nokuba ngabaqashi ngokwabo.

xho: iingqondo zabo ziyaphuphuma yimibono, kwaye ngabo abaphambili nabangoqala-zive kwezokuqamba nokuyila futhi bafuna ukuzenzela izinto ngokwabo.
zul: baqhamuke nemiqondo-mbono eminingi futhi ehlukahlukene, bahamba phambili ekusetshenzisweni kwezindlela-kusebenza ezintsha, futhi bafuna ukuzenzela izinto ngokwabo.

xho: kufuneka sibaxhase abo banamaphupha namadlu okuziqalela amashishini kuba ikamva leli lizwe lixhomekeke kwizakhono nobuchule beziphiwo zolutsha leli lizwe.
zul: kumele siyeseke le ntshisekelo yentsha ekusunguleni amabhizinisi ngoba phela impumelelo yaleli lizwe incike emdlandleni wabantu abasha kanye nasethalenteni labo lokuqhamuka nemiqondo emisha kanye nezindlela-kusebenza ezintsha.

xho: bantu bakuthi, ukuba sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuba kule minyaka ili-10 izayo wonke umntwana oneminyaka eli-10 uyakwazi ukufunda ngokuqonda nokulandela, kufuneka siphume sisisizwe sixhase iphulo elikhulu lokufunda.
zul: bantu bakithi, ukuze sikwazi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kule minyaka eyi-10 ezayo zonke izingane ezineminyaka eyi-10 ziyakwazi ukufunda futhi zikuqonda kahle lokho ezikufundayo, kumele sigqugquzele isizwe sonke ukuthi siweseke umkhankaso omkhulukazi wokufunda.

xho: ukufundisa abantwana ukufunda beselula kusisiseko umntwana athathela kuso kwimfundo yakhe ukusuka kumabanga aphantsi esikolweni, ukuya kwimfundo ephakamileyo ade aye kungena emsebenzini.
zul: ukufunda kwengane isencane kuyinto eyisisekelo, futhi ukuphumelela nokuqhubekela phambili kwengane emfundweni yayo kuncike kulokhu.

xho: onke amanye amanyathelo okungenelela - ukusuka kumsebenzi owenziwayo ukuphucula umgangatho wemfundo esisiseko ukuya kwimfundo ephakamileyo esimahla kwabo baphuma kumakhaya asokolayo, ukusuka kwimali etyalwa kwikholeji zemfundo noqeqesho lobugcisa nobuchule (i-tvet) ukuya kumaphulo okwandisa amathuba okuqeqesha abantu besemsebenzini - akayikunika ziphumo zincumisayo ngaphandle kokuba siqale siqinisekise ukuba abantwana bayakwazi ukufunda ngokuqonda.
zul: kusukela esikoleni kuqhubeke njalo kuyongena emfundweni ephakeme kuze kuyofinyelela nasemsebenzini imbala.

xho: ngamaphulo afana nephulo lesizwe lokufunda aza kusinceda sitsho sikwazi ukudlala indima ephambili kumaphulo esizwe okufunda.
zul: zonke ezinye izinhlelo zethu – kusukela emsebenzini owenziwayo ukwenza ngcono izinga lemfundo eyisisekelo kuyofinyelela ekuhlinzekweni kwemfundo ephakeme yamahhala kubantu abahlwempu, kusukela kutshalomali nokwesekwa esikunikeza amakolishi ezobuchwepheshe nemisebenzi yobungoti bezandla kuyofinyelela ekukhulisweni kwezinhlelo zokuqeqeshelwa emsebenzini – ngeke neze zikhiqize imiphumela emihle uma singaqali ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi izingane ziyakwazi ukufunda.

xho: siqalisa inkqubo yokufunda yamabanga asezansi, eza kuquka izicwangciso zezifundo ezinako konke, izixhobo ezongezelweleyo zokufunda kunye noncedo lweengcali oluza kunikwa ootitshala besigaba esisisiseko.
zul: yizinhlelo ezinjengomkhankaso wokufunda kazwelonke ezizokwenza sikwazi ukuqhuba ngempumelelo lo mzamo owenziwa ezweni lonkana.

xho: oku kuyinxalenye yamalinge abanzi okuphucula imfundo esisiseko ngokuthi kuxhotyiswe ngezakhono abaphathi nabalawuli bezikolo, ukuphucula izakhono zotitshala nokuqinisekisa ukuba iintlobo zokuhlola nokuvavanya zebanga lesithathu, elesithandathu nelesithoba ziyafana futhi ziyalingana ngokuntsokotha.
zul: bonke othisha bezinga eliyisisekelo kanye nelimaphakathi bazoqeqeshelwa ukufundisa isingisi kanye nezilimi zabomdabu, futhi njengamanje siqeqesha amaqembu abaqeqeshi esizobathumela ezikoleni ukuthi bayohlinzeka ngosizo olusezingeni eliphezulu kothisha ngaphakathi esikoleni.

xho: abantu abatsha kufuneka sibaxhobise nangezakhono eziza kubanceda bakwazi ukumelana neemeko zasemsebenzini kwilixa elizayo.
zul: siqalisa uhlelo lokufunda emabangeni aphansi, olubandakanya izinhlelo zesifundo ezinako konke, izincwadi zokufunda ezengeziwe kanye nosizo longoti kothisha bezinga eliyisisekelo.

xho: yiyo loo nto siqalisa izifundo ezifana ne-coding, kunye ne-data analytics kumabanga aphantsi esikolo.
zul: lokhu kuyingxenye yemizamo ebanzi yokuqinisa uhlelo lwemfundo eyisisekelo ngokucija nokuhlomisa amathimba abaphathi bezikole, siphucule amakhono othisha futhi siqinisekise ukusetshenziswa kwendlela ethembakele yokukala inqubekelaphambili yabafundi ebangeni lesithathu, elesithupha kanye nelesishiyagalolunye.

xho: inyathelo lokuqala kukwandisa inani lamapolisa ahamba-hamba phakathi koluntu ngokuthi kuqeshwe amapolisa, nangokuthi sikhuthaze abemi ukuba nabo badlale indima ebalulekileyo ngokuthi kusekwe imibutho esebenzayo yobupolisa yoluntu.
zul: yingakho, ezikoleni zamabanga aphansi, sethula izifundo enjengomsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwamakhodi ezinhlelo-kusebenza zamakhompyutha (izifundo ze-coding) kanye nomsebenzi wokuhlola nokuhlaziya i-data (i-data analytics).

xho: kungokunje, kukho abafundi ababhalisele ukuthatha inxaxheba kuqeqesho olusisiseko kwikholeji zoqeqesho zamapolisa zeli kwaye siqikelela ukuba eli nani liza kunyuka liye kuma-7 000 kule mijikelo mibini izayo yokuqesha amapolisa.
zul: isinyathelo sokuqala wukukhulisa inani lamaphoyisa abonakala ehamba hamba emphakathini, ngokuthi kuqashwe amaphoyisa angeziwe, kanye nokwenza isimo esizoholela ekutheni izakhamuzi zibambe iqhaza ngenkuthalo ngaphansi kwamaqenjana omphakathi asebenzisana namaphoyisa (ama-cpf) asebenza kahle.

xho: sizama ukunyusa inani lamatyala aphandwa ngempumelelo nelabaphuli-mthetho abathi bagwetywe ngenxa yamatyala abo, nokuqinisekisa ukuba iinkqubo zoqeqesho zingcono futhi kukho iingcali ezinenazakhono ezikwizinga eliphezulu kwicandelo lezenkundla.
zul: njengamanje, bangaphezu kwezi-5 000 abafundi ababhaliselwe ukuqeqeshwa okuyisisekelo emakolishi ethu okuqeqesha amaphoyisa futhi sibheke ukuthi leli nani likhuphuke liyofinyelela kwizi-7 000 ngomjikelezo ngamunye kumahlandla okuqeqeshwa kwamaphoyisa amabili ezayo.

xho: ulwaphulo-mthetho olunobundlobongela luyingxaki yesizwe kwaye kufuneka luliwe sisizwe siphela.
zul: senza imizamo yokwenza ngcono amazinga empumelelo yokuphenywa nokushushiswa kwamacala, kanye nokuqiniseka ukuqeqeshwa okungcono kanye nokusebenza ngobungoti nobunyoninco ohlelweni lwezobulungiswa nokulwisana nobugebengu.

xho: sisebenzisana nemibutho yoluntu ukugwadla amacebo anokusetyenziswa ukulwa nokuphelisa ubundlobongela obusekekwe kwisini esithile nokubulalwa kwabasetyhini.
zul: ubugebengu obuhambisana nodlame buyinkinga yezwe lonkana, futhi edinga ukuthi kuthathwe izinyathelo ezibandakanya abantu bonke.

xho: kulandela iindibano zokufakana imilomo nokubonisana, ngoku sisebenzela ukumisela ibhunga lobundlobongela obujoliswe kwabesini esithile nokubulawa kwabasetyhini kunye nesicwangciso-qhinga sesizwe esiza kusikhokela, naphi na apho sikhoyo, kumalinge okulwa esi sihelegu.
zul: sizebenzisana nezinhlangano zomphakathi ukuthola amaqhingasu okunqanda nokuqeda udlame olubhekiswe obulilini obuthile kanye nokubulawa kwabantu besifazane.

xho: siqesha size sixhobise ngezakhono amapolisa kunye neenkundla ukuze zikwazi ukunceda amaxhoba obundlobongela obujoliswe kwabesini esithile.
zul: kulandela ukubonisana okunohlonze, senza imizamo yokusungula umkhandlu wokulwisana nodlame olubhekiswe obulilini obuthile nokubulawa kwabantu besifazane kanye nohlelo lukazwelonke olukhethekile oluzoba ngumhlahlandlela wethu sonke, kungakhathalekile ukuthi sikuphi, emizamweni yethu yokuqeda lesi sihlava esisabalele ezweni lonkana.

xho: siwenza ngqingqwa amaphulo ethu okulwa imigulukudu ethengisa iziyobisi ngokuthi siphumeze isicwangciso-qhinga sesizwe sokulwa namaqela emigulukudu kunye nesicwangciso esikhulu sesizwe sokulwa iziyobisi.
zul: simatasa sicija futhi sihlomise amaphoyisa kanye nezinkantolo ekusekeleni izisulu zodlame olubhekiswe obulilini obuthile.

xho: manene nani manenekazi,zindwendwe ezibekekileyo, ukuze sikwazi ukuzifezekisa ezi njongo kufuneka sibe nombuso onezakhono nogxigxinisa kuphuhliso.
zul: siyayiqinisa impi yokulwisana namaqembu ezigelekeqe eziqhuba ibhizinisi lokuthengisa izidakamizwa, ngokuqalisa iqhingasu likazwelonke lokulwisana namaqembu emigulukudu kanye nohlelo-ngqangi lukazwelonke lokulwisana nezidakamizwa.

xho: lowo ngumbuso ongapheleli nje ekumiseleni amaziko neziseko ezingundoqo ezinceda uqoqosho nesizwe zisebenze koko onazo nezixhobo zokuzisa iinguqu notshintsho.
zul: manene namanenekazi, zimenywa ezikhethekile, ukufezekiswa kwazo zonke lezi zinjongo kudinga umbuso onamandla nekhono lokusebenza kanye nezinsiza-kusebenza ezidingekayo, futhi othuthukisayo.

xho: ekuqaleni kwale nyanga, saye sabhengeza utshintsho oluza kwenzeka kumasebe karhulumente amaninzi ukuze siwancede akwazi ukwenza umsebenzi wawo awugunyazisiweyo.
zul: lowo akuwona nje umbuso ohlinzeka kuphela ngezikhungo kanye nengqalasizinda ezokwenza ukuthi umnotho wezwe kanye nomphakathi usebenze, kodwa ngumbuso onezindlela-kusebenza zokuletha uguquko.

xho: eli linyathelo lokuqala lwenkqubo ebanzi yokuthintela ukuba umbuso ungalahlekelwa ngabasebenzi abanezakhono nokutshintsha indlela iinkonzo ezihanjiswa ngayo ukuze zixhanyulwa ngabantu beli lizwe.
zul: ngasekuqaleni kwale nyanga, samemezela ukuhlelwa kabusha kweminyango kahulumeni eminingana ukuze ikwazi ukwenza kahle imisebenzi ethweswe yona.

xho: siza kusebenzisa indlela eza kugxininisa kwizithili - sigxininise kwizithili ezingama-44 noomasipala abambaxa abasibhozo - ukuze sikhawulezisa indlela ezihanjiswa ngayo iinkonzo, ukuqinisekisa ukuba oomasipala bafumana inkxaso efanelekileyo futhi banazo nezixhobo ezifanelekileyo.
zul: isinqumo sethu besisekelwe phezu komzamo wokuqiniseksa ukusebenza ngobunyoninco, ukunciphisa izindleko, ukuphatha ngokubambisana kanye nokuhambelanisa imisebenzi eyenziwa yiminyango kahulumeni ehlukahlukene.

xho: ukuqinisekisa ukuba umbuso uyakwazi ukudala iimeko eziza kukhuthaza uphuhliso loqoqosho nezentlalo, kubalulekile ukuba siwaxhobise kangangoko amashishini karhulumente (ii-soe).
zul: lokhu kuyisiqalo senqubo ebanzi yokunqanda ukufadalala kwamandla okusebenza ombuso kanye nokuhlela kabusha uhlelo-kusebenza lwethu lokuhlinzeka ngezidingo-ngqangi ukuze lukwazi ukuzisebenzela kahle kakhulu izakhamuzi zezwe lethu.

xho: ngokusebenzisa ibhunga likamongameli lee-soe, urhulumente ufuna ukuqinisekisa ukuba kukho intsebenziswano phakathi kwawo onke amashishini karhulumente futhi kucaciswe kakuhle owona kanye msebenzi wawo.
zul: sizosebenzisa inqubo-kusebenza ezogxila ezifundeni ezingama-44 nemikhandlu-dolobha eyisishiyagalombili ngenhloso yokusheshisa ukuhlinzekwa kwezidingo-ngqangi, futhi kuqinisekiswe ukuthi omasipala bahlinzekwa ngokwesekwa okufanelekile futhi banikezwe nezinsiza-kusebenza ezanele.

xho: ngokusebenzisa eli bhunga, siza kusebenzisana nezikhulu eziphethe ezi soe ukuze siqulunqe imithetho nemigaqo ekhuthaza izakhono zoyilo kunye nodlamko kunye nokuwanceda akwazi ukumelana nokhuphiswano.
zul: ngenhloso yokuqinisekisa ukuthi umbuso uyakwazi ukuletha kahle intuthuko kwezomnotho kanye nakwezenhlalo yomphakathi, kusemqoka kakhulu ukuthi siqinise amabhizinisi ombuso (ama-soe).

xho: siza kwakhela kulo msebenzi sele siwuqalile ukulungisa ezi ngxaki zinxulumene nolawulo oluhexayo, ukusebenza ngendlela enganabunono kunye nozinzo kwizimali.
zul: ngokusebenzisa umkhandlu kamongameli wama-soe, uhulumeni uhlose ukuqinisekisa ukusebenza ngendlela ehambelanayo phakathi kwazo zonke izinkampani zombuso futhi kucaciswe kahle namagunya nemisebenzi ezethweswe yona ngokuhlukahlukana kwazo.

xho: sizimisele ukwakha umbuso oziphatha ngendlela esulungekileyo apho lungazikuba nandawo urhwaphilizo, ukwenzelelana ngendlela ekhethayo, ukuba nguhlohlesakhe nokuthoba ngemilenze imali karhulumente.
zul: ngaphansi kwalo mkhandlu, sizosebenzisana nabaholi bama-soe ukuthuthukisa imithetho nemithethonqubo ezogqugquzela ukusetshenziswa kwezindlela ezintsha zesimanjemanje ezihambisana nokukhalipha okukhulu futhi kwenziwe ngcono nekhono namandla okuncintisana kwalezi zinkampani nezimbangi zazo kwezebhizinisi.

xho: sifuna abasebenzi bakarhulumente abanezakhono ezikumgangatho ophezulu nabaziphatha ngendlela esulungekileyo nenesimilo - nabazinikele ngokugqibeleleyo ekusebenzeleni urhulumente.
zul: sizokwakhela phezu komsebenzi osuqalisiwe kakade okuhloswe ngawo ukuxazulula izinkinga zokungaphathi ngendlela efanele, nokuhluleka ukusebenza ngobunyoninco kanye nezinkinga eziphathelene nokusimama ngakwezezimali.

xho: amanyathelo angqingqwa esiwathathileyo ukulwa ingxaki yokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane ngamashishini abucala norhwaphilizo, aquka namanyathelo okuqasha izikhulu ezifanelekileyo kwigunyabantu lezotshutshiso (i-npa), icandelo elikhethekileyo lokuphanda (i-siu), iziko lezerhafu lomzantsi afrika (i-sars) kunye ne-arhente yokhuseleko lwelizwe, aza neziphumo ezincumisayo.
zul: sizibophezele ekwakheni umbuso olandela izinkambiso zokusebenza ngobuqotho lapho ingekho nakancane inkohlakalo, ukwenzelela, ukuzicebisa ngokungemthetho, kanye nokweba imali kahulumeni.

xho: sicele umlawuli kazwelonke wegunyabantu lezotshutshiso (i-ndpp) ukuba aqulunqe isicwangciso esineenkcukacha ngokuqashwa kwabantu nokwenza i-npa ibe nolwamvila, kuquka nokuqinisekisa ukuba icandelo loonothimba liyasifaka isabhokhwe.
zul: sifuna ukuba neqembu labasebenzi bakahulumeni abanekhono, abasebenza ngobungoti futhi abenza umsebenzi wabo ngobuqotho obukhulu futhi abazinikele emsebenzini wabo wokusebenzela umphakathi.

xho: kufuneka siqinisekise ukuba imali karhulumente ebiweyo iyabuyiswa ize isetyenziselwe iinkonzo kunye neziseko ezingundoqo ezifuneka ngamandla kwiindawo zabantu abangathathi ntweni.
zul: seziqalile ukukhiqiza imiphumela emihle futhi esemqoka izinyathelo esizithathile zokuqeda ukubanjwa ngobhongwane kombuso kanye nokulwisana nenkohlakalo, kubandakanya nezinyathelo zokuqinisa uphiko lukazwelonke lwezokushushisa (i-npa), uphiko lokuphenywa kwamacala akhethekile (i-siu), uphiko lokuqoqwa kwentela lwaseningizimu afrika (i-sars) kanye nenhlangano kahulumeni yezokuvikela.

xho: silindele ukuba inkundla eyodwa ye-siu esanda kuvulwa iza kuqala ukusebenza kwezi nyanga zimbalwa zizayo ukuze amabango oluntu avele kuphando olwenziwa yi-siu akhawuleze aqukunjelwe, ekungoku nje aqikelelwe ukuba axabisa malunga neebhiliyoni ezili-14,7 zeerandi.
zul: sesinxuse umqondisi kazwelonke wezokushushiswa komphakathi (i-ndpp) ukuthi athuthukise uhlelo oluzophucula futhi luthuthukise kakhudlwana amandla okusebenza kanye nobunyoninco be-npa, kubandakanya nokuqinisekisa ukuthi uqhutshwa kahle futhi ngobunono umsebenzi wokudliwa kwempahla etholakale ezenzweni zobugebengu nenkohlakalo.

xho: umzantsi afrika uza kuqhubeleka ukudlala indima emandla kwimiba yezobudlelwane bamazwe ehlabathi ngeenjongo zokulwela uxolo nokhuseleko kwihlabathi, uphuhliso olukhokelwa ngabantu namathamsanqa kuye wonke umntu.
zul: kumele siqinisekise ukuthi iyabuyiswa imali kahulumeni entshontshiwe ukuze isetshenziselwe ukuhlinzeka izidingo-ngqangi kanye nengqalasizinda eyisisekelo edingeka kakhulu emiphakathini edla imbuya ngothi.

xho: sizimisele nangakumbi ukusebenzisana namazwe ehlabathi ukuze kugcinwe futhi kukhuselwe le mibutho yokusebenzisana kwamazwe omhlaba ahlukeneyo ikhokelwa ngumbutho wezizwe ezimanyeneyo (i-un).
zul: sibheke ukuthi inkantolo entsha ekhethekile ye-siu iqale umsebenzi wayo kulezi zinyanga ezimbalwa ezizayo ngenhloso yokusheshisa amacala okudliwa kwempahla ahlobene nophenyo lwe-siu, njengamanje alinganiselwa kwinani-bungako elingamabhiliyoni ayi-14.7 amarandi.

xho: siza kusebenzisa esi sikhundla sethu sokuba lilungu lebhunga lezokhuseleko le-un (i-unsc) sikhuthaze ukuba iingxwaba-ngxwaba neembambano zisonjululwe ngoxolo, ingakumbi ezo zikweli lizwekazi lethu.
zul: iningizimu afrika izoqhubeka nokudlala indima esemqoka kwezobudlelwane bamazwe omhlaba emizamweni yokuqinisekisa ukuthula nokuvikeleka emhlabeni, intuthuko egxile kubantu kanye nokuchuma nokuphumelela kwabantu bonke.

xho: bantu bakuthi, ukuba siza kufikelela kulo mzantsi afrika siwunqwenelayo, kufuneka sibe nesivumelwano sokusebenzisana.
zul: siyakuvuselela ukuzibophezela kwethu ekusebenzisaneni okuhle namazwe omhlaba ngenhloso yokugcina nokuvikela uhlelo lokubambisana nokusebenzisana kwamazwe ngamazwe olusekelwe phezu kwemithetho ebekiwe, oluholwa yinhlangano yezizwe (i-un).

xho: urhulumente makadale iimeko eziza kukhuthaza oku, asebenzise iziseko nezixhobo zikarhulumente ngobulumko aze atyale imali neziseko kumaphulo okuphuhlisa izakhono zabantu beli lizwe.
zul: sizosebenzisa isikhundla sethu njengelungu lomkhandlu wezokuvikela we-un, (i-unsc), ukugqugquzela imizamo yokuxazulula izingxabano ngokuthula, ikakhulukazi kwizwekazi lase-afrika bantu bakithi, ukuze sikwazi ukufinyelela kuhlobo lweningizimu afrika esiyifisayo, sidinga isivumelwano sokusebenzisana nokubambisana esisha.

xho: sifuna amashishini azithathele ingqalelo iinjongo ezibalulekileyo zesizwe kunye nezinto eziza kuba lulutho kuluntu xa ethatha izigqibo namanyathelo.
zul: kudingeka ukuthi sakhe ubambiswano oluqinile phakathi kukahulumeni, abasebenzi, imiphakathi kanye nezinhlangano zomphakathi.

xho: siyavuma ukuba imibutho yabasebenzi kufuneka ilwele amalungelo abasebenzi kodwa kufuneka ikwenze oku ikwazi nokubaluleka kozinzo kumashishini nokudalwa kwemisebenzi.
zul: uhulumeni kumele akhe isimo esifanelekile, azisebenzise ngobuhlakani izinsiza nezimali zakhe futhi atshale izimali ekuthuthukiseni abasebenzi baleli lizwe.

xho: imibutho yoluntu kufuneka iqhubeleke idlala indima emandla ekunyanzeliseni urhulumente ukuba aphendule ngemisebenzi yakhe kodwa nayo kufuneka ibhinqe omfutshane incedise kwimisebenzi esiyenzayo ukufezekisa ezi njongo sizifuna sonke.
zul: kungaba yinto enhle impela uma abamabhizinisi bengazibhekelela izinjongo zezwe ezisemqoka kanye nezidingo zomphakathi ngenkathi bethatha izinqumo kanye nezinyathelo zabo.

xho: sijonge kumaqela alapha kule palamente ukuba nawo adlale indima emandla kule ntsebenziswano, anike inkxaso, iingcebiso kunye nezisombululo ezibambekayo nakumaphulo aza kunceda kwizinto ezilulutho kwisizwe.
zul: siyavuma ukuthi izinyunyana zabasebenzi kumele zilwele amalungelo abasebenzi, futhi kusenjalo, zigqugquzele ukusimama kwamabhizinisi nokwakhiwa kwamathuba omsebenzi.

xho: esi sivumelwano sentsebenziswano sifuna ukuba wonke umntu aphose igade.
zul: izinhlangano zomphakathi wonkana kumele ziqhubeke nokudlala indima yazo yokuqinisekisa ukuthi uhulumeni uyaphendula ngemisebenzi yakhe, kodwa futhi kumele zihlanganyele nathi ekuthatheni izinyathelo eziphathekayo okuhloswe ngazo ukufezekisa izinjongo zethu sonke.

xho: siza kufuna ukuba abantu beli lizwe benze u-ina-ethe, zibe khona izinto abakhetha ukuzincama.
zul: sinethemba lokuthi amaqembu amelwe kuleli phalamende azoba yingxenye esemqoka kulolu bambiswano, futhi alekelele, ahlinzeke ngemibono enohlonze nemiqondo ebonisa ubuhlakani obukhulu futhi aqhamuke nezixazululo kanye nemizamo ephathekayo ngenhloso yokuhlomulisa izwe lonkana.

xho: ukuba sifuna i-ndp ibe yimpumelelo kufuneka singajongi nje apha phambi kweenyawo zethu, amehlo masiwaphose kude phaya.
zul: futhi sidinga ukuzidela kanye nokuhlangabezana phakathi, ukuze kube khona ukuvumelana nokusebenzisana okuhle.

xho: sifuna umzantsi afrika apho wonke umntu ahlala kamnandi futhi engesosisulu sentsokolo.
zul: impumelelo yomuntu wonke incike kwindlela aziphatha ngayo omunye nomunye wethu.

xho: sifuna umzantsi afrika apho sonke siza kwenza konke okusemandleni ethu njengoko sithe ngcembe kwindlela eya empumelelweni.
zul: ukuze sikwazi ukuvuselela nokufaka ugqozi nofuqufuqu ekuqalisweni kwe-ndp, kumele siqinisekise ukuthi amehlo ethu ahlala ethe njo phambili lapho siphokophele khona.

xho: sinombono womzantsi afrika owukhokelisa phambili umba wokwakhiwa kweziporo zoololiwe, owenza oololiwe bale mihla abanesantya esiphezulu abaphuma bengena kwizixeko ezikhulukazi zeli, nditsho nezo zikwiindawo ezisemalandalahla zeli.
zul: sifuna iningizimu afrika lapho wonke muntu ezophila kamnandi futhi ahlale ngokunethezeka, akhombe ngophakathi.

xho: kufuneka sibe nombono welizwe apho oololiwe bale mihla ababaleka okweentolo benza utshe begqitha erhawutini besuka apha phofu belisingise emusina, baze beme ebuffalo city bephuma ethekwini bebuyela apha ekapa.
zul: kodwa-ke futhi sifuna iningizimu afrika lapho sizokwazi ukusebenzisa ngokuphelele amandla namakhono ethu ngenkathi siqhubeka endleleni ephokophele phambili.

xho: sifuna umzantsi afrika onoqoqosho olusebenzisa ubuxhakaxhaka bezinga eliphezulu apho ezempilo zisebenzisa i-intanethi, i-robotics kunye nezonyango ezisebenzisa ubuchwepheshe bale mihla njengoko siza kube siqalisa ukusebenzisa i-nhi.
zul: sifuna iningizimu afrika ebeke eqhulwini izinhlelo zayo zokuthutha ngesitimela futhi okuyizinhlelo ezikhiziqa izitimela ezihamba ngesivinini esikhulu ezizoxhumanisa amadolobhakazi ethu nezindawo zasemakhaya ezisemajukujukwini ezwe lethu.

xho: sinqwenela umzantsi afrika ongazithathi nje iimveliso zawo ezingasetyenziswanga uzithumele kumazwe angaphandle koko oliziko lale mihla lokuvelisa nelemizi-mveliso evelisa ubuxhaka-xhaka be-intanethi neekhompyutha kunye neentsimbi zeemoto.
zul: kumele sizibone ngamehlo engqondo sesiphila ezweni lapho izitimela ezihamba ngesivinini esikhulu zidlula egoli ziphokophele e-musina, futhi lapho zifika e-buffalo city zithi ukuma kancane, zivela ethekwini, sezibuyela emuva lapha edolobheni lasekapa.

xho: kufuneka sibe sisizwe esikwaziyo ukuzondla, esithatha sisebenzise ubuxhakaxhaka bezinga eliphezulu kulimo lwale mihla.
zul: sifuna iningizimu afrika enomnotho ogxile kubuchwepheshe besimanjemanje lapho sisebenzisa khona izindlela-kusebenza zezempilo ezihlinzekwa ngohlelo-kusebenza lwe-inthanethi, nama-robotics kanye nokwelashwa okuhlinzekwa ezigulini ezikude kwezindawo zokwelapha, ngenkathi siqalisa ukusebenza kwe-nhi.

xho: ndinephupha lomzantsi afrika apho isixeko esitsha tsha esakhiwe emva kokuba eli lizwe lifumene inkululeko, esinezakhiwo ezingokrwec'izulu, izikolo, iidyunivesiti, izibhedlele neefektri.
zul: sifuna iningizimu afrika engagcini nje kuphela ngokuthumela kwamanye amazwe imikhiqizo engakalungiswa, kepha eyisizinda esisezingeni lomhlaba sokukhiqizwa kwezingxenye ezisemqoka ezisetshenziswa kuma-elekthronikhi, ezimotweni kanye nakumakhompyutha.

xho: eli liphupha thina sonke esinokulifunqula, sithathe inxaxheba kumaphulo okulizalisekisa.
zul: kumele sibe yizwe elikwaziyo ukuzondla futhi lokhu sikwenze ngokusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe besimanjemanje kwezolimo.

xho: isixeko saserhawutini, etshwane, ekapa nesasethekewini ziphelelwa ngumhlaba eziza kuhlalisa kuwo abantu abagxalathelanayo besiya ezidolophini.
zul: kuyiphupho lami ukubona iningizimu afrika lapho kwakhiwa idolobha elisha sha esikhathini sombuso wentando yeningi labantu, elinamabhilidi amade, izikole, amanyuvesi, izibhedlela kanye namafemu.

xho: sisisizwe somzantsi afrika esisebenzisa umgaqo-siseko waso sinike ithemba abo bebesele bencamile, amalungelo kwabo bazintswela namajacu, ukhuseleko nolonwabo kumadoda, oomama nabantwana.
zul: amadolobha anjengegoli, i-tshwane, ikapa kanye netheku aseqala ukuphelelwa yindawo yokuhlalisa bonke abantu abafudukela ngobuningi emadolobheni.

xho: nangona zikhona iindawo esithe sagqwidiza kuzo, asizilibalanga ukuba singoobani, nokuba simele ntoni na.
zul: ingabe asikafiki yini isikhathi sokuthi sibonise isibindi futhi senze lokho ebesingacabangi neze ukuthi singaba namandla okukwenza?

xho: into endivuselele ithemba kukuhla ndinyuka nabantu beli lizwe - oomongikazi noonompilo, amajoni namapolisa, ootitishala ezikolweni zethu, abafundi abathi nakuba baphuma kumakhaya ahlwempuzekileyo kodwa abanamaphupha empumelelo, nabantu abatsha abatabalazayo bezama ukuziqalale awabo amashishini, bayile beqamba izinto ezintsha bezama ukuzonyula kwiinzima abakhula nabaphila phantsi kwazo.
zul: thina siyisizwe saseningizimu afrika, esikwaziyo ukuthi ngomthethosisekelo waso, sibuyise ithemba esimweni lapho belingasekho nelincane ithemba, esikwaziyo ukuhlinzeka ngamalungelo kubantu ababephucwe konke okungokwabo basala bengondinga sithebeni, futhi siyisizwe elikwaziyo ukuhlinzeka ngokunethezeka nokuvikeleka kubo bonke abantu balo, amadoda, abesifazane kanye nezingane.

xho: nini abandinika ithemba nomdla wokungcambaza ndiye phambili, nam ndithi kuni nani ngcambazani.
zul: nakuba kukhona lapho sihlulekile ukwenza izinto ngendlela efanele kanye nalapho siphelelwe khona wugqozi nofuqufuqu, asikazikhohlwa ukuthi singobani futhi asikakhohlwa ukuthi simeleni.

zul: nginethemba ngoba sengihambe ibanga elide nabantu baleli lizwe – abahlengikazi kanye nabasebenzi bezempilo, amaphoyisa namasosha, othisha ezikoleni zethu abafundi abazimisele ukuphumelela nakuba bebhekene nobunzima nenhlupheko emakhaya, kanye nentsha ezama ukuzisungulela amabhizinisi, ezama ukuqamba nokwakha izinto ezitsha, futhi eyenza konke okusemandleni ayo ukuphumelela ngaphansi kwezimo ezinzima ehlangabezana nazo.

xho: sekuyiminyaka engama-30 wakhululwayo waphuma ezihambela ngaphandle kwamasango entolongo i-victor verster unelson rholihlahla mandela, into leyo yabonakalisa ngokuphandle ukuba inkululeko ngenene ifikile kweli lizwe.
zul: sekuyiminyaka engama-30 selokhu u-nelson rolihlala mandela akhululwa ejele i-victor verster, okungumzuzu emlandweni wethu ogqame kakhulu kuneminye inkululeko eke yaba nawo njengamanje.

xho: njengoko wayemi kwiholo lesixeko sasekapa ethetha ebhekisa kwinginginya ayayiphume ngobuninzi ukuza kumamkela, wathi:“indlela yethu eya enkululekweni ayisenakujikwa.
zul: ngesikhathi eme kuvulandi ophezulu ehholo ledolobha lasekapa ukuzokhuluma nezinkumbi zabantu ababefike ngezinkulungwane ngezinkulungwane ukuzomamukela, wathi:'indlela yethu eya enkululekweni ayijiki.

xho: akufuneki ukuba sivumele uloyiko novalo lume endleleni yethu,”ngoku, yiminyaka engama-30 ukususela ngoko, njengokuba siqhuba ngohambo lwethu oluya phambili ukuphucula ubomi babantu bakuthi, njengokuba siqubisana nemingeni emikhulu, njengokuba sinyamezela amaxesha eenkathazo, nathi asikwazi ukuvumela ukuba uloyiko novalo lume endleleni yethu.
zul: akumele sivumele ukusaba kume endleleni yethu.

xho: kufuneka siqine siqhubele phambili, singavumeli iinzima neentandabuzo ukuba zisiphazamise.
zul: 'njengamanje, emva kweminyaka engama-30, sisaqhubeka nokuya phambili ukwenza ngcono izimpilo zabantu bakithi, sisabhekana nezingqinamba, sisabekezelela izikhathi ezinzima, nathi-ke angeke sivumele ukusaba kume endleleni yethu.

xho: njengokuba sithe nqwadalala apha ukukhangela ubume besizwe sethu, sinenyhweba yokuba sibe nosapho lukabasil february apha phakathi kwethu, igorha lomzabalazo wenkululeko elathi laphulukana nobomi balo liselula ngethuba ledabi lasewankie, i-wankie campaign, lowe-1967 ezimbabwe.
zul: njengoba sihlangane ukuzobuka isimo sezwe lethu, sihlanganyele nomndeni ka-basil february, iqhawe lenkululeko elinesibindi elashona ezimbabwe emkhankasweni i-wankie ngonyaka we-1967.

xho: kusisithuba esingangeminyaka engama-50, amathambo akhe engaziwa apho angcwatywa khona, njengamanye amaqabane wakhe, nawo angaziwayo ukuba angcwatyelwa phi na, kuba engekaziwa nanamhlanje oku.
zul: eminyakeni engama-50 indawo lapho elele khona, njengamanye amaqabane, kuze kube manje, ayaziwa.

xho: igalelo lakhe, ukuzenza kwakhe idini, zange kwalibalekangolu rhatya, sihlangene apha sithobekile xa sikhumbula amaqhawe namaqhawekazi eli athi anikezela ngobomi bawo esilwela inkululeko yethu, siluqonda kakuhle uxanduva olukhulu esinalo lokufezekisa amaphupha wabo.
zul: igalelo lakhe, ukuzinikelela kwakhe, akukaze kushaywe indiva.

xho: kukho amaxesha apho siye sasilela khona, kukho amaxesha apho siye saphazama khona kodwa ke sihleli singagungqi ekuzimiseleni ukwakha isizwe esikhululekileyo nesilinganayo nesinoxolo.
zul: kusihlwa nje, sihlangene lapha sithotshwe izinkumbulo zalawo madoda nabafazi abanikelela ngezimpilo zabo enkululekweni yethu, sisazi kahle isibophezelo esikhulu esisiphethe sokufezekisa amaphupho abo.

xho: imbali yethu isixelela ukuba xa simanyene eluxolweni kwaye sinethemba, singoyisa yonke imiqobo size siguqule ilizwe lethu libe yindawo apho sonke siziva sikhululekile, sikhuselekile futhi sihleli kamnandi.
zul: kunezikhathi la siphelelwa khona, kunezikhathi lapho senza amaphutha, kodwa siyaqhubeka nokungashukumiseki empokophelweni yethu yokwakha umphakathi okhululekile, olinganayo nonokuthula.

xho: siqubisana nezi ngxaki zikhoyo ngoku siqamele ngaloo moya.
zul: kungaloyo moya njengamanje sizobhekana nesimo samanje.

xho: ilizwe lethu lijongene kanye emehlweni nezi ngxaki.
zul: izwe lethu libhekene neqiniso elibabayo.

xho: uqoqosho lweli lizwe khange likhule ngazinga libheke phi kwisithuba esingaphezu kweminyaka elishumi.
zul: umnotho wethu awukakhuli ngezinga elifanelekile eminyakeni engaphezu kweyishumi.

xho: nangona ukho umnconwana wemisebenzi evelayo, ingxaki yokunqaba kwemisebenzi iya ithatha unyawo.
zul: noma imisebenzi yakhiwa, izinga lokungasebenzi liyaqhubeka nokukhuphuka.

xho: uhlumo loqoqosho lweli lizwe luyelwema ngxi njengoko ingxaki yokunqongophala kombane iphazamisa amashishini nobomi babantu.
zul: ukusimama komnotho wethu kumile ngenxa yokuthi ukushoda kwamandla ogesi okubelesele kuphazamisa amabhizinisi kanye nezimpilo zabantu.

xho: amaqumrhu aliqela karhulumente (ii-soe) asengxakini, kwaye imali yombuso ijongene neengxaki ezininzi.
zul: amabhizinisi amaningana kahulumeni asosizini, nezimali zikahulumeni wethu zingaphansi kwengcindezi enkulu.

xho: nini, bantu bomzantsi afrika, abathwala lomthwalo, bajongane nokunyuka kwamaxabiso, intswela-ngqesho, ukungakwazi ukuphuma kwintlupheko, ukungakwazi ukuzalisekisa amaphupha enu.
zul: yinina, abantu baseningizimu afrika, enithwele lomthwalo, enibhekene nezindleko zokuphila ezikhuphukayo, ukungabikho kwemisebenzi, ukungakwazi ukubalekela inhlupheko, ukungakwazi ukubonisa okwazi ukukwenza.

xho: kanti, kwangaxeshanye, kusekho enye inxalenye yenyaniso yethu.
zul: okwamanje, ngasikhathi sinye, kunenye ingxenye eqinisweni lethu.

xho: yinyaniso yokuba abantu abatsha abaninzi kunangaphambili basesikolweni kwaye siyazibona iziphumo ezincumisayo kwizifundo zabo.
zul: iqiniso lenani labantu abasha abafinyelela kalula kwezemfundo ukudlula phambilini futhi abathola imiphumela elokhu iba ngcono.

xho: yinyaniso yokuba abantwana abazizigidi ezi-2.4 bafunda kwizikolo-mpeleso neekritshi.
zul: iqiniso lezingane eziyisigidi ezi-2.4 ezisezindaweni zokukhulisa izingane ezincane nasezinkulisa.

xho: bamalunga nama-81% abafundi abaphumelele ibanga lematriki kulo nyaka uphelileyo, kwaye abafundi abaninzi kwaba basuka kwizikolo zasemaphandleni nasezilokishini.
zul: balinganiselwa kumaphesenti angama-81 abafundi abaphase umatikuletsheni ngonyaka odlule, nenani elandayo eliqhamuka ezikoleni zasemakhaya naselokishini.

xho: lo msebenzi mhle kangaka, wenzeka ngenxa yabantwana abebefunda kwibanga le-12 ngowama-2019.
zul: ngale mpumelelo enkulu, sishayela ihlombe abafundi bangowezi-2019.

xho: elinye inqaku eliyinyani kukuba ngabafundi abangama-720.000 abathe bafumana inkxaso-mali kurhulumente abafunda kwiikholeji zemfundo yamakhondo nobuchwepheshe noqeqesho (ii-tvet) kunye needyunivesithi kulo nyaka uphelileyo.
zul: iqiniso futhi ukuthi kunabafundi abayizi-720 000 abathole ukuxhaswa nguhulumeni ukufunda emakolishi amakhono nobuchwepheshe kanye nasemanyuvesi ngonyaka owedlule.

xho: bamalunga nezigidi ezi-6.8 abantu basemzantsi afrika abazaziyo isimo sabo sentsholongwane kagawulayo (i-hiv), malunga nezigidi ezihlanu zabantu abaqaliswe kunyango lwamachiza esithomalalisi sikagawulayo (ii-arv) ize isi-4.2 zezigidi zabantu abo umthalo we-hiv ungabonakaliyo ngenxa yoko.
zul: sikhuluma ngabantu baseningizimu afrika abangaba yizigidi eziyi-6.8 abasaziyo isimo sabo sesandulelangculazi, bangaba izigidi ezi-5 abantu asebeqaliswe imishanguzo yokudambisa isandulelangculazi kanye nabayizigidi ezi-4.2 abantu ngenxa yalokhu, ubungako begciwane egazini labo, abubonakali.

xho: ayingomanani nje la angathethi nto.
zul: lezi akuzona izibalo nje.

xho: koko ngumzekelo wezinto esizenzayo ukuphucula ubomi babantu abaninzi beli lizwe.
zul: lezi izimpilo zabantu bakuleli ezenziwe ngcono.

xho: zimpawu zenkqubela.
zul: kuyizimpawu zenqubekelaphambili.

xho: into eyinyani ngeli lizwe kukuba sonke sithanda singantinga siyokunqandwa zinkwenkwezi.
zul: iqiniso esinalo futhi kungokunye esinamandla okukwenza ngokungenamkhawulo.

xho: kukuba sisizwe esinomhlaba otyebileyo ngezimbiwa nangeeintlobontlobo zezityalo nezilwanyana futhi asinantanga kwihlabathi liphela ngobu butyebi.
zul: umhlaba onothe ngokumbiwa phansi kanye nokuhlukahlukana kwempilo yezitshalo nezilwane esingawulinganisa nengcosana emhlabeni.

xho: sisisizwe esityebileyo ngezimali, esineziseko zophuhliso ezininzi, imithetho engqingqwa kunye namaziko azinzileyo.
zul: isizinda esijulile somnotho, izingqalasizinda ezibanzi, imithetho enengqondo kanye nezikhungo eziqinileyo.

xho: bobabantu abazizityebi, abantlobontlobo, abatsha nabaneziphiwo.
zul: abantu abanothile, abahlukahlukene, abasebasha futhi abanamakhono.

xho: ngokuhlwa nje, uzozibini tunzi olapha phakathi kwethu namhlanje, nothe waphumelela isithsaba sokuba ngu-miss universe usisikhumbuzo samandla wethu okugqwesa okugqithisileyo phantsi kwayo nayiphi na imeko.
zul: ngalo busuku, sihlanganyele kanye nozozibini tunzi, ukwethwesa kwakhe isicoco sikazime womhlaba kuyisikhumbuzo kwamandla esinawo ukuzuza okukhulu simelene nezingqinamba.

xho: kwakhona samkela ikapteni yamabhoko-bhoko usiya kolisi, nothe wakhokelela iqela labemi bomzantsi afrika abazimiseleyo nabamanyeneyo ekubeni babe ziintshatsheli zehlabathi zowama-2019 zebhola yomboxo.
zul: samukela futhi ukaputeni wamabhokobhoko (springbok) u-siya kolisi, owahola iqembu elinempokophelo nelibumbene laseningizimu afrika ukuba abanqobi bomhlaba bebhola lombhoxo ngowezi-2019.

xho: ngokuhlwa nje kukwakho omnye umntu omtsha obalulekileyo apha phakathi kwethu, lowo ngunksz sinoyolo qumba, nongumfundi webanga le-11 wase-lenasia south, ochithe imini yayizolo encedisana nam ukubhala le ntetho ingobume besizwe (sona).
zul: kulobu busuku sihlanganyele nomunye umuntu osemncane omangalisayo, unksz sinoyolo qumba, umfundi webanga le-11 wase-lenasia south, ochithe isikhathi esiningi sayizolo engisiza ukubhala lenkulumo ngesimo sezwe.

xho: ubukrelekrele bakhe, ulwazi lwakhe ngokwezentlalo, intumekelelo anayo nenkuthalo yakhe indinika ithemba elikhulu ngekamva leli lizwe.
zul: ubuhlakani bakhe, ulwazi lwakhe ngomphakathi, intshisekelo yakhe kanye nenkuthalo yakhe kunginika ukuziqhenya okukhulu ngekusasa lale lizwe.

xho: kwintetho zam zokuqala ezimbini zesizwe ndathetha kakhulu malunga nokumanyanisa abantu, kunye noxanduva olukhulu esilithweleyo njengorhulumente lokuqhuba intsebenziswano nokuvisisana.
zul: ezinkulumweni zami zokuqala ezimbili ezibhekiswe esizweni ngakhuluma kabanzi ngesidingo sokuhlangana komphakathi, kanye nesibophezelo esikhulu esisemahlombe ethu njengohulumeni ukuqhubela phambili ukusebenzisana kanye nokuvumelana.

xho: ngowe-1994, sakhetha indlela yothethathethwano, ukophulelana nesivumelwano soxolo endaweni yentiyo nempindezelo.
zul: ngonyaka we-1994 sakhetha indlela yokuxoxisana, ukuzehlisa nokuvumelana okunokuthula, kunenzondo nokubuyisela.

xho: imbali yethu namava wethu okwangoku asifundisa ukuba ukuze siphumelele koko sizimisela ukwenza, kufuneka sigxile koko kusimanyanisayo kunoko kusahlulayo.
zul: umlando wethu kanye nesidlula kukho njengamanje kusifundise ukuthi uma sifuna ukuphumelela kulokhu esizibekele ukukwenza, kumele sibheke kulokhu okuhlanganisayo kunalokho okuhlukanisayo.

xho: awona mandla makhulu olawulo lwethu lwentando yesininzi olukumgaqo- siseko, nesizathu osinyamezeleyo, kungokuba sikwazile ulungiselela indibanisela ezibanzi nomanyanisa abantu, nokuba yeyezoshishino, yezabasebenzi, amaqela anomdla akhethekileyo okanye uluntu ngokubanzi.
zul: amandla amakhulu entando yeningi labantu yomthethosisekelo wethu, nesizathu esenza ubekezelelwe, ingenxa yokuthi sikwazile ukuqhubela phambili imifelandawonye esabalele nezivumelwano zomphakathi, kungaba namabhizinisi, abasebenzi, abantu abanentshisekelo efanayo noma umphakathi jikelele.

xho: ukuphumeza ukuvumelana nokwakha umanyano lwabantu asingomboniso wobutyhakala.
zul: ukufika esivumelwaneni nokwakha izivumelwano zomphakathi akukona ukutshengisa ubuthaka.

xho: kusisiseko soko sikuko.
zul: kuyingqikithi yokuthi singobani, njengabantu baseningizimu afrika.

xho: kungoko kule minyaka mibini idlulileyo besihleli sisebenza nzima sifuna ukulungiselela nokwakha imvumelwano malunga nesicwangciso sokuvuselela uqoqosho lwethu.
zul: yingakho eminyakeni emibili edlule besisebenza kanzima sifuna ukuqhubela phambili futhi sakhe isivumelwano ngohlelo lwethu lokutakula umnotho.

xho: kwintetho yakhe yokuqala njengomongameli ngomhla we-10 kucanzibe wowe-1994, umongameli unelson mandela wathi: “namhlanje singena kumnqophiso wokuba sizokwakha isizwe apho wonke umntu wasemzantsi afrika, omnyama nomhlophe, bayakukwazi ukunyathelela phezulu, ngaphandle koloyiko ezintliziyweni zabo beqinisekile ngelungelo labo elingena kususwa lesidima sobuntu.”lo rhulumente uhleli ezinikele ngokungenambaliso ekuwugcineni loo mnqophiso.
zul: enkulumweni yokugcotshwa kwakhe mhla ziyi-10 kunhlaba ngonyaka we-1994, umongameli u-nelson mandela wathi:“namuhla singena esivumelwaneni sokuthi kumele sakhe umphakathi wonke umuntu waseningizimu afrika, abansundu nabamhlophe, bazokwazi ukuhamba ngokuziqhenya, ngaphandle kokwesaba ezinhliziyweni zabo, baqinisekiswe ngelungelo labo abangeke baphucwe lona lesithunzi somuntu.”lo hulumeni usalokhu uzinikele ngokungephikiswe ukweseka leso sivumelwano.

xho: ngumnqophiso omilisele nzulu kweenjongo zobuchule zesicwangciso sophuhliso sesizwe (i-ndp), esinjongo zazo ikukuncothula indlala nokunciphisa ukungalingani ngowama-2030.
zul: isivumelwano esimiswe enhlosweni yamasu ohlelo lokuthuthukisa izwelonke, okuhloswe ngalo ukuqeda inhlupheko nokunciphisa ukungalingani ngonyaka wezi-2030.

xho: makhe sithi siyavumelana ukuba urhulumente akanako ukusombulula yonke imingeni yethu yoqoqoqsho eyedwa.
zul: ake sivume ngokungananazi ukuthi uhulumeni angeke axazulule izinselelo zomnotho wethu eyedwa.

xho: nokuba besinokucwangcisa umthombo ngamnye okhoyo phambi kwethu, size singene kwinkcitho enkulu yeemali zikarhulumente, besingenako ukuthi sisedwa siqinisekise ngemisebenze kwizigidi ngezigidi zabantu abangaphangeliyo.
zul: noma besingahlanganisa zonke izinsiza esinazo, siphinde sizifake ezindlekweni ezinkulu zemali yomphakathi, angeke sisodwa sakwazi ukuqinisekisa umsebenzi kubantu abayizigidi abangasebenzi.

xho: yonke into esiyizuzileyo sayiphumelela, oko sikwenze ngokubambisana.
zul: esesikuzuzile, sikuzuze sisonke.

xho: kule minyaka mibini idlulileyo – ukususela ngoko ndandiqala ukunikezela i-sona – sisebenzile ukulungiselela umanyano phakathi kwabantu basemzantsi afrika ukuhlangabezana noninzi lwemingeni ephambi kwethu.
zul: eminyakeni emibili edlule - selokhu ngaqala ukuma lapha ukuzokwethula inkulumo ngesimo sezwe - sesisebenzile ukwakha izivumelwano phakathi kwabantu baseningizimu afrika ukubhekana nezinselelo eziphambi kwethu.

xho: ngengqungquthela yemisebenzi, sidibanise imibutho yabasebenzi, abezoshishino, urhulumente kunye nemibutho yoluntu ndawonye ukufumana isisombululo kwingxaki enkulu yentswela-ngqesho, kwaye siyaqhubeka ukudibana ekuqaleni kwenyanga nganye, usekela mongameli kunye nam, ukususa imiqobo nokuqhuba ungenelelo oluya kukhusela luze ludale imisebenzi.
zul: ngezingqungquthela zemisebenzi, silethe umsebenzi, ibhizinisi, uhulumeni nemiphakathi bendawonye ukuthola izisombululo kulolu sizi lokuswelakala kwemisebenzi, futhi siyaqhubeka ukuhlangana ekuqaleni kwanyangazonke, iphini likamongameli kanye nami ukususa izithiyo nokuqhuba phambili izingenelelo ezizokonga futhi zakhe imisebenzi.

xho: siye sahlangana, njengorhulumente nemibutho yoluntu, njengoluntu kunye namaqela ezenkolo, ukujongana nobundlobongela obenziwa ngamadoda kwasetyhini.
zul: sesihlangane ndawonye, njengohulumeni nomphakathi, imiphakathi nezinhlangano zezenkolo, ukubhekana ngqo nenye inselelo enkulu ewudlame olwenziwa amadoda kwabesifazane.

xho: sihlanganise abezoshishino, abasebenzi kunye norhulumente ndawonye ukuqulunqa izicwangciso ezingundoqo zalo mashishini anamandla amakhulu okuqhuba uhlumo.
zul: sesihlanganise abezamabhizinisi, ezabasebenzi nohulumeni ukuza namasu amahle alezi zimboni ezinamandla amakhulu okukhula.

xho: sihlangene njengamaqoqo ahlukeneyo karhulumente, njengamaqumrhu ohlukeneyo karhulumente, njengemibutho yezoshishino kunye namaqela oluntu phantsi kwenkqubo entsha yophuhliso ekhokelwa zizithili (i-ddm) esiguqula ngokusisiseko indlela esiqubisana ngayo nophuhliso koomasipala.
zul: sihlanganyele ndawonye njengemikhakha eyehlukene kahulumeni, njengezinhlaka ezehlukene zombuso, njengezinhlangano zamabhizinisi kanye namaqembu omphakathi ngaphansi kohlelo olusha lokuthuthukiswa kwesifunda oluyisisekelo sokushintsha indlela esibhekana ngayo nokuthuthukiswa kwasekhaya.

xho: besisoloko sisakha umanyano lwabantu kuba kungobudlelwane nentsebenziswano ukuba siqhubele phambili.
zul: besilokhu sakha izivumelwano zomphakathi ngoba kungokubambisana nokusebenzisana ukuthi singaqhubekela phambili.

xho: sisonke, kule minyaka mibini idlulileyo, sisebenzele ukuzisa uzinzo kuqoqosho lweli lizwe saze sakha isisekelo sohlumo.
zul: sindawonye, eminyakeni emibili edlule, sisebenze ukuletha uzinzo emnothweni wethu nokwakha isisekelo sokukhula.

xho: senze ngabomi ukwakha amaziko nokususa imiqobo ethintela utyalo-mali.
zul: sesibenenhloso ukuphinda sakhe izikhungo sibuye sisuse izithiyo kutshalomali.

xho: sithathe amanyathelo angqongqo ukulwa ukubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwana saze salwa norhwaphilizo.
zul: sibhekane ngendlela efanele ukumelana nokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane nokulwa nenkohlakalo.

xho: silinyuse ngokubonakalayo inani labantwana abangena esikolweni, , siwuphucule umgagatho weenkonzo zezempilo futhi sazithathela ingqalelo iimfuno ezingundoqo zabahluphekileyo.
zul: siqhubekile sathuthukisa ukufinyelela emfundweni, sathuthukisa izinga kwezokunakekelwa kwempilo labhekana nezidingo zabantu abampofu.

xho: noko kunjalo, oko khange kube kwanele.
zul: njengamanje, lokho akukeneli.

xho: khange senze ngokwaneleyo ukutshintsha uqoqosho lweli lungafani nendlela olwalumi ngayo ngaphambili, nangokulungisa iimpazamo esithe thina buqu sazenza.
zul: akukaze kwenela ukukhulula umnotho wethu efeni elibi lomlando wethu, nasemaphutheni thina ngokwethu esiwenzile.

xho: asithathanga manyathelo aneleyo ukuze sizikhusele kumonakalo omkhulu owenziwa yingxaki yokucinywa kombane okanye ukuzisindisa kuqoqosho lwehlabathi oludodobalayo.
zul: akukaze kwenela ukuzisindisa emiphumelweni emibi yokucishwa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga, nasemnothweni ontengantengayo nowehlayo emhlabeni jikelele.

xho: ngoku namhlanje sizibona sijamelene neengxaki ezinzima.
zul: ngakho-ke sizithola namuhla sikumzuzu wokuzinqumela.

xho: kodwa oku kuxhomekeke kuthi.
zul: singazikhethela.

xho: sinokunikezela, sixhome izandla ngenxa yezi ngxaki zinkulu sijamelene nazo, okanye sibhinqe omfutshane singqale kuzo ngesibindi nokuzimisela.
zul: zinganqotshwa izinkinga ezingapheli eziningi nezinzima ezibhekana nathi, noma singabhekana ngqo nazo, ngezixazululo nokuzimisela kanye nokwenza.

xho: kuba ukuba sikhethe ukungqala kuyo ngqo imingeni esijamelene nayo, umsebenzi wethu wangoku, obalulekileyo nogubungeleyo kukubeka uqoqosho lwethu kwindlela eya kuhlumo oluza kuxhanyulwa ngumntu wonke.
zul: njengoba sikhetha ukubhekana ngqo nezinselelo zethu, umsebenzi wethu osheshayo, obalulekile nophelele ukubeka umnotho wethu emgudwini wokukhula komnotho okubandakanya wonke umuntu.

xho: ngaphandle kohlumo akuyi kubakho misebenzi, kwaye ngaphandle kwemisebenzi akuyi kubakho kuphucuka kubonakalayo kubomi babantu bakuthi.
zul: ngaphandle kokukhula angeke kube khona imisebenzi, ngaphandle kwemisebenzi angeke kube khona ukuthuthukiswa okunenjongo ezimpilweni zabantu bethu.

xho: ngoko ke, le sona, imalunga nohlumo oluza kuxhanyulwa ngumntu wonke.
zul: ngakho-ke lenkulumo echaza isimo sezwe imayelana nokukhula komnotho okubandakanya umuntu wonke.

xho: imalunga namanyathelo abalulekileyo esiwathathayo kulo nyaka ukwakha umbuso osebenzayo nokubeka uqoqosho lwethu endleleni eya ekuphucukeni.
zul: imayelana nezinqubo ezibucayi esizozithatha kulo nyaka ukwakha umbuso onekhono nokubeka umnotho wethu endleleni yokululama.

xho: kulo nyaka, silungisa oko kubalulekileyo.
zul: kulo nyaka, silungisa izisekelo.

xho: sigxininisa kumacandelo aza kunceda kuhlumo loqoqosho.
zul: siqhubekisa izindawo ezibucayi zokukhula.

xho: kwaye siza kuqinisekisa ukuba iinkqubo zethu zocwangciso zikumgangatho ophezulu nokuba ezo zincwangciso zikhoyo urhulumente uyaziphumeza.
zul: futhi siqinisekisa ukwenza kahle kakhulu ekuhleleni nasekusebenzeni kuhulumeni.

xho: bantu bomzantsi afrika,kusisithuba seminyaka elishumi, abantu bomzantsi afrika bejamelene nengxaki yokunqongophala kombane.
zul: bantu baseningizimu afrika,ngaphezu kweminyaka eyishumi, abantu baseningizimu afrika bekumele babhekane nemiphumela yobunzima bokulethwa kukagesi.

xho: ndithethe kwakuko malunga nokubaluleka kwendima edlalwa ngu-eskom kuqoqosho lwelizwe lethu nakubomi bomntu ngamnye wasemzantsi afrika.
zul: sengikhulume kabanzi ngendima ebalulekile edlalwa u-eskom emnothweni wezwe lethu nasezimpilweni zabo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika.

xho: ukuqhawuka kombane kwezinyanga zimbalwa zidlulileyo kwenze umonakalo omkhulu kwilizwe lethu.
zul: ukucishwa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kwezinyanga ezimbalwa ezedlule kube nomthelela ebuthakathakeni bezwe lethu.

xho: kuwabyisele umva ngamandla amalinge wethu okwakha ngokutsha uqoqosho nokudala imisebenzi.
zul: kuvele kwabuyisela emuva yonke imizamo yethu yokuphinde sakhe umnotho nokukwakha imisebenzi.

xho: ngalo lonke ixesha kusenzeka, kuphazamisa ubomi babantu, kubangela ukudana, ukuphazamiseka, nenzima.
zul: ngaso sonke isikhathi uma kwenzeka, kuphazamisa izimpilo zabantu, idala ukukhungatheka, ukubambezeleka, nobunzima.

xho: eyona nto ingunobangela wale ngxaki kukungakwazi kuka-eskom, iminyaka emininzi, ukukhanda nokulungisa amaziko akhe okuphehla umbane awagcine ekwimeko efanelekileyo.
zul: kumnyombo wayo, ukucishwa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kungumphumela ongenakugwenywa wokuhluleka kuka-eskom eminyakeni eminingi - ngenxa yesikweletu, ukuntuleka kwamandla kanye nokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane - ukunakekela iziphehlimandla zawo.

xho: oku kubangelwe ngamatyala anawo, ukungabikho kwabasebenzi abanezakhono ezifanelekileyo nengxaki yokubanjwa ngobhongwane kombuso.
zul: iqiniso okuzomele silamukele ukuthi ukuze u-eskom akwazi ukulungisa okubalulekile okudingekayo ukwenza ngcono ukuthembeka kokuthunyelwa kogesi, ukucishwa kogesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kuzohlala kuyinto engenzeka esikhathini esizayo.

xho: into ekufanele ukuba siyamkele kukuba ukuze u-eskom akwazi ukwenza umsebenzi wokukhanda nokulungisa amaziko akhe okuphehla umbane awagcine ekwimeko efanelekelileyo aze ngolo hlobo aphucule indlela awunkinkisha ngayo umbane, kuza kufuneka, kwezi nyanga zimbalwa zizayo, ukuba amane ewuqhawula ewucima umbane.
zul: lapho ukucishwa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kungenakugwenywa, kumele sikuthathe ngendlela engaqageleka futhi kunciphise ukuphazamiseka nezindleko ezimbonini nasemakhaya.

xho: apho ukuqhawuka kombane kungakwaziyo ukuphepheka, kufuneka kwenziwe ngendlela ecingelekayo neyokunciphisa uphazamiseko kunye neendleko kwimizi -mveliso nasemakhaya.
zul: ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezizayo, njengoba u-eskom usebenza ukubuyisa amakhona akhe okusebenza, sizobe sisebenzisa izindlela ezizoguqula ngendlela ebaluleke kakhulu umgudu wokuphehlwa kogesi ezweni lethu.

xho: kwezi nyanga zimbalwa zizayo, njengokuba u-eskom esebenzela ukubuyisela amandla wokusebenza kwakhe, siza kufezekisa amanyathelo ayakuguqula isiseko sendlela yokuphehlwa kwamandla ombane kwilizwe lethu.
zul: sithatha lezi zinyathelo ezilandelayo ukukhuphula ngokushesha okukhulu umthamo wokuphehlwa kukagesi ngaphandle kwakwa-eskom.

xho: sithatha la manyathelo alandelayo ukwandisa ngokukhawuleza nangokubalulekileyo izakhono zokuphehlwa kombane ngaphandle kuka-eskom:umlawuli wezamandla wesizwe uza kuqinisekisa ukuba zonke izicelo zabasebenzisi mbane bezorhwebo nabemizi-mveliso zokuvelisa umbane abaza kuzisebenzisela ongaphezu kwe-1mw zenziwa zingadlulanga intsuku eziyi-120 ezimiselweyo.
zul: okuhambisana namasu ashiwo ngonyaka odlule, u-eskom usuqalile ukuhlukanisa izinhla ezintathu zemisebenzi yakhe - ukukhiqizwa, ukudluliswa kanye nokusatshalaliswa - umsebenzi ngamunye uzoba nebhodi kanye nezinhlaka zawo zokuphatha.

xho: kufanele kuqatshwelwe ukuba akukho mmiselo wokufaka umthamo wombane ongaphezulu kwe-1mw.
zul: esisebenzisana nabo emphakathini abahlelwa ngaphansi komkhandlu wezwe wokuthuthukisa ezomnotho nezabasebenzi (nedlac) babe nemihlangano lapho bebedingida iziphakamiso eziningana emavikini amabili adlule ukuvuma izimiso zesivumelwano somphakathi ngogesi.

xho: ngokuhambelana nomhlahla-ndlela othe wabhengezwa kunyaka ophelileyo, u-eskom uye waqalisa ngenkqubo yokwahlulahlula amacandelo akhe amathathu – elophehlo-mbane, elokugqithisela nelokuwuhambisa – icandelo ngalinye kuwo liza kuba necandelo lebhodi nequmrhu labalawuli.
zul: lokhu kungukuthuthuka okuqophe umlando futhi okuqalayo njengoba kubonisa ukuzibophezela kwabobonke esisebenzisana nabo emphakathini ukuthatha izinyathelo ezidingekayo nokunikelela ngokufanele ukubhekana nezidingo zethu zogesi.

xho: amahlakani ethu ezentlalo aphantsi kwebhunga lesizwe lophuhliso lwezoqoqosho nezabasebenzi (i-nedlac) ebesoloko ehlanagana kwezi veki zimbini zidlulileyo ukuvumelana ngesivumelwano semanyano kwezombane.
zul: ngalesi sivumelwano okusetshenziswana nabo emphakathini bafuna u-eskom osebenza kahle, onemiphumela kanye nolungele ukusebenza okhiqizela imiphakathi nezimboni ugesi ngamanani angabizi.

xho: esi sivumelwano siyimbali eqalayo kuba sibonakalisa ukuzinikela kwawo onke amahlakani ezentlalo ukuthatha amanyathelo afanelekileyo nokuvuma ukuncama izinto ezithile kumalinge okuqinisekisa ukuba kukho uzinzo kwindlela onkinkishwa ngayo umbane kweli.
zul: lokhu kudinga ukuncishiswa okukhulu ezindlekweni - kubandakanya nokubuyekezwa kwezivumelwano zokusebenza ezingalandeli umthetho - nezindlela zokuhlanganisa izinsiza ezizonciphisa isikweletu sika-eskom bese zifaka imali lapho kudingeka khona.

xho: ngesi sivumelwano amahlakani ezentlalo afuna u-eskom olungele zonke iimfuno, osebenza kakuhle novelisayo nophehla umbane ngamaxabiso afikelelayo kuluntu nakushishino.
zul: okusetshenziswana nabo emphakathini - izinyonyana zabasebenzi, amabhizinisi, izinhlangano ezibhekele inhlalo yomphakathi kanye nohulumeni - bazinikele ukuthola uxhaso lwezimali ukubhekana nosizi lwezimali lwaka-eskom oluzoyiqhuba isikhathi eside ngokwezimali.

xho: oku kudinga ukwehla okumandla kwiindleko – kuquka ukuhlaziywa kwezivumelwano ezingafanelekanga – kunye namanyathelo okuvuselela imithombo eza kunciphisa ityala lika-eskom aze afake indlela entsha yemali apho kudingeka khona.
zul: bazofuna ukukwenza lokhu ngendlela engabeki impesheni yabasebenzi engcupheni futhi engathunazi ubuqotho bohlelo lwezezimali.

xho: amahlakani ezentlalo – imibutho yezabasebenzi, abezoshishino, imibutho yabahlali kunye norhulumente – bazinikele ukuncedisa kumalinge okufuna imali eza kuncedisa kule ngxaki yezezimali yakwa-eskom kodwa ngendlela engazikumfaka kwamanye amatyala amakhulu.
zul: ngesikhathi besebenza ukuqedela lesi sivumelwano, iqiniso ukuthi uhlelo lwethu logesi luzobe lulokhu lukhungathekile koze kuqale ukusebenza kokukhiqizwa kogesi okusha.

xho: bafuna ukukwenza oku ngendlela engazi kubeka imali yomhlala-phantsi yabasebenzi emngciphekweni kwaye engazukufaka engozini izimali zombuso.
zul: ngalezindlela ezisheshayo nomsebenzi oqhubekayo wokuhlela kabusha isisekelo semboni yethu kagesi, sizozuza ukuthunyelelwa kogesi okuthembekile, ongabizi futhi, ekugcineni, ozosiqhuba isikhathi eside.

xho: ngeli xesha besebenzela ukuqukumbela esi sivumelwano, into ekufuneka sihlale siyazi kukuba iingxaki zombane ziza kuhlala zikho kude kuvele indawo entsha eza kuphehla ivelise umbane.
zul: sithatha lolu guquko olunezinqumo ngomgudu wogesi wethu ngesikhathi lapho abantu bebhekene nokusatshiswa okukhulu osake kwaba khona okungesimo sokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu.

xho: izolo, ndihlangene no-ayakha melithafa, olitsha-ntliziyo kwezesimo sezulu wase-eerste rivier nobezimase iqonga lezoqoqosho lehlabathi edavos kulo nyaka ukumema zonke inkokheli zehlabathi ukuba mazingagungqi ekumeleni ubulungisa kwezesimo sezulu.
zul: izolo ngihlangane no-ayakha melithafa, isishoshovu sesimo sezulu esisesincane sase-eerste rivier esasihambele isigungu esengamele ukuthuthukiswa komnotho emhlabeni e-davos kulo nyaka ukucela abaholi bomhlaba ukuthi babumele baqine ubulungiswa besimo sezulu.

xho: u-ayakha undicelile ukuba ndiqinisekise ukuba akukho mntwana untsundu ushiywa ngasemva xa kutshintshelwa kwixesha apho isizwe sivelisa umbane onesisi esincinci, sikwaziyo ukumelana nemozulu eguqu-guqukayo nesinzileyo.
zul: u-ayakha ungicele ukuba ngiqinisekise ukuthi ayikho ingane yase-afrika eshiyeka ngemuva oguqukweni oluya emphakathini onciphise ikhabhoni, obekezelela isimo sezulu kanye nozinzile.

xho: kwaye ke eso sisithembiso endizimisele ukusigcina.
zul: futhi isithembiso engizimisele ukusigcina.

xho: ikhomishini kamongameli engokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu iza kuqinisekisa okokuba njengokuba sisiya kwindlela yohlumo olukhupha isisi esincinci asishiyi namnye umntu ngasemva.
zul: ikhomishana kamongameli kwezokuguquka kwesimo sezulu izoqinisekisa ukuthi njengoba siya phambili endleleni yekhabhoni ephansi asishiyi muntu emuva.

xho: siza kuwuqukumbela umthetho oyilwayo ongokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu, nonika ingcaciso ngemithetho eza kulawula indlela esisabela ngayo kwiziphumo zotshintsho lwemo-zulu ngokuthi iqinisekise ukuba akhona amacebo okukwazi ukuziqhelanisa nokumelana nale ngxaki kunye nokuqinisekisa ukuba asingomaxhoba anokonzakaliswa lula lutshintsho lwemozulu – nokukhangela amathuba amatsha ezoshishino anokuvela kuhlobo loqoqosho olungenabungozi kwindalo nakokusingqongileyo.
zul: sizoqedela umthethosivivinywa wokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu, onikeza uhlaka lwezimiso zokuphathwa ngendlela kwemithelela yokuguquka kwesimo sezulu okungenakugwenywa ngokuthuthukisa ukumelana nokuguquka kwesimo sezulu, kuqiniswe ukuzilungiselela nokulindela ukuguquka kwesimo sezulu kanye nokunciphisa ukuba buthakathaka ngenxa yokuguquka kwesimo sezulu - nokuthola amathuba ezimboni amasha emnothweni onciphisa ubungozi kwezemvelo.

xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,kufanele ukuba silungisa iimali zethu zikarhulumente.
zul: sidinga ukulungisa izimali zomphakathi wethu.

xho: amazinga aphantsi ohlumo athetha ukuthi asingenisi mali yaneleyo eza kubhatala ezi zinto siyichitha kuzo, ityala lethu likhula ngesantya esoyikekayo, kwaye imali siyichitha ngokuyisebenzisa nasekuhlawuleni ityala hayi kumaphulo okwakha iziseko ezingundoqo nemisebenzi yokuvelisa.
zul: amazinga aphansi okukhula achaza ukuthi asenzi imali engenayo eyanele ukuhlangabezana nezindleko zethu, isikweledu sethu sibheke emazingeni lapho singeke sisakhona, nokuchitha imali lapho kungafanele khona ekuqedeni nasekukhokheni isikweletu kanye nenzalo kunezingqalasizinda nemisebenzi ekhiqizayo.

xho: asikwazi ukuqhubeka ngale ndlela.
zul: angeke sikwazi ukuqhubeka ngale ndlela.

xho: singakwazi ukuma nje singenzintoxa esenza intetho yohlahlo-lwabiwo mali kwiveki ezimbini ezizayo ukususela ngoku, umphathiswa wezezimali uza kucacisa uludwe lwamanyathelo ukunciphisa inkcitho nokuphucula ukuqulunqwa kwayo.
zul: uma ethula inkulumo yakhe yesabelomali emavikini amabili ukusuka manje, ungqongqoshe wezezimali uzonikeza uhlaka lochunge lwezinhlelo zokunciphisa nokwenza ngcono ukwakheka kwalo.

xho: sithethathethana nabasebenzi kunye nabanye abadlali ndima ababaluleileyo ngamanyathelo okugcina ityala lemivuzo karhulumente lilawuleka nokunciphisa inkcitho.
zul: sizibandakanye nabasebenzi kanye nabanye ababamba iqhaza ezinhlelweni esizidingayo ukugcina umthethosivivinywa wamaholo abasebenzi bakahulumeni nokunciphisa ukumosha.

xho: amalinge okunciphisa inkcitho karhulumente, hlengahlengisa imithombo ngokubaluleka akwayo kakuhle kakhulu, nokuphucula ubuchule benkqubo yethu yerhafu kubalulekile - kodwa akwanelanga - amagalelo abhekisele ekuzinziseni imali zethu zikarhulumente.
zul: imizamo yokunciphisa ukuchithwa kwemali kukahulumeni, ukubeka phambili izinsiza ngendlela esebenza kahle, nokwenza ngcono ukusebenza kahle kohlelo lwentela kubalulekile - kodwa akwenele - ukunikelela ukuletha uzinzo kwezezimali zikahulumeni.

xho: ukuze kubekho uzinzo kuza kufuneka ukuba silungise indlela le uqoqosho lweli lwakheke ngayo, eyiyo ebangela ukuba abe phezulu amaxabiso ezinto ezibalulekileyo ebantwini nawokuqhuba ushishino.
zul: ukuzuza uzinzo ekugcineni kuzodinga ukuthi sibhekana nezinselelo zokwakheka komnotho ezikhuphula izindleko zempilo nokwenza ibhizinisi.

xho: ngokusebenzisana nomphicothi-zincwadi-jikelele ukunciphisa inkcitho engafanelekanga, ngokususa inkcitho karhulumente isuke kwinkcitho yokusebenzisa iye kutyalo-mali kwiziseko ezingundoqo, sizimisele ukuphucula ubume bezimali zikarhulumente.
zul: ngokusebenza nomcwaningimabhuku omkhulu ukunciphisa izindleko ezingekho emthethweni, ngokugudluka ekusebenziseni imali kukahulumeni ezindlekweni iyotshalwa kwingqalasizinda, sihlose ukwenza ngcono isimo sezimali zikahulumeni wethu.

xho: unondyebo wesizwe kunye ne-sarb basebenza kunye ukuthomalalisa uxinzelelo kushishino nabathengi.
zul: umgcinimafa kazwelonke nebhangengodla laseningimu afrika basebenza ndawonye ukukhulula ingcindezi kumabhizinisi nakubathengi.

xho: sigqibe kwelokuba siseke ingxowa- mali yesizwe yokuzenzela ubutyebi njengendlela yokulondoloza nokukhulisa ubutyebi besizwe sethu, ukunikla intsingiselo kumyalelo othi abantu bayakwabelana ngobutyebi belizwe.
zul: sinqume ukusungula isikhwama somcebo esizimele njengemizamo yokugcina nokukhulisa isizwe sethu ngoxhaso-mali lwezwe, ukwenza ngempela umyalelo wokuthi abantu kumele babelwe kumcebo wezwe.

xho: sikwaqhubeka ngamalungiselelo okusekwa kwebhanki karhulumente njengenxalenye yamalinge ethu okwandisa indlela yokufikelela kwiinkonzo zezimali kubo bonke abantu basemzantsi afrika.
zul: siyaqhubeka futhi nokusungulwa kwebhange lombuso njengengxenye yomzamo wethu ukwandisa ukufinyelela kwabo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika ezinsizakalweni zezimali.

xho: umphathiswa wezezimali uza kunikezela ngeenkcukacha zoku kwintetho yohlahlo-lwabiwo mali.
zul: ungqongqoshe wezezimali uzonikeza imininingwane ngalokhu enkulumweni yakhe yesabelomali.

xho: siza kuba sithatha amanyathelo okuhlaziya uqoqosho lwethu aneziphumo ezininzi nazakuquka lawo aqulathwe kwiphepha eliveliswe ngunondyebo wesizwe, elinesihloko esithi, inguqu yezoqoqosho, uhlumo oludibeneyo nokukhuphisana (economic transformation, inclusive growth and competitiveness.
zul: sizobe sithatha izindlela ezifinyelela ekudeni zokuguqula isimo somnotho ngokuthi sizofaka lezo eziqukethwe kushicilelo olwadidiyelwa ngumgcinimafa kazwelonke, olusihloko sithi ‘economic transformation, inclusive growth and competitiveness’ ‘ukuguquka komnotho, ukukhula okulinganayo ngokomnotho kanye nokuncintisana’kulo nyaka, siyasuka kuzinzo lwamabhizini aphethwe nguhulumeni siya ekunikezeni lezi zinkampani zamasu enye inhloso yokweseka ukukhula nokuthuthuka.

xho: )kulo nyaka, sijongise ekuziseni uzinzo kwii-soe, sitshintshe la maqumrhu abalulekileyo siwenze axhase uhlumo nophuhliso.
zul: emva kweminyaka yokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane, inkohlakalo kanje nokuphatha budedengu, sisebenza ukuqinisekisa ukuthi wonke amabhizinisi aphethwe uhulumeni (soes) ayakwazi ukufezekisa umyalo wabo wokuthuthukisa nokuba nozinzo kwezezimali.

xho: emva kweminyaka yokubanjwa ngobhongwana kukarhulumente, urhwaphilizo nolawulo olugwenxa, siyasebenza ukuqinisekisa ukuba zonke ii-soe ziyakwazi ukufezekisa isigunyaziso sazo sophuhliso zize zikwazi ukuziphilela ngokwasezimalini.
zul: ekuxoxisaneni nomkhandlu kamongameli wamabhizinisi aphethwe uhulumeni, sizoqala umsebenzi wokuhlela kabusha amabhizinisi ethu aphethwe uhulumeni futhi siqinisekise ukuthi asebenzela izinhloso zamasu omnotho noma okuthuthukisa.

xho: ngokuthethathethana nebhunga le-soe likamongameli, siza kuqala inkqubo yokwenza utshintsho kwii-soe zethu ukuqinisekisa ukuba ziyayifezekisa injongo yobuchule yezoqoqosho okanye yezophuhliso.
zul: umonakalo wokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane, inkohlakalo kanye nokuphatha budedengu kuma-soe kubonakala kahle kakhulu enkampanini yamabhanoyi i-south african airways, eyabekwa ekutakulweni kwamabhizinisi ekupheleni konyaka odlule.

xho: izinga lokubanjwa ngobhongwane kukarhulumente, urhwaphiliso nolawulo olugwenxa kwii-soe kubonakaliswe kakuhle kwinkampani yezophapho yomzantsi afrika (u-saa), nebibekwe phantsi kohlangulo lwezoshishino ngurhulumente ekupheleni konyaka ophelileyo.
zul: abasebenza ukutakula amabhizinisi balindeleke ukuveza obala amaqhinga abo okuhlela kabusha inkampani yezokundiza emavikini ambalwa azayo.

xho: amagosa ohlangulo ezoshishino kulindeleke ukuba abhengeze izicwangciso zokuhlengahlengiswa kwale nkampani kwezi veki zimbalwa zizayo.
zul: ekukhathaleleni imboni yezokundiza yaseningizimu afrika kanye nomnotho wethu, kubalulekile ukuthi inkampani yezokundiza esihlelwe kabusha ngengomuso izoba nozinzo ngokwentengiso nangokusebenza futhi ayincikile ekuqhubekeni ukuthi ixhaswe nguhulumeni.

xho: ngokweemfuno zecandelo lohambo ngomoya lasemzantsi afrika noqoqosho lwethu kubalulekile ukuba inkampani yohambo ngomoya ehlengahlengisiweyo yexesha elizayo kuba ikwazi ukuzinza kwezorhwebo nangokusebenza kwayo kwaye ingaxhomekeki kwenye inkxaso-mali karhulumente.
zul: okuseqhulwini kulo nyaka ukulungisa ojantshi bokuhamba izitimela, okuyinto ebalulekile emnothweni kanye nempilo yekhethelo yabantu bethu.

xho: umba ophambili ongundoqo kulo nyaka kukulungiswa koololiwe babakhweli, nokubalulekileyo kuqoqosho nakumgangatho wobomi babantu bakuthi.
zul: ojantshi bethu nsukuzonke bahambisa amakhulu ezigidi zabagibeli ukuya nokubuya emsebenzini.

xho: oololiwe beli lizwe bathutha izigidi ngezigidi zabakhweli ukuya nokubuya emisebenzini mihla le.
zul: senza ukusebenza kwezitimela zakwa-prasa kube okwesimanjemanje.

xho: siphucula oololiwe be-passenger rail agency of south africa.
zul: umzila ophakathi entshonalanga kapa kanye nomzila wasemabopane epitoli ivaliwe ngenxa yokulungiswa kabusha nokuthuthukiswa.

xho: umzila ongundoqo kaloliwe entshona koloni nomzila wasemobapane epitoli ibikade ivaliwe ukwenzela ukuhlwaziywa nokuphucula.
zul: sitshala imali eyisigidigidi esingu-1.4 samarandi kulowo nalowo mzila ukunikeza ukusizakala okuphephile, okuthembekile nokungabizi.

xho: umsebenzi osaqhubekayo kweminye imizila uquka ukuphuculwa kwezitishi, ukutshintshwa kweendawo zokupaka, neenkqubo zokutshintsha imizila yoololiwe ezintsha nokuphuculwa kweengcingo zombane ezihamba phezulu.
zul: umsebenzi oqhubekayo kweminye imizila kufaka ukuthuthukiswa kweziteshi, ukubuyisela kabusha izindawo zokupaka, ukufaka izimpawu ezintsha kanye nokuthuthukiswa kokudonswa kukagesi phezulu.

xho: njengokuba sisebenza ukulungisa amandla wombuso, siyayazi ukuba uhlumo nokudalwa kwemisebenzi umthamo omkhulu wako uyakuqhutywa ngamashishini abucala.
zul: njengoba sisebenza ukulungisa amakhono okusebenza kombuso, siyazi ukuthi ukukhula kanye nokwenza imisebenzi ngokwesilinganiso esikhulu kuzoqhutshwa amabhizinisi azimele.

xho: ngoko ke sakha imeko esebenzayo nekulungeleyo ukwenza ushishino.
zul: ngakho-ke sakha indawo yokusebenza evuna ukwenza ibhizinisi.

xho: ngokusebenza sonke namahlakani ezentlalo, siqhubile ukususa izinto ebezikade ziyimiqobo ekudalweni kwemisebenzi.
zul: ngokusebenza ngokubambisana nezinhlaka zomphakathi, siqhubekile nokubhekana nezingqinamba eziningana esezibe izithiyo ekwenzeni imisebenzi.

xho: iilayisenisi zokusetyenziswa kwamanzi, nezibaluleke kakhulu ekusebenzeni kweefama, imizi-mveliso nemigodi, bezikade zithatha ixesha elide ngokungaqhelekanga ukuzenza, ngamanye amaxesha kude kuthathe iminyaka emihlanu.
zul: ezinye zalezi zingqinamba yizimvume zokusebenzisa amanzi, abalulekile ekusebenzeni emapulazini, ezimbonini nasezimayini, ngokwedlule osekuthathe isikhathi eside ngokungafanele ukuthi zicutshungulwe, ngesinye isikhathi kufika eminyakeni emithathu kuya kwemihlanu.

xho: sinako ngoku ukuvakalisa okokuba iilayisenisi zokusetyenziswa kwamanzi ngoku ziza kukhutshwa zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-90.
zul: sesingasho ukuthi izimvume zokusebenzisa amanzi manje sezizokhishwa ezinsukwini ezingama-90.

xho: bekukade kuthatha iinyanga ukubhalisa inkampani.
zul: kwakuthatha izinyanga ukubhalisa inkampani.

xho: ngeqonga le-bizportal, umntu ngoku uyakwazi ukuthatha nje usuku olunye ukubhalisa inkampani, ukubhalisa kwingxowa-mali ye-inshorensi yokungaphangeli (i-uif) kunye nenkonzo yezerhafu yasemzantsi afrika kunye nokuvula i-akhawunti yebhanki.
zul: ngohlelo lwe-bizportal umuntu usezokwazi manje ukubhalisa inkampani ngosuku olulodwa, abhalisele isikhwama somshwalense wabalahlekelwe umsebenzi (uif) nomnyango wokuqoqa kwentela eningizimu afrika (sars) kanye nokuvula i-akhawunti yasebhange.

xho: amazibuko wethu axinene kwaye awasebenzi kakuhle.
zul: amachweba ethu aminyene futhi awasebenzi ngokufanelekile.

xho: apha ekuhambeni konyaka, siza kuqalisa ngokulungisa izibuko lasethekwini ngokupheleleyo – elilizibuko lokulayisha imithwalo emikhulu elikwindawo yesithathu ngobukhulu kwisiqingatha somhlaba sasemazantsi – ukunciphisa ukulibaziseka kunye neendleko.
zul: phakathi nalo nyaka, sizoqala ukulungisa kabusha ichweba lasethekwini – indawo yesithathu enkulukazi yokungeniswa kwezimpahla kwelaseningizimu – ukunciphisa ukubambezeleka nezindleko.

xho: elona galelo libalulekileyo sinokulenza kuhlumo loqoqoqsho oludibeneyo likuphuhliso lwezakhono ezifanelekileyo namandla okwenza.
zul: uxhaso olubalulekile esingalwenza ekukhuleni komnotho okubandakanya umutnu wonke lusekuthuthukiseni kwamakhono afanele.

xho: utyalo-mali esilwenzayo ngoku kwi-ecd nokufunda kumabanga aphantsi kuza kuvelisa iziqhamo ezihle zoqoqosho kule minyaka ingamashumi mabini izayo –nangaphaya kwayo.
zul: ukutshalwa kwezimali esikwenza manje ukuthuthukisa ukukhuliswa kwabantwana nokufunda usasemncane kuzoholela emiphumelweni emihle yezomnotho eminyakeni engama-20 ezayo – nangale.

xho: kodwa lukhona ungenelelo olukhawulezileyo esilwenzayo ukuphucula umgagatho nokubaluleka kweziphumo zethu zezemfundo.
zul: kodwa kukhona ukungenelela kwamanje esikwenzayo ukwenza ngcono ubukhethelo nokufaneleka kwemiphumela yezemfundo yethu.
