zul: ekuqaleni kwale nyanga, ngaphasisa izingxenye ezintsha ezintathu zomthetho, eseziqinise uhlelo-kusebenza lwezobulungiswa kwezobugebengu, zagqugquzela ukuziphendulela kuhulumeni kanye nokweseka labo abasindile.

xho: ukungeniswa kwalo mthetho kuza kunceda kakhulu ekuqinisekiseni ukuba abenzi bobubi bayohlwaywa, nokuba amaxhoba ayakhuselwa futhi kukho izixhobo ezininzi eziza kwenza ukuba kubenzima ukwenza olu hlobo lolwaphulo-mthetho.
zul: ukuqaliswa kokusebenza kwalo mthetho kuzosiza kakhulu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi amacala ashushiswa ngempumelelo, nokuthi abasindile bayavikelwa futhi kunezinto eziningi ezizogwema lokhu.

xho: mkhulu kakhulu umsebenzi esele siwenzile ukuphungula umthamo womsebenzi wokuhlolwa kwe-dna, saphungula iisampuli zegazi elibubungqina zasuka kwezingama-210 000 ngenyanga katshazimpunzi yowama-2021 zaya kutsho kwezingama-58 000 sithetha nje.
zul: sesenze inqubekela-phambili ebonakalayo ekunciphiseni ukusalela emuva kokuhlolwa kolibofuzo i-dna, ngokukunciphisa kusuka kubufakazi obuyizi-210 00 ngombasa ngowezi-2021 kuya kwizi-58 000 njengamanje.

xho: noko kunjalo, idabi lokulwa ubundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini soze siliphumelele, ngaphandle kokuba thina siluluntu, singacela sibongoza yonke imibutho kunye nabo bonke abemmi ukuba baxhase inkqubo yoluntu eza kuqhuba ingemi.
zul: noma kunjalo, impi yodlame olubhekiswe kwabobulili obuthile angeke siyinqobe ngaphandle, uma njengomphakathi, sinxenxa bonke abantu ngokwehlukahlukana kwabo kanye nezakhamuzi zonke ukuthi zibe yingxenye yohlelo lokusukuma komphakathi.

xho: njengokuba ubhubhane we-covid-19 esibonisile, impilo yabantu beli lizwe ixhomekeke kwindlela oluqhuba ngayo uqoqosho nakuphuhliso lwezentlalo.
zul: njengoba i-covid-19 isibonise ngokumangazayo, ezempilo zesizwe angeke ziyihlukanise nenqubekela-phambili yomnotho kanye nokuthuthukiswa komphakathi.

xho: ngenxa yoko siza kuqhubeka nalo msebenzi sele uqhuba wokuqinisekisa ukuba wonke umntu emzantsi afrika uyazixhamla iinkonzo zezempilo, nokuba akanamali yokuzibhatalela.
zul: ngakho-ke sizoqhubeka nomsebenzi oqhubekayo wokuqinisekisa ukuhlinzekwa kwezempilo kuwo wonke umuntu eningizimu afrika, ngaphandle nokubheka ukuthi bayakwazi ukukukhokhela na.

xho: nangona siza kuqhuba iindibano zokugaya izimvo zoluntu malunga nomthetho oyilwayo wempilo yesizwe (i-nhi) epalamente mninzi umsebenzi osele wenziwe ukulungiselela ukuqaliswa kwe-nhi.
zul: ngesikhathi ukulalelwa komphakathi mayelana nomthethosivivinywa wezempilo kuzwelonke (i-nhi) kuqhubeka ephalamende, inqubekela-phambili enkulu iyenziwa ekulungiseleleni ukwethulwa kwe-nhi.

xho: abantu abangaphezulu kwezigidi ezingama-59 sele bebhalisiwe kwi-health patient registration system.
zul: abantu abangaphezu kwezigidi ezingama-59 sebebhalisile kuhlelo-kusebenza lokubhaliswa kweziguli.

xho: ngeyomsintsi yowama-2021, abanye abasebenzi becandelo lezempilo abangaphezulu kwama-56 000 baye baqeshwa baze abasebenzi basekuhlaleni bezempilo abangaphezulu kwama-46 000 bafakwa kwicandelo lezempilo likarhulumente.
zul: ngomandulo ngowezi-2021, bangaphezu kwezi-56 000 abasebenzi bezempilo abongezeleliwe abaqashiwe futhi bangaphezu kwezi-46 000 onompilo abafakwe kuhlelo-kusebenza lwezempilo kuhulumeni.

xho: kule minyaka mibini idlulileyo imfundo yabantwana bethu nabantu abaselula belizwe lakuthi iye yaphazamiseka kakhulu.
zul: eminyakeni emibili eyedlule, imfundo yabantwana bethu kanye nabantu abasha iphazamiseke kakhulu.

xho: njengoko ngoku sibuyela kwindlela yokufunda nokufundisa yesiqhelo, siza kusebenza nzima ukuze siqinisekise ukuba abafundi bafumana imfundo esemgangathweni ebafanele kanye yonke imihla.
zul: njengoba sibuyela esimweni esejwayelekile, sizosebenza kanzima ukuqinisekisa ukuthi bonke abafundi nezitshudeni bathola imfundo esezingeni abayidingayo futhi ebafanele.

xho: bemmi bomzantsi afrika,urhulumente kufuneka asebenzele abantu.
zul: bantu bakithi baseningizimu afrika,uhulumeni kumele usebenzele abantu.

xho: yiyo loo nto owona mba siwukhokelise phambili ikukwakha isizwe esinabantu abanezakhono, esikhokelisa phambili imigaqo yokuziphatha echubekileyo kunye nesigxininisa kuphuhliso.
zul: yingakho sibeke eqhulwini ukwakha umbuso onekhono, onomthetho nothuthukayo.

xho: kungekudala siza kuqukumbela isicwangciso-qhinga sokwenza ukuba abasebenzi bakarhulumente baxhotyiswe ngezakhono ezikumgangatho ophezulu.
zul: maduze-nje sizophothula uhlaka lokusebenza ngendlela efanele kuhulumeni.

xho: oku kuza kuquka iindlela ezingekho yeke-yeke zokuqesha abasebenzi kurhulumente, inkqubo yoqeqesho oluqhubekekayo kwizakhono eziphucukileyo kusetyenziswa isikolo sikarhulumente sesizwe (i-nsg) kunye nezivumelwano zentsebenziswano phakathi kwamaqumrhu ombuso, imibutho yeengcali kunye needyunivesiti.
zul: lokhu kuzofaka phakathi izinyathelo eziqinile zokuqashwa kwabasebenzi bakahulumeni, ukuthuthukiswa okuqhubekayo kokusebenza ngendlela ngokusebenzisana nesikole sikahulumeni kuzwelonke nokusebenzisana phakathi kwezinhlangano zikahulumeni, izinhlangano zabasebenzi namanyuvesi.

xho: inkqubo enyanzelisa ukuba inkcitho yomntu ihambelane nengeniso yakhe esemthethweni iqalise kuwo onke amacandelo karhulumente.
zul: ucwaningo ngendlela yokuphila luvele seluqalile kwezemisebenzi kahulumeni.

xho: kulo nyaka siza kuqhubeka nokusebenzisa i-ddmle nkqubo iwadibanisa omathathu amaqoqo karhulumente kunye namanye amahlakani ezentlalo kwisithili ngasinye ukuze kukhuliswe uqoqosho lwemimandla oluza kuxhanyulwa ngumntu wonke kuphuculwe nobomi babemmi.
zul: kulo nyaka, sizoqhubeka nokuqaliswa kokusebenza kwe-ddm.

xho: i-ddm ikhokela iinkqubo ezihlangeneyo zokwenza izicwangciso kunye nezokuhlahla nokwaba imali kuwo onke amaqoqo karhulumente futhi ihlanganise iprojekthi zikarhulumente kazwelonke nezo zesithili.
zul: le ndlela iletha ndawonya zonke izinhlaka ezintathu zikahulumeni kanye nabanye esisebenzisana nabo emphakathini kuzo zonke izifunda ukuze kuzokhuliswa iminotho yendawo nokwenza ngcono izimpilo zezakhamuzi.

xho: nangona esekhona amacandelo amaninzi ombuso afuna ukukhe anikwe ingqwalasela emandla, akhona amaziko aqhubekayo nokunceda abantu beli lizwe ngendlela ekhawulezayo neluncedo.
zul: ikakhulukazi, i-ddm ibheka ukuhlelwa okuhlanganisile kanye nokwabiwa kwezimali kuyo yonke imikhakha kahulumeni futhi ithuthukisa ukuhlanganiswa kwemiklamo kazwelonke ezingeni lesifunda.

xho: elinye lalo maziko ngu-sars, oza kube efinca iminyaka engama-25 ekho kulo nyaka.
zul: ngesikhathi kunezingxenye eziningi zikahulumeni ezidinga umsebenzi omkhulu, kunezikhungo eziqhubeka nokusiza abantu baleli lizwe lakithi ngendlela efanele nangempumelelo.

xho: nangona u-sars wayechatshazelwe ngamandla ngumkhuba wokubanjwa kukarhulumente ngobhongwane, mhle kakhulu umsebenzi esele ewenzile ngoku ukubuyisela isidima negama lakhe, kunye nokuqinisekisa ukuba umsebenzi wakhe ubuyela kwimeko yesiqhelo.
zul: enye yalesi sikhungo i-sars, ezobe iqeda iminyaka engama-25 yasungulwa kulo nyaka.

xho: ukususela oko wasekwayo u-sars ngoku sele eqokelele imali ezitriliyoni ezili-16 zeerandi eye yayokunceda kuphuhliso lwezentlalo noqoqosho lweli lizwe.
zul: yize i-sars yayithunjwe kakhulu ukuqhwagwa kwamandla ombuso, isiyenze inqubekela-phambili emangalisayo ekugcineni ubuqotho, ukuthembeka kanye nemiphumela yokusebenza.

xho: le ngeniso ingaka incede urhulumente watsho waphucula ubomi bezigidi zabantu ngokubabonelela ngeenkonzo zempilo, imfundo, izibonelelo zezentlalontle zikarhulumente kunye nezinye iinkonzo ezisisiseko.
zul: selokhu yasungulwa, i-sars isiqoqele ukuthuthukiswa komphakathi nomnotho wezwe ama-r16 trillion.

xho: isizwe esinabasebenzi abanezakhono asibhekisi kumgangatho wezakhono zabasebenzi bakarhulumente kuphela koko nakwindlela asebenza ngayo amaqumrhu karhulumente.
zul: imali eqoqiwe yenze uhulumeni wakwazi ukuthuthukisa izimpilo zabantu abayizigidi ngokuhlinzeka ukunakekelwa kwezempilo, imfundo, izibonelelo zenhlalo kanye nezinye izidingongqangi.

xho: sikwamalunga nendlela abemmi abaxhotyiswe ngayo ukuze nabo bathathe inxaxheba.
zul: ukuba nombuso onekhono akusikho nje kuphela ukuba nabasebenzi bakahulumeni abasemgangathweni kanye nezikhungo ezisebenza kahle.

xho: kufuneka sisebenzisane ukuze siqinisekise ukuba amaqumrhu afana namaqumrhu alawula isikolo (ii-sgb) kunye nemibutho yabahlali yokugcina ucwangco (ii-cpf) iyasebenza futhi iquka wonke umntu.
zul: kuphinde kube ngukuthi izakhamuzi zinikwa kanjani amandla okuthi zifake igalelo.

xho: imibutho yoluntu evuthayo nebandakanyekayo kwizinto ezininzi ibalulekile kwisizwe esinazakhono nakuphuhliso.
zul: kumele sisebenze ngokubambisana ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izinkundla ezifana nebhodi elengamele isikole kanye neforamu yamaphoyisa omphakathi ayasebenza futhi ayabandakanyeka.

xho: ngenxa yoko siza kusebenzisana namahlakani ezempilo sibize ingqungquthela ekudala ilangazelelwa yecandelo lezemibutho yoluntu.
zul: umphakathi ophilayo ubalulekile ekubeni nohulumeni onekhono kanye nentuthuko.

xho: le ngqungquthela yenzelwe ukuphucula intsebenziswano phakathi kukarhulumente nemibutho yoluntu futhi ilungise nezinto ezidla imibutho engekho phantsi korhulumente kunye nemibutho yoluntu.
zul: le ngqungquthela izobheka ukwenza ngcono ukubonana ubuso nobuso phakathi kohulumeni nomphakathi bese kuxazululwa izinselele ezibhekene nezinhlangano ezingekho ngaphansi kukahulumeni kanye nezinhlangano zomphakathi.

xho: ilizwe lakuthi likhe lagagana nezinto ezibuhlungu kwezi nyangana zidlulileyo.
zul: izwe lethu selikhahlamezeke kakhulu kamuva nje.

xho: iingxaki ezininzi nemimoya emibi, inkoliso yazo zingaphaya kwamandla ethu, zisibeke kule ndawo sikuyo namhlanje.
zul: ukuhlangana kwamandla, amaningi awo ebesingeke siwalawule, kusibeke lapha esikhona manje.

xho: sijongene neengxaki kunye neenzima eziqatha.
zul: sibhekene nezinselele ezinzima futhi ezesabekayo.

xho: okuyinene kukuba silwela igama nekhaya elisisizwe sokhokho bethu.
zul: nebala, sisempini yomphefumulo waleli lizwe.

xho: kodwa akukho namathandabuzo, siza kubuya noloyiso.
zul: kodwa-ke asithandabuzi ukuthi sizonqoba.

xho: ndifuna ukucela bonke abemmi bomzantsi afrika ukuba babambisane kwidabi lokulwa urhwaphilizo, kwidabi lethu lokuzama ukudala imisebenzi, kwidabi lokuqinisekisa ukuba sisisizwe esisekelwe kubulungisa nesinolingwano.
zul: nginxusa wonke umuntu waseningizimu afrika ukuthi sibumbane ekulweni nenkohlakalo, empini yethu yokusungula imisebenzi, empini yethu yokuzuza umphakathi onobulungiswa nolinganayo.

xho: zininzi iinkqwithela esagqitha kuzo ngaphambili, kodwa sazoyisa.
zul: sesibhekane nezimo ezibucayi eziningi emlandweni wethu, futhi sizinqobile.

xho: sikhe sasezingxakini ezazifuna ukuba siqine isibindi, sakwenza oko singenadyudyu.
zul: sike sabhekana nezinqumo ezinzima, futhi sazithatha.

xho: ngamaxesha anzima, sibonise ubugorha nokukwazi ukunyamezelaizihlandlo ezininzi, sikwazile ukuzivuthulula sigqithe kwiintsunguzi ezimnyama nokulahlekelwa lithemba sazizithunywa zethemba, uvuselelo kunye nenkqubela.
zul: ezikhathini ezinzima, sibonise isibindi kanye nokuqina.

xho: somlomo wendlu yowiso-mthetho yesizwe (i-na), nksz nosiviwe mapisa-nqakula,sihlalo webhunga lesizwe lamaphondo (i-ncop), mnu amos masondo,sekela-mongameli udavid mabuza,sodolophu wesixeko sasekapa, mnu geordin hill-lewis,owayesakuba ngumongameli, uthabo mbeki,owayesakuba ngusekela-mongameli baleka mbete,umongameli wepalamente yase-afrika, ohloniphekileyo unkosi fortune charumbira,jaji eyintloko elibambela, raymond zondo kunye namalungu ecandelo leenkundla,iintloko zamaziko karhulumente axhasa ulawulo lwentando yesininzi,sekela-mongameli weqela elilawulayo, mnu paul mashatile kunye neenkokeli zawo onke amaqela ezopolitiko,malungu epalamente,bemi bomzantsi afirka,ndiyalibulela eli wonga lokuma phambi kwenu ngolu rhatya ndenze le ntetho ingobume besizwe.
zul: somlomo wesigungu sikazwelonke, unks nosiviwe mapisa-nqakula, sihlalo womkhandlu kazwelonke wezifundazwe, umnu amos masondo,iphini likamongameli u-david mabuza, usodolobha wedolobha lasekapa, umnu geordin hill-lewis, umongameli waphambilini uthabo mbeki, iphini likamongameli laphambilini ubaleka mbete, umongameli wephalamende lamazwe ase-afrika, umhlonishwa inkosi u-fortune charumbira, inhloko yamajaji u-raymond zondo kanye namalungu ophiko lwezobulungiswa, izinhloko zezikhungo ezeseka intando yeningi labantu, iphini likamongameli weqembu elibusayo, umnu paul mashatile kanye nabo bonke abaholi bamaqembu, amalungu ephalamende, bantu bakithi baseningizimu afrika, kuyintokozo enkulu ukuma phambi kwenu kusihlwa nje ngethule inkulumo echaza isimo sezwe.

xho: kuba sisisizwe esingadumanga ngazilwandle namilambo icanda imida yalo.
zul: thina asisona neze isizwe esigabe kuphela ngezilwandle nemifula eyakhe imingcele yezwe lethu.

xho: asidumanga ngazimbiwa ezisezantsi emathunjini omhlaba weli lizwe okanye ngazintili ezithe tshitshilili kuhle esithawuza phezu kwazo.
zul: asigabile kuphela ngezimbiwa ezingaphansi komhlaba wethu noma ubuhle obumangalisayo bezintaba, amagquma namathafa angaphezu kwawo.

xho: asidumanga nangeelwimi ezi sizithethayo okanye iingoma esizombelayo okanye imisebenzi esiyenzayo.
zul: asigabile ngisho nangezilimi esizikhulumayo noma amaculo esiwaculayo noma umsebenzi esiwenzayo.

xho: xa usijonga ngenene ukuba singoobani, sisizwe esiphila ngethemba nokunyamezela.
zul: kepha okusemqoka kakhulu thina siyisizwe esigabe kakhulu ngethemba namandla okumelana nezimo ezinzima.

xho: yayilithemba esasimi ngalo ngethuba lomzabalazo wenkululeko, futhi ikwalithemba elisintyontyelayo nangoku njengoko sitatamisa isizwe sakuthi sisikhupha entsunguzini sisisa empilisweni.
zul: yithemba elakhuthaza futhi lagqugquzela ukuqhubeka nokusimama komzabalazo wethu wenkululeko, futhi yithemba elisinika amandla nogqozi ngenkathi siqhuba izwe lethu okomkhumbi ohamba olwandle olugubha amagagasi uphokophele emanzini acwebileyo.

xho: nangamaxesha obunzima, lithemba into esima ngayo kwaye nelisenza sizimisele nangakumbi ukuba sizoyise zonke iinzima esijamelene nazo.
zul: ngisho kulezi zikhathi ezinzima imbala, yithemba elisinikeza amandla okuqhubekela phambili futhi elikhuthaza ukuzimisela kwethu ukunqoba ngisho obukhulukazi ubunzima.

xho: kule minyakana mithathu nje idlulileyo, izwe lakuthi lagqugqiswa ngoyena bhubhane wehlabathi wakhe wambi ezimbalini.
zul: eminyakeni emithathu nje edlulile, izwe lethu labe likhahlanyezwe wubhubhane olukhulukazi emhlabeni olungakaze lubonakale emlandweni.

xho: amawaka abantu abhubha angcwatywa, iinkampani ezininzi zavala, yaphela imisebenzi.
zul: bayizinkulungwane ngezinkulungwane abantu abalahlekelwa yimiphefumulo yabo, nezinkampani ezavalwa, nemisebenzi eyalahleka.

xho: i-covid-19 zange isibethe sibe ngamatywantsi okanye isishiye sihayiza.
zul: ukukhahlanyezwa yi-covid-19 akusiphendulanga amavaka sigcine sesifake imisila phakathi kwemilenze okwengcanga noma siphelelwe yithemba.

xho: sibambisene, samoyisa lo bhubhane, kwaye ngoku sesiqalisile ukubuyela kwimeko yesiqhelo.
zul: ngokusebenza ngokubambisana sasinqoba leso simo esinzima, futhi sesiqalile ukusimama.

xho: namhlanje uqoqosho lweli lizwe lungaphezulu ngobukhulu kula mgangatho lwalu kuwo phambi kwalo bhubhane.
zul: namuhla umnotho wethu usumkhulu kunalokho owabe uyikona ngaphambi kobhubhane.

xho: phakathi kwekota yesithathu yowama-2021 neyowama-2022, kwadalwa imisebenzi emalunga nesiqingatha sesigidi kweli lizwe.
zul: phakathi kwekota yesithathu yowezi-2021 neyowezi-2022, abalelwa kwisigidi nesigamu amathuba amasha omsebenzi adalekile emnothweni wethu.

xho: isibonelelo sezemisebenzi sikamongameli sidale amathuba emisebenzi nawokuphucula ubomi babantu abangaphezulu kwesigidi.
zul: uhlelo lukamongameli lokukhuthaza ukuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi seluhlinzeke ngamathuba omsebenzi nezindlela zokuziphilisa kubantu abevile esigidini esisodwa.

xho: kulo nyaka uphelileyo, i-80% yabafundi bebanga lematrikhi baphumelele, oko bekwenza phantsi kweemeko ezinzima zokuphazanyiswa yi-covid-19, kwaye sibaqhwabela izandla ngalo msebenzi mhle kangaka.
zul: ngonyaka odlule abafundi bethu bakamatikuletsheni bayishaya ngembibizane imithelela yobhubhane ngokuthi bazuze izinga lokuphasa elingama-80% futhi siyabahalalisela ngaleyo mpumelelo yabo enkulukazi.

xho: siyawubona lo moya wokuzimisela kumagcisa, iimvumi, abadlali beqonga, ababhali, abadlali bezemidlalo, abenza ezibukwayo apha ekhaya, kweli lizwekazi nakumazwe aphesheya kwezilwandle.
zul: lo moya wokuzimisela nokuphikelela siyawubona kumaciko ethu, abaculi, abalingisi, ababhali kanye nabadlali besilisa nabesifazane, abenza umsebenzi oncomekayo lapha ekhaya, ezwekazini kanye nasemhlabeni wonke jikelele.

xho: i-banyana banyana yasiphathela udumo ngethuba iphumelela indebe ye-women’s africa cup of nations, ngolo hlobo la maqobokazana azintshatsheli ze-afrika.
zul: ibanyana banyana yasenza siziqhenye ngenkathi idla umhlanganiso emqhudelwaneni wendebe yabesifazane yase-afrika ukuze ibe ngoshampeni base-afrika.

xho: u-zakes bantwini, nomcebo zikode kunye no-wouter kellerman nabo baliphakamisele phezulu igama leli lizwe ngethuba bephumelela imbasa kumsitho we-grammy awards ngengoma yabo elilima ethi, bayethe.
zul: u-zakes bantwini, nonomcebo zikode kanye no-wouter kellerman basenze saziqhayisa emcimbini wezindondo ama-grammy award ngenoni lengoma abayivubele ngokuhlanganyela esihloko sithi bayethe.

xho: ezi zinto sikwazileyo ukuzenza njengesizwe kulo nyaka uphelileyo, nangona besijamelene neengxaki ezimandla, zisikhumbuzile ukuba ela themba sasinalo ngomzantsi afrika lisekhona.
zul: lokho esikuzuzile njengesizwe kulo nyaka odlule, nakuba sinazo izinselele, kuyasikhumbuza ukuthi isithembiso seningizimu afrika siyaphila.

xho: lo msebenzi siwubonayo sele siwenzile ufanele ukuba usikhuthaze njengoko sisendleleni esingise phambili.
zul: inqubekela phambili esiyibonile kumele isinike isibindi ngenkathi sibheke phambili kwingomuso elingcono.

xho: kodwa noko kunjalo, namhlanje ndithetha nani, kumakhaya wenu mbombo zone zeli, abantu abaninzi bathwaxwa yintsokolo, abaninzi baxhalabile, abanye abazi nokuba mababheke ngaphi na, futhi abaninzi baphelelwe lithemba.
zul: kepha-ke nakuba kunjalo, njengoba ngikhuluma nani kusihlwa nje, emakhaya ezweni lonkana, abantu badlala inhlupheko, abaningi bakhathazekile, abaningi abanakho ukuqiniseka futhi abaningi abanalo ithemba.

xho: kodwa into endiqiniseke ngayo inye.
zul: kodwa-ke mina engiqinisekile ngakho yilokhu.

xho: yeyokuba nokuba sikweyiphi na intsunguzi ngoku, nokuba sijamelene neengxaki ezingakanani na ngoku, siza kufunquka sonke sijajulisane nayo, kwaye sibambisene, siza kuza noloyiso.
zul: noma ngabe ngobunjani ubunzima obukhona kulo mzuzu, noma ngabe yisimo esinzima kangakanani esibhekene naso, thina sizosukuma sibhekane nalokhu ngokuhlanganyela, futhi ngokubambisana sizonqoba.

xho: oku siza kukwazi ukwenza ukuba sisebenza ngokubambisana size singashiyi namnye ngasemva.
zul: lokhu sizokwazi ukukwenza uma sisebenzisana futhi engekho noyedwa umuntu esimshiya ngemuva.

xho: sithe nqwadalala apha namhlanje ngexesha elinzima.
zul: sibuthene lapha esikhathini lapho sibhekene nesimo esinzima.

xho: sele kuzinyanga eziliqela ngoku, izwe lakuthi lithwaxa yingxaki yokunqongophala kombane eyenze umonakalo ongathethekiyo kuqoqosho lweli lizwe.
zul: sekuphele eziningi izinyanga izwe lethu likhungethwe yinkinga enkulukazi yokushoda kukagesi esidale umonakalo omkhulu emnothweni wethu.

xho: futhi, kwiminyaka emibini phambi kwale nto, isizwe sakuthi savuthululwa ngubhubhane we-covid-19 eyabulala abaninzi yashiya abaninzi bezimpula zikalujaca.

xho: amaphulo aza kukhokelwa licandelo lobuntlola kumaziko ka-eskom akhokelele ekubeni kubanjwe abantu abangama-43.
zul: imikhankaso esekelwe phezu kolwazi lwezobunhloli seyiholele ekuboshweni kwabantu abangama-43 ezizindeni ezihlobene no-eskom kuze kube manje.

xho: njengenxalenye yenkqubo yokuzisa iinguqu, ilinge lokutshintshwa kwendlela akheke ngayo u-eskom esasilibhengezile ngaphambili liyaqhuba futhi ne-national transmission company enebhodi yayo ezimeleyo sele iza kuqalisa ukusebenza.
zul: njengengxenye yenqubo ebanzi yokwenziwa kwezinguquko, kuyaqhubeka ukuhlelwa kabusha kuka-eskom esakumemezela ngaphambilini futhi inkampani kazwelonke yokudluliswa nokuthunyelwa kukagesi izoqala khona maduze nje ukusebenza futhi izoba nebhodi elizimele.

xho: emaphelweni alo nyaka, siza kungenisa umthetho-sihlomelo oyilwayo wolawulo lombane oza kwenza iinguqu kwicandelo lezamandla uze uzale icandelo lezombane elinamaqumrhu amaninzi akhuphisanayo.
zul: ngokuhamba kwalo nyaka, sizokwethula umthethosivivinywa wokuchibiyela umthetho wokulawulwa kukagesi ukuze kulethwe uguquko emkhakheni wezamandla kagesi futhi kusungulwe imakethe kagesi enokuncintisana okufanele.

xho: njengoko sasitshilo ngenyanga yekhala kulo nyaka uphelileyo, sikwenza oko sineenjongo zokulwa le ngxaki kacimi-cimi wombane, siza kuqalisa ngephulo lokufakela amacangca esola phezu kwezindlu nezakhiwo.
zul: njengoba ngasho ngontulikazi ngonyaka odlule, futhi ngenhloso yokuxazulula inkinga yokucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga, sizoqhubekela phambili nokukhishwa kwamaphaneli kagesi welanga abekwa ophahleni.

xho: kwintetho yakhe yohlahlo lwabiwo-mali, umphathiswa wezemali uza kunika ingcaciso ngendlela amakhaya aza kuncedwa ngayo kunye nendlela aza kuxhamla ngayo amashishini kwizaphulelo zerhafu.
zul: enkulumweni yakhe yesabelomali, ungqongqoshe wezezimali uzochaza ukuthi amakhaya azolekelelwa kanjani kanye nokuthi amabhizinisi wona azohlomula kanjani kwisibonelelo-sikhuthazo sentela.

xho: unondyebo wesizwe wenza uhlenga-hlengiso kwimboleko-mali yokuncedisa eza kunceda amashishini amancinci atyale imali kwizixhobo zesola, zize neebhanki kunye namaziko emali yezophuhliso akwazi ukuboleka ngqo kwesi sikimu ukuze akwazi ukuqeshisa ngamacangca esola ebantwini asebenzisana nabo.
zul: umgcinimafa kazwelonke wenza izinguqukwana ezithile ohlelweni lokubolekisa ngemali yokuvuselela amabhizinisi akhahlamezekile ukuze ashaye ibuya, phecelezi i-bounce-back loan scheme ukuze kulekelelwe amabhizinisi amancane ekuthengeni ubuchwepheshe nemishini kagesi welanga, futhi ukuze kuvunyelwe amabhange kanye nezikhungo zezimali yentuthuko zikwazi ukuboleka ngqo kulolu hlelo ukwenza lula ukuqashiswa kwamaphaneli kagesi welanga kumakhasimende azo.

xho: enye yeenguqu emandla esiyenzileyo kukuvumela amaqumrhu abucala ukuba azivelisele owawo umbane.
zul: enye yezinguquko ezinohlonze esizenzile wukuvumela abathuthukisi-mhlaba abazimele ukuthi baphehle ugesi.

xho: ngoku kukho iiprojekthi ezingaphezulu kwe-100, ekulindeleke ukuba zivelise umbane ongama-9 000 mw.
zul: njengamanje sekunemiklamo engaphezu kwe-100, okulindeleke ukuthi ihlinzeke ngamandla amasha kagesi angama-9 000 mw ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.

xho: iinkampani ezininzi ezithatha inxaxheba kwinkqubo yokuvelisa umbane ohlaziyekayo ziza kuqalisa ukwakha amaziko azo zize zivelise umbane omtsha ngama-2 800 mw.
zul: kunezinkampani eziningana ezibambe iqhaza ohlelweni lwamandla kagesi avuselelekayo ezizokwakhiwa khona maduze nje futhi zizohlinzeka ngamandla amasha kagesi ongama-2 800 mw.

xho: u-eskom uza kuthenga umbane ongxamisekileyo oza kukwazi ukusetyenziswa zingaphelanga iinyanga ezintandathu ukulungisa iingxaki ezivela ekhwapheni ezingxamisekileyo.
zul: u-eskom uzothenga amandla kagesi esimo esiphuthumayo angathunyelwa kungakapheli izinyanga eziyisithupha ngenhloso yokuvala ngokushesha igebe elivulekile.

xho: sityale imali kumaphulo eengcingo zokuhambisa umbane kunye nezikhululo ezincinci zombane, ingakumbi kwiindawo ezifana nempuma koloni, emntla ntshona nasentshona koloni.
zul: sitshala izimali kumakhebuli nengqalasizinda entsha yokudlulisa nokuthumela ugesi kanye neziteshi ezincane, ikakhulukazi ezindaweni ezinjengempumalanga kapa, nyakatho kapa kanye nentshonalanga kapa.

xho: onke la malinge aza kubangela ukuba wenyuke kakhulu umthamo wombane oza kugalelwa kwiziko lombane lesizwe kwezi nyanga zili-12 ukuya kwezili-18 zizayo, nasemva koko.
zul: zonke lezi zinyathelo zizoholela ekukhuleni okukhulukazi kwamandla kagesi athunyelwa esikhungweni sikazwelonke samandla kagesi kulezi zinyanga eziyi-12 kuya kweziyi-18 ezizayo, kuya phambili.

xho: lo mbane uyahambelana nombono esinawo wokusebenzisa imithombo eyahlukeneyo yombane, equka ezi zikhululo zophehlo-mbane zamalahle zikhoyo, owesola, owomoya, owegesi, owenyukliya, oveliswa ngamanzi kunye neebhetri ezinobuxhaka-xhaka bokugcina umbane.
zul: la mandla kagesi azohlinzekwa ngendlela ehambisana nemithombo yethu kagesi oxubile kubandakanya iziteshi zethu ezikhona njengamanje eziphehla amandla kagesi ngamalahle, ugesi welanga, ugesi womoya, ugesi ophehlwa ngegesi, ugesi wenuzi, ugezi wamanzi kanye nogesi ogcinwe kubuchwepheshe bamabhethri.

xho: ukuze sisilandele ngokupheleleyo esi sicwangciso, kufuneka siqinisekise ukuba sinequmrhu elinamagunya aneleyo eliza kukwazi ukunika umkhomba-ndlela.
zul: ukuze luqaliswe ngokuphelele lolu hlelo, sidinga ukulawulwa okunohlonze okuzokwenziwa esizindeni esisodwa futhi sidinga nezinyathelo ezisheshayo futhi ezinohlonze.

xho: ngamaxesha anzima, kufuneka abe mnye umntu okanye iqumrhu elinika umkhomba-ndlela.
zul: esikhathini lapho sibhekene nesimo esinzima, sidinga isizinda esisodwa esizohlinzeka ngemiyalelo futhi sidinga umgudu wokusebenza owodwa ozolandelwa.

xho: nanjengokuba silungisa izinto ezingunobangela wale ngxaki sinayo, kufuneka siwujonge nomonakalo ewenzayo.
zul: ngokufanayo nokubhekana ngqo nembangela yale nkinga kumele futhi sibhekane ngqo nomthelela wayo.

xho: le ngxaki iya ithatha unyawo kwaye ithwaxa yonke into kwizwe lakuthi.
zul: le nkinga seyisabalale ngokuqhubekayo yaze yaba nomthelela kuyona yonke ingxenye yomphakathi.

xho: kufuneka sithathe amanyathelo ukuthibaza umonakalo owenziwa yile ngxaki kumafama, kumashishini amancinci, kwiziseko zethu zamanzi kunye nakwicandelo lezothutho.
zul: kumele sithathe izinyathelo ukunciphisa umthelela wale nkinga kubalimi, kumabhizinisi amancane, kwingqalasizinda yethu yamanzi kanye nasohlelweni lwethu lonkana lwezokuthutha.

xho: iziko lesizwe lezolawulo lwentlekele lide ekugqibeleni layihlela le ngxaki yombane sinayo laze umonakalo wayo lawuchaza njengentlekele.
zul: ngenxa yalokho-ke isizinda sikazwelonke sokuphathwa kwenhlekelele sesinqume ukuthi inkinga yamandla kagesi kanye nomthelela wayo kuthathwe njengenhlekelele.

xho: ke ngoko sibhengeza ngokusesikweni imeko yentlekele kwizwelonke ukuze sikwazi ukulwa le ngxaki kacimi-cimi wombane kunye nomonakalo ewenzayo.
zul: ngakho-ke, simemezela isimo sikazwelonke senhlekelele ukuze kubhekwane nenkinga kagesi nemithelela yayo.

xho: umphathiswa wolawulo ngentsebenziswano kunye nemicimbi yemveli sele esifakile kwigazethi esi sibhengezo sisesikweni semeko yentlekele, eza kuqala ngoku.
zul: ungqongqoshe wezokubusa ngokubambisana nezindaba zendabuko usanda kushicilela ukumenyezelwa kwesimo senhlekelele kusomqulu kahulumeni, okuyisimemezelo esizoqala ngokushesha ukusebenza.

xho: imeko yentlekele iza kusinceda sikwazi ukuthatha amanyathelo abonakalayo afunekayo ukuze sixhase amashishini akwicandelo lokuveliswa nokugcinwa kokutya kunye namaqumrhu asebenzisana neevenkile, kuquka nokukhutshwa kweejenareyitha, amacangca esola kunye nombane ongamane ucima.
zul: isimo senhlekelele sizosivumela ukuthi sihlinzeke ngezinyathelo ezinohlonze futhi eziphathekayo esizidingayo ukulekelela amabhizinisi ekukhiqizweni kokudla, ekugcinweni kwempahla kanye nokuthengwa nokuthengiswa kwempahla ezitolo, kubandakanya nokukhishwa kwemishini ephehla ugesi (amajeneretha), amaphaneli kagesi welanga kanye nokuphakelwa kwamandla kagesi okuqhubekayo futhi okunganqamuki.

xho: apho iingcali zikwaziyo, oku kuzakusinceda sitsho senze amaziko angundoqo afana nezibhedlela kunye namaziko okucocwa kwamanzi ukuba wona angacinyelwa umbane xa kukho ucimi-cimi wombane.
zul: lapho kunokwenzeka, lokhu kuzosivumela ukuba sikwazi ukubhekelela ngokukhethekile ingqalasizinda ekhethekile nesemqoka kakhulu enjengezibhedlela kanye nezizinda lapho kuhlanzwa khona amanzi, ngokuthi ungacinywa ugesi oya kulezi zikhungo.

xho: futhi iza kusinceda sikhawulezise iiprojekthi zezamandla size siphungule nemithetho enobucukubhede obuninzi ngeli thuba siqinisekisa ukuba senza kangangoko ukukhusela okusingqongileyo, silandela imigaqo yokuthenga iinkonzo kunye nelawula ubuchule obusetyenziswayo xa kusakhiwa.
zul: futhi lokhu kuzokwenza ukuthi sisheshise imiklamo yamandla kagesi futhi sinciphise izidingo zokulawula, kusenjalo futhi sigcine izinqubo ezinqala zokuvikelwa kwemvelo, imigomo yokuthengwa kwempahla-kusebenza kanye nemisebenzi kanye namazinga okumele athotshelwe okuqhutshwa komsebenzi ngendlela efanele.

xho: umphicothi-zincwadi-jikelele uza kudlala indima naye kuba nguye oza kuqinisekisa ukuba inkcitho ibekwe phantsi kweliso elibukhali ukuze anqande umkhuba wokusetyenziswa gwenxa kwezimali eziza kusetyenziselwa ukulwa le ntlekele.
zul: umcwaningimabhuku jikelele uzojutshwa ukuba aqinisekise ukuqashelwa nokuhlolwa ngokuqhubekayo kochithomali, ukuze kugwenywe ukuxhashazwa nokusetshenziswa ngokungafanele kwezimali ezidingekayo ukubhekana nale nhlekelele.

xho: ukuzilwa ngokukhawuleza size siziphelise nyha ezi ngxaki sijamelene nazo, ndiza kwanyula umphathiswa wezombane oza kuba kwi-ofisi kamongameli oza kuthathela kuye umsebenzi wokulawula zonke izinto ezinxulumene namanyathelo okulwa le ngxaki kacimi-cimi wombane, kunye nalo msebenzi ubusenziwa yikomiti yesizwe yokulwa ingxaki yombane.
zul: ukuze kubhekwane kahle futhi ngokushesha nezinselele esibhekene nazo, ngizoqoka ungqongqoshe wezikagesi ozozinza ehhovisi likamongameli ukuze kube nguyena ozokwenza ngokuphelele umsebenzi wokwengamela konke okuphathelene nezinyathelo esizithathayo ukubhekana nenkinga kagesi, kubandakanya nomsebenzi wekomidi likazwelonke lokubhekana nenkinga kagesi.

xho: ukunika nje ingcaciso emfutshane ukuze abantu bangabhideki, umpathiswa wamashishini karhulumente uza kuqhuba inguye omele urhulumente njengomnini-zabelo ku-eskom futhi uza kukhokela inkqubo yokutshintsha le ndlela akheke ngayo u-eskom, aqinisekise ukuba kuvulwa inkampani yokuhambisa umbane, ongamele inkqubo yokufezekiswa kwenkqubo yokutshintshela kuhlobo lombane ongenabungozi kokusingqongileyo ngendlela engazikushiya mntu ngasemva, aze akhokele nomsebenzi wokusekwa kwe-state-owned enterprises (ii-soe) holding company.
zul: ungqongqoshe uzogxila kulo msebenzi ngokuphelele futhi asebenzisane nebhodi kanye nabaphathi baka-eskom ekuqedeni ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kanye nokuqinisekisa ukuthi uhlelo lokusebenza lwamandla kagesi luqaliswa ngokushesha futhi ngaphandle kokubambezeleka.

xho: inkqubo yokwenza utshintsho kurhulumente iza kusinika ithuba lokuba sikwazi ukwaba imisebenzi nelokuba sibone ukuba singawasebenzisa njani na amasebe kunye nabaphathiswa ukuze babalasele kwindlela abawenza ngayo umsebenzi wesizwe.
zul: ukuze kuqedwe noma yikuphi ukudideka, ungqongqoshe wezamabhizinisi kahulumeni kusazolokhu kunguyena ummeleli womninimasheya kwa-eskom futhi ozoqhuba ukuhlelwa kabusha kuka-eskom, nokuqinisekisa ukusungulwa kwenkampani yokudlulisa nokuthumela ugesi, nokwengamela umsebenzi wokuqaliswa kohlelo lokuguqukela kugesi ohlanzekile oluqhutshwa ngobuqotho nobulungiswa, kanye nokwengamela ukusungulwa kwenkampani engumnikazi wamabhizinisi ombuso (ama-soe), phecelezi i-state-owned enterprises holding company.

xho: oku kufanelekile ukuba sikwenze kuba amanyathelo asebenzayo okulwa le ngxaki abandakanya amasebe namaqumrhu ahlukeneyo afuna ukukhokelwa kwi-ofisi ephezulu karhulumente.
zul: inqubo yokuhlelwa kabusha kukahulumeni izosinikeza ithuba lokubheka nokuhlonza ukuthi imisebenzi ehlukahlukene izokwenziwa kuyiphi imikhakha kanye nokuthi amahhovisi ongqongqoshe ahlukahlukene kanye neminyango ingalekelela kanjani ngokuphelele ekufezekiseni izinjongo zethu zikazwelonke.

xho: siza kubandakanya namanye amahlakani ezentlalo kwiqumrhu eliza kusebenza elifana neliya sasilisekile lalikhokela inkqubo yokugonywa kwabantu.
zul: okwamanje sigxile kakhulu enkingeni yamandla kagesi futhi ukuhlelwa kabusha kukahulumeni yinto esizoyenza ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.

xho: iimeko ezimaxongo zinyanzelisa ukuba kuthathwe amanyathelo angaqhelekanga.
zul: lokhu kudingekile ngoba phela ukuthathwa kwezinyathelo ezifanele ukubhekana nale nkinga kubandakanya iminyango nezikhungo eziningana ezihlukahlukene okuyinto edinga ukulawulwa ngendlela efanele okuvela kwiziphathimandla eziphezulu zikahulumeni omkhulu.

xho: njengoko sithatha la manyathelo ukusombulula le ngxaki yombane sijongene nayo, siyawuqonda nomonakalo onokwenziwa luguquko lwemozulu kwizwe lakuthi.
zul: sizobandakanya nabanye esisebenzisana nabo emphakathini ohlakeni olusebenza kahle olufana nalolo esalusungula ngenkathi siqhuba umsebenzi wokukhipha umgomo siwunikeza abantu.

xho: iimeko zemozulu ezimbi kakhulu eziyimbalela, izikhukhula kunye nemililo yamadlelo ziyingxaki engxamele ukuthatha unyawo nebeka iimpilo, ubomi kunye nokhuseleko lwabantu emngciphekweni.
zul: inkinga yamandla kagesi ibeka engcupheni umnotho wethu nokusebenza kwawo kanye nokuxhumana okuhle nensebenziswano emphakathini.

xho: siza kuqhubeleka nenkqubo yethu esekelwe kubulungisa yokutshintshelwa kuqoqosho olungakhuphi sisi sininzi siyingozi kokusingqongileyo ngesantya esiza kukwazi ukuhamba ngaso sisizwe nangendlela eza kuqinisekisa ukuba sinombane owaneleyo.
zul: kumele senze konke esingakwenza, futhi kungabi khona nokuncane ukubambezeleka esikuvumelayo ekuqaliseni lezi zinyathelo.

xho: le nkqubo yethu isekelwe kubulungisa yokutshintshela kuqoqosho olungeyongozi kokusingqongileyo siza kuyiqhuba ngendlela eza kuvula amathuba otyalo-mali, imizi-mveliso emikhulu zinto ezo zonke ziza kudala imisebenzi.
zul: njengoba sizothatha lezi zinyathelo ukuxazulula inkinga yamandla akagesi, buyinto esiyazi kahle kamhlophe ubungozi bokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu emphakathini wethu.

xho: ikhomishini kamongameli yezemozulu yiyo eza kukhokela la malinge, kwaye xa isenza njalo iza kuqalisa inkqubo yokubambisana nokuquka wonke umntu xa kuthathwa izigqibo, kuqukwe abantu, abasebenzi kunye noluntu oluchatshazelwa kakhulu lolu tshintsho luza kwenzeka.
zul: izehlakalo zesimo sezulu esixakile ezinjengesomiso, izikhukhula kanye nemililo yequbula zinobungozi obudlondlobalayo empilweni, inhlalakahle kanye nokuphepha kwabantu.

xho: ngokusebenzisa i-just energey transitions investment plan, imali eyitriliyoni eyi-1.5 yeerandi iza kutyalwa kuqoqosho lweli lizwe kule minyaka mihlanu izayo kumacandelo amatsha afana nelamandla ahlaziyekayo, elehayidrojini engeyongozi kokusingqongileyo kunye neemoto ezihamba ngombane.
zul: sizoqhubeka noguquko lwethu olunobuqotho nobulungiswa lokuguqukela emnothweni ohlanzekile okhiqiza ikhabhoni encane okuyinto esizoyenza ngesivivini esihambisana nesimo esizokwazi ukumelana naso izwe lethu futhi ngendlela eqinisekisa ukutholakala kwamandla kagesi ngokuqhubekayo futhi ngaso sonke isikhathi.

xho: amacandelo amaninzi ayaqalisa ukuvelisa kweli, afana neli likhulu lehaydrojini engeyongozi kokusingqongileyo, elezithuthi zombane kunye neeseli zokwenza umbane (i-fuel cells).
zul: ukuguqukela kwethu ngobuqotho nobulungiswa kugesi ohlanzekile sizokwenza ngendlela ezovula amathuba amasha otshalomali, kusungule izimboni ezintsha futhi ngaphezu kwakho konke, kube wuguquko oludala imisebenzi emisha.

xho: iiprojekthi eziliqela esele ziqalile, ziquka ukwakhiwa kweziko elitsha lika-sasol e-boegoebaai emntla koloni, i-prieska power reserve efreystatha kunye nephulo le-hydrogen valley elimpopo, gauteng nakwazulu-natal.
zul: ikhomishani yesimo sezulu kamongameli iyona elawula ingxenye enkulu yalo msebenzi, futhi, ngokwenza njalo, yakha uhlelo olusha lokuthathwa kwezinqumo okubandakanyayo futhi okwenziwa ngokuhlanganyela, ngokuthi kubandakanywe umuntu ngamunye, abasebenzi kanye nemiphakathi ekhahlamezeke kakhulu ngenxa yalolu guquko.

xho: iphondo lomntla koloni sele lingenelwe yimali engaphezulu kweebhiliyoni zeerandi ezili-100 evela koosomashishini abatyala imali kwiiprojekthi zombane ohlaziyekayo.
zul: ngokusebenzisa uhlelo lokuguqukela emandleni kagesi ohlanzekile olunobuqotho nobulungiswa, kuzotshalwa isamba semali engamathriliyoni angu-1.5 amarandi emnothweni wethu kule minyaka emihlanu ezayo emikhakheni emisha enjengomkhakha wamandla kagesi ovuselelekayo, ihayidrojini engayinukubezi imvelo kanye nezimoto ezisebenza ngogesi.

xho: la maphulo kunye namanye otyalo-mali kwicandelo lombane ohlaziyekayo aza kudala imisebenzi aze akhwezele noqoqosho lwezi ndawo hayi nje kuphela emntla koloni, koko nasempuma koloni, entshona koloni kunye nasempumalanga, aze atshintshe iindawo ekwakungathenjwa ukuba kungaze kutyiwe nto ngazo zibe zingingqi ezivelisa umbane namandla.
zul: kuneminye imikhakha emisha eminingana equbukayo emnothweni, njengomkhakha omkhulukazi wehayidrojini engayinukubezi imvelo, izimoto ezisebenza ngogesi kanye namaseli akhiqiza ugesi ngamakhemikhali, phecelezi ama-fuel cell.

xho: kuyo yonke le nto, inkqubo yethu esekelwe kubulungisa yokutshintshelwa kuqoqosho olungeyongozi kokusingqongileyo iza kukhokelisa phambili abasebenzi kunye noluntu kumacandelo angazinzanga ukwenzela ukuba kungabikho namnye oshiywa ngasemva.
zul: kunemiklamo eminingana eqhubekayo kakade kubandakanya ukuthuthukiswa kwesikhungo esisha ngabakwa-sasol e-boegoebaai enyakatho kapa, i-prieska power reserve efreyistata, kanye nomklamo wokukhiqiza ugesi ngehayidrojini, i-hydrogen valley initiative oqhutshwa e-limpopo, e-gauteng nakwazulu-natali.

xho: bemi bomzantsi afrika,uqoqosho lweli kufuneka lukhule ngokukhawuleza ukuba sifuna ukuphungula kakhulu inani labantu abangenamisebenzi.
zul: isifundazwe sasenyakatho kapa sesihehe utshalomali olungaphezu kwezigidigidi eziyi-100 zamarandi olufakwe emiklamweni yamandla kagesi ovuselelekayo.

xho: kulo nyaka uphelileyo kwi-sona sathetha ngeenjongo zethu zokwakha izivumelwano zezentlalo ezibanzi eziza kudibanisa onke amahlakani ezentlalo atsho asengele thungeni linye elikukwakha uqoqosho lweli lizwe lukwazi ukukuhluma kakhulu.
zul: le miklamo kanye neminye yotshalomali olufakwe emkhakheni wamandla kagesi ovuselelekayo izokwakha imisebenzi futhi ikhuthaze nokusimama kweminotho yendawo hhayi nje kuphela enyakatho kapa kodwa ngisho nasempumalanga kapa, entshonalanga kapa kanye nasempumalanga imbala, okuyinto ezoguqula ngisho ugwadule olome kakhulu lube yisikhondlakhondla somthombo wamandla kagesi.

xho: khange sikwazi ukusiqukumbela size sisityikitye isivumelwano sezentlalo ngela xesha besizisikele lona kuba kuye kwavela izinto ezininzi ezibangele ukuba amahlakani ezentlalo angakwazi ukuvumelana.
zul: ngaphezu kwakho konke, uguquko lwethu lokuguqukela emandleni kagesi ahlanzekile olunobuqotho nobulungiswa luzobeka eqhulwini abasebenzi kanye nemiphakathi esezimbonini ezisengcupheni ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi akekho noyedwa umuntu ozosala ngemuva.

xho: amahlakani ezentlalo sele etshilo ukuba ayafuna ukuba siqukunjelwe isivumelwano sezentlalo kwaye ayaqhubeleka nokuqulunqa isicwangciso esiza kwenza ukuba sikwazi ukusebenza ngokubambisana kwimiba engundoqo efana nezamandla, ezothutho kunye nezokuhanjiswa kweempahla, ezokudalwa kwemisebenzi nophuhliso lwezakhono, ezotyalo-mali nokuveliswa kweempahla apha kweli, elezezibonelelo zikarhulumente, ezolwaphulo-mthetho kunye norhwaphilizo.
zul: bantu bakithi baseningizimu afrika, umnotho wethu kudingeka ukuthi ukhule ngesivinini esikhudlwana impela uma sifuna ukunciphisa ukuntuleka kwemisebenzi ngendlela ebonakalayo nephawulekayo.

xho: nangona sizimisele ukwakha isivumelwano esitsha nawo onke amacandelo kwizwe lakuthi, sikwathathe nesigqibo sokuba sisebenzisane kwimiba ethile.
zul: kwi-sona ngonyaka odlule, sakhuluma ngenhloso yethu yokwakha isivumelwano esibanzi phakathi kukahulumeni nemiphakathi yonkana esabe sizohlanganisa bonke labo okubanjiswene nabo emphakathini ngaphansi kohlelo olulodwa lokwakha kabusha umnotho wethu kanye nokuvumela ukukhula okuphakeme.

xho: sikubonile ukuzimisela kwamahlakani ezentlalo kwizivumelwano esele zityikityiwe ezazimalunga nokulwa ubhubhane we-covid-19 kunye nokuqalisa iphulo lokugonywa kwabantu elilelona lalikhulu ezimbalini.
zul: asikwazanga ukuphothula isivumelwano somphakathi wonkana ngesikhathi esabe silindelekile ngenxa yokuqubuka kwezimo ezintsha eziningana ezenza ukuthi kube nzima ukuthi kube nokuvumelana nabo bonke okubanjiswene nabo emphakathini.

xho: sizibonile iziphumo zamaphulo afana ne-solidarity fund eyakwazi ukukhuthaza isizwe, yakhuthaza abantu ukuba babhinqe omfutshane, yacela namalizo ayimali isenzela ukulwa ingxaki yethu sonke, kunye nezivumelwano esingene kuzo zokulwa ubundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini nokubulawa kwamanina (i-gbvf) kunye nomonakalo owenziwa luguquko lwemozulu.
zul: labo okubanjiswene nabo emphakathi bazwakalise inhloso yabo yokwenza isivumelwano nohulumeni futhi baqhubekile nomsebenzi wokwakha uhlaka oluzovumela ukuthatha izinyathelo ngokuhlanganyela emikhakheni emqoka njengokagesi, ezokuthutha nokuhanjiswa kwempahla, ukwakhiwa kwemisebenzi nokuthuthukiswa kwamakhono, utshalomali nokulungiswa ngokuphelele kwemikhiqizo yezimbiwa neminye ngaphakathi kuleli, ukuvikelwa komphakathi, ubugebengu kanye nenkohlakalo.

xho: sizibonile izinto ezilulutho ngokusebenza ngale ndlela ngokukhuthaza utyalo-mali kunye nokuqulunqa izicwangciso ezingundoqo zamacandelo ezoqoqosho afana nelezezithuthi, elezempahla namalaphu, elezeenkuku, eleswekile, elezolimo kunye neleenkonzo zoshishino zehlabathi.
zul: ngenkathi sisalokhu sizibophezele ekwakheni ukuvumelana okusha phakathi kwayo yonke imikhakha yomphakathi wethu, siphinde futhi sathatha izinyathelo eziphathekayo zokubambisana ezindaweni ezithile.

xho: ezi zicwangciso zingundoqo sele ziqukunjelwe zincedisa kakhulu kumsebenzi wokuvuselela amacandelo afanelekileyo, ukungena kotyalo-mali luvela kwicandelo labucala kunye nokudalwa kwemisebenzi nokunceda kweempilo zabantu.
zul: kunezinye izivumelwano eziningana esizenzile nalabo esibambisene nabo emphakathini.

xho: ziyasichulumancisa iindaba zokuba amahlakani ezentlalo, ingakumbi amashishini, athe anika inkxaso kwinkqubo yokuphunyezwa kwesicwangciso sokusebenza sezamandla ngelokubonisa ukuzibophelela kwawo kwezi zivumelwano.
zul: siyakubona ukuzibophezela kwabo bonke labo okubanjiswene nabo emphakathini ezivumelwaneni ezenziwe ngenhloso yokulwisana nobhubhane lwe-covid-19 kanye nokuqhuba uhlelo lokugoma olungolukhulukazi emlandweni wethu.

xho: sikwasebenzisana kakhulu nemibutho yabasebenzi kunye noluntu ekuxhaseni eminye imiba yamanyathelo okulwa le ngxaki yombane sinayo.
zul: sizibonile izinhlelo ezinjengesikhwama sobumbano ezigqugquzele umphakathi, zakhuthaza ubushoshovu bezakhamuzi futhi zanxenxa uxhasomali ukuze kufezekiswe izinhloso ezifanayo, futhi okuyizinhlelo ezenziwe ngobambiswano okuhloswe ngalo ukuqeda udlame olubhekiswe kwabobulili obuthile kanye nokubulawa kwabantu besifazane (i-gbvf), kanye nokubhekana ngqo nemithelela yokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu.

xho: njengokuba amandla ebalulekile kuhlumo loqoqosho, amanzi nawo abaluleke ngokulinganayo necandelo lezothutho elisebenzayo ngokunjalo neziseko zendlela.
zul: siyibonile imihlomulo yale ndlela yokusebenza ekugqugquzeleni utshalomali kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwezinhlelo-ngqangi emikhakheni yomnotho enjengomkhakha wezimoto, owezingubo zokugqoka nendwangu, owezinkukhu, okashukela, owezolimo kanye nowezinsizakalo zebhizinisi zomhlaba wonke.

xho: imizila kaloliwe kulithuba ithwaxwa zingxaki zokungancediswa ngemali, ukungakhandwa, ulwaphulo-mthetho kunye nokungasebenzi ngendlela efanelekileyo.
zul: izinhlelo-ngqangi eseziphothuliwe zeseka ukuvuselelwa kabusha kwaleyo mikhakha ethintekile, nokufakwa kotshalomali okwenziwa ngabomkhakha ozimele kanye nokwakhiwa kwemisebenzi emisha kanye nezindlela zokuziphilisa.

xho: ukulungisa le ngxali, kulo nyaka uphelileyo samkela ngokusesikweni umgaqo-nkqubo wesizwe wezoololiwe oza kusetyenziselwa ukukhokela amaphulo okuphucula icandelo lezoololiwe nawokwenza iinguqu kulo, sikhululela, phakathi kwezinye izinto, ukuba amanye amaqumrhu angengorhulumente nawo akwazi ukuyisebenzisa imizila neziseko zoololiwe.
zul: kuyasithokozisa ukubona ukuthi labo esibambisene nabo emphakathini, ikakhulukazi abamabhizinisi, bebelokhu behlinzeka ngokweseka ukuqaliswa kohlelo lokusebenza lwamandla kagesi ngokomoya wobambiswano nokwenziwa kwezivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni nezinhlaka zomphakathi wonkana.

xho: singurhulumente siqulunqa isicwangciso sika-transnet esiza kuzalisekisa izithembiso esizenzileyo kumgaqo-nkqubo, kuquka nokutshintsha indlela kwakhiwe i-transnet freight rail ukuze sivule iqumrhu elilodwa elingumlawuli weziseko ezingundoqo wemizila kaloliwe ngeyedwarha 2023. utransnet kunye neenkampani zabucala baza kutyikitya izivumelwano zokusebenzisana kwizibuko lase-durban nelasengqura, into leyo eza kukhokelela ekubeni kutyalwe imali kamazibuko eli kuze kuphuculwe nendlela asebenza ngayo.
zul: ngokufanayo, sesakhe ubambiswano nensebenziswano eqinile nabasebenzi ngokunjalo futhi nomphakathi ekusekeleni eminye imikhakha yezinhlelo zokubhekana nenkinga yamandla kagesi.

xho: oku kuza kunceda amaziko eli lizwe ukuba abuyele kwakhona kula ndlela ayesaziwa ngawo kwihlabathi ukuba angawona asebenza ngokhawuleza.
zul: njengoba amandla kagesi ebalulekile ekukhuleni komnotho, kubalulekile futhi nokutholakala kwamanzi ngaso sonke isikhathi kanye nohlelo lwezokuthutha olusebenza kahle kanye nengqalasizinda yomgwaqo.

xho: izibuko lokulayisha izithuthi lasebhayi liqhube kakuhle kakhulu emva kokuba lilungisiwe, kuba ngoku likhulu ngokuphindwe kabini kwaye nomthamo wemithwalo ethunyelwa kumazwe angaphandle unyukile.
zul: uhlelo lwethu lokuthutha ngezitimela lukhahlamezekile ngenxa yeminyaka eminingi kungatshalwa izimali kulona ngendlela efanele, ungenziwa nomsebenzi wokulungisa, nezenzo zobugebengu kanye nokungaqhutshwa neze kahle komsebenzi.

xho: izithuthi ezininzi ezithunyelwa kumazwe aphesheya zilayishwa kwizibuko lasebhayi lokulayisha izithuthi.
zul: ngenhloso yokubhekana ngqo nalokhu, ngonyaka odlule, samukela inqubomgomo kazwelonke yezezitimela ukuze isihole ekwenzeni umkhakha wezitimela ube ngowesimanjemanje futhi kulethwe uguquko kuwona, kuhlinzekwe, phakathi kokunye, ngokufinyelela kwezikhungo nezinkampani ezingaphandle kukahulumeni ohlelweni lwethu lokuthutha ngezitimela.

xho: u-transnet naye uqalise inkqubo yokulungisa oololiwe abebekade bemile bengahambi futhi uyabongeza noololiwe bakhe.
zul: kuhulumeni wonkana sisebenzela ukuthuthukisa umhlahlandlela wakwa-transnet ozoguqula izibophezelo zenqubomgomo yethu zibe yinto eyenzekayo, ephathekayo futhi ebonakalayo, kubandakanya ukuhlelwa kabusha komkhakha wakwa-transnet wokuthuthwa kwempahla ngezitimela ukuze kwakhiwe umphathi wengqalasizinda oseceleni ozoqondana ngqo nohlelo lokuthutha ngezitimela ngaphambi kokuphela kukamfumfu 2023. u-transnet kanye nezinkampani zomkhakha ozimele bazokwenza izivumelwano zokubambisana nokusebenzisana esikhumulweni semikhumbi sasethekwini nesasengqura, ukuze kuvunyelwe ukungena kotshalomali olusha emachwebeni ethu futhi kuphuculwe nendlela aqhuba ngayo umsebenzi.

xho: emva kokuba kwenziwe utshintsho kwi-arhente yomzantsi afrika yoololiwe abalayisha abantu (u-prasa), imizila eli-13 yoololiwe abalayisha abantu ivuliwe kwakhona, into encede ukuba iphunguke kakhulu imali echithwa ngabasebenzi xa besiya emisebenzini.
zul: lokhu kuzolekelela amachweba ethu ukuthi abuyele endaweni abekuyo emhlabeni ngokuthi aphinde athathwe njengamanye amachweba awuqhuba ngobunyoninco obukhulu umsebenzi wawo.

xho: ukuba namanzi angamane ecinywa kubalulekile kwiimpilo zabantu nakuhlumo loqoqosho lweli lizwe.
zul: inkulu kakhulu impumelelo ezuziwe emsebenzini wokuguqula isimo sokusebenza kwesikhumulo sezimoto sase-port elizabeth, esesiwuphindaphinde kabili umthamo waso futhi osekuqalile kusona ukubonakala komthamo ophakeme wemikhiqizo ethunyelwa emazweni angaphandle.

xho: ukuqinisekisa ukuba sinamanzi awaneleyo ngoku futhi siza kuhlala sinawo nangomso, isebe lezamanzi nogutyulo likhokela inkqubo yokutyala imali kumaphulo okwakha iziseko ezingundoqo ezikhulu mbombo zone zeli.
zul: likhulile impela inani lezimoto ezithunyelwa ezimakethe zaphesheya eziphuma esikhumulweni sezimoto sase-port elizabeth.

xho: uza kuqala kulo nyaka umsebenzi wokwakha isigaba sesibini seprojekthi ye-lesotho highlands emva kokuba ukhe walibaziseka iminyaka emininzi.
zul: futhi u-transnet wenza umsebenzi wokulungisa nokuvuselela izitimela ebezihleli zingasebenzi futhi ukhulisa nenani lezitimela zakhe.

xho: emva kweminyaka engaphezu kweshumi kwaphakanyiswa ukuba kuza kwakhiwa i-umzimvubu water project, emva kwesithuba emva komsitho wokuphethulwa kwesoyi, isigaba sokuqala sayo siza kuqalisa kulo nyaka-mali uzayo.
zul: kulandela ukuhlelwa kabusha kwesikhungo sokuthuthwa kwabagibeli ngezitimela saseningizimu afrika, iyi-13 imizila yokuthuthwa kwabagibeli ngezitimela esiphinde yavulwa futhi, osekunciphise kakhulu izindleko zokugibela kubasebenzi abaningi.

xho: esi sigaba siza kubhatalelwa ngurhulumente futhi siquka ukwakhiwa kwedami lasentabelanga, iziseko ezingundoqo zokunkcenkceshela kunye nokufakelwa kwamanzi kwiilali ezingqongileyo.
zul: ukutholakala kwamanzi ngaso sonke isikhathi kusemqoka kakhulu kwinhlalakahle yabantu kanye nasekukhuleni komnotho wethu.

xho: isigaba esilandelayo siza kuba kukwakhiwa kwedami laselilane, lona eliza kuba nesikhululo sokuphehlwa kombane ngamanzi.
zul: ukuqinisekisa ukutholakala kwamanzi ngaso sonke isikhathi, manje nasesikhathini esizayo, umnyango wezamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle uhola inqubo yokutshalwa kwezimali emiklamweni yengqalasizinda emikhulukazi ezweni lonkana.

xho: iiprojekthi ezinkulu zokwandisa i-clanwilliam dam, ihazelmere dam kunye netzaneen dam ziza kuqinisekisa ukuba kukho amanzi awaneleyo ewest coast, ethekwini nakwimimandla esempuma yelimpopo.
zul: emuva kokubambezeleka iminyaka eminingana, kulo nyaka uzoqaliswa ngokuphelele futhi umsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwesigaba sesibili somklamo we-lesotho highlands.

xho: kulo nyaka uphelileyo, sabhengeza isicwangciso esigcweleyo sokwenza utshintsho ukuze siyenze lula inkqubo yokufaka isicelo selayisenisi yokusebenzisa amanzi, into leyo ibalulekileyo kuba iza kuvula amathuba otyalo-mali.
zul: umklamo we-lesotho highlands usemqoka kakhulu ekuqinisekiseni ukuphakelwa kwamanzi e-gauteng, efreyistata, empumalanga, enyakatho ntshonalanga kanye nasenyakatho kapa.

xho: ukususela ngoko, sele siziqukumbele izicelo zelayisenisi ebezingekagqitywa saze saphungula ixesha elithathwayo ukuqwalasela izicelo latsho lazintsuku ezingama-90.
zul: emuva kwamashuminyaka ambadlwana kwenziwa isiphakamiso futhi emuva kweminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye kwabanjwa umcimbi wokuphendula isoyi, isigaba sokuqala somklamo wamanzi i-umzimvubu water project sizoqaliswa kulo nyakamali ozayo.

xho: inkqubo yethu yokwakha iziseko ezingundoqo iya inyusa isantya ngokuncedwa yi-infrastructure fund and infrastruture south africa, eyasekelwa ukuxhasa amaphulo okwakha iziseko ezingundoqo.
zul: lesi sigaba, esibandakanya ukwakhiwa kwedamu i-ntabelanga dam, nengqalasizinda yokuchelela kanye nokuthunyelwa kwamanzi emiphakathini, sizoxhaswa ngezimali nguhulumeni.

xho: enye yezinto engumqobo omkhulu kutyalo-mali kwiziseko ezingundoqo kukunqongophala kwezakhono zobugcisa kunye nabantu abazingcali kwezolawulo lweeprojekthi.
zul: isigaba esilandelayo kuzoba wukwakhiwa kwedamu i-lilane dam, elizobandakanya nesiteshi esiphehla amandla kagesi ngamanzi.

xho: ukulungisa le ngxaki i-infrastructure south africa ibekele bucala imali ezizigidi ezingama-600 zeerandi eza kunceda kumsebenzi wokwenza amalungiselo eprojekthi, ingakumbi kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni nezihlelekileyo.
zul: imiklamo emikhulukazi yokukhuphula umthamo wamadamu i-clanwilliam dam, ne-hazelmere dam kanye ne-tzaneen dam izokwenza ngcono ukuphakelwa kwamanzi ogwini olusentshonalanga, ethekwini kanye nasengxenyeni esempumalanga ye-limpopo.

xho: le nkxaso siyikhuphayo kwakunye nezi zicwangciso siziqulunqileyo kule minyaka iliqela idlulileyo ngoku ziyaqalisa ukuza neziphumo ngokuba sibona urhulumente etyala imali eninzi kwiziseko ezingundoqo.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, samemezela uhlelo olubanzi lokuguqula isimo okuhloswe ngalo ukuhlela kabusha inqubo yezicelo zamalayisensi okusebenzisa amanzi, okuyinto esemqoka ekungeniseni utshalomali oluthe xaxa.

xho: ezi projekthi zigqityiweyo ziquka iindawo zokuhlala abantu egauteng, ukulungiswa kweendlela kunye nokuphuhliswa kwamazibuko asenxwemeni lolwandle amancinci.
zul: kusukela lapho, sesikuqedile ukusalela emuva komsebenzi wokukhishwa kwamalayisensi okusebenzisa amanzi futhi sabunciphisa nobude besikhathi sezicelo sayofinyelela ezinsukwini ezingama-90.

xho: kwimisebenzi yokwakha emikhulu, i-arhente yesizwe yomzantsi afrika yezendlela – i-sanral – sele ikhuphe izivumelwano zokwakha iindlela ezixabisa imali engaphezulu kweebhiliyoni zeerandi ezili-18 kwezi nyanga zintathu zidlulileyo.
zul: uhlelo lwethu lokwakhiwa kwengqalasizinda seluqala ukuhamba ngesivinini esikhulu impela ngenxa yomsebenzi owenziwa yisikhwama sengqalasizinda kanye nesikhungo sezengqalasizinda saseningizimu afrika, i-infrastructure south africa, okuyisikhungo esisungulelwe ukweseka imiklamo yengqalasizinda ekhethekile.

xho: umsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwebhulorho yasemsikaba kunye neyasemtentu uza kugqitywa into leyo eza kwenza ukuba kube lula ukusebenzisa iindlela empuma koloni.
zul: esinye sezithiyo ezinkulukazi kutshalomali lwengqalasizinda wukuntuleka kwamakhono obungoti bomsebenzi kanye namandla okuphathwa kwemiklamo.

xho: la maphulo aza kunceda icandelo lezokwakha futhi adale nemisebenzi emininzi, ancede kuphuhliso lwezakhono kunye nokulwa indlala, ingakumbi kwiilali ezikufutshane.
zul: ukuze kulungiswe lokhu, i-infrastructure south africa yabelwe isamba esiyizigidi ezingama-600 zamarandi okuyimali eqondiswe emsebenzini wokulungiselelwa kwemiklamo, ikakhulukazi ezindaweni zasemakhaya kanye nezindawo ezingenazo kahle izinsiza.

xho: kulo nyaka uphelileyo sithe siza kulandisa inani lebhulurho zasezilalini esiza kuzakha njengenxalenye yenkqubo ebizwa ngokuba yiwelisizwe, ukunze sincede abahlali bakwazi ukuwela ngeebhulorho baye ezikolweni, emisebenzini nakumanye amaziko anezinto eziluncedo kubo.
zul: izindlela zokweseka nokuhlela esizisungulile esaziqalisa kule minyakana embadlwana edlule manje seziqala ukubonisa izithelo ezinhle njengoba sekubonakala ukukhula kotshalomali lukahulumeni kwingqalasizinda.

xho: iibhuloro ezingama-24 sithetha nje ziyakhiwa kwiphondo lakwazulu-natal kwaye sele eqalisiwe namalungiselelo okwakha ezinye iibhulorho ezingama-24.
zul: ngomasingana kulo nyaka, iyisamba esiyizigidigidi ezingama-232 zamarandi imiklamo eyakhiwayo kanti futhi beseyiphothuliwe imiklamo ebalelwa kwisamba esiyizigidigidi ezine zamarandi.

xho: kwicandelo leziseko ezingundoqo zezonxibelelwano, ukugqitywa kwenkqubo yokuvulwa kwefandesi yokuthengisa amaza osasazo ivule amaphulo amatsha otyalo-mali agalele imali ezibhiliyoni ezili-14 zeerandi kwingxowa karhulumente.
zul: imiklamo esiphothuliwe ibandakanya imiklamo yezindlu ezintsha zokuhlalisa abantu e-gauteng, imiklamo yokulungiswa nokuthuthukiswa kwemigwaqo kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwamachweba amancane.

xho: kulo nyaka, siza kutshintshela kwinkqubo yosasazo edijithali kuze kucinywe uhlobo losasazo olu-analogu.
zul: maqondana nemiklamo yentuthuko emikhulu, isikhungo sezemigwaqo sakuleli, i-south african national roads agency – i-sanral – sesihlinzeke ngezinkontileka zokwakhiwa kwemigwaqo zenani eliyizigidigidi eziyi-18 zamarandi kule zinyanga ezintathu ezedlule.

xho: oku kuza kuvulela amaza osasazo afuneka ngamandla kuze kuqaliswe inkqubo yonxibelelwano ngeeselula eyi-5g ize iphungule neendleko ze-data.
zul: umsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwebhuloho imsikaba bridge kanye nebhuloho imtentu bridge uzophothulwa futhi uzokwenza kube ngcono kakhulu ukuhamba empumalanga kapa.

xho: la manyathelo asisondeza kufutshane kwiphupha lethu lokuba ne-intanethi efikelelekayo, ehamba ngesantya esiphezulu kumntu wonke.
zul: lolu tshalomali luzohlomulisa kakhulu imboni yezokwakha futhi luvumele ukwakhiwa kwemisebenzi eminingi, ukuthuthukiswa kwamakhono kanye nokuxosha indlala, ikakhulukazi emiphakathini yezindawo zasemakhaya eziseduzane.

xho: kwi-sona yalo nyaka uphelileyo, sathi siza kugxininisa kumba wokutsala utyalo-mali lungene kweli lizwe, into leyo iza kunceda ukwenza uqoqosho luhlume futhi kudaleke nemisebenzi.
zul: ngonyaka odlule sathi sizowukhulisa umsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwamabhuloho ezindaweni zasemakhaya njengengxenye yohlelo iwelisizwe, ukuze silekelele abahlali bakwazi ukufinyelela kalula futhi ngokuphepha ezikoleni, emsebenzini kanye nasezikhungweni ezisemqoka.

xho: sathi siza kulikhawulezisa iphulo esaliqala kwisithuba esiphantse sibe yiminyaka emihlanu esidlulileyo sokuqokelela imali yotyalo-mali olutsha oliyitriliyoni yeerandi eyi-1.2.
zul: angama-24 amabhuloho akhiwayo njengamanje kwazulu-natali futhi uyaqhubeka umsebenzi wokulungiswa kwezizinda okuzokwakhiwa kuzona amanye amabhuloho angama-24.

xho: kulo nyaka uphelileyo, kwinkomfa yomzantsi afrika yotyalo-mali (i-saic) safumana imali ezibhiliyoni ezingama-367 eerandi ezizithembiso zotyalo-mali, into leyo eyabangela ukuba sibe kufutshane kule mali sasizibekele ukuyiqokelela kwisithuba esiyiminyaka emihlanu.
zul: emkhakheni wezokuxhumana ngobuchwepheshe, ukuphothulwa kwendali yamagagasi omoya obuchwepheshe bezokuxhumana (spectrum) sekuvule amathuba otshalomali olusha futhi sekufake imali eyizigidigidi eziyi-14 zamarandi emgodlagodleni wezimali kahulumeni.

xho: kulo nyaka uphelileyo, uninzi lwezi zithembiso zikhokelele ekubeni iinkampani ezazenze ezo zithembiso zityale imali kwiifektri ezintsha, amaziko omnxeba emibuzo, imizi-mveliso yokuvelisa amacangca esola, iintambo ze-intanethi nonxibelelwano ezihamba phantsi kolwandle, ukwandiswa kwemizi-mveliso ekhoyo kunye nokuqaliswa kokusetyenziswa kweentlobo ezintsha zobuchwepheshe.
zul: ngokuqhubeka kwalo nyaka, sizofudusela amakhaya asele kwisiginali kamabonakude wedijithali futhi siphothule nenqubo yokucinywa kwesiginali kamabonakude osakaza nge-analogi.

xho: okubalulekileyo kukuba olu tyalo-mali ludalele amashishini amancinci nasakhasayo imisebenzi namanye amathuba.
zul: lokhu kuzokhulula amagagasi omoya obuchwepheshe bezokuxhumana ayigugu kakhulu ukuze asetshenziselwe ukukhishwa kwamanethiwekhi e-5g omakhalekhukhwini futhi kuzonciphisa izindleko zedatha.

xho: kule nkomfa, siza kuzibekela umyinge wemali yotyalo-mali esifuna ukuluqokelela ukusuka ngoku ukuya kunyaka wowama-2028 ibe yimali engaphezulu kweetriliyoni ezimbini zeerandi.
zul: lezi zinyathelo zizosisondeza ekufezekiseni inhlosombono yethu yokufinyelela kwabantu bonke ku-inthanethi engambi eqolo futhi esheshayo.

xho: la maphulo otyalo-mali aqhutywa kweli lizwe ukuza kuthi ga ngoku abangele ukuba unyuke umthamo weemveliso oveliswa apha ekhaya.
zul: ku-sona ngonyaka odlule, sathi sizogxilisa imizamo yethu ekugqugquzeleni amazinga aphakame otshalomali, okuyinto esemqoka ekukhuliseni umnotho nokwakha imisebenzi.

xho: la maphulo otyalo-mali athe asikhuthaza nathi ukuba sithenge iimveliso zeli.
zul: sathi sizofaka umfutho emkhankasweni esawuqalisa cishe eminyakeni emihlanu edlule wokuthola nokunxenxa utshalomali olusha olungamathriliyoni angu-1.2 amarandi.

xho: kulo nyaka uphelileyo, ndenza intetho ye-sona ndinxibe isuti kunye nezihlangu eziveliswe apha emzantsi afrika.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, ingqungquthela yesine yotshalomali yaseningizimu afrika, (i-saic) yathola izithembiso zotshalomali oluyisamba esiyizigidigidi ezingama-367 zamarandi, okuyinto ewakhuphule kakhulu amathuba okufezekisa umgomo weminyaka emihlanu wotshalomali okuhloswe ukufinyelela kuwona.

xho: namhlanje, ndisela amanzi ngeglasi eyenziwe ewadevilee kule veki iphelileyo ngabasebenzi basekatlehong, vosloorus nasegermiston.
zul: kulo nyaka odlule, eziningi zalezi zibophezelo ziholele ekutheni izinkampani ezenze lezo zibophezelo zitshale izimali emafemini amasha, izizinda ezamukela izingcingo, izikhungo zikagesi welanga, amakhebuli ezokuxhumana ahamba ngaphansi kolwandle, ukwandiswa kwezizinda zokukhiqiza kanye nokwamukelwa nokusetshenziswa kobuchwepheshe obusha.

xho: ukuba uyokwenza uqhaqho-tyando esibhedlela, maninzi amathuba uza kutofa ngechiza lokubala intlungu elenziwe kumzi-mveliso okumgangatho wehlabathi osempuma koloni.
zul: utshalomali olungenile emnothweni kuze kube manje lulekelelile ekukhuleni kakhulu komsebenzi wokukhiqiza kuleli.

xho: izivumelwano phakathi kweenkampani ezikhuphisanayo ziye zakhokelela ekubeni kuveliswe amafutha ezithuthi acolilweyo amaninzi kweli nokuba ukutya kuthengwe kumafama alapha kweli.
zul: lolu tshalomali selukhuthaze imizamo yethu yokuthenga imikhiqizo eyenziwe kuleli.

xho: kulo nyaka uphelileyo, sathembisa ngokuba siza kuvula amathuba otyalo-mali kwicandelo lezentsangu.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, ngathula i-sona ngigqoke isudu nezicathulo ezithungwe ngokuziqhenya khona lapha eningizimu afrika.

xho: isebe lezolimo, ukubuyekezwa komhlaba nokuphuhliswa kwamaphandle kunye nesebe lezempilo liza kulungisa ezi meko zikhoyo zitsho zilungele ukulinywa kwentsangu ukwenzela ukuba ikwazi ukulinywa phandle kunye nokuqokelelwa kwesivuno sayo kumafama asakhasayo.
zul: kusihlwa nje, ngiphuza amanzi ngengilazi eyenziwe e-wadeville ngeviki eledlule ngabasebenzi abavela e-katlehong, e-vosloorus nase-germiston.

xho: sele uqukunjelwa ngurhulumente umsebenzi ongxamisekileyo wokuqulunqa imithetho eza kulawula eli candelo, apho kuza kukhuthazwa ukusebenza ngendlela esemthethweni xa kuveliswa amayeza okuncedisa empilweni yomntu, ukutya, izinto zokuzihombisa kunye neemveliso zemizi-mveliso emikhulu, ngendlela ehambelanayo nemigaqo esetyenziswa kwihlabathi nemimiselo efanelekileyo esetyenziswayo jikelele.
zul: uma uya esibhedlela uyohlizwa, makhulu amathuba okuthi uthole izidambisizinhlungu ezenziwe esikhungweni sokukhiqiza esisezingeni lomhlaba esisempumalanga kapa.

xho: oku kuquka ukutshintshwa kwemali ezibekelwe bucala zamasebe zisetyenziselwe ukuphuhlisa eli candelo zize zixhase amafama wabantsundu asakhasayo, kunye nokwenza imithetho elandelwa ngamapolisa xa eqhuba umsebenzi wawo ihambelana nale mithetho mitsha.
zul: ohambweni lwami olusemthethweni lokuvakashela e-united kingdom ngonyaka odlule, ifemu yaseningizimu afrika yathola ilayisensi yokukhiqiza umgomo wesifo sohudo (ikholera) ophuzwayo okungokokuqala ngqa lapha eningizimu afrika.

xho: uqoqosho olukhulayo kufuneka lube luqoqosho oluxhanyulwa ngumntu wonke ngokukhawuleza.
zul: izivumelwano zokuhlanganiswa kwamabhizinisi abe yinkampani eyodwa sezihlinzekele ukuthi imikhiqizo kawoyela engeziwe ilungiswe futhi icwengwe kuleli futhi nokudla okuthe xaxa kuthengwe kubalimi bakuleli.

xho: inkomfa yokuqala yoosomashishini abakhulu abantsundu ngeyekhala kulo nyaka uphelileyo yasibonisa impumelelo entle yabemi bomzantsi afrika abantsundu kwicandelo lokuveliswa kokutya, eleentsimbi zeemoto, elefenitshala, elezempahla, elesinyithi, elekhemikhali kunye neemveliso zezemigodi, ngolo hlobo badale amawaka emisebenzi futhi bafaka isandla kwisambuku semveliso yelizwe yonyaka (i-gdp).
zul: ngonyaka odlule, sazibophezela ekuvuleni amathuba otshalomali emkhakheni wemikhiqizo yensangu.

xho: ngoku sinosoomashishini abakhulu abantsundu abamalunga newaka abathatha inxaxheba kwinkqubo yokuphuhlisa oosomashishini abakhulu abantsundu.
zul: siyaqhubeka nomsebenzi wokwakha izimo ezikahle ezizovumela lo mkhakha ukuthi ukhule.

xho: njengomzekelo wobuchule baba somashishini, omnye owaphumelela imbasa kula nkomfa yayiyinkampani yakwa-astrofica technologies, inkampani eyasekwa ngujessie ndaba olinina elintsundu encedisana nabanye, ibonelela ngeenkonzo ezinxulumene ne-data kwabo basebenza ngeesathelayithi ezisemajuku-jukwini.
zul: umnyango wezolimo, izinguquko kwezomhlaba kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya kanye nomnyango wezempilo izolungisa udaba lwezimo ezikhona njengamanje maqondana nokutshalwa kwensangu ukuze kuvunyelwe ukutshalwa kwayo ngaphandle kwezakhiwo kanye nokuqoqwa kwezivuno kubalimi bendabuko.

xho: mde umgama esiwuhambileyo kulo nyaka uphelileyo malunga nokuqinisekisa ukuba abasebenzi badlala indima yokuba ngabanikazi-mashishini kweli lizwe.
zul: lokhu kuzovula amathuba amakhulukazi omnotho ezindaweni zasemakhaya zakuleli, ikakhulukazi empumalanga kapa, kwazulu-natali nasempumalanga.

xho: uhlumo kunye namaphulo okudala imisebenzi kuqoqosho lweli lizwe aza kuqhutywa ngamashishini amancinci naphakathi, ookopoletyeni kunye namashishini angabhaliswanga ngokusesikweni.
zul: uhulumeni uphothula umsebenzi ophuthumayo ukuze kwakhiwe uhlaka lwemithetho elawulayo oluzovumela ukusetshenziswa kwemikhiqizo yesihlahla sonke ngokuphelele, nendlela yokusebenza ezovumela imisebenzi evumelekile ukuze isihlahla sisetshenziselwe ukwakha imithi, ukudla, izimonyo, kanye nemikhiqizo yezimboni, ngokuhambisana nezivumelwano zamazwe ngamazwe kanye nezinkambiso ezingungqaphambili.

xho: kulo nyaka uphelileyo saphehlelela isikimu semali-mboleko yokuvuselela ishishini ekhutshwa zibhanki kunye namanye amaziko ezimali, kuze kubanjiswe ngorhulumente.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ukwabiwa kabusha kwezabelomali zeminyango ukuze kuthuthukiswe lo mkhakha futhi kwesekwe abalimi bendabuko, abamnyama, futhi kuhanjelaniswe nomsebenzi we-saps wokuphoqelela ukuthotshelwa komthetho nezinguquko zokulawula.

xho: isebe lezokuphuhliswa kwamashishini amancinci liza kusebenzisana nonondyebo wesizwe ngendlela esi sikimu esiza kwenziwa ngayo ukuba singaqhwaleli ndawo ukuze sincede amashishini amancinci naphakathi kunye nalawo angabhaliswanga ngokusesikweni.
zul: ingqungquthela yokuqala yosozimboni abamnyama eyabanjwa ngontulikazi ngonyaka odlule yabonisa impumelelo yabantu abamnyama baseningizimu afrika ekukhiqizeni ukudla, izingxenye zezimoto, ifenisha, izingubo zokugqoka, insimbi, amakhemikhali kanye nemikhiqizo yezimayini, osekudale izinkulungwane eziningi zemisebenzi futhi kwafaka isandla kwisambamkhiqizo sezwe.

xho: ukulwa le ngxaki yokunqongophala kwemisebenzi, isaphulelo serhafu yengqesho sandisiwe ukuze sikhuthaze amafama aqashe abantu abatsha abaninzi.
zul: manje sesinosozimboni abamnyama ababalelwa kwabayi-1 000 ababambe iqhaza ohlelweni losozimboni abamnyama.

xho: kulo nyaka uphelileyo, ndabhengeza ukuba siza kubuphungula ubucukubhede obuthandwa ukufunwa ngabasemagunyeni ngolo izwe lakuthi lingabinabo obu bucedu-cedu bulibambezelayo.
zul: njengesibonelo sekhono lezobuchwepheshe elimangalisayo losozimboni labo, enye inkampani eyahlabana ngendondo kule ngqungquthela yi-astrofica technologies, okuyinkampani eyasungulwa ngokubambisana ngowesifazane omnyama, u-jessie ndaba, ohlinzeka ngezinsiza zedatha yokusetshenziswa kwamasathelayithi.

xho: iingcali zokwenza lo msebenzi wokuphungula umthamo wobucukubhede obuthanda ukufunwa ngabasemagunyeni kwi-ofisi kamongameli ezikhokelwa ngumnu sipho nkosi sele kulithuba zisebenza namasebe ahlukeneyo ngeenjongo zokwenza ukuba kube lula ukuqalisa ishishini.
zul: kulo nyaka odlule, senze inqubekela phambili ekufezekiseni amazinga aphakeme obunikazi bomnotho kubantu abamnyama.

xho: kuncede intsebenziswano, kuphathiswene namasebe kunye nezinye ii-arhente kumacandelo afana nelezokukhutshwa kweelayisenisi zemigodi, ukukhutshwa kweelayisenisi zokuqhuba izithuthi ezihambisa abakhenkethi, ukukhutshwa kwee-visa namaphepha-mvume okusebenza, okuvula izikolo-mpeleso kunye nawecandelo lamashishini angabhaliswanga ngokusesikweni.
zul: ukukhula nokwakhiwa kwemisebenzi emnothweni wethu kuzoqhutshwa ngamabhizinisi asafufusa, imifelandawonye kanye namabhizinisi angahlelekile.

xho: kulo nyaka, siza kuqukumbela izilungiso ezenziwe kumthetho wamashishini, wowe-1991 (umthetho 71 wowe-1991) ukuphungula imithetho eyimiqobo esokolisa amashishini amancinci, aphakathi namancinane (ii-smme) kunye nookopolotyeni kuze kwenziwe lula ukuba oosomashishini bavule amashishini.
zul: ngonyaka odlule sethula uhlelo lokubolekisa ngemali kumabhizinisi akhahlamezekile ukuze ashaye ibuya, olulawulwa ngamabhange nezinye izikhungo zezimali, futhi oluqinisekiswe nguhulumeni, ukuze kulekelelwe izinkampani ezidinga ukuxhaswa ngezimali ukuba zivuke kwimithelela yobhubhane.

xho: ngokusebenzisa i-small enterprise finance agency – siceba ukubekela bucala imali eyibhiliyoni yeerandi eyi-1.4 eza kuxhasa oosomashishini abasakhasayo abangaphezulu kwama-90 000. urhulumente, ebambisene ne-sa sme fund uceba ukuseka ingxowa eza kuba nemali ezibhiliyoni ezilishumi zeerandi eza kuxhasa kumaphulo okukhulisa ii-smme.
zul: umnyango wezokuthuthukiswa kwamabhizinisi amancane uzosebenzisana nomgcinimafa kazwelonke maqondana nokuthi luzoqiniswa kanjani lolu hlelo ukuze kulekelelwe amabhizinisi asafufusa kanye namabhizinisi asemkhakheni ongahlelekile.

xho: urhulumente ucinga ukufaka isandla ngemali ezibhiliyoni eziyi-2.5 yeerandi ize enye le izibhiliyoni zeerandi eziyi-7.5 ivele kwicandelo labucala.
zul: ukuze kubhekwane nenselele yokuntuleka kwemisebenzi entsheni, seluliwe isibonelelo-sikhuthazo sentela yokuqasha ngenhloso yokukhuthaza amabhinizinisi ukuthi aqashe abantu abasha abaningi.

xho: ukukhutshwa kwelayisenisi ye-postbank kuza kuba ngamaqalela okuvulwa kwebhanki karhulumente eza kuncedisa ngemali ii-smme, amashishini olutsha nawamanina kunye nabantu abangafumani nkxaso yaneleyo.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, ngamemezela ukuthi sihlose ukunciphisa izinqubo zemidanti nemicikilisho eminingi kwinkambiso kahulumeni ukuze kuqedwe ukubambezeleka okungenasidingo ezweni lethu okuvamise ukuvimbela inqubekelaphambili esheshayo.

xho: njengokuba indlu yowiso-mthetho yesizwe iza cubungula umthetho-sihlomelo oyilwayo we-postbank, i-postbank izama ukuhlaziya uluhlu lweenkonzo eza kuzinikezela ngazo ukuze ikwazi ukuba yibhanki iza kunikezela ngeenkonzo ezingcono kunezo zinikezwa zezi bhanki zesiqhelo.
zul: ithimba lokuncishiswa kwezinkambiso ezibambezelayo elizinze ehhovisi likamongameli eliholwa ngumnu sipho nkosi belilokhu lisebenzisana neminyango ehlukahlukene ukwenza kube lula ukwenza ibhizinisi.

xho: eyona ndlela iyiyo neyenza umahluko yokwakha uqoqosho kukuxhobisa abantu ngezakhono kunye nolwazi lokwenza lo msebenzi.
zul: lokhu kulandele indlela yokusebenza ngokubambisana, ngokuthi kusetshenziswane neminyango kanye nezikhungo zikahulumeni emikhakheni enjengohlelo lwamalungelo okumba ezimayini, amalayisensi abaqhubi bamabhizinisi ezokuthutha kwezokuvakasha, ama-visa nezimvume zokusebenza, ukuthuthukiswa kwezingane ezisencane kanye nomkhakha ongahlelekile.

xho: ke ngoko oku sixakekile sizama ukuqinisekisa ukuba kukho unxibelelwano phakathi kwezakhono ezikhoyo kweli lizwe kunye nezo zifunwa emisebenzini.
zul: kulo nyaka, sizophothula izichibiyelo zomthetho wezamabhizinisi, we-1991 (umthetho wama-71 we-1991) ukuze kuncishiswe izithiyo zokulawula kumabhizinizisi asafufusa (ama-smme) kanye nemifelandawonye futhi kwenziwe lula ukuthi osomabhizinisi basungule amabhizinisi.

xho: kulo nyaka, i-national skills fund iza kunikezela ngemali ezizigidi ezingama-800 zeerandi eza kusetyenziselwa ukuphuhlisa izakhono kwicandelo lezedijithali nobuchwepheshe ngokusebenzisa inkqubo entsha edibanisa intlawulo ekhutshelwe uqeqesho kunye nokuba lo mntu uqeqeshiwe uwufumene na umsebenzi.
zul: ngokusebenzisa isikhungo sokuxhaswa kwamabhizinisi amancane ngezimali – sihlose ukuhlinzeka ngoxhasomali oluyizigidigidi ezingu-1.4 zamarandi kosomabhizinisi abangaphezu kwezi-90 000. uhulumeni, ngokubambisana nesikhwama i-sa sme fund usebenzela ukusungula isikhwama esiyizigidigidi eziyi-10 zamarandi ngenhloso yokweseka ukukhuliswa kwama-smme.

xho: siyasiphinda isibongozo esasenza kumashishini, amasebe kunye nee-soe ukuba zilisuse ela solotya linyanzelisa ukuba abantu babenamava okusebenza phambi kokuba baqeshwe kwizikhundla ezisezantsi zabantu abaqalayo ukusebenza.
zul: uhulumeni ubheke ukuthi kunokwenzeka yini ukuthi yena ahlinzeke ngoxhasomali oluyizigidigidi ezi-2.5 zamarandi kulesi sikhwama bese kuthi lena enye imali esele eyizigidigidi eziyisi-7.5 zamarandi itholakale kwabomkhakha ozimele.

xho: kulo nyaka uphelileyo, sathi siza kufunela imisebenzi abafundi abaphumelele kwiikholeji zemfundo noqeqesho lobugcisa namakhondo ezandla (i-tvet) abangamawaka alishumi.
zul: ukuhlinzekwa kwe-postbank ngelayisensi kuzobeka isisekelo sokusungulwa kwebhange lombuso elizohlinzeka ngezinsizakalo zezimali kuma-smme, amabhizinisi abantu abasha kanye nawabantu besifazane kanye nemiphakathi engakutholi kahle ukuhlinzekwa ngezinsiza ezifanele.

xho: siye sagqitha kweli nani besizibekele lona kwaye ngoku silinyusile eli nani laya kutsho kuma-20 000 kulo nyaka wama-2023.
zul: njengoba isigungu sikazwelonke sicubungula isichibiyelo somthethosivivinywa weze-postbank, i-postbank ibuyekeza izinsizakalo ezihlinzekayo ukuze ikwazi ukuhlinzeka ngezinsizakalo ezingasebenziseka ngempumelelo futhi ezingambi eqolo ezingasetshenziswa ngabantu esikhundleni sokusebenzisa amabhange ajwayelekile.

xho: inani labafundi abaqeqeshelwa ubugcisa kwiikholeji ze-tvet liza kunyuka lisuka kuma-17 000 liye kutsho kuma-30 000 ngowama-2023.
zul: indlela esebenza kahle kakhulu futhi engasebenziseka ngempumelelo isikhathi eside yokwakha umnotho wukucija abantu ngamakhono kanye nolwazi lokuthi bangawuqhuba kanjani.

xho: enye yezinto ezinceda kakhulu kuhlumo loqoqosho kunye nokukwazi ukumelana nokhuphiswano kukukwazi ukuba nabantu abanezakhono ezifunwa luqoqosho.
zul: ngakho-ke besisebenza ngenhloso yokuqinisa ukuxhumana phakathi kwamakhono esiwathuthukisayo kanye namakhono adingwa ngabaqashi endaweni yokusebenzela.

xho: emva kokuba siqhube uhlaziyo olunzulu lwenkqubo yethu yokunikezela ngee-visa ezineempepha-mvume zokusebenza, siza kuqalisa ukuphumeza iziphakamiso ezenziweyo ngokukhawuleza.
zul: kulo nyaka, isikhwama sikazweloke samakhono sizohlinzeka ngemali eyizigidi ezingama-800 zamarandi yokuthuthukisa amakhono emkhakheni wezedijithali nowezobuchwepheshe ngokusebenzisa uhlelo olunobuhlakani bokusebenzisa amaqhingasu amasha oluxhumanisa inkokhelo yokuqeqeshwa kanye nemiphumela yokuqashwa.

xho: oku kuquka ukuqalisa inkqubo ezakusebenzisa amanqaku athile ukuze kutsalwe abantu abanezakhono bamazwe angaphandle ukuba bafudukele kweli lizwe, siqalise inkqubo ekhuthaza ukuba abaqeshi nabo bathembeke into leyo iza kwenza ukuba kube lula kubatyali-zimali abakhulu futhi nezinto ezifunekayo xa kufakwa izicelo nazo ziphungulwe.
zul: sigcizelela kwikhwelo lethu elibhekiswe ezinkampanini, iminyango kanye nama-soe lokuthi basuse isidingo sokuthi abantu abasha kumele babe nesipiliyoni somsebenzi uma befuna ukuqashwa emisebenzini esesigabeni sokuqala.

xho: siza kuqalisa inkqubo yokukhupha ii-visa zabantu abaza kusebenza besebenzisa ubuxhaka-xhaka bale mihla bekumazwe abo size siqalise iinkqubo ezintsha eziza kwenza kube lula kumashishini akumacandalo akhula kakhulu.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, sathi sizofaka emsebenzini abafundi abangaphezu kwezi-10 000 abaphothule izifundo zabo emakolishi ezobuchwepheshe namakhono ezandla nokuqeqeshwa (ama-tvet).

xho: ngeli thuba le nkqubo yokwenza iinguqu iqhuba, siza kuqhubeleka nokuxhasa amaphulo karhulumente nawoluntu okudala imisebenzi ukulungiselela abo baxhamlayo kuwo.
zul: sidlulile kuleli nani futhi manje sesizibekele inani esifuna ukufinyelela kulona ngowezi-2023 labafundi abaphothule kuma-tvet abayizi-20 000. inani labafundi abangenela ukuqeqeshelwa umsebenzi wobungcweti bamakhono ezandla emakolishi angama-tvet lizokhushulwa lisuka kubafundi abayizi-17 000 liyofinyelela kubafundi abayizi-30 000 ngonyaka wemfundo wezi-2023.

xho: kulo nyaka uphelileyo sithethile ngegalelo elibalulekileyo elenziwa yi-presidential employment stimulus malunga nokudala imisebenzi kunye namathuba okuziphilisa.
zul: enye yezinto ezisemqoka kakhulu ekukhulisweni komnotho nokuzibeka ethubeni lokuncintisana kahle yikhono lokuheha amakhono adingwa ngumnotho.

xho: eli phulo ngoku sele livule amathuba angaphezulu kwesigidi, kwaye lenza umahluko kuwo onke amaphondo kunye nezithili kweli lizwe lakuthi.
zul: njengoba sesiwuphothulile umsebenzi obanzi wokubuyekezwa kohlelo lwama-visa omsebenzi, sizoqhubeka ngokushesha ukuqalisa ukusebenza kwezincomo eziphakanyisiwe.

xho: kulo nyaka uphelileyo, abantu abatsha abasebenza njengootitshala abancedisayo abangama-150 000 baqalise ukusebenzisa kwizikolo ezingaphezulu kwama-22 000. amathuba afana nala abanika isidima, ithemba futhi bafumane namava okusebenza abantu abatsha abebekade bengasebenzi.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ukusungulwa kohlelo olusekelwe phezu kwamaphuzu oluguqulekayo ukuze luhambelane nezimo ezihlukahlukene ukuze kuhehwe abantu bakwamanye amazwe abanamakhono, kuqaliswe uhlelo lwabaqashi abathembakele ukuze kwenziwe inqubo ye-visa ibe lula kubatshalimali abakhulu futhi kuhanjelaniswe ngendlela efanele izidingo zokufakwa kwezicelo.

xho: i-social employment fund iza kuthatha abantu abangama-50 000 kwesi sigaba silandelayo abaza kwenza imisebenzi yobulungisa, ize yona i-national youth service evuselelweyo idale amanye amathuba angama-36 000 ngokusebenzisa imibutho engenzi inzuzo kunye neyoluntu.
zul: sizokwethula futhi ne-visa yabasebenzi abazosebenza bekude nendawo yokusebenzela futhi kube nohlelo olukhethekile lokubhekelela ukusungulwa kwamabhizinisi amasha anamandla nekhono lokukhula ngesivinini futhi anwebeke ngokushesha.

xho: isebe lemicimbi yezekhaya liqashe abantu abatsha abangasebenziyo abangama-10 000 abaza kukhuphela kwikhompyutha amaxwebhu aneenkcukacha zabantu angaphezulu kwezigidi ezingama-340.
zul: ngenkathi kuqhubeka uhlelo lwezinguquko, sizoqhubeka nokweseka ukuqashwa kwabantu kuhulumeni nasemphakathini ukuze kuhlinzekwe ngomsebenzi kulabo abawudingayo.

xho: mobi., ikhasi lonxibelelwano elingafuni mali labantu abatsha bomzantsi afrika abalisebenzisela ukukhangela amathuba emisebenzi nawokufunda.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, sakhuluma ngosizo lohlelo lukamongameli lokukhuthaza ukuqashwa kwabantu ekuhlinzekeni ngamathuba omsebenzi nawokuziphilisa.

xho: oku kwenziwe ngentsebenziswano ne-arhente yesizwe yophuhliso lolutsha (i-nyda), eqhubekayo nokubonelela ngoncedo olubalulekileyo koosomashishini abatsha kunye nabo bafuna imisebenzi.
zul: manje lolu hlelo seludale amathuba angaphezu kwesigidi esisodwa, futhi selufinyelele kuzo zonke izifundazwe nezifunda ezweni lethu.

xho: amafama akhasayo amalunga nama-140 000 afumana iivawutsha zokuthenga imbewu, izichumiso kunye nezixhobo zokulima, ngolo hlobo saba kanti senza igalelo kumalinge okuqinisekisa ukuba kukho ukutya okwaneleyo futhi kwenziwa neenguqu kwicandelo lezolimo.
zul: ngeviki eledlule, iqembu elisha labasebenzi abangabasizi ezikoleni abayizi-150 000 liqalile ukusebenza ezikoleni ezingaphezulu kwezi-22 000, okuyinto ehlinzeke ngesithunzi, ithemba kanye nesipiliyoni somsebenzi esibaluleke kakhulu kubantu abasha abebengasebenzi.

xho: eli phulo likhokelele ekubeni kulinywe umhlaba ozihektare ezingama-640 000. ama-68% onke abantu abathatha inxaxheba kweli phulo ngabantu ababhinqileyo.
zul: isikhwama sokusiza abangasebenzi emphakathini sizoqasha abanye ababambiqhaza abayizi-50 000 esigabeni saso esilandelayo abazokwenza umsebenzi ozohlomulisa umphakathi wonkana, kanti futhi uhlelo lukazwelonke lwemisebenzi yentsha luzokwakha amanye amathuba angeziwe ayizi-36 000 ngokusebenzisa izinhlangano ezingenzi nzuzo kanye nezinhlangano ezisebenzela ngaphakathi emiphakathini.

xho: kulo nyaka sineenjongo zokukhupha iivawutsha ezingama-250 000 eziza kunikwa amafama asakhasayo.
zul: umnyango wezasekhaya usuqashe iqembu lokuqala labantu abasha abangasebenzi abayizi-10 000 abazosusa imininingwane yabantu engaphezu kwezigidi ezingama-340 egcinwe emaphepheni bayifake kumakhompyutha.

xho: le yimizekelo yomahluko onokwenziwa ngurhulumente kwiimpilo zabantu ngokusebenzisa ukuhlakanipha, ubukrele-krele nokuzimisela.
zul: mobi, okuyinkundla ye-inthanethi okungenwa kuyona mahhala eyenzelwe abantu abasha baseningizimu afrika ukuze bakwazi ukufinyelela emathubeni okufunda kanye nokuzitholela imali.

xho: bemi bomzantsi afrika,iindleko zezinto ezisisiseko zenza indlala nokungalingani kuthathe unyawo.
