zul: lokhu kwenziwe ngokubambisana kanye nokusebenzisana kakhulu nesikhungo sikazwelonke sokuthuthukiswa kwentsha (i-nyda), okuyisikhungo esiqhubekayo nokuhlinzeka ngosizo olukhulu kubantu abasha abangosomabhizinisi kanye nabantu abafuna umsebenzi.

xho: kukho umsebenzi wefektri egqeberha ungazaziyo nokuba ingomso limphathele ntoni na kuba ucimi-cimi wombane eyivalile le fektri asebenza kuyo.
zul: uhlelo lukamongameli lokukhuthaza ukuqashwa kwabantu nalo futhi luyabeseka abantu ukuze bakwazi ukuziphilisa.

xho: ngumsebenzi karhulumente ukunika abantu izibonelelo zokugcina iqondo lentsokolo likwinqanaba elithile ekungekho mmi womzantsi afrika kufanelekileyo ukuba abe ngaphantsi kulo.
zul: abalimi abancane abayizi-140 000 bathole amavawusha ezolimo okuthenga imbewu, umanyolo kanye namathuluzi, okuyinto esikhuthaze ukutholakala kokudla okwanele kanye nezinguquko kwezolimo.

xho: sithetha nje, kweli lizwe lakuthi kukho abantu abangaphezulu kwezigidi ezingama-25 abaphila ngeentlobo ezahlukeneyo zezibonelelo-mali.
zul: lesi sinyathelo sesiholele ekulinyweni komhlaba ongamahektha ayizi-640 000. okuhlaba umxhwele kulokhu wukuthi ama-68% kulaba balimi ngabantu besifazane.

xho: ukongeza, amakhaya asokolayo amalunga nezigidi ezibini afumana amanzi angumlinganiselo othile asimahla, umbane ongumyinge othile osimahla futhi nenkonzo yokuthuthelwa inkunkuma bayifumana simahla.
zul: kulo nyaka, sihlose ukuhlinzeka ngamavawusha angeziwe ayizi-250 000 kubalimi abancane.

xho: imali emalunga nama-60% kuhlahlo lwabiwo-mali lweli lizwe ichithwa kwizibonelelo-mali, ezizintlobo ezahlukeneyo zenkxaso, ezeenkonzo ezisisiseko kunye noncedo olunikwa amakhaya kunye nabantu bakwazi ukugxotha ikati eziko.
zul: lezi yizibonelo zomehluko ongenziwa nguhulumeni ezimpilweni zabantu ngokusebenzisa amaqhingasu amasha, ukusebenza ngobuhlakani kanye nokuzinikela.

xho: njengelinge lokuxhasa lo msebenzi kunye nokulwa ingxaki yokunyuka kwamaxabiso ezinto, siza kuqhubeleka ne-social relief distress (i-srd) grant, ekungoku efunyanwa ngabantu abamalunga nezigidi eziyi-7.8.
zul: bantu bakithi baseningizimu afrika, izindleko zokuphila ezikhulayo zenza sibe sibi kakhulu isimo sobubha kanye nokungalingani.

xho: siza kuqinsekisa ukuba izibonelelo-mali zezentlalo ziyenyuswa ukuze zikhusele abantu bangathwaxwa kakhulu yintlungu yokunyuka kwamaxabiso ezinto.
zul: abantu baseningizimu afrika abayizigidi ngezigidi abakwazi ukuzondla futhi bondle nemindeni yabo.

xho: ingcaciso ethe vetshe malunga noku iza kunikwa ngumphathiswa wezemali xa esenza intetho yohlahlo lwabiwo-mali.
zul: kunomama ozikhulisela abantwana bakhe ngayedwana e-alex, okhathazekile ukuthi uzothathani ahlanganise nani ukuze ondle umndeni wakhe njengoba intengo yommbila kanye nemali yokugibela amatekisi kulokhu kuqhubeke njalo nokukhuphuka.

xho: uyaqhuba umsebenzi wokuqulunqa uhlobo lwesibonelelo esiza kunceda abantu abasokola kakhulu, ngendlela apho ipokotho yesizwe iza kufikelela khona.
zul: kunesisebenzi sefemu e-gqeberha manje esesibhekene nekusasa elingacacile neze kahle njengoba ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kuwumisa nse umsebenzi wokukhiqiza.

xho: olu hlobo lutsha lwesibonelelo uza kuyelelana nesibonelelo se-srd, kuquka nokusebenzisa iinkcukacha zabantu esele zikho koovimba bolwazi bakarhulumente ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuba wonke umntu osokolayo uyaxhamla.
zul: kungumsebenzi wombuso ukuhlinzeka ngokuvikeleka okuyisisekelo lapho kungafanele neze ukuthi kube khona noyedwa umuntu waseningizimu afrika ozithola eyisisulu.

xho: izindlu ezineetayitile ezidlulelwe lixesha ezingekaqukunjelwa zingaphezulu kwesigidi.
zul: njengamanje ezweni lethu, kunabantu abangaphezu kwezigidi ezingama-25 abathola uhlobo oluthile losizo lwesibonelelo-mali.

xho: ixabiso lezi zindlu bekufanele ukuba kudala zakhutshelwa emagameni abantu abasokolayo basemzantsi afrika liqikelelwa kwimali ezibhiliyoni ezingama-242 zeerandi.
zul: ngaphezu kwalokhu, kunamakhaya adla imbuya ngothi abalelwa ezigidini ezimbili athola izinsiza eziyisisekelo zamahhala zokuphakelwa ngamanzi, ugesi kanye nokuthuthelwa imfucuza.

xho: ngoku asizikuqukumbela ezi tayitile sele zidlulelwe lixesha, koko siza kuzama ukwenza le nkqubo yokuphicothwa nokukhutswa kweetayitile ikhawuleze futhi isebenziseke lula.
zul: cishe ama-60% esabelomali sethu asetshenziselwa lokho okubizwa ngezibonelelo zikahulumeni, ezihlinzeka ngezinhlobo ezihlukahlukene zosizo, izinsizakalo eziyisisekelo kanye nosizo oluqondiswe emakhaya kanye nomuntu ngamunye ngenhloso yokulwisana nobubha nokuxosha indlala.

xho: njengoko sasithembisele kwi-sona kulo nyaka uphelileyo, isebe lezemisebenzi karhulumente neziseko zophuhliso sele liyiqukumbele inkqubo yokukhutshelwa komhlaba karhulumente ozihektare ezingama-14 000 oza kusetyenziselwa ukwakha izindlu.
zul: ngenhloso yokweseka lo msebenzi kanye nokulekelela abantu ezindlekweni zokuphila ezilokhu zikhuphuke njalo, sizoqhubeka nokukhipha isibonelelo senhlalo sabangasebenzi (i-srd), njengamanje esifinyelela kubantu ababalelwa ezigidini eziyi-7.8.

xho: imfundo efikelelekayo sesona sixhobo siyinkunzi sokulwa intsokolo.
zul: sizoqinisekisa ukuthi ziyakhushulwa izibonelelo zikahulumeni ezikhona njengamanje ukuze sinciphise ukukhahlamezeka kwabantu abampofu ngenxa yokwehla kwamandla emali okudlondlobalayo.

xho: kufuneka sibagobe besebatsha abantwana ngokuthi siqinisekise ukuba sibanika isiseko esiza kubanceda bakwazi ukubhala nokufunda ngokulandelayo, futhi bafundele nokuziphuhlisa.
zul: uyaqhubeka umsebenzi wokuthuthukiswa kohlelo lwesibonelelomali esiyisisekelo esiqondiswe kuphela kulabo bantu abadinga ukubhekelelwa kakhulu abadla imbuya ngothi, uma isimo sezimali sikuvumela lokhu ngoba phela umgodlagodla kahulumeni unezidingo eziningi kanti imali ekhona incane.

xho: ke ngoko, ngumsebenzi omkhulu into yokuba inani labantwana abafumana isibonelelo sokufunda kwizikolo-mpeleso okanye iikritshi linyuke ngokuphindwe kabini phakathi kowama-2019 kunye nowama-2022, liye kufikelela kubantwana abasisiqingatha sesigidi.
zul: lokhu kuzokwakhela phezu kweqhingasu elisha lokusebenza esilithulile ngokusebenzisa isibonelelo se-srd, kubandakanya ukuxhunyaniswa kwemininingo esinayo kuhulumeni wonkana ukuze siqinisekise ukuthi siyafinyelela kubo bonke labo abantulayo.

xho: isebe lemfundo esisiseko liphungula ubucukubhede obufunekayo xa umntu efuna inkxaso-mali yokuvula isikolo-mpeleso esiza kunceda amawaka ukuba afumane izibonelelo kurhulumente.
zul: umgcinimafa kazwelonke wenza izinhlelo zokucubungula ukuthi kungalunga yini uma eqhamuka nezinyathelo eziphuthumayo zokunciphisa umthelela wokucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga emananini okudla.

xho: futhi masibaqhwabele izandla nabantwana abebefunda ibanga lematrikhi kulo nyaka uphelileyo ngokuba i-80% yabo ithe yaphumelela, futhi namaphondo onke ngokuthi anyuse inani labantwana beli banga abaphumeleleyo.
zul: kulo nyaka, sizothatha izinyathelo zokulekelela kakhulu amakhaya ampofu ngokuthi sisheshise ukuhlinzekwa kwamatayitela ezindlu zomxhaso.

xho: oku kuthetha ukuba indlela abaqhuba ngayo abafundi bezikolo ezingathathi ntweni liya linyuka, into ebonisa ukuba inkxaso karhulumente inegalelo.
zul: njengamanje ukusalela emuva kwenqubo yokukhishwa kwamatayitela kungaphezu kwezindlu eziyisigidi esisodwa, okuyinani lempahla elinganiselwa kwizigidigidi ezingama-242 zamarandi okufanele ngabe isezandleni zamakhaya ampofu kakhulu aseningizimu afrika.

xho: ezi ziphumo zibonisa ukuba mkhulu umsebenzi owenziwa ezikolweni.
zul: asizogxila nje kuphela ekuqedeni lokhu kusalela emuva, kodwa futhi sizogxila nasekwenzeni uhlelo lwamatayitela lusebenze ngendlela efanele futhi lufinyeleleke kalula.

xho: izikolo kufuneka zibe zindawo ezikhuselekileyo apho abantwana baza kukwazi ukufunda nokufundiswa kakuhle.
zul: njengoba sazibophezela ku-sona ngonyaka odlule, umnyango wezemisebenzi yomphakathi nengqalasizinda usukuphothulile ukudluliswa kwamahektha omhlaba wombuso ayizi-14 000 ukuze kwakhiwe kuwona izindlu.

xho: i-sanitation appropriate for education initiatve – ebizwa ngokuba yi-safe – kunye nephulo lokukhawulezisa ukwakhiwa kwezikolo (i-asid) sele zakhe izindlu zangasese ezifanelekileyo ezingama-55 000 ngoncedo olufunyenwe kurhulumente nakwicandelo labucala.
zul: ukufinyelela kwabo bonke abantu kwimfundo eseqophelweni eliphezulu yilona thuluzi elinamandla kakhulu esinalo lokuqeda ububha.

xho: ukuze sikhuphe abantwana abanezi zakhono zifunwa sisizwe, siyayandisa inkqubo yeekholeji zemfundo yoqeqesho nemisebenzi yezandla ngokuthi siqalise ukusebenzisa ikharityhulam ehlaziyiweyo eza kugxininisa kumakhondo amathathu amkelwe ngokusesikweni.
zul: kumele siqale ngezingane ezisencane kakhulu, sizihlinzeke ngesisekelo ezisidingayo ukuze zikwazi ukuyiqonda kahle into eziyibhalayo neziyifundayo, ukuze zikwazi ukufunda futhi zithuthuke.

xho: kulo nyaka, urhulumente uceba ukuqukumbela inkqubo ecacileyo yokuxhasa abafundi ngemali yokufunda, ingakumbi abafundi abangavumelekanga ukuba baxhamle kwisikimu sesizwe sokuxhasa abafundi ngemali yokufunda (i-nsfas).
zul: umnyango wezemfundo eyisisekelo uhlela kabusha izidingo zezikhungo ze-ecd ukuze zikwazi ukuthola ukwesekwa futhi ukuze ezinye eziyizinkulungwane ngezinkulungwane zithole imixhaso evela kuhulumeni.

xho: ngolo hlobo kuncedwe abo baphuma kumakhaya anemivuzo ephakathi kweyabantu abasokolayo kunye nabapokotho zifumileyo.
zul: futhi ngakolunye uhlangothi lohambo lwemfundo eyisisekelo, kumele silishayele ihlombe izinga lokuphumelela kwabafundi bakamatikuletsheni ngonyaka odlule elingama-80%, njengoba futhi zonke izifundazwe zibonise imiphumela engcono kunaleyo eziyithole ngaphambilini.

xho: abantu, mbombo zone zeli, baphila ngokungcungcutheka besoyikisela iintsapho zabo engozini.
zul: lokhu kusho ukuthi ukuphumelela kwabafundi abavela ezikoleni ezimpofu kulokhu kukhuphuke njalo, okuyinto ebonisa ngokusobala ukubaluleka kosizo nokwesekwa okuhlinzekwa nguhulumeni kulezo zikole.

xho: la malinge aquka ukutyala amapolisa amaninzi ezitalatweni kunye nokuseka amabutho angoompondo-zihlanjiwe bokulwa iintlobo ezithile zolwaphulo-mthetho.
zul: izikole kumele zibe yindawo ephephile futhi zivumele ukufunda nokufundisa ngempumelelo.

xho: kulo nyaka uphelileyo, sathatha isigqibo sokuba siqeshe amapolisa angama-12 000. sithetha nje, amapolisa amatsha angaphezulu kwama-10 000 alugqibile uqeqeso lokuqala kwizikolo zamapolisa futhi amanye angama-10 000 aza kuqeshwa aze aqeqeshwe kwakulo nyaka.
zul: uhlelo lwenhlanzeko kwezemfundo i-sanitation appropriate for education initiative – olwaziwa nge-safe – ngokuhlanganyela nohlelo lokusheshiswa kokwakhiwa nokuhlinzekwa kwengqalasizinda yezikole selwakhe izindlu zangasese ezisezingeni elikahle eziyizi-55 000 ngokusebenzisa izinsiza ezivela emkhakheni kahulumeni kanye nasemkhakheni ozimele.

xho: la mabutho amapolisa azingcali ajongene nokulwa iintlobo zolwaphulo-mthetho ezifana nokuxhwila, ukuhlawuliswa imali ngokugrogriswa, ukwemba imigodi ngokungekho mthethweni sele ebambe abarhanelwa abaliqela baze abaninzi kubo bafunyaniswa benamatyala, bagwetywa.
zul: ukuze kukhiqizwe amakhono adingwa yizwe lethu, siyalukhulisa uhlelo lwamakhono ezandla nokuqeqeshwa ngokuthi siqalise ukusebenza kwekharikhulamu egunyaziwe yohlelo lwemigudu yemfundo olumikhakha-mithathu.

xho: kuthathwa amanyathelo angqingqwa ngoku ukulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho lokutshatyalaliswa koqoqosho kunye nezinye iintlobo zolwaphulo-mthetho ezifana nalo ezibangela umonakalo omkhulu kuqoqosho lweli lizwe.
zul: kulo nyaka, uhulumeni uhlela ukuphothula uhlelo olubanzi lokuxhaswa kwabafundi ngezimali oluqondiswe emkhakheni wezemfundo ephakeme, ikakhulukazi kubafundi abavaleleke ngaphandle ngenxa yemigomo yokufaneleka yohlelo lukazwelonke lokuxhaswa kwabafundi ngezimali.

xho: ngoku kukho amaqela ajongene neziseko ezingundoqo zoqoqosho asebenza kwiindawo ezingama-20 ezidume ngezi ntlobo zolwaphulo-mthetho.
zul: ukuze sikwazi ukufinyelela kulabo bafundi abangondingasithebeni abaziwa ngokuthi yi-‘missing middle’.

xho: ngeyomnga, urhulumente waphakamisa ukuba lunqunyanyiswe urhwebo lokuthunyelwa kweentambo zekopolo kunye neenkcenkce ezindala zesinyithi ngeenjongo zokulwa imigulukudu ephila ngalo mkhuba nokulinda ukuba kude kuqulunqwe izivumelwano zorhwebo ezitsha.
zul: siqinisa i-saps ukuvimbela ubugebengu futhi senza ngcono amandla ophiko lukazwelonke lwezokushushisa (i-npa) kanye nezinkantolo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abenzi bobubi babhekana nengalo yomthetho.

xho: nanjengoko besiqalise ngeenkqubo yokuzisa iinguqu kwicandelo lombane, elamanzi eleziseko ezingundoqo zonxibelelwano nelokuhanjiswa kwemithwalo sisebenzisa iphulo elibizwa nge-operation vulindlela, siqalisile ngeenkqubo yokuzisa iinguqu ukuze siphucule indlela esilulwa ngayo ulwaphulo-mthetho.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ukukhuliswa kwesibalo samaphoyisa emigwaqeni kanye nokusungula amathimba akhethekile azogxila kwizinhlobo ezithile zamacala.

xho: siza kusisebenzisa ubuxhaka-xhaka bale mihla obusetyenziswa kumaziko oncedo ngomnxeba size siphucule iziko loncedo elinenombolo engu-10111 sikwenza oku sibambisene necandelo labucala.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, sanquma ukuqasha amaphoyisa amasha ayizi-12 000. kusukela lapho, angaphezu kwezi-10 000 amaphoyisa amasha aphothule ukuqeqeshwa kwawo ezikhungweni zokuqeqesha amaphoyisa futhi kunamanye ayizi-10 000 azoqashwa bese eqeqeshwa kulo nyaka.

xho: iinjongo zoku kukuqinisekisa ukuba xa abantu betsalela umnxeba amapolisa, kufuneka baphendulwe baze bafumane uncedo abalufunayo.
zul: amathimba amaphoyisa akhethekile abhekene ngqo namacala okuthumba, ukuphanga kanye nokumbiwa kwezimbiwa ngokungemthetho asezuze impumelelo emacaleni amaningi, lapho ebophe khona amashumi ngamashumi abasolwa futhi baningi kulaba abalahlwe ngamacala.

xho: siza kulandela iinkqubo ezikhokelisa phambili iinkcukacha eziphandisisiweyo ngendlela ephucukileyo ukuze sikhangele size sigxininise kwiindawo ezidume ngolwaphulo-mthetho.
zul: kuthathwa izinyathelo ezinqala ukubhekana namacala okucekelwa phansi komnotho ngamabomu kanye namanye amacala ahlobene nalokho, okungamacala adala umonakalo omkhulukazi emnothweni.

xho: eyona into ibaluleke kakhulu yeyokuba ngokuba siza kufaka uchatha kwimali eyabelwa amapolisa, i-npa kunye necandelo lophando elikhethekileyo (i-siu).
zul: ngonyaka odlule, ngatshela izwe ngomonakalo omkhulukazi odalwa wukwebiwa kwamakhebuli ethusi nensimbi ohlelweni lwethu lukagesi, izintambo zojantshi bezitimela kanye nenye ingqalasizinda yomphakathi.

xho: ulwaphulo-mthetho olwenziwa kumanina nabantwana luyintlungu embi eyambethe izwe lakuthi.
zul: kusukela lapho, amaphoyisa aphezu kwawo amasela amakhebuli.

xho: ngenyanga yekhala kulo nyaka uphelileyo, sabamba ingqungquthela kamongameli yesine ye-gbv ukuze sihlole umsebenzi osele wenziwe malunga nokuzalisekiswa okanye ukuqalisa ukusetyenziswa kwesicwangciso esiqiqisisiweyo sesizwe, esiqulethe amanyathelo anolwamvila nangqingqwa okulwa esi sihelegu.
zul: ngozibandlela, uhulumeni wethule ukumiswa okwesikhashana kokuthunyelwa emazweni angaphandle kwamakhebuli ethusi asesetshenzisiwe kanye nezinsimbi ezithile ezingamasekeni ukuze kunqandwe amaqembu ezigelekeqe futhi kuvunyelwe ukuqaliswa kohlelo olusha lokuhweba.

xho: enye yezinto ezichulumancisa kakhulu ngeli linge lethu lokulwa i-gbv yindlela amahlakani ezentlalo asixhasa ngayo esi sicwangciso siqiqisisiweyo sesizwe.
zul: njengoba sesiqalise izinguquko zomnotho kwezikagesi, amanzi, ukuxhumana ngobuchwepheshe kanye nokuthuthwa kwempahla ngokusebenzisa umkhankaso i-operation vulindlela, ngakolunye uhlangothi siqalisa inqubo yezinguquko yokuphucula impumelelo yempi yethu yokulwisana nobugebengu.

xho: ngeyomqungu kulo nyaka uphelileyo, ndatyikitya imithetho eyilwayo yayimithetho ezeleyo eenjongo zayo ikukukhusela amaxhobo e-gbv nokuqinisekisa ukuba abenzi bobubi abakwazi ukusebenzisa izikroba ezikhoyo kwimithetho yeli xa befuna ukungabanjwa.
zul: sizosebenzisa ikhono lethu lokwenza ngobunyoninco futhi ngendlela engambi eqolo umsebenzi wezizinda ezamukela izingcingo ukuze sisekele ukusebenza ngendlela efanele kwenombono yosizo i-10111, ngokubambisana nabomkhakha ozimele.

xho: siyaqhubeka nokuzama ukwenza ukuba abantu bakwazi ukusebenzisa nokuxhamla kwiinkundla zamatyala esondo futhi sandise nomsebenzi owenziwa zi-thuthuzela care centre.
zul: lokhu kwenzelwa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uma abantu befonela amaphoyisa, ziyaphendulwa izingcingo zabo futhi izimo eziphuthumayo ababhekene nazo zithathelwa izinyathelo.

xho: umba ophambili kwesi sicwangciso siqiqisisiweyo sesizwe ngowokuxhotyiswa kwamanina ngezoqoqosho.
zul: futhi sizosebenzisa ngobuhlakani obukhulu izindlela ezisekelwe kakhulu kwimininingo yolwazi olutholakele ukuhlonza kanye nokugxila ngokuqondileyo ezidlekeni zobugebengu.

xho: ukususela oko sabhengeza ukuba sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuba i-40% yeempahla neenkonzo ezithengwa ngurhulumente ziza kuthengwa kumashishini abantu ababhinqileyo, ngoku sele siziqalisile iinkqubo zokuxhasa oosomashishini abangamanina.
zul: okusemqoka kakhulu, amaphoyisa, i-npa kanye nophiko oluphenya amacala akhethekile kuzokwabelwa imali engeziwe kulesi sabelomali.

xho: ngokusebenzisa i-women’e economic assembly, siyobonile imibutho yamacandelo ahlukeneyo kunye neenkampani zithembisa ukuba ziza kufikelela kulo myinge ubekiwe ngamacandelo ahlukeneyo kulo lonke eli wenani lamanina ekufuneka axhamle ngokulinganayo namadoda.
zul: ngolwezi ngonyaka odlule, sabamba ingqungquthela kamongameli yesibili ye-gbvf ngenhloso yokuhlola inqubekela phambili esiyenziwe ekuqaliseni uhlelo lweqhingasu likazwelonke, eyamukela ngokusemthethweni uhlelo olubanzi, olusebenza kahle futhi olunokubumbana lokulwisana nalolu bhubhane.

xho: i-industrial development corporation ibekele bucala imali ezibhiliyoni ezisithoba zeerandi eza kuyityala kumashishini oomama.
zul: enye yezimpumelelo ezinkulukazi zomzamo wethu wokulwisana ne-gbv yindlela abalwamukele futhi balweseka ngayo uhlelo lweqhingasu likazwelonke labo esibambisene nabo emphakathini.

xho: amanye amaqumrhu, aquka i-public investment corporation kunye ne-national empowerment fund, nawo athembisile ukuba aza kubeka imali bucala eza kunceda amashishini abantu ababhinqileyo.
zul: ngomasingana ngonyaka odlule, ngasayina imithethosivivinywa emithathu esemqoka ukuze ibe yimithetho ezonikeza ukuvikeleka okuthe xaxa kulabo abasinde ku-gbv futhi eqinisekisayo ukuthi abenzi bobubi ngeke besakwazi ukusebenzisa amaqhinga athile awumphumela wobuthakathaka bomthetho ukuze bagweme ukushushiswa.

xho: sonke masifake isandla, thina njengabantu, amaziko kunye neenkokeli kulo lonke eli, kumalinge okulwa isihelegu sobundlobongela obenziwa kumanina nabantwana.
zul: siyaqhubeka nokwenza ngcono ukufinyeleleka kanye nokusebenza kwezinkantolo zamacala ezocansi kanye nokwandisa izikhungo zokunakekela, phecelezi, ama-thuthuzela care centres.

xho: kulo nyaka uphelileyo, ndathi siza kuthatha amanyathelo angqingqwa okulwa urhwaphilizo siqinisekise nokuba asisoze siphinde sibuyele kwixesha elifana nelokubanjwa ngobhongwane kombuso.
zul: into esemqoka kakhulu ohlelweni lweqhingasu likazwelonke wukufukulwa nokuhlonyiswa kwabesifazane kwezomnotho.

xho: iziphakamiso ezenziwa yile khomishini sele ziqalise ukuphunyezwa kulandelwa esa sicwangciso ndandisingenise epalamente ngeyedwarha kulo nyaka uphelileyo ukuze zonke ezi ndawo ziqhwalelayo zabonwa yikhomishini zilungiswe futhi sithintele nokuba singaze siphinde sibone urhulumente wethu ebanjwe ngobhongwane ngoohlohl’esakhe.
zul: kusukela ngamemezela ukuzimisela kwethu ukuthi okungenani ama-40% empahla nezinsizakalo ezithengwa nguhulumeni kumele kuthengwe emabhizinisini abesifazane, sihlose ukwenza isimo esikahle esizovumela ukwesekwa kosomabhizinisi besifazane.

xho: ibhunga lesizwe labacebisi elichasene norhwaphilizo, elakhiwa ngabemi beli abaphuma kwiinkalo ezahlukeneyo, sele lisekiwe ukwenzela ukuba linike iingcebiso ngeendlela ezifanelekileyo zokusiphula neengcambi urhwaphilizo, kuquka nokutshintsha indlela akheke ngayo amaziko anikwe uxanduva lokulwa urhwaphilizo.
zul: sesiqeqeshe amabhizinisi abesifazane angaphezu kwezi-3 400, ukuze siwalungiselele ukusebenzisa amathuba okuhlinzeka ngempahla nezinsizakalo kuhulumeni.

xho: siphezu komsebenzi wokuxhobisa ngezakhono icandelo lokukhuselwa koodiz’amahleko kwaye siza kwenza izilungiso kumthetho wokudiza amahlebo ekhusini, wowama-2000 (umthetho 26 wowama-2000) kunye nomthetho wokukhuselwa koodiz’amahlebo, wowe-1998 (umthetho 112 wowe-1998) ukuze siqinisekise ukuba lungqingqwa ukhuseleko loodiz’amahlebo.
zul: ngokusebenzisa ingqungquthela yabesifazane yezomnotho, sesibone izinhlangano nezinkampani zemboni zizibophezela ekufinyeleleni emigomweni ebekiwe yoguquko oluphathelene nezobulili embonini yonkana.

xho: sele uqalisile umsebenzi wokwenza kube lula kubasebenzi bakarhulumente abadiza kwabasemagunyeni ulawulo olugwenxa, urhwaphilizo kunye nokuziphatha ngendlela enxamnye nemigaqo yokuziphatha, ukuba basebenzisa inkqubo yokukhuselwa koodiz’amahlebo.
zul: inhlangano yokuthuthukiswa kwezimboni seyibeke eceleni imali elinganiselwa kwizigidigidi eziyisi-9 zamarandi ezotshalwa emabhizinisini aholwa ngabesifazane.

xho: siza kuwuqukumbela umthetho oyilwayo wokuthenga kukarhulumente ukuze silungise ezi ngxakana zachazwa kwikhomishini yokubanjwa ngobhongwane kombuso sizwe siphucule indlela yokusebenza, ukulibona ixabiso lento oyichithe kuyo imali kunye nokwenza izinto elubala.
zul: ezinye izikhungo, kubandakanya inhlangano yezokutshalwa kwezimali zikahulumeni kanye nesikhwama sikazwelonke sokufukula nokuhlomisa abantu abamnyama, nazo sezizibophezelelile ukuthi zizosungula izinhlelo ezikhethekile ezenzelwe kuphela umsebenzi wokweseka amabhizinisi abesifazane.

xho: ii-arhente zogcino-mthetho zeli ezivuke okutsha ngoku zizithathela amanyathelo angqongqo iinkampani kunye nabantu ekutyholwa ukuba bayachaphazeleka kumkhuba wokubanjwa ngobhongwane kombuso.
zul: sonke kumele sidlale indima yethu, njengomuntu ngamunye, njengezikhungo futhi njengabaholi emphakathini wonkana ukuze siqede lobu bugebengu obubhekiswe kwabesifazane nezingane.

xho: icandelo lezophando le-npa, elasekwa ngowama-2019, sele libambe abatyholwa abali-187 betyholwa ngamatyala angama-32 anxulumene nokubanjwa ngobhongwane kombuso kunye norhwaphilizo.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, ngathi sizothatha izinyathelo ezinqala zokulwisana nenkohlakalo futhi ukuze siphume siphele esikhathini sokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane.

xho: imali engaphezulu kweebhiliyoni ezisixhenxe zeerandi sele ibuyiselwe kurhulumente ivela kumatyala anxulumene nokubanjwa ngobhongwane kombuso.
zul: ikhomishani ephenya ngokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane ephethwe yinhloko yamajaji u-raymond zondo isiwuphothulile umsebenzi wayo futhi iyithumelile ingxenye yokugcina yombiko wayo ngonhlangulana wonyaka odlule.

xho: bemi bomzantsi afrika,ukuze sikwazi ukuhamba ngesantya esisifunayo kula lamalinge okulwa ezi ngxaki sijamelene nazo, kufuneka sibe norhulumente onezakhono futhi nosebenzayo.
zul: izincomo zekhomishani ziyaqaliswa ngokohlelo engaluthumela ephalamende ngomfumfu ngonyaka odlule ukuze ukuntengantenga nobuthakathaka obukhona obahlonzwa yikhomishani kubhekwane ngqo nako futhi ukuze singalokothi neze sikuvumele ukubanjwa ngobhongwane kombuso.

xho: ezona ngxaki zinkulu esinazo zikumashishini ombuso kunye noomasipala.
zul: umkhandlu kazwelonke wokweluleka mayelana nokulwisana nenkohlakalo, owakhiwe ngabantu abavela emphakathini wonkana, sewusunguliwe ukuze weluleke maqondana nezindlela zokuqeda inkohlakalo, kubandakanya nokulungiswa kabusha ngokuphelele kwesimo sohlaka lokwakheka nokusebenza kwezikhungo ukuze kulwiswane nenkohlakalo.

xho: ii-soe ezininzi zeli zithiwe nkxi ngamatyala, azityali mali yaneleyo kwiziseko zazo ezingundoqo, zithwaxwa ngumonakalo owenziwa kukubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane kunye nokungabi nabasebenzi banezakhono ezifanelekileyo.
zul: siyasebenza ngenhloso yokuhlomisa ngezinsiza nokucija uphiko lokuvikelwa kofakazi futhi sizokwethula izichibiyelo emthethweni wokudalula ulwazi ngendlela evikelekile, wezi-2000 (umthetho wama-26 wezi-2000) kanye nomthetho wokuvikelwa kofakazi, we-1998 (umthetho we-112 we-1998) ukuze siqinise ukuvikelwa kwezingede.

xho: siza kulandela iziphakamiso ezenziwe kwibhunga likamongameli lee-soe lokuba kusekwe inkampani eza kulawula onke amashishini karhulumente njengenxalenye yokuba iinkampani zikarhulumente zilawulwe kwiziko elinye into leyo eza kwenza lula ukubeka iliso kwi-soe.
zul: usuqalile umsebenzi wokwenza ngcono ukufinyelela ohlelweni lokuvikelwa kofakazi kwabasebenzi bakahulumeni abaveza obala izenzo zokungaphathi ngendlela efanele, inkohlakalo kanye nokuziphatha okungenaso isimilo nobuqotho.

xho: komnye umba, ndiyalele i-ofisi kamongameli kunye nonondyebo wesizwe ukuba basebenzisana kuze kukhangelwe indlela ekunokwenziwa ngayo ukuba asebenza ngobunono amasebe karhulumente, amaqumrhu ombuso kunye neenkqubo kule minyaka mithathu izayo.
zul: sizophothula uhlaka lomthethosivivinywa wokuthengwa kwempahla nezinsizakalo ezidingwa nguhulumeni ukuze silungise ubuthakathaka nokungahanjiswa kwezinto ngendlela okwahlonzwa yikhomishani ephenya ngokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane futhi senze ngcono ukusebenza, uhulumeni athole imbuyiselomali enhle ngemali ayisebenzisile futhi kusetshenzwe ngendlela evulelekile nesobala.

xho: unondyebo wesizwe uqikelela ukuba umbuso ungonga imali ezibhiliyoni zeerandi ezingama-27 kule minyaka imbalwa izayo ukuba ingalungiswa ingxaki yokufana kwemisebenzi eyenziwa ngamacandelo ahlukeneyo, kuvalwe amacandelo angasebenzi kakuhle kuze kudityaniswe amaqumrhu apho kubonwa imfuneko.
zul: izimpiko zethu zokugcina umthetho esezinogqozi nofuqufuqu olusha zithatha izinyathelo ezinqala ezinkampanini nakubantu abasolwa ngokubandakanyeka ekubanjweni kombuso ngobhongwane.

xho: oomasipala abaninzi beli, abali-163 kwabangama-257 bafadalele okanye basezingxakini ezinkulu ngenxa yolawulo olugwenxa, iinkqubo zolawulo lwezimali ezingasebenziyo nezonganyelwe lurhwaphilizo kunye nokuphatha nje ngokubanzi kwakunye nokungahanjiswa kweenkonzo.
zul: uphiko lwezokuphenya amacala lwe-npa, engalusungula ngowezi-2019, selubizele enkantolo abasolwa abayi-187 emacaleni angama-32 okubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane kanye nenkohlakalo.

xho: urhulumente uqalise ngamanyathelo aliqela okungenelela ukuze kulungiswe le ngxaki yokungasebenzi kakuhle koomasipala kuze kuphuculwe neenkqubo zokuhanjiswa kweenkonzo ezisiseko.
zul: kuze kube manje iyizigidigidi eziyisi-7 zamarandi imali esibuyiselwe kumbuso evela emacaleni okubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane.

xho: la manyathelo aquka ukuqeqesha amagosa kunye nabameli boluntu abonyuliweyo, ukulungisa nokuphucula iziseko ezingundoqo zoomasipala, nokusebenzisa amagunya karhulumente kazwelonke okungenelela xa oomasipala bengawenzi umsebenzi wabo.
zul: kuze kube manje, iyizigidigidi eziyi-12.9 zamarandi imali nempahla ebanjiwe.

xho: urhulumente oneengcali, onabasebenzi abanezakhono, abantu abazimiseleyo nabathembakeleyo ubalulekile ukuze kubekho umbuso osebenzayo futhi kuliwe urhwaphilizo, ukwenzelelana idolo kunye nenkcitho engaphaya.
zul: kulo nyaka, uphiko lwezokuphenya amacala selusungulwe njengesikhungo esizosebenza unomphela ngaphakathi kwe-npa.

xho: ngelokulandela iziphakamiso ezenziwa yikhomishini yokubanjwa ngobhongwane kombuso kunye nesicwangciso-sikhokela sokujikwa kukarhulumente akhokelwe zingcali eziqeqeshiweyo, uvavanyo oluhlola ukuthembeka luza kuba yinxalenye yezinto ezinyanzelekileyo xa kuza kuqeshwa abantu kurhulumente, futhi kuza kubhaliswa novavanyo lokungena emsebenzini.
zul: bantu bakithi baseningizimu afrika, ukuze kwenziwe noma iyiphi inqubekela phambili ekusombululeni izinselele eziphuthumayo esibhekene nazo, sidinga umbuso onamandla futhi onekhono lokusebenza kahle.

xho: senza izilungiso emithethweni futhi siza kuyinika amagunya athe chatha ikhomishini yabasebenzi bakarhulumente ukuze iqinisekisa ukuba kuqeshwa abantu abaneziqinisekiso zemfundo ezifanelekileyo kwizikhundla eziphezulu kuze kuqaliswe inkqubo yokuba necandelo elinye elijongene nezabasebenzi bakarhulumente.
zul: iningi lama-soe ethu licwile ezikweletini ezinzima, utshalomali alufakwa kahle kwingqalasizinda, futhi libhekene nemithelela yokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane kanye kunokushoda kwamakhono.

xho: malungu ahloniphekileyonjengokuba sizimisele ukuphucula ubomi bomlisela nomthinjana weli kunye nokuqinisekisa ukuba sonke kweli lizwe sibudla ngokulinganayo ubuncwane balo, sikwazimisele nokuthatha inxaxheba kwidabi lokulwela i-afrika engcono kunye nehlabathi elingcono.
zul: sizokuqalisa ukusebenza kwesincomo somkhandlu kamongameli wama-soe sokusungula inkampani ezoba ngumnikazi wamabhizinisi ombuso njengengxenye yohlelo lokubeka amandla obunikazi bomnikazimasheya ezandleni zesikhungo esisodwa oluzoqinisekisa ukuthi umsebenzi wokuqapha ama-soe wenziwa ngendlela efanele.

xho: isixhalisa kakhulu into yokujongana kwezikhondo zamehlo kutsha nje phakathi kwabantu belizwe lase-israel nabelizwe lasepalestine, kwaye sithi makuthotywe izibilini kubekwe phantsi izikhali kubuyelwe kwiingxoxo ezikhe zaphazamiseka zokwakha uxolo.
zul: okunye okuseceleni okwehlukile wukuthi sengiyalele ihhovisi likamongameli kanye nomgcinimafa kazwelonke ukuthi basebenzisane ekuhlelweni kabusha kweminyango, izikhungo kanye nezinhlelo zikahulumeni kule minyaka emithathu ezayo.

xho: umzantsi afrika uthi tutwini kurhulumente nabantu basetürkiye emva kwenyikima ebangele intshabalalo kweliya lizwe ekuqaleni kwale veki.
zul: umgcinimafa kazwelonke ulinganisela ekutheni kungenzeka kongiwe imali eyizigidigidi ezingama-27 zamarandi esikhathini esimaphakathi uma kulungiswa inkinga yamagunya afanayo enziwa ngokungenasidingo yiminyango nezikhungo ezahlukene, kuvalwe nezinhlelo ezingasebenzi kahle futhi kuhlanganiswe izikhungo ezahlukene zibe yisikhungo esisodwa lapho kufanelekile.

xho: njengesizwe siyalibulela igalelo le-gift of the givers kwiphulo lokunceda abo bathwaxwe yile nyikima.
zul: uhulumeni uqalisa izinhlelo zokungenelela eziningana ngenhloso yokulungisa ukuhluleka okukhona ezingeni lohulumeni basekhaya futhi kwenziwe ngcono nokuhlinzekwa kwezidingongqangi.

xho: asilali buhlayo lungquzulwano olwenzeka phakathi kwerussia ne-ukraine kwaye sibongoza la mazwe ukuba abeke phantsi izikhali azame ukusombulula iimbambano zawo ngomlomo.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ukuphuculwa kwamandla namakhono okusebenza abameleli bomphakathi kanye nabasebenzi, ukulungiswa nokuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda yendawo, kanye nokusetshenziswa kwamandla kahulumeni kazwelonke okungenelela lapho omasipala behluleka ukufezekisa izibopho zabo.

xho: ikamva lomzantsi afrika lixhomekeke kweli lizwekazi lethu, ingakumbi kumbutho wokuphuhliswa kwamazwe asemazantsi e-afrika (i-sadc).
zul: umkhakha wezemisebenzi kahulumeni osebenza ngobungoti nobunyoninco, onabasebenzi abanamakhono, abazinikele futhi abanobuqotho, usemqoka kakhulu embusweni osebenza kahle kanye nasekuqedeni inkohlakalo, ukuqasha ngokwenzelela ngokusebenzisa amandla ngokungafanele kanye nokumosha.

xho: ukuze neli lethu ilizwe libe nozinzo futhi liqhubele phambili, sinyanzelekile ukuba sincedise kumaphulo okuzisa uxolo, uzinzo kunye nophuhliso kweli lizwekazi lasekhaya.
zul: ngenhloso yokusabela nokufezekisa lokho okushiwo yikhomishani ephenya ngokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane futhi ngokuhambisana nohlaka lokwenziwa komkhakha wezemisebenzi kahulumeni usebenze ngobuchule nobunyoninco, ukuhlolwa kwesimilo nobuqotho kuzoba yisidingo esiphoqelekile uma kuqashwa abasebenzi emkhakheni wezemisebenzi kahulumeni futhi kuzokwethulwa ukuhlolwa kwalabo abagaqele ukungena futhi basebenze kulo mkhakha.

xho: siyaqhubeleka nokuwandisa amathuba orhwebo notyalo-mali namahlakani ethu ezorhwebo ehlabathi kwaye sifuna ukurhwebeshela emzantsi afrika utyalo-mali kunye nemali ngokuthi sisebenzise amathuba esiwafumanayo ngokuthatha inxaxheba kumaqonga eengxoxo zehlabathi afana ne-g20, eza kusingathwa kuleli lizwe ngowama-2025.
zul: sichibiyela imithetho futhi siqinisa indima yekhomishani yezemisebenzi kahulumeni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ngabantu abanezicucu zemfundo nolwazi lomsebenzi olufanelekile abaqashwa ezikhundleni zokuphatha eziphezulu futhi ukuze sikwazi ukuqalisa umsebenzi wokwakha umkhakha wezemisebenzi kahulumeni owodwa futhi osebenza ngendlela ehambelanayo.

xho: siza kugxininisa kumba wentsebenziswano kuphuhliso oluzinzileyo, ukutshintshela kuhlobo lwamandla angenabungozi kokusingqongileyo, ukuphuhliswa kwamashishini kunye nokusetyenziswa kwesivumelwano sommandla welizwekazi le-afrika elingahlawulisani rhafu yorhwebelwano (i-afcfta).
zul: malungu ahloniphekile, njengoba sizibophezele ekwenzeni ngcono isimo senhlalo nempumelelo yabesilisa nabesifazane bakuleli kanye nasekuthuthukiseni ukuchuma komuntu wonke, ngokunjalo futhi sizibophezele nasekufezekiseni i-afrika engcono kanye nomhlaba ongcono.

xho: yakuba iqalisile ukusebenza i-afcfta iza kusinika ithuba lokuqala ezimbalini lokuba kuhlanganiswe ngamandla uqoqosho lwe-afrika, lokukhulisa uqoqosho kumazwe ase-afrika, kuze kuvele namathuba okufumana iindawo kunye nabantu eziza kukwazi ukurhweba nabo iinkampani zasemzantsi afrika.
zul: sikhathazeke kakhulu ngokudlondlobala kamuva nje kwengxabano phakathi kwabantu bakwa-israel kanye nabantu base-palestine, futhi siyanxusa ukuthi kuphele ukungqubuzana futhi kuqaliswe kabusha inqubo emileyo njengamanje yokuletha uxolo.

xho: bemi bomzantsi afrika,imbilini yesizwe ibonakala mhla kunzima.
zul: iningizimu afrika izwakalisa ukuzwelana kwayo okukhulu nohulumeni kanye nabantu base-türkiye kulandela ukuzamazama komhlaba okudale umonakalo omkhulu ngasekuqaleni kwaleli viki.

xho: imbilini yesizwe ebonwa kwindlela abemi baso abajajulisana ngayo neemeko ezimaxongo – bangakwenza oku ngokubambisana baze bafunquke bonke baswantsulisane neengxaki abajamelene nazo, besengela thungeni linye.
zul: njengezwe siziqhenya kakhulu ngemizamo yenhlangano i-gift of the givers yokusiza labo abakhahlanyezwe wukuzamazama komhlaba.

xho: sisizwe esijongene neengxaki zanamhlanje, kodwa sikwasisizwe esibhinqe omfutshane sizama ukuzalisekisa izithembiso zekamva eliqaqambileyo.
zul: sisalokhu sikhathazeke kakhulu ngempi eqhubekayo phakathi kwe-russia ne-ukraine futhi siyabanxusa bonke abathintekayo ukuba babeke phansi izikhali futhi bazame ukuthola isixazululo esinokuthula ngokuthi kuxoxiswane.

xho: sasinephupha lelizwe apho sasiza kukwazi ukuphilisana ngoxolo, apho sasiza kukwazi ukusebenzisana sakhe isizwe esinye esinephupha elinye ngekamva lethu.
zul: ngenxa yokucabangela uzinzo nokuchuma kwakuleli, sinesibopho sokwenza imizamo yokungenelela ezoletha ukuthula, uzinzo kanye nentuthuko ezwekazini lethu.

xho: isizwe sethu sisekelwe kumgaqo-siseko wona okhokelisa phambili imimiselo ebalulekileyo yolawulo lwentando yesinzi esisidima, ulingwano nenkululeko, kunye namalungelo ethu sonke.
zul: sizoqhubeka nokwandisa amathuba okuhwebelana nokutshalwa kwezimali namazwe esibambisene nawo kwezohwebo emhlabeni futhi sizozama ukuheha utshalomali kanye nokuxhaswa ngezimali kweningizimu afrika ngokusebenzisa ukubamba iqhaza kwethu kwizigcawu ezibandakanya amazwe ahlukahlukene ezinjenge-g20, okuyisigcawu esizosisingatha ngowezi-2025.

xho: la manyathelo ndiwandlale ngolu hlatya, esakhela kumsebenzi osele wenziwe ngaphambili, aza kusisondeza kufutshane kweli phupha.
zul: kulo nyaka iningizimu afrika izophinda futhi iqhoqhobale isikhundla sokuba ngusihlalo wombimbi lwamazwe lwe-brazil, i-russia, i-india, i-china kanye neningizimu afrika.

xho: aza kusinceda sikwazi ukusebenza ngokubambisana nangokuzimisela okukhulu, sizoyise nezi ngxaki sijongene nazo sivele sisizwe esizalwe ngokutsha.
zul: sizogxila kubambiswano maqondana nentuthuko esimeme, ukuguqukela emandleni kagesi ohlanzekile ngendlela enobulungiswa nobuqotho, ukusungulwa kwezimboni kanye nokuqaliswa kwendawo-sifunda yokuhwebelana mahhala ezwekazini lase-afrika.

xho: sizakudlula kwezi ngxaki sikuzo sivele ngaphaya sisizwe esinombane osebenzayo, ongacima-cimiyo nofikelelekayo.
zul: iningizimu afrika, ngokuhlanganyela nomakhelwane bayo kwinhlangano yamazwe aseningizimu ne-afrika angakhokhisani intela yezimpahla ezingenayo neziphumayo emingceleni, phecelezi, i-southern african customs union, khona maduze nje izophothula isiphakamiso sethu esiphathelene nezimboni kwindawo-sifunda yokuhwebelana mahhala ezwekazini lase-afrika.

xho: sizakuvela sisizwe ezinamazibuko noololiwe abakwizinga lehlabathi, sisizwe apho abemi abaninzi bomzantsi afrika kwiindawo ezininzi benayo i-intanethi ehamba ngesantya esiphezulu, sisizwe esinamanzi oneleyo ampompoza ezimpompeni.
zul: uma seyisebenza ngokuphelele, indawo-sifunda yokuhwebelana mahhala ezwekazini izohlinzeka ngethuba eliyingqayizivele lokuqinisa ukudidiyelwa kwe-afrika kwezomnotho, ukukhuliswa kweminotho yamazwe, kanye nokuvulelwa kwezinkampani zaseningizimu afrika imingcele emisha kanye nezimakethe.

xho: kuza kuthontelana abakhenkethi kweli lizwe lakuthi, futhi siza kuphuhlisa size siqeqeshe abantu abanezi ntlobo zezakhono zifunwa kanye luqoqosho lweli lizwe.
zul: bantu bakithi baseningizimu afrika, isimobunjalo soqobo sesizwe sivela obala lapho kubhekenwe nesimo esinzima.

xho: siza kudalela abangasebenziyo inkitha yemisebenzi, size sivuselele ithemba kwabo bebesele bencamile.
zul: isizwe sizibonakalisa ubunjalo baso ngendlela abantu baso ababhekana ngayo nobunzima obukhulu – sizibonakalisa ngokuthi siyakwazi yini ukusebenzisana ngokuhlanganyela futhi sibhekane ngqo nezinselele zaso njengesizwe esisodwa, esibunjaniswe yinhloso efanayo, noma-ke siyisizwe esithi maluju, siphonse ithawula ezinkingeni esibhekene nazo.

xho: kuza kugcwala amapolisa ezitalatweni enze umsebenzi wawo, ekhatshwa ngamaqumrhu ogcino-cwangco oluntu kunye negunyabantu lezotshutshiso elizimeleyo nelingenalusini, abantu baza kutsho bamthembe urhulumente ukuba uligxadi labo lokugqibela lokubakhusela.
zul: thina siyisizwe esimatasa esibhekene nezinselele zesikhathi samanje, kodwa futhi siyisizwe esizabalazela ukufezekisa isithembiso sengomuso lethu.

xho: ngokulwa umkhuba wokutshatyalaliswa koqoqosho kunye nolwaphulo-mthetho oluqhutywa ngamaqela emigulukudu, iziseko zethu ezingundoqo ziza kukhuseleka futhi namashishini aza kusebenza ngeentliziyo ezingenaxhala.
zul: ngenkathi sithatha isinyathelo sokuqala emgwaqeni obheke kwintando yeningi labantu, sabe sinombono ocacile wokuthi uyosiholela kuphi lowo mgwaqo.

xho: njengoko sibonisa imbeko kule ngqanga, masisimelele ngamazwi wayo eyawenza ngethuba ibekwa ngokusesikweni njengomongameli ngowe-1994, apho yathetha yenjenje:“kwintlungu engathethekiyo ebangelwe ngumntu engcungcuthekise iminyaka, kufanele ukuba kuzalwe isizwe abantu abayakuzingoba isifuba ngaso.
zul: zizokwenza ukuthi, sisebenze ngokuhlanganyela futhi sisebenze ngenhloso, ukuze siphume kulesi simo esinzima siyisizwe esiguqukile.

xho: izinto esizenza imihla nezolo njengabemi bomzantsi afrika kufanele zizale isizwe esiza kukhokelisa phambili size sigxininise inkolelo yoluntu enzulu kubulugisa futhi siluqinise ukholo lwethu kumoya onyulu womnye size sihlale ethembeni lokuba sonke sizakuwongwa ngobomi obuzukileyo.
zul: sizophuma kulesi simo esinzima siphethe uhlelo lukagesi olusebenza kahle kakhulu, oluthembakele kakhudlwana futhi oluncintisana kangcono.

xho: ukwakha isizwe esifana nesi, ukulwa ezi nzima sijongene nazo, kufuneka sisebenze ngokubambisana.
zul: sizophuma siphethe izikhumulo kanye nezokuthutha ngezitimela ezizophinda futhi zibe sesimweni sokuncintisana nalezo eziphuma phambili emhlabeni, sizophuma siphethe uhlelo lwe-inthanethi olusheshayo okufinyelela kulona abantu baseningizimu afrika abaningi futhi olutholakala ezingxenyeni eziningi zezwe, futhi sizophuma siphethe ukuphakelwa kwamanzi aseqophelweni eliphezulu, atholakala ngaso sonke isikhathi.
